  75. Chapter 1321: Legal Transmission is Accused of Being a Mystery

  77. At this moment, Li Fan suddenly heard Zhong Daogong say this.Chapter 1322
  78. Chapter 1323: Reversing Entropy Returns to Youth
  79. Chapter 1324: Blood Sees True Immortal Memory
  80. With safety assured, Li Fan did his best to maintain the Innate Grandmaster Technique, simultaneously focusing his attention on the True Immortal blood that resembled a fiery wall. Under the impact of countless divine senses, its defenses seemed to show faint cracks. The stalemate continued for an unknown duration. Finally, Li Fan broke through the defenses of the True Immortal blood. The backlash vanished out of thin air, and his soul instantly felt clear and cool. A beam of light emerged from the True Immortal blood, enveloping Li Fan's divine sense. Afterward, a segment of light and shadow appeared before him. It was as if it were covered in mist, and all surrounding scenes were indistinct. An enraged voice was heard from a distant, towering figure. It was sporadic, and only the general meaning could be understood: "...Qionglang Star Domain... Yan... guarding..." "...Target found..." "Your subject obeys the order." A low voice emanated from his own body. The light and shadow shifted again. In the next moment, he was already within the Xuanhuang Realm. Standing high above, overlooking the myriad sentient beings within the realm. However, his body's attention seemed not to be on the Xuanhuang Realm below, but rather on the outside of the starry sky. He appeared to be waiting for something. After an unknown amount of time, a beam of light suddenly arrived from beyond the heavens. His gaze immediately locked onto it. But he did not interfere, allowing the beam of light to fall into the Xuanhuang Realm. Only when the light completely dimmed and settled did his figure descend to the mortal world to investigate specifically. "Not yet." "But it's not bad. If it were years ago, ascension would have been possible. What a pity..." The figure seemed accustomed to this outcome, shaking his head with neither joy nor sorrow, and then returned to the Xuanhuang Realm's celestial dome. Silently watching, waiting for the arrival of the next target... The scene abruptly froze, then rapidly faded and dissipated like a vintage photograph. Li Fan jolted back to reality, returning to the present. Although the memories experienced within the True Immortal blood were fleeting, Li Fan felt as if he had lived through dozens of lifetimes. This longevity was also reflected in his physical body. His long hair, which had been flowing freely, had now grown to his waist, interspersed with white strands. His face, palms, and even the skin all over his body had become somewhat wrinkled. Li Fan looked at his age on the Return to Reality panel. His mental age had not changed, but his physiological lifespan limit had been directly reduced to 50 years. He was still thirty years old in spirit, yet his life was nearing its end. "Is this the price of prying into True Immortals?" After attempting to use the Xuanhuang Realm's celestial treasures that increased lifespan and confirming they could not increase this reduced lifespan limit, Li Fan's heart filled with dread. "If it were an ordinary cultivator, they would surely be driven to a desperate situation by this." "Fortunately, I have [Return to Reality]. A 50-year lifespan limit makes little difference to me." "There are still 20 years left in this life, which is enough to complete my plans." Li Fan's mood calmed down, and he couldn't help but recall the scenes he had seen within the True Immortal blood earlier. "The True Immortal who owned this blood should have been ordered to come to Xuanhuang to find a certain target..." "The word 'subject' is quite interesting." "Moreover, that beam of light from beyond the heavens..." Li Fan narrowed his eyes. Combining the information from the ancient immortal formations in the Xuanhuang Realm and the clues obtained from outside the high wall, a guess emerged in Li Fan's mind: "The ancient Xuanhuang Realm was also 'capturing' things." "Unlike the later capture of other cultivation worlds, the target at that time was... 'Humans'?" Li Fan's eyes flickered. "But it's not bad. If it were years ago, ascension would have been possible..." Li Fan repeated the True Immortal's words several times. "The 'light from beyond the heavens' that had the 'potential for ascension' was not the target that True Immortal was waiting for. What exactly is it..." Suddenly, Li Fan, for some unknown reason, began to associate himself with it. Although the True Immortal's memories were vague and from countless years ago, Li Fan inexplicably felt a sense of having narrowly escaped a catastrophe. When he came to his senses, his back was already drenched in cold sweat. This was not due to Li Fan's timidity, but rather a primal fear and relief after realizing the situation in hindsight. "This..." His rapidly beating heart slowly calmed down. Li Fan temporarily left the underground space of the Dao Discussion Platform and flickered back to the sky above the Great Profound Minor World. Boundless clouds obscured the sight of the living beings on the ground. Li Fan savored the premonition he had just experienced. "Although it's hard to believe..." "But a premonition from the depths of my being tells me that years ago, the True Immortal's target in Xuanhuang might actually have been me?!" "Or rather, not me, but [Return to Reality]!" Li Fan closed his eyes, preventing his inner turmoil and shock from being exposed. "[Return to Reality], [Return to Reality]..." As he spoke, the surrounding scenery became illusory and ethereal again. Being isolated from the real world gave Li Fan a slight sense of peace. "[Return to Reality] involves the Great Dao of [True and False] and [Illusion and Reality]." "Wondrous artifacts of heaven and earth, True Immortal script characters, and even the mysterious symbol that created the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate's bloodline, are all partial projections of the Great Dao." "But only [Return to Reality] stands above all else." "It can be said to be almost the embodiment of the Great Dao of [True and False] and [Illusion and Reality] itself..." Li Fan's thoughts churned as he calmly contemplated. "The fact that the True Immortal called himself 'subject' suggests that the towering figure in the memory must have an extraordinary status." "Qionglang Star Domain... Yan..." Li Fan attempted to deduce the possible truth of the matter from the fragmented information. "It appears the Immortal Realm was already facing a crisis at that time." "Yan..." "With the power of a True Immortal, perhaps they could deduce a solution to the Immortal Realm's crisis, which was [Return to Reality]." "That's why they were 'lying in wait' in the Xuanhuang Realm?" "However, for some reason, I arrived here tens of thousands of years too late." ... After breaking free from the True Immortal's memories for a long time, the lingering sense of narrowly escaping death in Li Fan's heart eventually dissipated. With his emotions calmed, Li Fan re-examined his earlier speculation and found it almost absurdly laughable. "What is the truth?" Li Fan, his mood having calmed, flickered from the sky back to the underground. He looked at the remaining True Immortal blood in the golden net, pondering for a long time. "I cannot pry into it further in this life." "I will see in the next life if I can find more clues." "Even if my guess is confirmed, it doesn't matter. After all, the Immortal Realm faced a great calamity, and those True Immortals who wanted to 'hunt' me have already disappeared first!" A glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes, and his state of mind became steady once more. Although he could not further pry into the memories from the True Immortal blood in this life, it did not prevent Li Fan from continuing his research on the True Immortal flesh. "Next, let me see how the True Immortal flesh resists the power of True Immortal script characters." With his Origin Force Essence surgical knife, he cut off a small piece of flesh. Then, golden light continuously rotated, transforming into a grinder, crushing this small piece of flesh.Chapter 1324

  107. Chapter 1351: The Supreme Being Controls the Heavens

Chapter 1251: The Holy Emperor Crosses the Tribulation

Although the pond did not appear extraordinary, the Stone Tablet's intuition told it that some secret was hidden here.

The Stone Tablet slowly walked to the edge of the pond. The clear water reflected the scholar's appearance, causing him to pause slightly.

Then, he shook his head, and his appearance instantly changed.

"I am somewhat curious, what were you originally like?" the Faceless Saint Emperor Li Ping said from behind him.

"Heh heh, I can barely remember myself," the Stone Tablet chuckled self-deprecatingly.

Then, it seriously observed the pond.

The water was not deep, and one could see the bottom at a glance.

"Hmm?"

The Stone Tablet observed for a long time but found no mystery in the pond, and couldn't help but doubt its own judgment.

It turned to look at Li Ping.

Li Ping did not explain, but suddenly asked meaningfully, "Before the great calamity of the Xuanhuang Realm, there were many Immortal Treasures in existence. Now, after more than ten thousand years have passed, these treasures have long since disappeared without a trace. The existence of Immortal Artifacts has become a legend, and even cultivators rarely mention them in casual conversation."

"Does Fellow Daoist know the whereabouts of these Immortal Treasures?"

The Stone Tablet's expression remained unchanged. "Immortal Artifacts? I've never cared about them..."

Halfway through his sentence, he seemed to realize something and looked back at the Fishing Pond again.

After pondering for a moment, his appearance changed again.

The Stone Tablet, now in the form of an old fisherman wearing a straw cloak and carrying a fishing basket, threw out his fishing rod.

The next moment, his body suddenly froze.

Without reeling in the line, the Stone Tablet stood motionless, as if frozen in ice.

After a long time, it took a step back, disengaging from the illusion before them.

"What was that?" The Stone Tablet stared directly at Li Ping.

"What is what?" The Saint Emperor asked knowingly.

"The fishing pond? The starry sky?" the Stone Tablet pressed on.

Li Ping shook his head slightly. "That is the [Bait]."

"The angler is also being fished." Li Ping's tone was cold.

"Even if Fellow Daoist saw all the treasures in the starry sky, you wouldn't be moved. But if it involves your path to liberation? Can you still remain so calm?" Li Ping's voice was low and melodious.

The Stone Tablet had existed in the Xuanhuang Realm for too long and had witnessed too many events.

Therefore, after hearing Li Ping's words and pondering for a moment, it quickly understood his meaning.

"The path to immortality is broken, and the Sea of Stars beyond Xuanhuang should have long been a ruin. Unless..." A glimmer of understanding flashed in the Stone Tablet's eyes.

"What, you want to go out and explore?" Li Ping asked.

The Stone Tablet denied it. "All things in the world are similar. Even if it's another world, what difference does it make? I just want to take off this heavy stone on my back and sleep soundly."

Its topic returned to the Fishing Pond. "I don't know when this thing arrived in the Xuanhuang Realm. But I can be sure it was after the great calamity."

"More accurately, it was after the Law Transmitter reappeared and established the Myriad Immortals Alliance."

The Saint Emperor was more direct. "That is to say, this Fishing Pond was likely implanted in the Xuanhuang Realm along with fragments of other cultivation worlds."

"It should be so... but Immortal treasures surpass our understanding. We cannot guarantee this." The Stone Tablet reserved its judgment.

"The liberation you mentioned, is it not for me to bite this bait?" The Stone Tablet looked at the Saint Emperor with a strange expression.

Li Ping said frankly, "Exactly. Fellow Daoist, aren't you living in great pain? You are one with the Creation Stone Tablet. I believe that in the entire world, only an Immortal Treasure that surpasses the power limit of the Xuanhuang Realm can separate you from the Stone Tablet."

"As for what happens after being fished by the power behind the Fishing Pond, that is beyond my guarantee."

The Stone Tablet really wanted to say, "We have no enmity, Fellow Daoist, why would you harm me?"

However, the words stopped on his lips.

It was clear that this Faceless Venerate had no ill intentions. Otherwise, why would he reveal the entire plan?

On the contrary, the Stone Tablet felt this person was quite honest.

Moreover, a familiar aura emanating from the other party inexplicably gave him a sense of peace.

"I am just tired of living and want to get rid of this burden. It doesn't mean I don't want to live anymore." The Stone Tablet politely declined the Saint Emperor's offer.

"If Fellow Daoist is just troubled by the constant information emerging from the Creation Stone Tablet, then the matter is easily resolved." Li Ping finally revealed his true intention.

"Oh?" The Stone Tablet's eyes clearly showed suspicion.

"Does Fellow Daoist recognize this object?" Li Ping reached out, and a brilliant blue crystal floated quietly in his palm.

"I am aware of the Dao-Transformation Stone. Do you intend to..." The Stone Tablet shook its head.

"To tell you the truth, to alleviate the pain, I have tried various methods. I have even tried the Taiyan Sect's Dao-Transformation Divine Secret technique. However, the Creation Stone Tablet is the embodiment of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao's authority. The Heavenly Dao is lofty and looks down upon all things. After merging with me, it can no longer tolerate other things..."

"That was before. Things are different now." Li Ping directly interrupted the Stone Tablet's words.

The Stone Tablet paused slightly.

"Besides, I can also help you."

As these words were spoken, the aura emanating from the Faceless Saint Emperor changed.

The sky above the Taoist temple gathered clouds, and a peculiar rhythm appeared out of thin air, echoing the Saint Emperor.

The familiar and close feeling in the Stone Tablet's heart became even more evident.

"You are?!"

Even though it had lived for tens of thousands of years, it couldn't help but exclaim in shock.

"Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate?!"

However, it quickly dismissed the thought. "No, this is impossible. And..."

The Stone Tablet looked up at the sky, its expression shifting from shock to solemnity.

The authority wielded by the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate was independent of the Creation Stone Tablet, yet it was above the Stone Tablet.

Although its deeds were recorded, they were only brief mentions. Only the vaguest outlines existed.

But the Stone Tablet, sensing the aura emanating from the Faceless Saint Emperor at this moment, was clearly different from the recorded Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate.

"The Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate controls the钧天 Dao. Although there are subtle connections with the Heavenly Dao, it is more like a separate entity. However, after receiving some kind of empowerment, it can manipulate the laws of the Heavenly Dao as if it were its own arm. As for the one before me..."

A thought inexplicably arose in the Stone Tablet's mind.

"Incarnation of the Heavenly Dao?"

Although somewhat unbelievable, this was the most reasonable explanation.

Li Ping also seemed to sense the Stone Tablet's thoughts and no longer displayed his connection with the Heavenly Dao.

Nor did he directly explain.

Instead, he continued the previous topic. "With the Dao-Transformation Stone to help you alleviate and sort out the events happening in the Xuanhuang Realm, it should make things easier for you."

"But relying solely on the Dao-Transformation Stone is not enough."

The Stone Tablet's eyes narrowed slightly, waiting for the other party's next words.

"The Dao-Transcendence Sect, Fellow Daoist should be familiar with it." Li Ping asked.

Upon hearing these three words, the Stone Tablet's expression turned slightly displeased.

"The True Sight Divine Eye of the Dao-Transcendence Sect has a similar effect to the Creation Stone Tablet. Combined with the endless paper figures, that Book of Dao-Transcendence can also record everything it monitors."

"The Book of Dao-Transcendence, combined with the Dao-Transformation Stone, should be sufficient to offset the side effects of the Creation Stone Tablet. As for the rest, I believe your tenacious will, cultivated over tens of thousands of years, should be able to handle it." The Faceless Saint Emperor spoke slowly.

The Stone Tablet fell silent, pondering the feasibility of the other party's suggestion.

"First, the quality of the Dao-Transformation Stone in your hand is somewhat insufficient..." After a moment, the Stone Tablet spoke.

"It's fine, I can find a better one," the Saint Emperor replied directly.

The Stone Tablet paused, then continued, "Second, the Dao-Transcendence Sect angered the Law Transmitter back then, and the entire sect was sealed away and disappeared. Due to their cultivation technique [Eternal Tribulation World], they can even interfere with Heaven and Earth's perception. Moreover, it was the Law Transmitter who acted, so..."

"I know where they are hiding," the Saint Emperor said calmly.

The Stone Tablet was astonished.

"It seems this person is even stronger than I imagined."

Since the other party had said so much, the Stone Tablet naturally would not continue to stall.

"Please lend me your assistance, Fellow Daoist." It spoke sincerely.

Li Ping was waiting for this sentence.

"Follow me."

His figure flickered, and he instantly appeared at the edge of the sky.

The Stone Tablet followed suit, its figure moving swiftly.

Only Ou Shangtian was left behind, looking bewildered.

He had not heard the conversation between the Saint Emperor and the Stone Tablet.

Ever since Li Ping pointed towards the Fishing Pond, Ou Shangtian had lost the ability to perceive these two powerful beings.

Only when they left one after the other did he react.

"Didn't Master want to deal with that Stone Tablet? Why aren't they fighting?"

"Could it be that, like the Earth Vein Ancient Tree, he's also joining our Sacred Dynasty?"

Ou Shangtian immediately had a bad premonition.

At this moment, Li Ping and the Stone Tablet had already arrived outside the Dao-Transcendence Sect's sealing location.

Watching Li Ping skillfully break the Law Transmitter's seal, the doubts in the Stone Tablet's heart grew.

"This is a seal left by the Law Transmitter. Even a Heavenly Dao incarnation cannot break it so easily?"

"Or perhaps, after so many years, the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao has recovered enough strength to contend with the Law Transmitter?"

Li Ping ignored the Stone Tablet's thoughts and led it all the way into the Dao-Transcendence Sect.

Up the mountain, down the mountain, endless repeating courtyards...

Everything transformed rapidly before his eyes, and finally, the main hall of the Dao-Transcendence Sect appeared before them.

"Enter."

The Stone Tablet followed him inside and confirmed that this was indeed the former location of the Dao-Transcendence Sect.

It could sense that countless lifelike and deathlike paper figures were hidden within this gloomy main hall.

"They were one of the Ten Immortal Sects of the Xuanhuang Realm, enjoying the cultivation resources generated by the Xuanhuang Realm. Yet, when disaster struck, they chose to hide and escape. They are truly like those so-called Seers of the Worlds, parasites of the Xuanhuang Realm." Li Ping's words were cold and merciless, criticizing them without reservation.

The Stone Tablet squinted its eyes, neither agreeing nor disagreeing.

"Eternal Tribulation World, cultivating through the calamities of the world. This is inherently a wicked technique that harms Heaven and Earth. If Heaven and Earth were flourishing and free from calamities, perhaps these people would stir up trouble and create calamities. Such a sect should have been exterminated long ago." Li Ping continued.

As if hearing the Saint Emperor's words, a cold wind inexplicably blew through the gloomy hall.

"Thinking they could escape everything by transforming into paper figures..."

A golden chain emerged from the Saint Emperor's body.

Silently, it shot into the depths of the darkness.

As if stirring up mist, the darkness within the Dao-Transcendence Sect's main hall fluctuated like water waves.

The Stone Tablet observed the golden chain, a flicker of surprise in its eyes.

Then, a phantom image of a golden vortex slowly formed within Li Ping's body.

Thousands of golden chains, following the rotation of the vortex, whistled out.

Bang, bang...

They flew into the darkness, as if colliding with something, emitting muffled sounds.

The Saint Emperor's imposing aura was too overwhelming. Even the Stone Tablet had to take a step back temporarily.

The Stone Tablet couldn't help but secretly marvel, "This person's strength is indeed much greater than ordinary [Longevity Realm] cultivators."

"And..."

"It seems to be more than just the power of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao."

The sound of creaking could be heard continuously in the hall.

As the golden vortex nebula within the Saint Emperor rotated in reverse, and the golden chains retracted.

Something in the darkness seemed to be bound by the chains and was being forcibly dragged out.

If ordinary cultivators saw this scene, they would surely feel a chill run down their spines.

However, the Stone Tablet felt a rare flicker of excitement in its heart.

When a paper figure with a somewhat terrified expression emerged from the darkness, the Stone Tablet's eyebrows couldn't help but rise.

It was these bastards!

The paper

Chapter 1252: The Truth of Transmission

Li Ping’s golden chain moved slightly, and one of the paper figures was pulled in front of him. Unlike the others, this paper figure showed little fear. Instead, it looked listless and weak. Its thick, bushy eyebrows were furrowed, giving it a somewhat comical appearance.

"Desire for survival?" Li Ping said coldly. "If the skin is gone, where will the hair attach? If the Xuanhuang Realm is destroyed, where will you live!"

The thick-browed paper figure offered a wry smile. "Our sect, the Crossing Calamity Sect, has only ordinary strength. If the Xuanhuang Realm is truly destroyed, what can we do? We can only accept our fate. Are you going to blame the mortals of this world for not stepping forward to save the Xuanhuang Realm? One can only do what they are capable of..."

Li Ping did not debate with the paper figure of the Crossing Calamity Sect. The golden chain tightened slightly. "Sharp-tongued, unrepentant even when facing death."

Golden light slowly condensed, shrinking from the thickness of a chain to that of a fine thread. It wound around the thick-browed paper figure, circle by circle. The other captured paper figures cried out in terror. However, the thick-browed paper figure, as if sitting in solemn meditation, became serious. He began to chant, "Time turns to dust, calamity is eternal. A hundred generations and a thousand tribulations, melt my golden body..."

The golden Origin Force, which had always been effective for the Saint Emperor, lost its efficacy for the first time. Li Ping felt the power he exerted on the thick-browed paper figure being cleverly nullified by an unseen force. It was even absorbed, becoming part of its foundation. The golden threads slowly dissolved, yet the thick-browed paper figure remained unmoving. The color of the paper figure, from aged white-yellow, slowly transformed into a brilliant gold, approaching the essence of Origin Force.

The Stone Tablet, which had been observing, suddenly became grave. "Fellow Daoist, be careful. This is the Crossing Calamity Sect's ultimate technique, [Eternal Tribulation World], which can transform all calamitous powers in the world into sustenance for one's cultivation."

Li Ping sneered. "Just a turtle hiding its head. You wish to use my power to cultivate? Very well, I shall oblige!"

Blinding golden light, like raging flames, erupted from the Saint Emperor. The surging flames illuminated the entire space of the Crossing Calamity Sect in a golden hue. The condensed golden flames flowed through the remaining chains, being channeled into the paper figure's golden body. The numerous other paper figures, not the primary targets but merely caught in the crossfire, let out earth-shattering wails, as if being scorched by fierce fire. It was evident how immense the pressure on the golden-bodied paper figure was; it appeared distorted, as if on the verge of melting. Yet, the thick-browed paper figure remained unmoving, its expression serene.

This scene caused the Stone Tablet to secretly gasp. Even though they could not discern their original appearances after transforming into paper figures, for someone to remain so calm and unharmed under the Saint Emperor's might was rare, even within the fully empowered Crossing Calamity Sect of the past. The Stone Tablet tried to guess the identity of the thick-browed paper figure.

Meanwhile, the Faceless Saint Emperor did not cease tormenting the paper figures of the Crossing Calamity Sect. The golden flames burned ever brighter. Although they did not completely incinerate the paper figures, they slowly coated them with an indelible golden layer. Especially the thick-browed paper figure, enveloped by the flames, its golden light becoming even more conspicuous.

"You wish to avoid the world and hide from disaster, but I will not allow it!"

"The Xuanhuang Realm faces peril, and you all bear responsibility!"

The Saint Emperor's voice boomed like thunder. Origin Force essence erupted outwards, illuminating every corner of the space. Its brilliance was such that even the Stone Tablet had to close its eyes to avoid it. When the light receded, the darkness within the main hall of the Crossing Calamity Sect had vanished. The uncomfortable, oppressive aura was also gone. The paper figures, freed from the chains, tumbled to the ground in disarray. Compared to before, they seemed to possess a little more vitality. The leading thick-browed paper figure had transformed into a "little golden man."

The golden man still had the same listless, dispirited appearance. He sighed, "Your Excellency wasted so much Origin Force essence on us useless individuals; it truly is a waste of heavenly treasures!"

"It’s too cost-ineffective!"

Li Ping said sternly, "If all matters in the world were decided by pure rationality, the Xuanhuang Realm would have perished long ago! How else would you be able to spout nonsense here!" Before his words finished, a large "X" appeared on the golden paper figure's face, sealing its mouth. Following that, the other paper figures were similarly affected. The hall of the Crossing Calamity Sect, which had been chaotic like a marketplace, instantly fell silent.

"Fellow Daoist Yijue?" At this moment, the Stone Tablet looked at the golden paper figure and asked tentatively. The paper figure, unable to speak, merely winked at the Stone Tablet. Whether it was an acknowledgment or a denial was unclear.

There was no time for pleasantries. The space here was no longer stable after losing the support of Origin Force essence. "Let's get out first." Li Ping, along with the Stone Tablet and the dazed paper figures, vanished from the spot. The ancient immortal sect, suppressed by the Grand Law Seal, finally revealed its true form.

A book, unfolding from the center. The book contained no words, only relief carvings of mountains and empty architectural scenes. As the book naturally turned, the images within changed. However, they were all in silhouette, appearing comical and bizarre. Li Ping grasped the Book of Crossing Calamity with his giant hand, and the mountains and rivers depicted within were instantly stained with gold.

"Collect!" the Saint Emperor commanded, and the densely packed paper figures, including the thick-browed little golden man, flew uncontrollably into the Book of Crossing Calamity. *Bang!* Li Ping pressed his right hand down, closing the book. All anomalies vanished instantly.

"This place is not suitable for lingering. Although my method of deciphering the Grand Law Seal was ingenious, and I restored the seal as I deciphered it, I cannot guarantee that abnormalities here will not be discovered by the Grand Law."

"Follow me." Li Ping said sternly, his figure already vanishing from this place.

The Stone Tablet followed the Saint Emperor, traversing space through the Xuanhuang Realm's spatial channels, and arrived in an endless void. At their speed, they had been flying for quite some time in the void before sensing the presence of a world ahead.

"That is..." The Stone Tablet was slightly startled. "The Five Elements Cave-Heaven of the First Origin Sect? It's here. Doesn't that mean the Longevity Realm cultivator from the previous Brilliant Circulation Cave-Heaven..."

While the Stone Tablet was pondering, Bai Hua had already flown to greet them. After her gaze lingered on the Stone Tablet for a moment, Bai Hua then transmitted something to Li Ping via voice transmission. Li Ping nodded slightly. Then, Bai Hua nodded to the Stone Tablet before flying back into the Five Elements Cave-Heaven.

"This is where I recuperate. Fellow Daoist, what do you think of this place compared to the Xuanhuang Realm itself?" Li Ping brought the Stone Tablet to the Great Qi small world. A scan of Li Ping’s divine sense revealed the general state of the small world. Although some areas were obscured by mysterious forces, preventing complete omniscience, what was revealed was enough to shock the Stone Tablet. Even though the Creation Stone Tablet's reputation for recording all matters in the world was somewhat undeserved now, it still knew the events that had transpired in the Xuanhuang Realm's various prefectures. However, compared to this Great Qi small world... it was like being centuries behind, an entire era. The intricacies of it were beyond even the Stone Tablet's comprehension. Furthermore, it sensed the aura of an old acquaintance here. For instance, the Earth Vein Ancient Tree, and that disciple of the Beast Taming Sect.

Following Li Ping to the Saint Emperor's Throne, the Stone Tablet's shock slowly subsided. "I have carried this stone tablet for so many years, thinking I knew all about the world. I never imagined that the events unfolding today would reveal truths that have long surpassed my predictions..." The Stone Tablet spoke with a sense of loss.

"Fellow Daoist, there is no need to be discouraged. Progress and change are the righteous paths. If the world stagnates for thousands of years..." Li Ping smiled slightly. "Wouldn't that make us seem incompetent?" The Stone Tablet was speechless, unsure how to respond. Its interactions with this "Heavenly Dao incarnation" had been too shocking. Compared to the scenes it was witnessing now, the Xuanhuang Realm in its mind felt like merely a stage play, a fabricated illusion. This made the Stone Tablet feel somewhat lost and disheartened.

"I knew long ago that the Five Elders Council, the Myriad Immortals Alliance, and even the other supreme experts in the Xuanhuang Realm, if they knew about the stone tablet on my back, they would try to evade the stone tablet's records. But I never expected that the truth of the world would have evolved to this extent..." Li Ping vaguely sensed the Stone Tablet's thoughts and spoke slowly, "The Xuanhuang Realm is the last refuge of the ultimate starry sea. The Xuanhuang Realm itself, fragments of other worlds, survivors of the starry sea, and powers from beyond the High Wall... all converge here. Its complexity is such that not only you, Fellow Daoist, but even the Grand Law Transmitter and the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao itself cannot fully grasp it."

"Yes..." The Stone Tablet sighed and nodded. It then thought of the Fishing Pond it had seen earlier. How many such hidden treasures were there in the Xuanhuang Realm? As an ancient remnant of the Xuanhuang Realm, it now truly felt a sense of being out of sync with the times. "Things change, stories are no longer the same." Long ago, scenes from the early Xuanhuang Realm surfaced in the Stone Tablet's mind, causing it to pause slightly. It was Li Ping's voice that broke the silence.

"The fusion of realms is inevitable. Between myself and the Grand Law Transmitter, a battle is bound to occur. However, regardless of who wins or loses, it will not change the fact that the Xuanhuang Realm will be reborn from its decay." Li Ping did not mention helping the Stone Tablet resolve its overload of mental information, but suddenly spoke. The Stone Tablet's thoughts converged, and it focused on Li Ping. "The crux of the matter lies in the new orthodoxy of the Xuanhuang Realm."

"Fellow Daoist, do you know the secrets of the Grand Law Transmitter?" Li Ping’s divine sense locked onto the Stone Tablet, asking in a deep voice. The Stone Tablet pondered for a moment and replied, "When the Grand Law Transmitter first appeared, we of the Ten Immortal Sects investigated. He was indeed a native cultivator of the Xuanhuang Realm. His life trajectory from childhood was completely clear and recorded."

"The Grand Law Transmitter’s name is Xuanyuan Zituo. He lived in a rural village and was frail as a child, so his parents gave him the humble name 'Dog Egg'. Until the age of fifty, his life was no different from an ordinary farmer. It was only after the age of fifty-one that he suddenly attained enlightenment and rose to prominence."

"This is why, in the initial investigations by the Ten Immortal Sects, they could find no trace of his origins, as he truly achieved enlightenment suddenly." The Stone Tablet slowly recounted. As it spoke, scenes from that year appeared in the Saint Emperor's Throne room.

...

"Xuanyuan Zituo." Li Ping looked at the screen, observing the somewhat simple and honest young boy, who gradually transformed into a taciturn middle-aged farmer, and then into a white-haired elder. "It is indeed possible for a mortal to attain enlightenment suddenly. However, this usually happens at a young age. Xuanyuan Zituo's evolution, reaching this stage, only occurs when he is near his end..."

"It is truly perplexing and suspicious." Li Ping commented. The Stone Tablet nodded. "The Ten Sects harbored similar suspicions back then. However, we used secret arts and the Heavenly Dao's validation to confirm that there was no possession or impersonation by an outsider in him."

"But the Grand Law Transmitter is truly mysterious. He seems to possess innate knowledge. Even when several Longevity Realm cultivators from the Ten Sects attacked him back then, he managed to resolve it through some unknown method. Since then, he has completely surpassed our control. Perhaps if the Ten Sects had launched a full-scale attack back then, the outcome might have been different..." The Stone Tablet sighed with emotion. The great hall fell silent. After a long while, Li Ping suddenly spoke, "Heavenly Dao validation... What if the method of impersonation surpasses the Heavenly Dao itself?" The Stone Tablet was utterly stunned. At first glance, Li Ping's words seemed like sophistry. But after careful consideration, the Stone Tablet realized that the Ten Sects' overconfidence in their methods back then had led to their unshakable belief for thousands of years.

"It's too late to inquire about the Grand Law Transmitter's secrets now. What use is it?" After a brief moment of disappointment, the Stone Tablet felt a new thought arise in its heart. With a sense of confusion, it looked back at the Saint Emperor. The Saint Emperor's voice echoed like thunder in the great hall. "As I said before, the key to the rebirth of the Xuanhuang Realm lies in the word 'orthodoxy'."

"It's like a new body assembled from severed limbs; who serves as the brain is crucial."

"Currently, the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao still considers itself the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao. But perhaps not for much longer..." Li Ping's tone was melancholy. The Stone Tablet knew that as a Heavenly Dao incarnation, Li Ping would not speak without reason, and its expression changed. "Fellow Daoist, please elaborate."

"The matters recorded on your stone tablet, you can observe them all from your position as an outsider. However, with the fusion of realms, memories become like personal experiences, blurring the lines between reality and illusion. Over time, one can no longer distinguish between falsity and truth, between the self and the external."

"Especially..." Li Ping's gaze turned towards the Xuanhuang Realm, thousands of miles away.

"The Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao is weak now, its resistance is minimal. If one day, the remaining wills of the Heavenly Daos from various realms descend like a flood, rushing in simultaneously..."

"I fear the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao would immediately be unable to bear it, going mad and losing its sense of self." Li Ping's tone carried a hint of self-mockery.

"At that point, if someone were to guide and erode it with a relatively complete Heavenly Dao will, they could steal the heavens and change the orthodoxy of Xuanhuang. By then, although it would still be called the Xuanhuang Realm, it would no longer be the original Xuanhuang, from the inside out." The Stone Tablet fell into deep contemplation upon hearing this. The target of the Saint Emperor's words was clearly the Grand Law Transmitter.

Chapter 1253: Clear Guanshi Divine Eye

"Rectifying principles, rectifying principles..."

"Could it truly be like this?" Yin Shangren stood stunned for a long time before his body began to tremble uncontrollably. Xu Ke's aged face also showed excitement. "No wonder Mr. Bai always said all I needed was to wait."

"Besides the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao descending to save itself, countless mortals are also constantly embarking on the path of cultivation. The process of cultivation is the process of reversing the principles of the Immortal-Mortal Miasma. After thousands of years, the accumulation..."

The Faceless Saint Emperor's voice was ethereal. "It's not that the process of dispelling the Immortal-Mortal Miasma is simple in the eyes of cultivators. The initial steps and prerequisites for cultivation are essentially the same as the ultimate goal of achieving Longevity."

"It is also defying the principles of Heaven and Earth." Upon hearing this, complex emotions flickered in Yin Shangren and Xu Ke's eyes. Yin Shangren said, "If the Heavenly Venerate of Reversal were still alive, it would not be so easy for mortals in the Xuanhuang Realm to defy the principles of Heaven and Earth and embark on the path of cultivation. But precisely because Mr. Bai has passed away, the restrictions of the Immortal-Mortal Miasma have been greatly weakened."

Li Ping interjected at this point, "Moreover, Eastern Pole Heavenly Venerate foresaw the mysteries of this place. Using the Net Body Spiritual Pool formation, he further reduced the difficulty of defying the principles." Xu Ke's lips moved, and after a long struggle, he managed to speak, "The last time I saw Mr. Bai, I saw the death wish in his heart. I haven't been able to let go of it all these years, but now, perhaps I understand a little."

Yin Shangren fell into mumbling again, "Everyone is defying the principles of Heaven and Earth, but in essence, this is still within the cultivation system created by the Law Transmitter. Even if we know this, what use is it?"

"There must be something we haven't thought of..." Li Ping spoke with certainty. "The answer should lie within the Immortal-Mortal Miasma. When it comes to researching the Immortal-Mortal Miasma, perhaps no one in the Xuanhuang Realm currently knows more than you. I'm afraid it will be a bit more strenuous for you."

"Although there are no longer any mortals carrying the Immortal-Mortal Miasma within the Great Qi, it is not difficult to find some from the conquered small worlds for research. I will have people fully cooperate with you," Li Ping said to Yin Shangren.

"Saint Emperor, please rest assured," Yin Shangren suddenly became excited.

Meanwhile. In the Derivation Law Jade space within the Myriad Immortals Alliance. After the Saint Embryo encountered the Remnant Realm Great Wall, Li Ping's original calm heart was once again stirred. "Defying the principles of Heaven and Earth again? Immortal-Mortal Miasma..."

Li Ping suddenly recalled his experience of dispelling the Immortal-Mortal Miasma in the Pure Body Spiritual Pool formation on Glazed Island back then. The lava-like hot pool water ravaged his consciousness. Even with a firm will, he eventually fell into a state of ignorance and oblivion. His mind became blank, acting solely on instinct. Before entering the Spiritual Pool, Li Ping, who had been cultivating the Xuanhuang Pure Heart Curse day and night, instinctively reactivated the technique. While completely dispelling the miasma within his body, Li Ping inexplicably comprehended an advanced and elevated version of the Xuanhuang Pure Heart Curse. The Xuanhuang Heart Refining Curse. And then it evolved into the current Xuanhuang Immortal Heart Curse. This technique had been of immense help to Li Ping throughout his journey.

"The suffering in the Pure Body Spiritual Pool is unbearable for ordinary people. Most would fall into a coma, and even if they remained conscious, they would be unable to accommodate any other distracting thoughts amidst such extreme pain."

"Embrace the Dao, cleanse the mind, emulate nature..." His eyes closed tightly, but a flash of inspiration crossed Li Ping's mind. "Humans merge with the Dao. Instinctive actions in a state of ignorance and oblivion are precisely the closest to the Dao. This might be why so many mortals in the world can successfully dispel the Immortal-Mortal Miasma and defy the principles of Heaven and Earth again."

"However, this is not defying the principles in the true sense. The fact that their strength did not leap significantly after dispelling the Immortal-Mortal Miasma proves this point." Li Ping pondered and contemplated.

"Firstly, it's because the Immortal-Mortal Miasma was not dispelled entirely by their own power. Secondly..." The Dao-Transformation Stone flashed in his mind, and Li Ping recalled the moment of enlightenment, savoring it repeatedly.

"When the Immortal-Mortal Miasma was finally dispelled..."

"It was as if it disappeared on its own."

"Just like sensing my cultivation of the Xuanhuang Pure Heart Curse, it spontaneously transformed into the Heart Refining Curse."

"Did it trigger some condition?" Li Ping recalled the scene of Eastern Pole's life before his death, transmitted by the True Heavenly Venerate.

"The secret of defying Heaven and Earth again lies hidden within the Immortal-Mortal Miasma." In Li Ping's eyes, he saw countless mortals over thousands of years breaking the shackles between immortals and mortals, and embarking on the path of cultivation.

"The birth of every cultivator is a process close to defying the principles of Heaven and Earth again."

"Even if they are unaware of it, this is a true occurrence."

"To defy Heaven and Earth again is tantamount to directly confronting the Law Transmitter and completely overturning the cultivation system he personally created. Figures like Mr. Bai and Eastern Pole, who were Heavenly Prodigies, also ended in failure. This shows the immense difficulty. But..." Li Ping suddenly realized. He recalled the simulation process of his own repeated reincarnations.

"The process of every mortal resisting the Immortal-Mortal Miasma can be seen as a simulation of defying the principles of Heaven and Earth again."

"The strength of one person may have limits. The strength of tens of thousands of people also has its limits."

"But tens of thousands of people, stretching over countless years, create infinite power."

"Facing such immense power, the new method created by the Law Transmitter is bound to be broken, it's only a matter of time." Li Ping's mind trembled. "All beings in all worlds, the masses refining spirits, use pure numbers to shake the power of the transcendent Immortal."

"Endless beings, defying the laws forever, this magnifies the advantage of numbers over time, achieving a qualitative leap from quantitative change..."

"As long as there are individuals in the Xuanhuang Realm who refuse to accept their mortal fate, this method will continue indefinitely." Li Ping's thoughts raced, and he felt even more genuine respect for Mr. Bai, who created such a marvelous method. Ignoring the limit of lifespan, his methods still took effect after his death, spanning across time and influencing events many years later. Unlike Li Ping, who possessed the True Return Treasure, this was the limit that ordinary mortal cultivators could possibly achieve. Of course, this was of little use to Li Ping personally. However, this did not prevent Li Ping from harvesting Mr. Bai's achievements.

"In my opinion, the secret of defying the principles of Heaven and Earth again, hidden within the Immortal-Mortal Miasma, is the enlightenment gained by countless cultivators while dispelling the Immortal-Mortal Miasma over the years."

"All of it has been recorded and preserved."

"If one could absorb these simulated experiences of defying Heaven and Earth again and again..." Li Ping considered himself capable of remaining indifferent to most treasures in the Xuanhuang Realm now, even Cat Treasure from beyond the High Wall. However, he had to admit that he was deeply moved upon sensing these countless experiences of defying principles. Unlike magical artifacts, this 'gift package' was something that could directly enhance Li Ping's soul essence. It was enough to significantly shorten the gap between him and the Law Transmitter and the Heavenly Physician. Although it was a one-time benefit, it was of great significance to Li Ping, and the sooner he discovered it, the better.

"It could at least save me three lifetimes of reincarnation time." Li Ping calculated in his heart.

"Then, where did Mr. Bai hide this grand gift package?"

"Is it within the Immortal Mirror, or within the power of the Immortal-Mortal Miasma? Does it require any special conditions to be triggered?" If it weren't for the fact that he had already decided on the strategy of 'watching the tigers fight' in this life, Li Ping would have been desperate to go in person and investigate. However, years of experience had allowed him to suppress this impulse.

"With Yin Shangren and Xu Ke working hard together to research it, it will be more efficient than me fumbling around blindly."

"If they find out, it's equivalent to me finding out. Anyway, it will all be mine in the end, no need to rush."

"I can also see how much weight this gift package holds. After the Saint Emperor's clone absorbs it, can he really shake the Law Transmitter?"

"Hehehe, it really makes me look forward to it." After being confined in the Derivation Law Jade space for a long time, Li Ping, who felt bored, was now full of emotion.

Chapter 1254: Rift Hides Dark Power

Hearing Sun Erlang's words, the white-haired Taoist priest smiled slightly. "Indeed, everyone has their own independent personality and thoughts. It is indeed difficult to get everyone to work together wholeheartedly. The events that have occurred in the history of the Xuanhuang Realm indicate this." The white-haired Taoist priest waved his whisk lightly, and countless images instantly appeared in the pure white space before Sun Erlang. Black shadows representing the end times hovered over the Xuanhuang Realm, potentially descending at any moment. However, regarding how to deal with this catastrophe, various sects and factions in the Xuanhuang Realm still held different attitudes. There were those who resolved to abandon the realm and flee, those who chose to be cowardly turtles, those who worked tirelessly to rally everyone to unite, and those who took advantage of the chaos to satisfy their selfish desires. The beings in the image had no specific appearances, all replaced by faceless little figures. But the absurd farces being played out were incredibly real.

"But this is the past Xuanhuang Realm." The white-haired Taoist priest waved his whisk again, and the scene changed dramatically. "United as one, firm will against fate, openly joining divine power, carefree therefore fearless, one word decides everything..." As the True Heavenly Venerate spoke, the living scenes from the human territories of the Five Elders Council appeared before Sun Erlang.

"What do you think of this place compared to the Myriad Immortals Alliance?" the True Heavenly Venerate asked. "It is indeed much better than the Myriad Immortals Alliance," Sun Erlang said without hesitation. He then added, "Unfortunately, all of this is based on the great divine powers of the five Heavenly Venerates. Everything is as ephemeral as a mirage. If one day, one of these Heavenly Venerates encounters misfortune, this seemingly beautiful scene will instantly collapse."

In the territory of the Five Elders Council, openly discussing the potential demise of a Heavenly Venerate was an act tantamount to treason. However, the white-haired Taoist priest before him did not show any anger. Instead, he nodded in agreement, "You are indeed somewhat correct, but also entirely incorrect." Sun Erlang's expression faltered, and he cupped his hands solemnly, "Please enlighten me, Heavenly Venerate."

"The reason you are correct is from the perspective of an outsider cultivator; it is indeed so. The order here is all born from the five Heavenly Venerates. If the Heavenly Venerates were to perish, the order would also vanish."

"The reason you are incorrect is because you do not understand the true meaning of the Longevity Realm." The True Heavenly Venerate stroked his beard and spoke slowly, "To defy the principles of Heaven and Earth, and thus achieve longevity."

"After cultivators defy the principles, they naturally become a part of the world's principles. Just like sunlight, water droplets, and air, they all constitute the [World] itself."

"Humans are not isolated individuals. Discussing cultivators in the Longevity Realm without negating the existence of the Longevity Realm is also meaningless." Sun Erlang did not fully understand the True Heavenly Venerate's words. In his opinion, this was more like a form of sophistry. However, the Longevity Heavenly Venerate, standing at the pinnacle of this realm, would not engage in petty arguments with a junior like him. Sun Erlang frowned and pondered carefully. After a long while, he said thoughtfully, "We are discussing cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm. This is the fundamental premise. And the Longevity Heavenly Venerates have already become an inseparable part of the Xuanhuang Realm, so..."

"No," Sun Erlang suddenly became vigilant. "The key is that your power does not seem to cover the entire Xuanhuang Realm? It is only confined to this area." The True Heavenly Venerate asked, "Have you perceived the existence of Carefree Heavenly Venerate's divine power?"

Sun Erlang nodded, "Of course, I am aware of it."

"As fellow cultivators in the Longevity Realm, Carefree's strength is not much stronger than ours. What he can do..."

"We can naturally also do it," the True Heavenly Venerate said slowly. Upon hearing this, Sun Erlang felt an instinctive disbelief. Then, as he pondered, his expression gradually became solemn. "Then why?" he couldn't help but ask.

"Naturally, the time is not yet right." The white-haired Taoist gently waved his whisk. The white space of the True Fruit Tree gradually faded. The figure of the True Heavenly Venerate also slowly became blurred.

"Heavenly Venerate!" Only then did Sun Erlang suddenly remember his Master's instructions and quickly shouted, "Does Heavenly Venerate know about Eastern Pole Heavenly Venerate?"

"You will see." The white space exploded violently. Countless rays of light erupted simultaneously, blooming in Sun Erlang's mind. He returned to the real world, but Sun Erlang was still immersed in the images transmitted by the True Heavenly Venerate.

"Defying the principles of Heaven and Earth again? Are you crazy? You've already reached this point, just one step away from defying the principles. If you follow the normal progression, you'll achieve Longevity. Why do this?" The young Taoist's expression was full of confusion, his words intense.

"Longevity? That's merely becoming one with the Dao." The figure opposite him was indistinct, but his tone showed disdain for the [Longevity Realm]. He continued, "If that existence were not present, it would be fine for us to become one with the Dao. But the entire cultivation system is built upon the framework created by him..."

"Xinghan, do you know the consequences?" The young Taoist remained silent.

"The Xuanhuang Realm is being destroyed and reborn. This is the only thing he cares about right now. Someone achieving Longevity is insignificant to him. In fact, he would even welcome the birth of a Longevity Realm cultivator that meets his expectations. Do you know why?" The young Taoist continued to lower his head, silent.

"Your talents are no less than mine, so how can you not understand? It's just that you're clinging to a sliver of hope."

"Let me be blunt. One day, when the Xuanhuang Realm welcomes rebirth and completes its transformation, the so-called Longevity Heavenly Venerates will completely become a part of the new world's Heavenly Dao... It's better to live than to die, or rather, it doesn't matter whether you live or die."

"They are all just tools for transforming the world." The indistinct figure sneered.

"This is just your fantasy, your conjecture..." After a long time, the young Taoist weakly retorted. But the indistinct figure ignored him and continued, "I refuse to believe it! I must fight against him!"

"To defy the principles of Heaven and Earth and achieve longevity. This is the foundation of his enlightenment, but also his greatest flaw. If one can defy his principles again, one can instantly steal all his creation and replace him..."

"Eastern Pole! You..." The young Taoist nervously looked around, fearing that these heaven-defying words would be overheard by others. The indistinct figure, full of ambition and confidence, said, "Xinghan, don't be nervous. I am not alone on this path." Just then, Eastern Pole spoke comfortingly.

"In the Immortal-Mortal Miasma, there lies the secret of defying Heaven and Earth again. It originates from the previous Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate who has already passed away..."

"I'm starting to get a clue recently. As long as..." Boom! Eastern Pole hadn't finished speaking when the image suddenly shattered. When his vision cleared again, it was still Eastern Pole's figure. However... Eastern Pole, who was originally full of pride and arrogance, looked extremely strange. His head was bowed, his body naked. His long hair was scattered, and countless silk threads extended from his body. Extending into the endless void beyond.

"Eastern Pole!" This horrifying scene, along with the True Heavenly Venerate's exclamation, suddenly vanished.

"What is this?" Sun Erlang's mind was shaken. Although it was only a brief conversation, the secrets revealed were all earth-shattering. Sun Erlang first looked around and realized that not much time had passed since he entered the creation illusion of the True Fruit. Currently, there were still cultivators meditating under the fruit, undergoing the test. But Sun Erlang had no intention of staying here any longer. He had to return quickly and tell Master everything he had seen and heard. Fortunately, the attention of the cultivators in the city was focused on the [Heavenly Prodigies] who were still in the illusion. There wasn't much attention paid to Sun Erlang, the failed participant. He quietly left the city and headed straight for the entrance of the Great Qi small world. While flying, Sun Erlang's thoughts raced.

"The True Heavenly Venerate had discovered my whereabouts long ago?"

"Which is why he appeared in the illusion to meet me."

"They already knew about Eastern Pole Heavenly Venerate's situation, and coincidentally, I was sent by Master to come here, so they used me to relay these images to Master..."

"What deeper meaning lies behind this?" Even though Sun Erlang considered himself experienced, facing the truth about the Xuanhuang Realm's ultimate secrets, he still found it difficult to control himself. Sun Erlang couldn't help but speed up his pace.

Chapter 1255: Sun Family Hedao Fetus

The Earth Vein Ancient Tree was also within the Faceless Saint Emperor's Origin Force essence net. Therefore, after Ruo Mu surrendered, the Earth Vein Ancient Tree vaguely sensed it. However, it could not confirm, and its fear and unease only grew daily. "Now we are all subordinates of the Saint Emperor. With the Saint Emperor's protection, how could he possibly do anything to me?" the Ancient Tree could only console itself. The Earth Vein Ancient Tree knew very well that perhaps only the Saint Emperor could save its life. And the more useful it was to the Sacred Dynasty, the safer it would be. Thus, the Earth Vein Ancient Tree eagerly wanted to prove its worth to the Saint Emperor. Unfortunately, ever since arriving at the Sacred Dynasty of Great Qi, it felt as if it had been forgotten. No one actively sought it out. Even the task entrusted to it earlier, to sort out the Earth Veins of Great Qi's small world, had not been inspected. This made the Earth Vein Ancient Tree quite dejected.

However, one day, the opportunity the Ancient Tree had been waiting for finally arrived. It was Ou Shangtian, the fifth disciple of the Saint Emperor. "This is the diagram of the Xuanhuang Realm's Earth Vein currents?" Ou Shangtian pointed at the image before him and asked. A dense, intricate network, extending to all corners of the Xuanhuang Realm. Like blood vessels in a human body, they seemed to contract and pulse, looking quite bizarre. The Earth Vein Ancient Tree nodded, "Young Master, you see correctly."

Ou Shangtian seemed quite pleased with the Ancient Tree's flattery and readily accepted the title of "Young Master." "I heard from Senior Sister Lin Ling that when traveling through the Earth Vein currents, the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao's power naturally conceals them, making it difficult for ordinary people to detect. Is that true?" Ou Shangtian asked again. "Indeed." The Earth Vein Ancient Tree handed over a withered branch. "Young Master, please take a look."

Ou Shangtian felt the Earth Vein current power surging within the withered branch and frowned slightly. "I don't see anything particularly special about this. How can it shield others' perception?" The Earth Vein Ancient Tree smiled slightly, "Young Master, you must understand that gathering sands can form a high tower, and dripping water can form a river. A single point of Earth Vein power may seem insignificant. But when the Earth Vein currents of the entire Xuanhuang Realm converge, it becomes truly vast and majestic, like the might of thunder."

"Ultimately, the flow of Earth Veins is an important part of the normal operation of the Xuanhuang Realm. I am merely holding its reins on its behalf. Compared to the overwhelming principles of the entire Xuanhuang Realm, ordinary cultivators are naturally overlooked." Ou Shangtian gazed blankly at the Earth Vein current diagram, lost in thought. After a long while, he came back to his senses, returned the Earth Vein withered branch, and instructed, "Coincidentally, I am going out on a mission assigned by Master this time, and I might need your help."

The Earth Vein Ancient Tree had been waiting for this. Upon hearing this, it was overjoyed. "Young Master, please command me. I will definitely assist you with all my heart." "In the Xuanhuang Realm, there is an immensely powerful senior, carrying a stone tablet on his back... Do you know of him?" Ou Shangtian asked, looking at the Earth Vein Ancient Tree. The Earth Vein Ancient Tree's expression suddenly changed. The previous eagerness instantly vanished. It stared at Ou Shangtian in disbelief for a long time before tentatively asking, "Young Master, is the Sacred Dynasty planning to take action against Senior Stone Tablet?"

"If I may be so bold, that Stone Tablet is a true Longevity Realm cultivator, and has been enlightened for many years..." Ou Shangtian impatiently waved his hand. "I naturally know the strength of that so-called Stone Tablet. Longevity Realm, indeed!"

"Compared to Master, it's nothing!" "Don't worry, I am only responsible for luring him to a specific location." Upon hearing Ou Shangtian's words, the Earth Vein Ancient Tree was slightly relieved. Since the mysterious Faceless Saint Emperor could subdue its father, it should be able to deal with this Stone Tablet without issues. The Ancient Tree became invigorated. "Young Master, how may I cooperate?" Ou Shangtian explained the detailed plan. The Ancient Tree pondered and nodded, indicating that it was not a problem.

"There's no time to delay. After I meet Master, I will set off immediately." The Ancient Tree stated, "My main body is still in the Xuanhuang Realm. As long as Young Master summons me, I can appear at any time." Ou Shangtian hurried into the Saint Emperor's Throne. When he emerged, the anxiety on his face had completely disappeared. "I have the Kunqian Bone Hand, and the Seven-Colored Jade Void Flowing Light protects my body. I have even received a treasure bestowed by Master this time. And I have studied formations for so long..."

"I only need to lure him to the Fishing Pond, and the mission will be complete. It should not be a problem." "But isn't the Fishing Pond our Sacred Dynasty's treasure? Why would Master ask me to lure the great enemy there? Isn't he afraid of any unexpected accidents?" Ou Shangtian couldn't understand no matter how hard he thought. However, in the end, he couldn't be bothered to think about it anymore. He left the Great Qi small world and headed straight for the Nine Mountains Prefecture of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

Relying on the surging Earth Vein currents, it only took the time to brew a cup of tea to reach the Nine Mountains Prefecture. Ou Shangtian tried it out. As expected, the spatial laws here were somewhat chaotic and fragile. If he rashly used the teleportation technique, he might directly tear the space and be sucked into the spatial turbulence, never to be found again. "However, flight is not a problem. These nine mountain peaks can stump ordinary cultivators, but not me with the Seven-Colored Divine Light."

Thinking this, Ou Shangtian deliberately controlled the Seven-Colored Jade Void Flowing Light to form a protective layer around his body. Like a blazing sun in the sky, it constantly emitted its own rhythm outwards. With a thought, an armor that also emitted a seven-colored glow suddenly appeared on Ou Shangtian's body. Master's words echoed in Ou Shangtian's ears at the same time: "This item is called [Flowing Light Armor], refined from the Nine Heavens Thunderclap and the Morning Breath Rainbow Neon. After wearing it, your flight speed can rival that of lightning, and it can ignore most types of attacks..."

Ou Shangtian tried it out. Looking at the summit of the mountain range far ahead, in just a moment's daze, he found himself on the mountaintop the next instant. "So fast!?" Ou Shangtian himself was shocked. With the dual enhancement of the Flowing Light Armor and the Seven-Colored Jade Void Flowing Light, his speed had reached an unimaginable level. Even though he was flying ostentatiously, emitting seven-colored light all over his body, due to his extreme speed, not a single cultivator in the entire Nine Mountains Prefecture could detect him. Even the Harmonious Dao guardians of the Myriad Immortals Alliance were the same.

Ou Shangtian was cautious at first, but eventually, upon confirming that no one could perceive him, he gradually relaxed. He even felt a sense of exhilaration, as if he could do whatever he pleased. "This is exhilarating, truly exhilarating!" In the vast Nine Mountains Prefecture, he had flown back and forth several times in the time it took to draw a breath. The feeling of lightning speed made Ou Shangtian somewhat intoxicated. At the same time, he couldn't help but feel confused. "Just by flying around like this, can I lure out that Stone Tablet?"

"Is it that mystical? I'm flying so fast, maybe he won't be able to find me?" "Should I slow down and try?" Just as Ou Shangtian's thoughts began to wander, a sense of inexplicable crisis suddenly arose in his heart. A scene suddenly appeared in his mind. The heavens and earth suddenly darkened. It felt like an invisible restraint; no matter how he flew, he couldn't escape the scope of the darkness. In despair, his body slowly slid towards the center of the darkness.

"!" Ou Shangtian's heart trembled violently. He knew that this was the self-warning of his other companion artifact, apart from the Kunqian Bone Hand: the Myriad Death Records. "What the hell is that? The Stone Tablet?" The scene he foresaw made Ou Shangtian's hair stand on end. He made a decisive move and detonated a formation crown he had prepared for a long time. Instantly, countless formations were completed, protecting Ou Shangtian in the center. Only then did the illusionary scene from the Myriad Death Records slowly dissipate.

However, Ou Shangtian's sense of crisis did not diminish. As the formation setter, he could clearly feel that the tens of thousands of formations he had painstakingly laid out were disappearing at an unbelievable speed. But from beginning to end, he never saw the person breaking the formation. It was as if something was silently devouring them. The horror in his heart intensified. Taking advantage of the protective formations still being effective, Ou Shangtian threw out several more formation crowns around him. Layer after layer of formations unfolded, and a shadowy figure slowly materialized. However, Ou Shangtian did not dare to look further.

"Earth Veins!" He inwardly shouted, and Ou Shangtian plunged straight into the ground, heading towards the Earth Veins. In an instant, he disappeared. The myriad formations he left behind were bizarrely compressed into solid entities resembling book pages, all slowly floating towards the figure that had suddenly appeared. The figure gradually revealed its true appearance: a scholar, with a conspicuous stone tablet behind his back. Every time he received a page, after reading it. The page disappeared from his hand, flickered with fluorescent light, and then seemed to be branded onto the stone tablet.

The scholar did not rush to pursue the escaping Ou Shangtian, but slowly finished reading all the pages in his hand. His originally calm expression gradually furrowed. "When did formations in the Xuanhuang Realm develop to this level?" "That 'light of the world'..." "Could it be an outsider?" All the pages in his hand disappeared. The scholar glanced in the direction of Ou Shangtian's location, sensing it.

"Such speed. He even has the Earth Vein Ancient Tree to help..." The scholar sorted through the recent records on the stone tablet. He did not find any relevant entries. "More and more outsider prefectures are appearing, and even this so-called omniscient stone tablet is gradually becoming unworthy of its name." "Carefree, you were right. There is no such thing as eternal. Immortals are like this, and so is the power we Longevity Realm cultivators are proud of." Although this matter clearly smelled of conspiracy, clearly intended to lure him out. But the stone tablet felt no fear. Instead, there was more curiosity.

With one step, the next moment it had already arrived at the location where Ou Shangtian had been before. However, Ou Shangtian seemed to have anticipated this and had already preemptively burrowed into the Earth Veins. The torrent of Earth Veins roared and surged, making it difficult even for the Stone Tablet to find the trace of an ant. However, the Stone Tablet was not in a hurry, knowing that the opponent would inevitably reappear. Thus, it simply stopped in place and waited.

"Interesting. It seems the person behind this understands me quite well." Instead of being angered by being toyed with, the Stone Tablet revealed a faint smile. And so, the Stone Tablet was gradually drawn to a peaceful mountain Taoist temple. Ou Shangtian no longer fled, but respectfully stood behind a majestic figure. The Stone Tablet's gaze shifted from Ou Shangtian to this figure. After observing for a moment, the smile on the Stone Tablet's face finally disappeared. It was replaced by a look of confusion and solemnity. The person before him felt somewhat familiar, yet also gave off a warning sense of danger.

"Just standing there, aren't you tired? Come in and sit down." Just as the two faced off, Li Ping spoke proactively. With just these few words, he broke the tense atmosphere of mutual confrontation. It didn't seem like enemies meeting, but rather like old friends meeting after a long separation, greeting each other familiarly. The Stone Tablet felt a strange sensation in its heart. However, it still said lightly, "Alright." It followed Li Ping into the Taoist temple below. Passing through the Taoist temple, Li Ping did not stop but continued to a pond behind the temple.

"Fellow Daoist, how long have you been carrying that stone tablet on your back?" Li Ping asked. The Stone Tablet paused slightly, then answered without hiding anything, "Thirty-six thousand, nine hundred and forty-two years." "Thirty-six thousand, nine hundred and forty-two years." Li Ping repeated the number. "It sounds like a very long time, but it's only over thirty thousand years. Compared to the lifespan of the Xuanhuang Realm, it's insignificant. Let alone the Sea of Stars beyond the Xuanhuang Realm." Li Ping sighed slightly. The Stone Tablet also agreed, "Yes, thirty thousand years have passed in an instant. For Heaven and Earth itself, it may be nothing. But for an ordinary person like me, it's truly been too long."

"Ordinary person..." Ou Shangtian couldn't help but mutter softly at this moment. Li Ping smiled, "Shangtian, don't be disrespectful. Senior is right; he is indeed just an ordinary person." Ou Shangtian dared not disobey the Saint Emperor and quickly bowed to the Stone Tablet to apologize. The Stone Tablet, however, did not dwell on it and stared directly at Li Ping. "You... seem to know me very well?" Li Ping did not admit it, "It's just that I feel a sense of empathy." "I am also just an ordinary person, merely bearing a destined mission." Ou Shangtian lowered his head further, fearing that the slightest anomaly might be revealed.

The Stone Tablet, however, pondered, constantly observing Li Ping. His tall figure was unlike ordinary cultivators. The several mysterious energies attached to his body made the Stone Tablet dare not underestimate him. "Fellow Daoist, you led me here for what purpose? Could it be just to have a simple chat?" Finally, the Stone Tablet asked, ending the exchange of veiled words between them. "I am here to help Fellow Daoist attain liberation." Li Ping said, his voice solemn. These straightforward words made Ou Shangtian raise his head, a flicker of excitement in his eyes. The Stone Tablet narrowed its eyes, becoming wary.

"It seems Fellow Daoist has misunderstood me. I truly wish to help Fellow Daoist attain liberation." Li Ping's tone revealed a hint of disappointment. The Faceless Saint Emperor gestured towards the surroundings. "Could it be that Fellow Daoist hasn't noticed anything amiss here?" Hearing this, the Stone Tablet's attention shifted from the Faceless Saint Emperor to its surroundings. Scanning the area, its gaze finally fell upon the calm pond.

Chapter 1256: The News of the Sky Sword Appears

The pond did not appear extraordinary, but the Stone Tablet's intuition told it that some secret was hidden there.

The Stone Tablet slowly walked to the edge of the pond. The clear water reflected the scholar's appearance, causing him to pause slightly. Then, he shook his head, and his appearance instantly changed.

"I am somewhat curious, what were you originally like?" the Faceless Saint Emperor Li Ping said from behind him.

"Heh heh, I can barely remember myself," the Stone Tablet chuckled self-deprecatingly.

Then, it seriously observed the pond. The water was not deep, and one could see the bottom at a glance.

"Hmm?" The Stone Tablet observed for a long time but found no mystery in the pond, and couldn't help but doubt its own judgment. It turned to look at Li Ping.

Li Ping did not explain, but suddenly asked meaningfully, "Before the great calamity of the Xuanhuang Realm, there were many Immortal Treasures in existence. Now, after more than ten thousand years have passed, these treasures have long since disappeared without a trace. The existence of Immortal Artifacts has become a legend, and even cultivators rarely mention them in casual conversation."

"Does Fellow Daoist know the whereabouts of these Immortal Treasures?" The Stone Tablet's expression remained unchanged.

"Immortal Artifacts? I've never cared about them..." Halfway through his sentence, he seemed to realize something and looked back at the Fishing Pond again. After pondering for a moment, his appearance changed again.

The Stone Tablet, now in the form of an old fisherman wearing a straw cloak and carrying a fishing basket, threw out his fishing rod. The next moment, his body suddenly froze. Without reeling in the line, the Stone Tablet stood motionless, as if frozen in ice.

After a long time, it took a step back, disengaging from the illusion before them.

"What was that?" The Stone Tablet stared directly at Li Ping.

"What is what?" The Saint Emperor asked knowingly.

"The fishing pond? The starry sky?" the Stone Tablet pressed on.

Li Ping shook his head slightly. "That is the [Bait]."

"The angler is also being fished." Li Ping's tone was cold.

"Even if Fellow Daoist saw all the treasures in the starry sky, you wouldn't be moved. But if it involves your path to liberation? Can you still remain so calm?" Li Ping's voice was low and melodious.

The Stone Tablet had existed in the Xuanhuang Realm for too long and had witnessed too many events. Therefore, after hearing Li Ping's words and pondering for a moment, it quickly understood his meaning.

"The path to immortality is broken, and the Sea of Stars beyond Xuanhuang should have long been a ruin. Unless..." A glimmer of understanding flashed in the Stone Tablet's eyes.

"What, you want to go out and explore?" Li Ping asked.

The Stone Tablet denied it. "All things in the world are similar. Even if it's another world, what difference does it make? I just want to take off this heavy stone on my back and sleep soundly."

Its topic returned to the Fishing Pond. "I don't know when this thing arrived in the Xuanhuang Realm. But I can be sure it was after the great calamity."

"More accurately, it was after the Law Transmitter reappeared and established the Myriad Immortals Alliance." The Saint Emperor was more direct.

"That is to say, this Fishing Pond was likely implanted in the Xuanhuang Realm along with fragments of other cultivation worlds."

"It should be so... but Immortal treasures surpass our understanding. We cannot guarantee this." The Stone Tablet reserved its judgment.

"The liberation you mentioned, is it not for me to bite this bait?" The Stone Tablet looked at the Saint Emperor with a strange expression.

Li Ping said frankly, "Exactly. Fellow Daoist, aren't you living in great pain? You are one with the Creation Stone Tablet. I believe that in the entire world, only an Immortal Treasure that surpasses the power limit of the Xuanhuang Realm can separate you from the Stone Tablet."

"As for what happens after being fished by the power behind the Fishing Pond, that is beyond my guarantee."

The Stone Tablet really wanted to say, "We have no enmity, Fellow Daoist, why would you harm me?" However, the words stopped on his lips. It was clear that this Faceless Venerate had no ill intentions. Otherwise, why would he reveal the entire plan?

On the contrary, the Stone Tablet felt this person was quite honest. Moreover, a familiar aura emanating from the other party inexplicably gave him a sense of peace.

"I am just tired of living and want to get rid of this burden. It doesn't mean I don't want to live anymore." The Stone Tablet politely declined the Saint Emperor's offer.

"If Fellow Daoist is just troubled by the constant information emerging from the Creation Stone Tablet, then the matter is easily resolved." Li Ping finally revealed his true intention.

"Oh?" The Stone Tablet's eyes clearly showed suspicion.

"Does Fellow Daoist recognize this object?" Li Ping reached out, and a brilliant blue crystal floated quietly in his palm.

"I am aware of the Dao-Transformation Stone. Do you intend to..." The Stone Tablet shook its head.

"To tell you the truth, to alleviate the pain, I have tried various methods. I have even tried the Taiyan Sect's Dao-Transformation Divine Secret technique. However, the Creation Stone Tablet is the embodiment of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao's authority. The Heavenly Dao is lofty and looks down upon all things. After merging with me, it can no longer tolerate other things..."

"That was before. Things are different now." Li Ping directly interrupted the Stone Tablet's words. The Stone Tablet paused slightly.

"Besides, I can also help you." As these words were spoken, the aura emanating from the Faceless Saint Emperor changed. The sky above the Taoist temple gathered clouds, and a peculiar rhythm appeared out of thin air, echoing the Saint Emperor.

The familiar and close feeling in the Stone Tablet's heart became even more evident.

"You are?!" Even though it had lived for tens of thousands of years, it couldn't help but exclaim in shock.

"Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate?!"

However, it quickly dismissed the thought. "No, this is impossible. And..." The Stone Tablet looked up at the sky, its expression shifting from shock to solemnity. The authority wielded by the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate was independent of the Creation Stone Tablet, yet it was above the Stone Tablet.

Although its deeds were recorded, they were only brief mentions. Only the vaguest outlines existed. But the Stone Tablet, sensing the aura emanating from the Faceless Saint Emperor at this moment, was clearly different from the recorded Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate.

"The Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate controls the Jun Tian Dao. Although there are subtle connections with the Heavenly Dao, it is more like a separate entity. However, after receiving some kind of empowerment, it can manipulate the laws of the Heavenly Dao as if it were its own arm. As for the one before me..." A thought inexplicably arose in the Stone Tablet's mind.

"Incarnation of the Heavenly Dao?" Although somewhat unbelievable, this was the most reasonable explanation.

Li Ping also seemed to sense the Stone Tablet's thoughts and no longer displayed his connection with the Heavenly Dao. Nor did he directly explain. Instead, he continued the previous topic.
