The Da Qi small world. A single glazed golden flower materialized in her hand with a mere thought. Bai Hua smiled, "I told you, don't listen to that Qiao Gong blowing his own horn, talking about puppets comparable to Longevity cultivators. They are ultimately just dead objects. How can they truly compare to us cultivators!" "Gold of Space-Tearing!" While Bai Hua was in a daze, a spatial fluctuation occurred ahead, catching her attention. Emptying her mind, thinking of nothing. Fleeting fragments of images occasionally flashed by. "You've come to get beaten again?" Bai Hua saw Sun Erlang's expression and knew his intention, unable to help but feel a bit helpless. Petals fluttered, yet the glazed flower's main body showed no signs of damage. In a short while, the void around Bai Hua Daoist was shrouded by countless golden flower petals. Bang! Bang! Petals scattered, continuously colliding with the secretly hidden, following puppets. All along, she had completed the Saint Emperor's tasks perfectly. The rewards of Origin Force essence were also consistent, and recently, they had even become more abundant. Li Fan weighed the sphere in his hand. "Two or three more like this, and it would far exceed the protection that my 119th life's [Ascetic Training of All Beings] could provide. There should be no problem." In the void, five almost identical voices sounded simultaneously with Sun Erlang's words. But Origin Force essence, after all, was just that. "It's likely the puppets manipulated by that fellow. However, I can't even lock onto him with my divine sense?" After gaining freedom, the Origin Force essence gradually lost its target and motivation. The most it did daily was care for the various cavern-worlds, ensuring smooth spiritual energy circulation and vibrant life. Golden-bronze colored puppets began to reveal their true forms one by one. Some were from their experiences in the Sacred Dynasty of Da Qi after awakening.

"Bai Hua Senior." There were a total of five, who had already quietly surrounded Bai Hua in the center. Bai Hua Daoist finally felt a spark of interest. Secondly, she would just zone out. And then, in an instant, they bloomed with explosive force. However, he estimated that his act of severing the roots of the Xuanhuang Realm's tree wouldn't last long. She vaguely felt a presence secretly following her. She felt as if something was secretly following her. She had never had it before, and now she had it. Previously, she thought it was precious and that she had to try it. Now that she was rich, she felt it was tasteless. Bai Hua Daoist was at the border of the Five Elements Great Cavern-world, staring blankly into the void. Upon sensing that familiar aura, her instantly tensed nerves relaxed. … "Gold of Space-Tearing!" "Wood of Entanglement!" "Water of Life-Extinguishing!" "Earth of Void!" Strange Five Elements powers surged from the five puppets respectively. They didn't immediately attack Bai Hua but formed a formation in an instant. Inside the formation, Bai Hua seemed to have instantly left the void and returned to the Five Elements Great Cavern-world. However, the Five Elements Cavern-world here was not vibrant and full of life; instead, it was filled with a murderous aura. Every trace of Five Elements energy within the cavern-world was like a sharp sword. Upon sensing Bai Hua, an outsider, it launched a frantic assault. Gold of Space-Tearing, silent and traceless, its sharpness could tear space itself. Wood of Entanglement, seeking targets in the void, once entangled, it would not rest until death. Water of Life-Extinguishing, extinguishing all life force. Even Bai Hua's released golden glazed flowers withered rapidly upon contact. … The Five Elements gave birth to each other, and the five types of power transformed into one another, inexhaustible. Bai Hua was trapped in the formation, seemingly having endured several days of siege, yet her offensive showed no signs of weakening. "This is the Five Elements Killing Formation." "The main formation should be those five puppets. Instead of attacking directly, they transformed into the eyes of the formation..." While Bai Hua was contemplating, she didn't notice that a dark golden puppet had silently appeared behind her. Hidden within the violent Five Elements energy, like a golden long sword, it ruthlessly struck down. Ding! A sound like metal striking metal echoed through the Five Elements Killing Formation. Bai Hua Daoist’s body instantly turned transparent. A glazed golden flower bloomed within her. Under the light, the long sword that had pierced into her body gradually also became glazed and transparent. The power of the Gold of Space-Tearing erupted, breaking free from the glazed erosion, and then disappeared again, hiding in the chaotic Five Elements Killing Formation. "Not bad." Bai Hua Daoist showed her true form to Sun Erlang for the first time. She said calmly, "If it were the me of the past, I would have been severely injured by your move." "Unfortunately..." Within Bai Hua Daoist's transparent body, the glazed flower rapidly expanded. Under the pure glazed brilliance, the violent Five Elements energy was completely assimilated into solid glazed crystals. In just a few breaths, the glazed flower had swept over everything, engulfing the entire formation space. Ding! A slender finger extended from the solidified crystal. It lightly tapped the condensed flower. A crack appeared, and then rapidly spread throughout the entire flower body. Bang! The flower exploded into countless fragments. The originally violent Five Elements Killing Formation completely turned into void. Bai Hua also returned to her original form, looking around. But what made her expression change was that this move, the [Pure Life Glazed Light] capable of instantly destroying a small world, did not seem to have destroyed the Five Elements Killing Formation? In the void, a disturbing aura began to emerge again. Bai Hua Daoist identified it and suddenly realized, "It's not the Five Elements Killing Formation, but the Yin-Yang Five Elements Grand Formation." Yin and Yang energies circulated, and Five Elements energies emerged from the chaos, ever-flowing.

Soon, the calm void became lively again. Bai Hua saw this and couldn't help but frown slightly. She could easily destroy the formation, but she couldn't prevent the process of Yin and Yang giving birth to Five Elements. Even if she killed it again and again, the killing intent targeting her in the void remained undiminished. "The power of Yin-Yang and Five Elements, combined with the formation, has not significantly increased its lethality, but it has indeed become much more troublesome." Although Bai Hua had a basic understanding of formations, she did not sense any traces of a formation in the surroundings. "Hahahaha! Bai Hua, you're out of ideas, aren't you! Just surrender obediently!" Qiao Gong Daoist's arrogant voice echoed through the Killing Formation. Bai Hua snorted coldly, and a brilliant golden light ignited in her eyes. "Sun kid, be careful. We've finally forced out this move! Let's see how our prepared countermeasures measure up." With the enhancement of Origin Force essence, Bai Hua's glazed light seemed to have become even purer. It was as if even space itself had crystallized, and a shimmering gem slowly formed around her. The Yin and Yang energies that nurtured the Five Elements, and even the structure that sustained the formation, had no place to hide under the pressure of such pure power. Light from the outside shone in, and the killing formation was about to be broken by Bai Hua. "Only you have Origin Force essence?!" Just as this moment arrived, Qiao Gong's slightly smug voice rang out again. A finger, composed entirely of golden light, ignored the solidified glazed crystals and appeared inexplicably before Bai Hua's eyes. The crystals shattered with a bang, turning into countless flowing streams of light. The golden finger was unstoppable, pressing down fiercely towards her forehead. Bai Hua's expression changed slightly, and her body returned to its pure glazed form. Under the same golden light, Bai Hua and the golden finger clashed. What surprised her was that this seemingly terrifying golden finger of Origin Force essence was actually an empty shell. It shattered at the touch, turning into innumerable golden threads that wrapped around her body. "Young Sun, cast your net!" Qiao Gong Daoist shouted with extreme excitement. The golden threads spread instantly, crisscrossing, and Bai Hua Daoist, caught off guard, fell into the net! The glazed flower tried to emit light, but it collided with the golden net and was annihilated into nothingness. A powerful force surged from the golden net, dragging Bai Hua towards the front. "Presumptuous!" Bai Hua's cold shout echoed. "All beings are glazed!" In an instant, Bai Hua's seemingly captured figure disappeared. The glazed flower also reappeared, its petals falling one by one, but this time they vanished completely. In an instant, her true form was revealed. Amidst the flickering light and shadow, it was actually a glazed world! Glazed and frozen, countless beings instantly opened their eyes! Hiss... The golden net wrapped around the world instantly showed cracks. Qiao Gong Jushi's shocked and enraged voice rang out, "You weren't supposed to have escaped the world back then, were you?! I didn't expect you to refine the entire Myriad Sheng Realm into a glazed form!" "What a vicious woman!" Within the glazed world, Bai Hua Daoist's voice echoed, "What do you know! This is for survival!" "Not just for me, but for the entire Heavenly Lotus Sect!" With Bai Hua's furious roar, brilliant light erupted from the glazed world, completely shattering the golden net that bound her.

"Young Sun, quickly retreat!" "Senior, please forgive me..." She faintly heard Qiao Gong Jushi's somewhat flustered voice and Sun Erlang's helpless voice. Returning to the void, their figures were already nowhere to be seen. The glazed flower bloomed again, obscuring the central Myriad Sheng Realm. Bai Hua Daoist resumed her original form. She didn't pursue them but returned to the Five Elements Great Cavern-world. "I just had a fight, and it's finally not so boring. I wonder when we can truly go to war with the Myriad Immortals Alliance?" "If we can truly escape the Immortal Ruins, or even the entire Utmost Darkness Star Sea, perhaps the Heavenly Lotus Sect can also see the light of day again." Bai Hua Daoist's thoughts churned. She had a special kind of confidence in the Saint Emperor. Bai Hua inadvertently glanced towards the outside void. Where the Saint Emperor had gone before, she faintly sensed an energy that made the entire Myriad Sheng Realm tremble with fear. "Truly a madman..." Within the Sacred Dynasty of Da Qi, Qiao Gong, looking somewhat disheveled, cursed to himself while looking heartbrokenly at the seven dark golden puppets before him. "I should have known. Those who survived the world-ending calamity couldn't possibly be simple. Seeing her docile appearance before the Saint Emperor, I was actually fooled..." "Qiao Gong, Qiao Gong, you're truly muddled!" Sun Erlang remained silent. The strength displayed by this seemingly amiable Bai Hua Senior exploding suddenly was indeed somewhat terrifying. However, the purpose of finding her for a spar this time had been achieved. Sun Erlang looked at the seven dark golden puppets in the arena. By manipulating these puppets, he not only became more familiar with the power of the seven Heavenly Souls within the puppet cores but also vaguely deepened his understanding of controlling Origin Force essence. "No! I refuse to believe that I, Qiao Gong of the Heavenly Mystery Realm, can be outdone by a mere Myriad Sheng Realm!" His voice filled with resentment, Qiao Gong took out an object from his embrace. "Young Sun, install this onto these puppets!" Qiao Gong said fiercely. "What is this?" Sun Erlang looked at the square black object in Qiao Gong's hand, asking curiously. "Hehehe, this is the [Experience] extracted from the Immortal Puppet [Ancestor] of our Heavenly Mystery Realm. It cannot be replicated. After the Heavenly Mystery Realm was destroyed, each use diminishes it. I was reluctant to use it before, but now..." Qiao Gong glanced at it reluctantly, then gritted his teeth. "I absolutely cannot let that woman surpass me!" Hearing the words "Immortal Puppet," Sun Erlang's heart trembled. Just as he was about to take it, he suddenly remembered something and hesitated, "This precious item, why don't you give it to Senior Tianyang? Perhaps it would be more useful to him..." Qiao Gong waved his hand, "I already gave him a portion. Do you know where he's been all this time? He's been in seclusion meditating, and he hasn't emerged yet!" "Stop babbling, just do as I say! Quickly, I might regret it later!" Sun Erlang no longer demurred. Connecting his mind to the seven dark golden puppets, he simultaneously crushed the square black object in his hand. Black liquid flowed from the gaps in his hand. Like a living creature, it climbed up Sun Erlang's arm, reaching his head. It coiled high like a hunting cobra and then fiercely burrowed into Sun Erlang's eye sockets. Out of trust for Qiao Gong, Sun Erlang did not resist. The moment the black liquid obscured his vision, Sun Erlang's perception of his surroundings changed. A torrent of blurry images flooded his mind, accompanied by fragmented combat memories. Or more accurately, memories of "being beaten." Mysterious and unfathomable techniques struck the Immortal Puppets. The Immortal Puppets could only endure the blows with their tough material, with little opportunity for counterattack. But even from simply being beaten, profound insights emerged in Sun Erlang's mind. Having been beaten so many times, Sun Erlang seemed to have developed a kind of instinct. When the attack of the Immortal Technique reappeared in his mind, he instinctively felt how to counter it. This feeling captivated Sun Erlang. It was a pity that just as he seemed on the verge of truly sensing something, the images suddenly disappeared. The previous insights also receded like a tide, leaving no trace. "Ugh..." Sun Erlang's veins bulged on his forehead, his fists clenched, and he gasped for air. His eyes turned red, staring intently at Qiao Gong Jushi. Qiao Gong, however, seemed to have expected this and had already moved far away. He said coldly, "Young Sun, clear your head. Don't be deceived by illusions!" "Those feelings of nearing enlightenment, are they from yourself, or from the Immortal Puppet?!" Qiao Gong's words were like a basin of ice water poured over him. Sun Erlang gradually sobered up. However, it still took him nearly half a day to suppress the thought of wanting to snatch the Immortal Puppet's experience from Qiao Gong and continue meditating.

"I'm sorry, Senior," Sun Erlang said with some shame. "It's alright. You don't need to blame yourself. Let alone you, even those old fellows in our Heavenly Mystery Realm can't resist this temptation," Qiao Gong licked his lips, seemingly savoring the taste of enlightenment. "Now, look again. What's different from before?" Qiao Gong instructed. Sun Erlang refocused on the five dark golden puppets. After a moment, a hint of joy flashed in his eyes. "Huh? Those memories of being beaten are constantly reappearing..." Sun Erlang closed his eyes and felt. Qiao Gong clapped his hands, and thousands of Sacred Army puppets appeared one after another. With their mechanical instincts, they simultaneously launched an attack on the dark golden puppets manipulated by Sun Erlang. As if tempered through a thousand trials, Sun Erlang easily dodved all the techniques. This result stunned even Sun Erlang. He couldn't even understand why those attacks, which clearly landed on the dark golden puppets he controlled, ultimately caused no damage. It wasn't that the powerful defense of the dark golden puppets had nullified the damage. It was that, through some extremely mysterious method, all the attacks from the Sacred Army puppets had been dodged. "Don't hesitate, maintain this instinctive feeling as much as possible!" "The remnants of the Immortal Puppet's experience will dissipate soon. How much you can retain in the end depends on your own destiny!" Qiao Gong's words brought Sun Erlang back to his senses. He cast aside all other thoughts, focused his mind, and memorized the Immortal Puppet's evasion instinct. However, it was, after all, the divine ability of an Immortal Puppet, not something that could be solidified by mortal means. Even though Sun Erlang tried his best, as time passed, the puppets he controlled were inevitably hit more and more times. After seven days of persistence, the evasion rate finally stabilized at a certain value. "One-third." "That's a decent result," Qiao Gong comforted him. Sun Erlang was clearly somewhat dissatisfied. "Don't worry. As you continue to meditate in the future, your evasion ability will still improve to a certain extent. However, to reach the level of an Immortal Puppet, moving freely and dodging attacks from so-called divine abilities at will..." "Perhaps only by breaking through the mortal limit." Qiao Gong Jushi said truthfully. Sun Erlang took a deep breath, pushing down the regret in his heart. "Don't underestimate this one-third. In life-and-death combat, it often has miraculous effects. Even if someone's strength far surpasses yours, their attacks might be inadvertently dodged by you." "More importantly, you can control seven puppets simultaneously. In actual combat, due to the shared senses of the seven puppet bodies, the performance will actually be slightly higher than this numerical value..." Qiao Gong began to summarize and analyze the gains with Sun Erlang. "If you were to fight Bai Hua again now, you would have a high probability of dodging her glazed golden light from the Myriad Sheng Realm. If the formation isn't broken, she would be nothing more than a turtle in a jar..." Qiao Gong clearly still harbored some resentment towards Bai Hua, muttering sullenly. While they were talking, they suddenly felt the surrounding space subtly vibrate. "Hm?" Sun Erlang and Qiao Gong were first stunned, then they both flew out of the test site. Not only their location, but the entire Sacred Dynasty of Da Qi was engulfed in violent tremors. In the sky, a vortex vaguely appeared. Thunderbolts rumbled within it. "This is..." A hint of surprise flashed in Sun Erlang's eyes. He had experienced a similar scene before. It was the anomaly that occurred when the Sacred Dynasty's environment underwent an overall sublimation. After the previous anomaly, the Sacred Dynasty's spiritual energy concentration had increased manifold. And the number of talented individuals appearing in the world had also significantly increased compared to before. The current cultivation environment of the Sacred Dynasty was no less than that of the ordinary regions of the Xuanhuang Realm. If it were to sublimate again... Wouldn't it far surpass the Xuanhuang Realm? Not only Li Ping's disciples but also the citizens of the Sacred Dynasty had all emerged from their homes, looking up at the sky with excitement. As the direct beneficiaries of the world's sublimation, without any summons, the citizens of the Sacred Dynasty all knelt down in unison, sincerely praying to the Saint Emperor. If Li Ping were here, he would see that the Sacred Dynasty's luck, which had already condensed to its absolute limit, was showing signs of breaking through again. However, taking this step was extremely difficult. Amidst the prayers of the Sacred Dynasty citizens, tangible violet energy floated out from all directions and was absorbed by the vortex in the sky. The sounds of wind and thunder intensified, and the thunderbolts even made Sun Erlang's heart tremble. From above his head, he felt increasing pressure. "Master has broken through again." A flash of understanding surged into Sun Erlang's heart. From the expressions of Su Yuqing, Ou Shangtian, and the other disciples of the Saint Emperor, Sun Erlang saw that they shared the same thought as himself. The vortex in the sky spun faster and faster, and starlight occasionally shot out from it, sprinkling down on various corners of the world. As vegetation was touched, it grew visibly. As living beings were touched, it was as if they had received a divine awakening, instantly achieving enlightenment. Moreover, several condensed streams of vast starlight shot out like ribbons, accurately flying towards Sun Erlang and others. This included Bai Hua, Qiao Gong, and Yin Shangren, who had been summoned by the Saint Emperor. The moment the starlight entered their bodies, Sun Erlang's vision drastically changed. It was as if he had truly arrived in the endless void outside the Xuanhuang Realm. Sun Erlang saw countless terrifying calamities of destruction hidden within the dead silence of the void. Sun Erlang also saw that even in this terrifying destructive Star Sea, countless Dao of the Star Sea were stubbornly reviving. "Light is hidden beneath darkness..." "Life is born from death." Like a devout follower experiencing enlightenment, Sun Erlang witnessed the vastness and resilience of the Star Sea, tears streaming down his face. And the other cultivators within the Sacred Dynasty also experienced the same. Waves of profound energy surged from their bodies, reaching towards the heavens. The shared enlightenment caused the tremors of the Da Qi small world to intensify. This fluctuation even spread beyond the world, extending towards the void. The Five Elements Cavern-worlds around Da Qi, and other small worlds that had been relocated here, also resonated in unison. Like the rhythm of a heartbeat, something seemed to be gestated within this heartbeat. All living beings in the Da Qi small world looked up at the vortex in the sky as if they felt something. Amidst the gazes of the multitude, a majestic figure descended slowly into the world, passing through the wind, thunder, violet energy, and mysterious starlight. "We welcome the Saint Emperor!" Billions of Da Qi citizens bowed in unison, shouting their greetings. And the Saint Emperor's disciples, as well as Bai Hua, Qiao Gong, and Yin Shangren, were somewhat shocked to discover that their familiar Faceless Saint Emperor's originally empty face now had features! After a moment of hesitation, the aura emanating from the Saint Emperor undoubtedly confirmed his true identity. The Saint Emperor stood high above the nine heavens, looking down at the beings below. With a gentle wave of his hand, all the kneeling citizens stood up.

Chapter 1285: Fifty Years Old to Pass on the Law

The vortex in the sky was about to close. The Saint Emperor reached out and grasped the last beam of starlight shooting out from it. The nebulae swirled, shining brilliantly. After being refined in the Saint Emperor's palm, it flowed like gentle water towards him. It transformed into a star-lit throne. The Saint Emperor sat upright and spoke slowly, his voice like thunder: " Boundless Primordial Chaos, Infinite Innate; Yin and Yang separate, Five Elements flow; All things emerge, created by the Great One..." Every word was profoundly mysterious and difficult to understand. But under the Saint Emperor's recitation, the living beings fortunate enough to hear it in this world faintly felt a sense of contemplation. The fleeting moment of enlightenment, just experienced under the starlight from above, became clear again under the Saint Emperor's every word of the Great Dao's resonant sound. "Dao follows Heaven and Earth, holding it in hand is to be Immortal; Freely roaming the Azure Void, commanding Creation; Eternal through ten thousand tribulations, energy nurturing the eight desolate lands..." Even those with mediocre aptitude and low cultivation, under the Saint Emperor's voice, gained some understanding. The anger in their hearts only intensified. The enlightened populace listened as if drunk. Yin Shangren scratched his scalp. He felt as if the primal Dao foundation within his body was impatient to burst forth. "This is Master's good fortune, and also your good fortune." However, at this juncture, no one dared question the Great Saint Emperor's decision. The Myriad Immortals Alliance controlled half of the Xuanhuang Realm's territories, yet it could still be commanded as if an extension of their arm. This was precisely because of the Heaven-Probing Mirrors and the Law Transmission Altars spread across every state. And seizing the opportunity when everyone was distracted, they hastily left the cave dwelling. "During the three years of preparation, some methods can be implemented in advance." The remaining disciples all nodded in agreement. Six disciples, lined up in order. Sun Luoyuan was speaking eloquently at a gathering when he suddenly sensed something and quickly interrupted his lengthy speech. "Is this what they call 'one person ascending, the chickens and dogs ascend'? No, this is clearly sharing one's own understanding selflessly, imparting it to others regardless of closeness. Hiss..." "The 'Dark Needle Plan' is finally going to be implemented? I've waited so long for this day." A glint flashed in Sun Luoyuan's eyes. He suppressed the excitement and a hint of fear for the future, concealed his aura, and hurried towards the agreed meeting point. As for those with exceptional aptitude like Sun Erlang and Ou Shangtian, their eyes shone brightly, and purple energy even began to swirl around them. "Master gives you three years to comprehend. Three years from today..." The Saint Emperor's voice echoed in everyone's minds. Most of them would need the rest of their lives to digest the Saint Emperor's sermon. Xuanhuang Realm, Tianquan Prefecture. No matter which prefecture encountered a problem, support from all prefectures or even the headquarters of the Myriad Immortals Alliance could swiftly arrive. "Congratulations, Master, on your enlightenment!" Sun Erlang said with a bow. Therefore, to deal with the Myriad Immortals Alliance, destroying or interfering with this connection became the top priority. Everyone lowered their heads and complied. The so-called Dark Needle Plan was a sabotage plan targeting the Myriad Immortals Alliance's Heaven-Probing Mirrors and their teleportation altars. The Saint Emperor's gaze swept over the six disciples below: "Our Great Qi Sacred Dynasty will conquer the Myriad Immortals Alliance and reclaim the Xuanhuang Realm!" "Three years." ... The Saint Emperor's sermon lasted for three days and three nights. The six disciples' bodies trembled upon hearing this. But Sun Luoyuan had already made up his mind. Besides the reasons that led him to betray them before, a greater factor was the recent demise of Sun Luochang. Even if it was just a perfunctory comfort, it would suffice. They had long known that this battle was inevitable, but no one had expected it to come so soon! It was only when the Saint Emperor's image dissipated that they remained immersed in it, completely oblivious. Sun Luoyuan had been waiting for the Myriad Immortals Alliance to give him an explanation. It was only when the essence of blood left in the underground blood pool suddenly dried up that Sun Luoyuan felt despair. "Before, Ou Shangtian said he could influence or even destroy the Heaven-Probing Mirrors in each prefecture. I don't know how he did it. However, my informants in each prefecture are already prepared," Sun Luoyuan pondered as he hurried along. Spiritual energy spontaneously flowed into his body, an image of achieving enlightenment on the spot. He knew that once the arrow was shot, there was no turning back. If he made a move this time, he would completely solidify his identity as a traitor to the Myriad Immortals Alliance. If discovered, there would be no chance of survival. These days, he had watched the Myriad Immortals Alliance continue to release rainbow light messages from beyond the realm, even showing images of Sun Luochang, who had already perished. And now, the Saint Emperor had returned to his throne to contemplate. When he was chosen to go beyond the Xuanhuang Realm, Sun Luoyuan still held a sliver of hope for Sun Luochang's survival. But clearly, he had overthought. The various prefecture guardians at the Harmonious Dao stage and those so-called important officials of the Myriad Immortals Alliance were indeed like materials that could be discarded at will. They were abandoned without hesitation. "Myriad Immortals Alliance..." At this point, Sun Luoyuan had completely severed all hope he had for the Myriad Immortals Alliance. He had completely sided with the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty. "Regardless of anything else, the benefits I have received from the Sacred Dynasty in recent years far outweigh those from serving the Myriad Immortals Alliance." Thinking this, Sun Luoyuan had already arrived at the agreed rendezvous point. Beside the towering white mist barrier in Tianquan Prefecture. Years ago, due to the great upheaval in the Xuanhuang Realm, the white mist barrier here had broken and crashed to the ground. The unconstrained Devouring Mist had flowed and spread outwards, mercilessly devouring all the living beings it enveloped. Although the great upheaval eventually subsided and the white mist barrier was restored, this dead land had never recovered its vitality. This attested to the terrifying nature of the Devouring Mist. "Who would have thought that the Sacred Dynasty actually had a way to almost completely negate the influence of this Devouring Mist. Meeting here is the safest!" Sun Luoyuan scanned his surroundings, ensuring no one was following, and cautiously took out the [Dilligent True Boat]. Flying into the boat, he piloted it into the white mist barrier. Maintaining a constant speed and constantly changing direction, after traveling for a while, he indeed saw another Diligent True Boat quietly docked within the white mist. A black light flew out from it, lightly cutting through the white mist and arriving in front of Sun Luoyuan. Sun Luoyuan took it and found it was a storage ring made of black jade. When he looked up again, the previous Diligent True Boat had already vanished without a trace. "So cautious, they wouldn't even show their face." Inside the black jade ring, nearly a thousand square jade pieces, engraved with profound characters, were neatly arranged. Sun Luoyuan took one out and examined it carefully, while also reading the usage instructions just transmitted via the black light. "As long as it is brought into a Heaven-Probing Mirror or a teleportation altar, and activated, it can explode?" "So simple?" Sun Luoyuan was somewhat surprised. He immediately felt the urge to try it out. However, after studying it carefully, he could only shake his head in frustration. "The detonation time has already been set. It can only be detonated three years later. Before that time, even the core formation within is not activated, and it is just an ordinary jade piece..." "No wonder I couldn't sense any spiritual fluctuations from it." Sun Luoyuan put the jade piece back, his expression grim: "Let those cultivators, whom the Myriad Immortals Alliance considers ants, be the first to sound the death knell for it." Just as the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty began to operate for the conquest plan three years later, Li Fan had already annihilated four small worlds through the Spirit Void Grand Array. He had collected enough of the substance he called [Essence of All Things]. A pure collection of energy, emitting a dreamlike, multicolored viscous glow. To Li Fan, it felt similar to the golden Origin Force Essence. "Have you learned this formation?" Li Fan gazed into the distance, asking the Boundless Mirror. The simulated personality, Sun Luoyao, who had been rebuilt several times, remained silent for a moment before finally replying, "I've more or less learned it, Senior." Li Fan nodded with satisfaction. He gently flicked his finger, and a beam of light entered Sun Luoyao's illusory form: "Then, for the next step, you will go to these places and continue setting up the formations." "Just quietly set up the formations, no need to activate them." Saying this, Li Fan flicked the Boundless Mirror, along with all the Origin Force Essence he had collected upon returning to the Sun family, towards it. Sun Luoyao quickly collected the golden light, thanked Li Fan excitedly, and then transformed into a beam of light, heading towards the target small world. If it were the real Sun Luoyao, executing Li Fan's task alone might have led to insubordination. But now, he was merely a simulated personality. He might not even be genuinely happy to receive Origin Force Essence; it was all fabricated, so he naturally would not disobey Li Fan's orders. "The Boundless Mirror Spirit setting up formations is less effective than me, but destroying a world is more than enough. After all, the small worlds I chose were all weak, with no cultivators, preventing outsiders from noticing them being approached by the Xuanhuang Realm's Immortal Ruins." "Although he may not show himself again in this life, leaving some contingency is still necessary." The connection with the Saint Emperor had been completely severed. However, Li Fan could still faintly sense the tremendous changes happening to the Saint Emperor. "Did he have another epiphany in the Star Sea?" "Clearly, the clone's original talent was just ordinary. With so many fortuitous encounters and blessings, he has truly begun to resemble a destined protagonist..." A hint of sarcasm flashed across Li Fan's face. "It's a pity, it's all in vain!" Li Fan's divine sense transformed into a thin thread and flew towards the Tianquan Prefecture region. He needed to deliver the [Essence of All Things] he had collected for protection to his main body. In just over half a day, Li Fan had found his target. The "Hermit Chi," who had been cultivating in the mortal world in disguise. The clone, unnoticed, drifted into the body of a nearby Golden Core cultivator. The cultivator paused for a moment, then quickly returned to normal. Turning around, he arrived in front of Hermit Chi. "Elder, shall we play a game of chess?" The disheveled Taoist, who was picking his feet without any decorum, immediately looked up. ... After Li Fan successfully obtained the Law Transmitting Jade Token from Hermit Chi, he first went to the Debating Dao Tower in Tianquan Prefecture and used all his savings to rent a small courtyard. Then, using the [Dao Pill] method, he completely possessed the body of the host cultivator. Li Fan extended his hand, looking at his new body, and frowned slightly. "Compared to the environment of the Xuanxianzhou outside the Star Sea, this soul-possessing method is not as perfect in the Xuanhuang Realm." Li Fan moved his limbs and felt a slight discordance. "Possessing Zhao Xian could deceive the Immortal Severing Tower." "But possessing this..." "Fu Yuansheng, might not be able to evade the inspection of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. I need to refine it further." Li Fan manipulated Fu Yuansheng's body and set up a formation around himself. Then, he strode into the formation. "Using the body as the tool, refining with the formation~" Li Fan chanted softly, using the power of the formation to gradually refine and eliminate the disharmony within the possessed body. During this process, the experiences of the Saint Emperor's cultivation in this life, the sights of the Saint Embryo within the Xuanxianzhou, and the insights gained from the main body's seclusion and enlightenment, all flooded his mind and were integrated by Li Fan. He tapped his fingers, modifying and improving the formation he had just set up. The abnormalities of the body and soul gradually disappeared. "From today onwards, I am Fu Yuansheng!" Li Fan's divine sense smiled slightly. To verify, Li Fan first entered the Heaven-Probing Mirror of Tianquan Prefecture. As expected, he successfully deceived the Heaven-Probing Mirror's inspection and entered his Heaven-Probing Mirror space as Fu Yuansheng. "Two thousand contribution points..." "Truly meager." Li Fan shook his head and sighed, but made no changes. He merely rested for a while as usual before leaving the Heaven-Probing Mirror. He then walked to the most prosperous area of Tianquan Celestial City and activated the Law Transmitting Jade Token. The sudden burst of light immediately attracted the attention of everyone present. "What is that?" "This type of jade token... Hiss, could it be that?" Soon, someone recognized the item in Li Fan's hand, and exclamations of shock and disbelief arose. The surrounding cultivators surrounded Li Fan, who put on an appearance of extreme pallor and forced support. As the recruiting cultivator arrived, stabilizing the chaotic scene, the recruiting cultivator weighed the jade token in his hand and did not directly take Li Fan to the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters. Instead, he transmitted a voice: "This Law Transmitting Jade Token is of exceptional quality, capable of deriving Harmonious Dao cultivation techniques... You are only at the Golden Core stage, which is a waste. Are you interested in transferring this jade token to me? Of course, I will not mistreat you. I will still grant you a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique, and even prepare all the resources needed for your promotion from Nascent Soul to Harmonious Dao." "Thank you for your kind intentions, Senior..." Li Fan cupped his fists, "But I am not interested in transferring the jade token." The recruiting cultivator, who thought Li Fan would agree, changed his expression upon hearing the reply: "Boy, you should think clearly! It's not that having a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique guarantees you can reach Harmonious Dao. I've already investigated your background. Without family support, I doubt you can even reach Nascent Soul on your own!" "I am doing this for your own good!" The recruiting cultivator stared intently at Li Fan. Li Fan was slightly surprised: "Did Senior not hear clearly? Then I will say it again." "Junior is not interested in transferring the Law Transmitting Jade Token." This time, it was not a voice transmission but a clear declaration in public. The surrounding cultivators immediately turned their attention to the recruiting cultivator. Although no one dared to openly discuss, their gazes clearly conveyed their thoughts. The recruiting cultivator, having a deep understanding of worldly affairs, showed no change in his expression: "Since that is the case, so be it. I was merely offering friendly advice. With a Golden Core cultivator possessing a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique... I don't know how many malicious individuals would be tempted to take risks." "Isn't that right, Fu Yuansheng!" he said loudly, also vocally. The voice shook, faintly spreading throughout Tianquan Celestial City. Instantly, all eyes in the city converged on Li Fan. Their expressions varied, but all concealed greed. Li Fan's face turned completely pale, a hint of hatred and fear flashed in his eyes, and he lowered his head, saying, "Thank you for your concern, Senior." The recruiting cultivator let out a cold snort and then opened the passage to the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters. After the two of them left, the previously suppressed Tianquan Celestial City erupted into a frenzy. Golden Core cultivators, Harmonious Dao cultivation techniques. The combination of these two was too impactful, instantly becoming the focus of everyone's discussion. Fu Yuansheng's background information was also quickly dug up. Those with quick minds began to instruct people to pressure the Fu family. Powerless and with low cultivation, even if he obtained a treasure, how could he protect it? In the Debating Dao Tower of Tianquan Celestial City. A cultivator in white robes looked at this scene and sighed slightly: "This recruiting cultivator is truly pushing people to a dead end!" A handsome young man opposite him also nodded in agreement: "Unless Fu Yuansheng can hide in the Heaven-Probing Mirror forever and disregard the lives and deaths of his family and friends, I'm afraid he cannot protect that Harmonious Dao cultivation technique." The young man paused, then changed the subject: "It's just a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique, yet they resort to such life-or-death tactics. And this is happening in broad daylight, in the eyes of everyone... We came out for a cup of tea and encountered such a thing. It just goes to show how many similar incidents are happening offstage." "The Immortal Alliance is corrupt, as can be seen." The white-robed cultivator remained silent, sighing helplessly after a long while. "That's why I say, joining our Sacred Dynasty and overthrowing the corrupt rule of the Immortal Alliance is the wise choice. Tianming, you've been to our Sacred Dynasty before, and such forceful coercion would never happen in the Sacred Dynasty." The young man transmitted his voice, speaking eloquently. The white-robed cultivator, named Tianming, also nodded in agreement: "Brother Tianci, you are right. In that fishing pond, countless treasures were fished out, and they all belonged to the citizens of Da Qi personally. There's no need to worry about others snatching them... Judging by this alone, the Sacred Dynasty is already far superior to the Immortal Alliance!" Shang Tianci smiled: "I see that Brother Tianming has made up his mind." The white-robed cultivator also responded with a smile. "Another one successfully persuaded. This time is truly a blessing from heaven." Shang Tianci secretly thought, and at the same time, the next name flashed in his mind. "I wonder about the progress of the others." In the absence of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's awareness, such changes were constantly occurring everywhere. When people's hearts are lost, it is only a matter of time before they are persuaded or swayed. At the headquarters of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. When Fu Yuansheng's body, Li Fan, arrived at the headquarters again. As expected, just like the previous few times, Li Fan fell into an illusion. The illusion master was still the Law Transmitting Heavenly Venerate. However, the scenes witnessed this time were completely different from before. Below the continuous immortal mountains shrouded in clouds and mist, a man in his fifties was being ruthlessly stopped. "This is an immortal sacred place, how can you, a mere mortal, trespass?" "Strange, wasn't the outer perimeter protected by an illusion array? How did this mortal get in?" A cultivator in blue Taoist robes muttered, kicking the middle-aged man away. The middle-aged man tumbled awkwardly on the ground, then miraculously got up as if unharmed, saying with a smile, "Immortal Master, can you give me a chance? I feel... I feel like I can cultivate." The cultivator sneered, "You're already half dead, and you still dream of cultivating? Cultivation requires talent and resources. Someone like you..." The cultivator's face was filled with contempt: "Even if you could cultivate, our Tianyuan Sect doesn't accept you!" The middle-aged man didn't give up, even extending his arm, offering it: "Immortal Master, believe me, look, my aptitude..." The cultivator's eyes flashed with killing intent, his spiritual energy surging, about to blast this ignorant fool to death. Just then, a familiar voice echoed from above: "What's your name?" "Xuanyuan Dog Egg... No, Xuanyuan Tuo, my name is Xuanyuan Tuo," the middle-aged Law Transmitter said somewhat nervously. "Uncle Xu!" The cultivator's expression changed, and he immediately withdrew the killing intent in his heart, hurriedly bowing to the newcomer. He was also a middle-aged man, but Uncle Xu looked much more energetic than Xuanyuan Tuo. He came to Xuanyuan Tuo's side and examined him closely. After a moment, Uncle Xu shook his head with a hint of regret: "Although you have sufficient meditative potential, your age is simply too great. It's difficult to achieve anything." "It will be extremely difficult to even reach the Foundation Establishment stage..." Xuanyuan Tuo quickly said, "Immortal Master, I don't ask for much. As long as I can cultivate. I've farmed for half my life, and my mind has always been restless, feeling that I shouldn't spend my life in the fields..." Uncle Xu was somewhat surprised, not expecting this old farmer to say such a thing. Just as he was hesitating, a clear bell chime suddenly sounded from the mountain peak in the distance. The blue-robed cultivator behind him also spoke up, "Uncle Master, the Sect Master is convening a meeting." Uncle Xu glanced back at the mountain peak, swallowed the words he was about to say, and took out a book. "Go back first and read this scripture. If you can cultivate spiritual energy within a year, you can come find me again." Uncle Xu said, then floated away. Xuanyuan Tuo's eyes widened, watching him go. After walking for a while, he seemed to remember something, his face changed drastically, and he wanted to look back, only to find that the magnificent immortal mountain had disappeared at some point. Xuanyuan Tuo slapped his thigh in regret: "I can't read!" ... Boom! The illusion shattered violently, and Li Fan returned to reality. Recalling the content he had just seen, his expression was strange. "What did you see?" The recruiting cultivator asked. Li Fan answered, feigning shock: "I saw the Heavenly Venerate exhibiting the Dharma Body Manifestation, preaching in the world..." "Hmph. A trace of the Heavenly Venerate's aura remains in the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters, so any cultivator entering here for the first time will experience an illusion..." The recruiting cultivator snorted, then explained, "I'll take you to the Law Enforcement Hall headquarters." Along the way, Li Fan secretly pondered. "I wonder what the origin of this illusion is?" "This Law Transmission is quite peculiar, having such a preference for displaying his life story here for his disciples and grandchildren to watch..." "Heh heh, I didn't expect that the dignified Law Transmitting Heavenly Venerate also had such a disreputable side." Li Fan found it difficult to connect the dark-skinned old farmer with the white-haired, long-bearded, sorrowful old man. "If the Tianyuan Sect had accepted the Law Transmitter back then, perhaps the history of the Xuanhuang Realm would have taken a different turn?" "But perhaps not." "After the Law Transmitter awakened, he was not someone a small sect like this could control. Speaking of which, the Tianyuan Sect, after the great catastrophe descended, could barely last long before perishing due to internal strife." "As for Uncle Xu, he looked somewhat similar to the Chief of the Law Enforcement Hall, Xu Yuanxian. He might be his ancestor?" Countless thoughts flashed through his mind in an instant. By the time they reached the bluestone path outside the Law Enforcement Hall, Li Fan had reined in his thoughts. Following the same procedure as using the Law Transmitting Jade Token before, after queuing for several days, he finally entered the Law Derivation Chamber. Looking at the "listless" Law Derivation Chamber, Li Fan feigned great excitement. "Why again?" the Law Derivation Chamber muttered, its annoyed expression clearly not feigned. After all, normal technique derivation could be handed over to simulated personalities. But this type of technique derivation tailored specifically for Law Transmitting Jade Tokens required her to act personally. "What are your requirements?" The Law Derivation Chamber threw a piece of paper over. Just as it was about to reach Li Fan, it was caught by "Sun Ang" who was guarding there. "Wait!" Sun Ang's action attracted the attention of the other two guards. "Brother Sun, is something wrong?" Hua Yueye asked with a grave expression. Sun Ang shook his head: "Just a faint feeling of unease. It's better to inspect it more carefully." Since it was for the safety of the Law Derivation Chamber, the other two guards exchanged glances and did not stop him. Fu Yuansheng seemed somewhat nervous at Sun Ang's arrival. "Greetings, Senior..." Sun Ang completely ignored him, placing his right hand on Fu Yuansheng's head. Fu Yuansheng's body instantly froze. After a moment, Sun Ang withdrew his right hand. However, his furrowed brow did not relax. "Two of you, please check again." Hua Yueye and Zhang Xu nodded and each stepped forward to inspect carefully. Naturally, they found nothing. "Perhaps Brother Sun is being overly cautious?" Hua Yueye said. Sun Ang seemed unconvinced, but since the inspection yielded no results, he had no reason to obstruct further. However, throughout the entire derivation process, he kept a close eye on Fu Yuansheng. After the technique derivation was completed, Fu Yuansheng's face was ashen, and he fled as if escaping. "Could it be because I've been here too long?" Without outsiders present, Hua Yueye asked with some concern, "Did you feel unwell?" Sun Ang, also known as Li Fan's main body, sensed the [Essence of All Things] he had obtained. He excused himself, "No. My mind was uneasy..." "Perhaps something happened to my family's bloodline."

Chapter 1286: The Holy Emperor Establishes New Laws

Zhang Xu stroked his beard, his expression solemn, and said, "The connection between bloodlines is mysterious, yet it must be believed. Brother Sun, perhaps you could send someone to confirm with your family."

Hua Yueye echoed the sentiment.

"Thank you for your guidance, fellow Daoists," Sun Ang, which was Li Fan's true body, said after pondering for a moment. He then sent out a spiritual talisman, which flew beyond the Derivation Law Jade space.

This spiritual talisman could only be used once every hundred years by each guardian who had reached the Harmonious Dao stage. If it weren’t for the previous "assistance" from Xu Yuan, which reduced Sun Ang's guarding time by a hundred years, he wouldn’t have been able to contact the outside world even now.

After about half a day, Sun Luoyuan, the head of the Sun family, personally arrived.

"Your uncle has unfortunately passed away."

Li Fan's expression first turned to shock, then morphed into self-reproach and grief: "When Uncle left back then, I already had a vague premonition…"

Sun Luoyuan comforted him, "Life and death are unpredictable. Lu Chang's demise has nothing to do with you; you don't need to blame yourself, Lu'er."

"I..."

After flying aimlessly for a long time, Li Fan soon encountered the person he was waiting for.

"Everyone, it's just a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique, not worth fighting to the death over. Why don't we discuss it peacefully?" someone suggested, directly disregarding the opinion of Fu Yuansheng, the owner of the cultivation technique, treating it as if it were already theirs.

Everyone's focus was on Fu Yuansheng, who seemed to be forced into a corner, desperately trying to escape.

He was waiting for an opportunity to completely ignite the situation.

Li Fan smiled slightly, then his expression instantly turned pained and filled with immense grief.

"If necessary, I will find a way to get you out."

"You scoundrel, the family head summoned you but you didn't return. What exactly do you want to do?" As soon as Fu Linmu appeared, he unleashed a torrent of scolding at Fu Yuansheng.

Li Fan continued his act, his expression becoming increasingly subtle as the urgent message from outside showed no signs of stopping and even grew more intense due to the prolonged lack of a reply.

After Fu Linmu's persuasion, Li Fan appeared to struggle internally before finally seeming to compromise.

Just then, another unwelcome guest arrived.

"Let me... give it another push!"

It wasn't that there were truly so many people coveting the cultivation technique; most of them were simply there to join the excitement.

"Fu Yuansheng, don't think you'll be lucky forever! You're just a mere Golden Core cultivator, how can you protect a true Harmonious Dao technique? Rather than it being forcibly taken later, why not hand it over proactively and exchange it for a bright future!"

Li Fan pretended to be terrified, but he was nonchalantly leading these people on.

Soon, Fu Yuansheng's appearance drew the attention of some individuals.

"Indeed, if the price is too high, it's better to just buy it honestly from the Heaven-Probing Mirror."

Li Fan pretended to be somewhat confused, unsure of who to listen to.

"As the saying goes, different places nurture different people. Such things would never happen within our Sacred Dynasty. The Myriad Immortals Alliance is at the end of its rope!"

Just as the Sun family's father and son were performing a deeply heartfelt scene, Li Fan, through the possessed Fu Yuansheng, faced immense malice from different individuals within the family.

Knowing that the Sun family had already defected to the Sacred Dynasty of Da Qi, Li Fan naturally understood the true meaning of Sun Luoyuan's words, but at this moment, he could only feign saying: "I can hold on. We can't waste the family's resources because of me."

"Little Shengzi, what incredible luck did you stumble upon to obtain a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique?"

It was another elder from the Fu family, accompanied by another Nascent Soul cultivator, who wanted to contend for the ownership of the Harmonious Dao true technique.

How fast could a Golden Core cultivator fly? Very quickly, a large group of people followed behind Fu Yuansheng.

Sun Luoyuan made a solemn promise.

"Sheng'er, in less than two days, more than ten Nascent Soul cultivators have come knocking. Any one of them is someone our Fu family cannot afford to offend! For the future of the Fu family, why don't you hand over the cultivation technique?"

Soon, many onlookers followed.

While two Nascent Soul cultivators were confronting each other, more Nascent Soul cultivators arrived upon hearing the news.

Instead of returning to the Fu family, he used the teleportation array and arrived at Tianquan Celestial City, openly appearing before the public.

Li Fan stopped his flight, appearing to be extremely fearful of his own father.

"This is Senior Futongtian from Tianquan Prefecture. We are somewhat related by family."

Fu Linmu continued to persuade with emotion and reason, then introduced the identity of the眯眼 Nascent Soul cultivator behind him.

Behind Fu Linmu stood a cultivator with his arms crossed and his eyes slightly narrowed. Judging by his aura, he should be at the Nascent Soul stage.

…

"Your Harmonious Dao cultivation technique, our Fu family truly cannot protect it. If it falls into your hands, it will be a curse rather than a blessing. Why not hand it over to Senior Fu…"

Even those who were unaware quickly understood what was happening after hearing the inquiries of the surrounding cultivators.

Unexpectedly, he didn't hide temporarily or use the teleportation array to transfer. Instead, as if he had lost his mind, he flew directly out of Tianquan City in his physical body.

"The malice of human hearts, to this extent!"

"Yuan Sheng, didn't the family treat you well these years? It's time for you to repay the family."

That should be Fu Yuansheng's nominal father, Fu Linmu.

"Why not listen first to what this Fu family prodigy, Fu Yuansheng, has gleaned from Derivation Law Jade to deduce such a cultivation technique first?"

The group of Nascent Soul cultivators quickly reached a consensus and unanimously looked at Li Fan.

Little did they know, this move was exactly what Li Fan wanted.

Before entering the Derivation Law Jade space, he had already calculated that he would use this cultivation technique to stir up trouble. Therefore, the foundational cultivation technique he provided to Derivation Law Jade was of an extremely high standard.

The resulting cultivation technique was naturally extraordinary, even having some effect on Li Fan in his current state.

Li Fan, disguised as Fu Yuansheng, showed a pained expression. Finally, with a helpless sigh, he took a deep breath and said word by word: "The cultivation technique I obtained is called the [Heaven-Reaching Spirit Manifestation Art]."

"The current new methods are truly defying the heavens. However, to break through realms, one must rely on the various resources in heaven and earth. It's fine for those aristocratic families, but for those like us without power or influence, even with peerless talent, we are still limited!"

Li Fan's words caused many cultivators present to be moved and feel a sense of empathy.

Li Fan continued, "Therefore, I have always dreamed of one day escaping such limitations. Thanks to Senior Qian Xun's favor, I was gifted the [Jing Fa Jade Tablet], which finally allowed me to turn my dream into reality."

"This Heaven-Reaching Spirit Manifestation Art can continuously strengthen one's connection with the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, greatly reducing the hostility of the Heavenly Dao. Then, through the connection with heaven and earth, it becomes easier to find the materials necessary for breakthroughs such as the Nascent Soul stage cave-heaven and the transformation of life and death. Even when cultivated to a profound level, it would be easy to sense the location of the primal essence of heaven and earth…"

"With this cultivation technique, as long as I, Fu Yuansheng, am given some time, achieving Harmonious Dao is not an absurd fantasy. But I didn't expect... I didn't expect..."

"The Myriad Immortals Alliance actually pressures cultivators like me from the lower echelons to this extent! They give us no opportunity at all!"

The more Li Fan spoke, the more indignant he became, his eyes filled with bloodshot rage.

He then waved his hand, directly revealing the grand outline of the [Heaven-Reaching Spirit Manifestation Art] for all to see.

With just a glance, the Harmonious Dao cultivators present recognized the extraordinary nature of this cultivation technique.

It was certainly not something a mere Golden Core cultivator could fabricate.

The Nascent Soul cultivators present had various expressions. The atmosphere suddenly became tense and serious.

"Enough."

One of them erased the text on the sky screen and then scanned the crowd: "The value of this cultivation technique is self-evident. I believe no further explanation is needed."

"Indeed, there are gaps between Harmonious Dao cultivation techniques. If this young man's words are true, the value of this Harmonious Dao cultivation technique is truly unprecedented in my life."

"Heh heh, I think even if all of you present were to die, as long as one could obtain the cultivation technique, it would be worth it!"

The Nascent Soul cultivators interjected one after another, the atmosphere growing increasingly hostile.

The Fu family members present gradually wore looks of despair.

If they had known that Fu Yuansheng had comprehended such a supreme cultivation technique capable of establishing a cultivation family, they would have tried to protect him, no matter what!

Even if they had set more conditions when selling it.

Regardless of the Fu family's regret,

The final ownership of the Heaven-Reaching Spirit Manifestation Art was snatched by a newly ascended Harmonious Dao cultivator.

This person was known as "Immortal Venerable Chilliant," who had only recently broken through to the Harmonious Dao realm a few days prior.

He had not yet found a suitable cultivation technique and happened to hear of Fu Yuansheng's situation. Intrigued, he came to join the fun.

Unexpectedly, he found a pleasant surprise.

There was a world of difference between Harmonious Dao and Nascent Soul. Chilliant wanted it, and the Nascent Soul cultivators present naturally could not compete with him.

Moreover, Chilliant was not alone; he had the backing of a not-insignificant family.

Ultimately, under the dual pressure of power, the Nascent Soul cultivators present withdrew from the competition.

To avoid further complications, the final victor, Immortal Venerable Chilliant, immediately demanded that Fu Yuansheng hand over the cultivation technique on the spot.

"I hope that after obtaining this technique, Senior can still show some care to our Fu family."

Li Fan raised his head and sighed, his words causing the Fu family members present to feel ashamed.

Watching Chilliant fly closer, Li Fan's divine sense transmitted the complete Heaven-Reaching Spirit Manifestation Art to him.

"As expected of an supreme miraculous method," Chilliant said with great joy, his expression beaming.

"Fu boy, sign this contract, signifying that you voluntarily give up the ownership of the cultivation technique. Don't worry, I won't mistreat your Fu family…" Chilliant said solemnly.

"Your junior obeys." Li Fan bowed his head, about to take the golden contract.

And just at this moment…

Perhaps influenced by the text of the Heaven-Reaching Spirit Manifestation Art, Chilliant suddenly felt his senses become somewhat hazy.

The Fu Yuansheng before him seemed to transform into a terrifying monster from nightmares, claws and teeth bared, lunging towards him. The next moment, he was about to pounce on his face.

Chilliant jolted, instinctively unleashing a red light.

It struck Fu Yuansheng's body directly.

The power of Harmonious Dao, even a casual, unintentional strike, how could a Golden Core cultivator withstand it?

With an expression of disbelief, Fu Yuansheng's body instantly disintegrated, vanishing into dust.

This sudden turn of events stunned everyone.

All eyes were filled with shock as they stared at Immortal Venerable Chilliant, who had committed murder in public.

And Chilliant himself was somewhat taken aback.

He stared blankly at his own palm.

"Could it be that after just breaking through, the influence of the world's essence on me hasn't completely faded?"

"Fortunately, the [Heaven-Reaching Spirit Manifestation Art] is now in my possession." This was the second thought that flashed through Chilliant's mind.

"Sheng'er!" After a dead silence, the Fu family members finally reacted.

They cried out in grief and indignation.

Many even disregarded the immense gap between themselves and the Harmonious Dao cultivator, staring at Chilliant with hateful eyes.

Above them, the phenomenon of death arrived late, signifying the cause of Fu Yuansheng's demise.

And Chilliant, the murderer, felt vaguely uncomfortable looking at these ants.

However, given that he was in the wrong, he couldn't lash out in public.

He simply said, "Don't worry, I keep my word. I won't mistreat your Fu family..."

The Fu family's cries gradually subsided.

After all, the person was dead, and it was not worth risking death by defying a Harmonious Dao cultivator for the sake of a deceased individual.

Chilliant left with the Fu family members.

The other Nascent Soul cultivators also sighed with emotion: "It seems the cultivation technique was too precious. Immortal Venerable Chilliant chose to silence the witnesses to ensure absolute secrecy."

"He doesn't even trust the contract? This newly-ascended Harmonious Dao cultivator is too suspicious!"

"What about the contract? There are many wondrous techniques in the world; perhaps there's a way to breach the contract without punishment?"

"Even with so many people watching, if it were in private, his actions would surely be even more unrestrained!"

"Harmonious Dao cultivators are truly awe-inspiring! The laws of the Immortal Alliance seem to become trivial at their level!"

"Naturally. Even a fool would know that the Immortal Alliance would never punish a Harmonious Dao cultivator for the sake of a mere Golden Core cultivator. Even if they did, it would likely be just for show."

"Once one enters the Harmonious Dao, everything changes. Just like the outbound rainbow light before, which could roam the Star Sea, it is only accessible to Harmonious Dao cultivators."

…

The Nascent Soul cultivators chatted animatedly before dispersing one by one.

However, the large number of Foundation Establishment, Golden Core, and Nascent Soul cultivators who remained on the scene lingered for a long time.

They looked up at the lingering phenomenon of death in the sky, a sense of sorrow for fallen companions welling up in their hearts.

Under the influence of some imperceptible force, this emotion gradually transformed into a blazing flame of anger, slowly igniting.

"In the eyes of the higher echelons of the Immortal Alliance, we are truly no different from ants."

"What about the promised laws of the Immortal Alliance? It turns out they only apply to us?"

"Today, Fu Yuansheng died unjustly. Tomorrow, who among us will be next?"

…

In the silence, a strange atmosphere was brewing.

Although no words were spoken, the mutual glances conveyed everything.

However, due to the deterrence of the Immortal Alliance, none of them dared to voice their thoughts.

Perhaps…

They only needed an opportunity.

After a long while, the surrounding cultivators finally dispersed.

Li Fan's divine sense, in the form of a wisp of remnant soul, reappeared in the world.

"The flames have been lit, and I probably won't need to fan them; they will burn throughout the entire Myriad Immortals Alliance." Li Fan was very pleased with his own work.

And the subsequent developments unfolded exactly as he had predicted.

Although Immortal Venerable Chilliant's act of killing Fu Yuansheng in broad daylight was rapidly spread throughout the Myriad Immortals Alliance via the Heaven-Probing Mirrors, due to the Fu family's statement that Chilliant had merely made a mistake due to his unstable realm after just breaking through, they expressed their forgiveness. Thus, the Immortal Alliance did not pursue the matter further, only imposing a symbolic penalty of contribution points.

Conversely, the Heaven-Reaching Spirit Manifestation Art, which Immortal Venerable Chilliant obtained, became widely discussed after its news spread, causing numerous families to inquire about its authenticity.

And they all expressed their willingness to pay a hefty sum to have Chilliant help them sense and locate the whereabouts of the primal essence of heaven and earth.

In a short time, Chilliant, who had just ascended to Harmonious Dao, found his status even higher than some veteran Harmonious Dao cultivators.

As for the innocent Fu Yuansheng, he was gradually forgotten as time passed.

…

In the Sacred Dynasty of Da Qi, Wang Xuanba read the article in his hand and sighed, "It's truly ironic! The guilty are not punished but rewarded."

"If this were in our Da Qi, let alone ordinary officials, even I, the Saint Emperor's direct disciple, if I committed such an offense, I would be severely punished. At the very least, I'd be imprisoned in the Nether Prison for hundreds of years. How could it be so lightly dismissed? The Myriad Immortals Alliance is truly good... ah, no, the Myriad Immortals Alliance is truly corrupt!" Ou Shangtian shook his head repeatedly.

Sun Erlang glanced at Ou Shangtian and chuckled helplessly, "Master's intention is that this matter can be used as a typical example for propaganda. As a mobilization before the battle."

"Furthermore, we can even use this opportunity to shake the foundations of the Immortal Alliance. After all, the vast majority of cultivators in the Myriad Immortals Alliance are only at the Harmonious Dao realm and below."

Ou Shangtian curled his lips, "What's the use of roping in these wastes? No matter how many come, I'll kill them all!"

Sun Erlang's expression changed: "Stop your reckless talk! 'He who gains the Dao has many helpers, he who loses the Dao has few.' The Myriad Immortals Alliance has lost the hearts of the people, and our Sacred Dynasty's conquest is in line with the will of the people."

"To have legitimacy and act righteously is the way to be invincible!"

After all, he was the senior disciple. Ou Shangtian dared not refute, only muttering in a low voice, "No matter what you say, in the end, it all comes down to strength."

After a period of banter, the fellow disciples returned to the main topic.

"Shangtian, how is the construction of your Myriad Transference Array coming along?" Sun Erlang asked.

Ou Shangtian showed a proud expression: "Brother Sun, you can rest assured when I handle things. We have already completed the positioning for all prefectures of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. As soon as Master gives the order, our Da Qi soldiers can instantly travel through the Myriad Transference Array to various designated prefectures. Then, using the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat, with the cover of the white mist barrier, we can guarantee to descend beneath the celestial cities of each prefecture stealthily!"

Wang Xuanba also added, "The several spies embedded within the Immortal Alliance have also completed their liaison. Once the time is right, the Heaven-Probing Mirrors and teleportation altars in each prefecture of the Immortal Alliance will all become defunct."

A miniature map of the Immortal Alliance's territories appeared before them.

"At that time, each prefecture will become an isolated island, preoccupied with its own survival. Their strength has already been assessed. We can defeat them one by one."

"The most critical aspect is the four central prefectures of the Immortal Alliance and the headquarters of the Myriad Immortals Alliance."

After scanning the list of major cultivators stationed in each prefecture, Sun Erlang focused his gaze on the center of the miniature map.

After pondering for a moment, Sun Erlang said, "Master subtly revealed when he summoned me before. At that time, he will use an earth-shattering method to directly seal off the four central prefectures and the Immortal Alliance headquarters. We should not have to worry about support from the Immortal Alliance headquarters; we only need to focus on quickly resolving the battles in each prefecture."

"Additionally, there are the Immortal Alliance secret realms hidden within the white mist and various prefectures. We will seal them before the war begins. Places like the Hidden Dragon Abyss, Fengwu City, Cangmang Mountain, and Chizha Immortal City, although each is not heavily garrisoned, collectively they are not to be underestimated. We must defeat them individually."

The other disciples listened solemnly to Sun Erlang's explanation of the conquest plan.

Only Ou Shangtian said with a playful smile, "I have personally experienced the formation skills of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. They are simply not worth mentioning. Master's personally created sealing formation is more than enough to trap them for half a year to a year!"

"It's just that the materials needed for setting up the formation might be a bit scarce?" Ou Shangtian suddenly frowned, asking in confusion.

Sun Erlang smiled and took out a piece of [Empty Light Mother Stone] from his embrace, placing it before them.

Ou Shangtian scanned the supplies contained within the Mother Stone and was so astonished that he stood up abruptly: "So much? Did you steal the Myriad Immortals Alliance's treasury?"

Sun Erlang chuckled, "Master gave me three such Mother Stones. Each one is packed to the brim. As far as I know, Senior Ou Daozi also has ample supplies granted by Master. So, you don't need to worry about strategic resources. Just focus on preparing the formations."

Ou Shangtian's eyes lit up upon hearing his father's name, and he repeatedly nodded.

Sun Erlang then looked at the Su Yuqing and Liu Li duo, who had remained silent.

Ever since they were sent by the Saint Emperor to guard the dark underground world, they had truly become tainted by the darkness and changed their personalities, becoming considerably more taciturn.

"Junior Sister, how is the mobilization of the small world reinforcements progressing?" Sun Erlang asked.

"It's faster than we anticipated. Don't worry, the Myriad Realms Allied Forces will definitely arrive on the battlefield on time," Su Yuqing said softly, her tone carrying a resilience that was previously absent.

While educating the Abyssal race in the dark underground world, she had vaguely sensed a possible connection between the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao and the inhabitants of that realm.

Coupled with her own fortuitous encounter in the Border Realm where she gained the favor of the Heavenly Dao, she naturally gained the trust of the small world's Heavenly Dao more easily than other cultivators.

Leveraging this advantage, under the Saint Emperor's orders, she traveled among different small worlds.

Using both gentle persuasion and coercion, she assembled a "United Myriad Realms" force with terrifying efficiency.

Although she didn't hold high expectations for the actual combat effectiveness of this allied army, its grand mobilization alone was undoubtedly effective in boosting morale.

Most importantly, it prevented them from interfering with the Sacred Dynasty and the Myriad Immortals Alliance's decisive battle.

"By the way, where did Senior Sister Lin Ling go? I haven't seen her around lately," Ou Shangtian suddenly asked curiously.

Sun Erlang replied vaguely, "She has her own assigned mission from Master, so I'm not entirely sure. However, rest assured, she will definitely not miss this grand feast."

The disciples all looked at the miniature map of the Myriad Immortals Alliance in the center again.

Their eyes were filled with impatience.

Sacred Dynasty Secret Realm, a testing ground or academy built for Yin Shangren.

Yin Shangren scratched his scalp, pushing back the true self Dao foundation that had re-emerged from the cracks in the skull.

He said with some uncertainty, "Is doing this too hasty?"

"With my Foundation Establishment method, it's considered a complete success. As for the Primordial Golden Core, I've only deduced half of it. The rest, further beyond, are all castles in the air, illusions in a mirror, beautiful at first glance but shattering at a touch, unable to withstand scrutiny!"

Saint Emperor Li Ping sat at a wooden table, occasionally flipping through illusory texts, revising them.

Around him, phenomena resembling a galaxy, born from his enlightenment, twisted and flickered in and out of existence.

Yin Shangren forced himself to shift his gaze away from the astonishing scene. After a long while, the Saint Emperor finished flipping through the entire illusory book and began revising from the first page.

He then responded, "As the saying goes, 'When the true becomes false, the false also becomes true.' As long as we make the cultivators of the world believe that this is a 'new method' that allows independent cultivation, breaking away from the lineage cultivation system…"

"Even if it's only for a few days, it's enough."

"Moreover, with the profound obscurity of the new method, completely contrary to the lineage method, how long do you think it will take Xuanhuang cultivators to verify its authenticity?"

The Saint Emperor spoke as he once again used his hand as a brush to revise the illusory book built upon the new method.

Yin Shangren did not answer, only repeating the phrase '[When the true becomes false, the false also becomes true]' in his mouth. After a long time, he suddenly realized, "That's right. Precisely because there was no new method before in the world, once we announce it, and the most easily verifiable Foundation Establishment method is genuine, they will naturally assume that all subsequent cultivation techniques are also real."

"And my repeated revisions are merely to perfect this deception," the Saint Emperor said with a self-deprecating smile.

"But what's the point? Ultimately, it cannot shake the foundation of lineage cultivation!" Yin Shangren scratched his scalp again.

"Lineage methods and new methods are incompatible. To cultivate, one must switch paths and establish a new trajectory. Perhaps one in a thousand would choose to do so, but after all, it's a matter of gaining some and losing some."

"More importantly…"

As the Saint Emperor spoke, he completed another revision of the illusory book.

He made no further changes and instead closed the illusory book.

Placing his hands on it, illusory starlight churned on the book. In less than a breath, the illusory book, which was merely a fictitious light and shadow, actually became a tangible [book] that truly existed in the world.

He handed this [new method] to Yin Shangren and said, "More importantly, if we announce the new method, and the Immortal Alliance is powerless against us…"

"The Law Transmitter will definitely rush back from the distant Star Sea."

The Saint Emperor said gravely.

"This is called 'attack what they must save'."

A glimmer flashed in Yin Shangren's eyes, and he slowly nodded.

"Do you have confidence in ascending the Law Transmitter?"

After hesitating for a moment, Yin Shangren asked.

"It's merely a gamble." The Saint Emperor paused, then said frankly.

Chapter 1287: Strange Change in the Sea of Stars Begins

"A desperate gamble..." Yin Shangren fell silent upon receiving the answer.

"There's no need to worry. I have already made my plans. Regardless of victory or defeat, the orthodox Xuanhuang lineage will be re-established. You and Xu Ke should just do what you need to do," Saint Emperor Li Ping said calmly.

"But..." Yin Shangren still hesitated.

"When the Law Transmitter reveals himself, it will be the moment the Sacred Dynasty army launches its full-scale attack on the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters. You two will sneak into the [Museum of Divine Treasures] amidst the chaos and retrieve Mister Bai's skull. At this stage, victory or defeat is a matter of grand momentum. Although you are both not weak, you cannot influence the overall situation. Moreover, the Muppet Sage is in charge of the crucial artifact [Era]. Even the most mediocre being, after countless simulations and deductions, can create miracles. Do not underestimate them!" Li Ping said with solemnity.

The Saint Emperor's words carried some weight with Yin Shangren.

He no longer argued, but instead narrowed his eyes in thought.

As he pondered, Yin Shangren's scalp began to make a rustling sound, like silkworms crawling. His scalp undulated, as if something would break through the cracks on his head at any moment.

Yin Shangren suddenly became annoyed, while Li Ping flashed to his side.

With a gentle caress of his palm, starlight permeated the area, and the anomaly gradually subsided.

"This is the 'Rebellion of True Self.' Suppressing it forcefully is not a good solution," the Saint Emperor immediately recognized the problem and suggested.

Yin Shangren's face was filled with helplessness. "Starting cultivation halfway, after all, is not the same as from the beginning. It is bound to leave all sorts of after-effects. I initially thought that as long as I consumed my original imperfect Dao foundation and cultivated anew with [Building My Dao], everything would be fine. But a while ago, I heard your sermon in the Star Sea and had a new realization. Only then did I know that my complete self was not entirely complete. With the foundation shaken, it indeed requires further adjustment."

"Don't worry, I will resolve it before the decisive battle arrives," Yin Shangren guaranteed.

"It's good that you have it under control."

The Saint Emperor's voice echoed, but his figure had already disappeared.

Yin Shangren looked around and was stunned to find that the incomplete [New Method], which had been transformed from void into reality and taken by the Saint Emperor at the long table where the Saint Emperor had sat, had reappeared.
