Knowing that the Saint Emperor had deliberately left it for him, Yin Shangren did not hesitate. He immediately picked it up and began to study it.

"Marvelous..."

Even though it was merely compiled to deceive the world, this half-volume New Method was still unfathomably mysterious in Yin Shangren's eyes, almost like a true divine technique.

Soon, he was completely engrossed.

Sacred Dynasty, Five Elements Great Cavern-world, Fire Element Cavern-world.

An endless sea of fire, roaring flames erupted like surging tidal waves, soaring straight into the sky.

The scorching flames, like wild stallions, gnawed at everything within the cavern-world.

And in the deepest part of this purgatorial scene, a golden glazed flower bloomed. No matter how the surrounding flames raged, the flower remained clear and unaffected.

Within the center of the glazed flower, an image of a world flickered faintly.

Occasionally, a wisp of golden light floated from the glazed world within the flower. Upon contact with this golden light, the surrounding flames instantly ignited and burned even more fiercely.

If viewed from high above, one could see Daoist Bai Hua, using the golden light glaze as a guide, continuously refining the fire element cavern-world.

Compared to when it was first captured, not only the fire element cavern-world, but the entire Five Elements Great Cavern-world had almost doubled in size. Daoist Bai Hua could be said to have made an invaluable contribution.

The Saint Emperor Li Ping's figure flashed beside the golden light glaze.

The raging flames immediately subsided. They didn't even dare to approach, only swaying from a distance, as if trying to please him.

"You've done well. The fire element cavern-world has been managed excellently."

"And the other cavern-worlds as well," Li Ping said indifferently.

His gaze pierced through the Heaven's Veil of the Five Elements Great Cavern-world and reached the void beyond.

The Five Elements Great Cavern-world, like a robust navigator, led the Sacred Dynasty's Great Qi through the void at high speed.

And around it, more than a hundred small worlds of various sizes were also being dragged along.

With the Sacred Dynasty's Great Qi at the core, they vaguely formed a formation, like a giant warship, awe-inspiring.

"It's just doing my part. If not for the Saint Emperor's reward of the Myriad Spirits Nectar, I wouldn't have been able to achieve this," Bai Hua bowed and said, approaching Li Ping.

Bai Hua also looked in the direction Li Ping was gazing.

After a brief silence, she couldn't help but sigh, "I can't believe that such a magnificent scene was created by me."

"Most of them are no smaller than my hometown."

"Next, I'll have to trouble you again. Send this Five Elements Great Cavern-world back to the Xuanhuang Realm." Li Ping's voice came at the opportune moment.

Bai Hua was slightly stunned.

The Saint Emperor, however, chuckled and explained, "The time for evasion is over. Now is the time for close combat. Let this be the vanguard!"

As soon as the Saint Emperor uttered these words, the surrounding flames seemed to receive encouragement and surged fiercely.

Daoist Bai Hua also noticed that within the roaring fire element cavern-world, besides the flames themselves, there was a deep shadow flowing.

It was a terrifying existence that could threaten her.

The Saint Emperor extended his palm, and the shadow flowed, quickly coming to rest in his palm, transforming into a cute little bug with a tiger-like head.

It looked chubby and harmless, but Bai Hua knew very well how terrifying this little thing was.

The fire element cavern-world they were currently in, and even the entire Five Elements Great Cavern-world, were merely avatars of this black bug.

For years, Bai Hua had been tending to the cavern-world, but more accurately, she had been raising this bug named [Dao Yi].

"With [Dao Yi]'s help, dragging the cavern-world back won't be as strenuous as when you came,"

"You only need to return the Five Elements Great Cavern-world to its rightful place. Dao Yi will handle everything else," the Saint Emperor instructed.

As Li Ping spoke, starlight emanated from his palm.

The Dao Yi bug seemed somewhat proud. Its chubby body intimately rubbed against Li Ping's palm, then greedily devoured the specks of starlight.

Its black body seemed to become more solid.

"Go."

Li Ping gently patted it. Although the Dao Yi bug was reluctant, it was very obedient. The shadow dissipated, and it returned to the surrounding cavern-world.

The surrounding flames instantly became even more vigorous.

Daoist Bai Hua could also sense that the entire cavern-world seemed to have come alive instantly. Being inside it felt like being within the belly of a behemoth.

The sense of danger that constantly arose made Bai Hua restless.

Li Ping also noticed Bai Hua's unusual behavior and took her outside the Five Elements Great Cavern-world into the void.

The Saint Emperor tapped his finger, and the Five Elements Great Cavern-world detached itself from the Sacred Dynasty's Great Qi void battleship formation.

"Don't worry. Dao Yi will only execute my orders loyally."

Since the Saint Emperor said so, Bai Hua could only nod. Suppressing the fear in her heart, she transformed into golden light and flew towards the Five Elements Great Cavern-world.

The Five Rings Cavern-world was instantly tinged with a golden edge.

Rumble!

After the initial roar, the relocation of the cavern-world became absolutely silent.

Under the concealment of the Saint Emperor's formation, even if one passed by the moving behemoth, they might not notice its movement.

Watching the Five Elements Great Cavern-world return home, Li Ping secretly pondered, "In Dao Yi's current state, it is fully capable of altering the spiritual energy of the entire Xuanhuang Realm without a sound."

"Not only targeting the Myriad Immortals Alliance, but it can also use this opportunity to stimulate the Xuanhuang Realm and further ignite its revival."

Since comprehending the Dao in the center of the Star Sea last time, the Xuanhuang Realm had briefly erupted with signs of revival. However, it was ultimately like water without a source, and after this period, the signs of revival had gradually stagnated.

The new buds on the branches of the Wutong tree were beginning to turn yellow again.

The transformed Five Elements Great Cavern-world, through the Dao Yi bug, was like a potent medicine.

Spiritual energy was an extremely crucial component of the Xuanhuang Realm. If it were eroded, it would inevitably trigger a fierce reaction from the Xuanhuang Realm's own instincts.

"Dao Yi's mission, besides creating a battle environment suitable for the Sacred Dynasty's soldiers, is most importantly to continuously transform and devour the foreign cultivation worlds that have been merged over thousands of years."

"After the great battle ends, Dao Yi will perish. The spiritual energy will return to its proper course, and Dao Yi's remains, those foreign worlds, can then nourish the Xuanhuang Realm."

"Through this bug calamity, the Xuanhuang Realm itself will become much stronger. Coupled with the [Orthodox Xuanhuang] method I previously laid down, regardless of whether I or the Law Transmitter wins, the Xuanhuang Realm will hold an absolute advantage in the future integration of various realms."

The Saint Emperor continuously deduced various scenarios of the upcoming great battle in his mind.

Gazing into the distance, he saw through layers of time and space to Daoist Bai Hua successfully dragging the bug-transformed Five Elements Great Cavern-world back to its rightful place.

Amidst the silent roar of heaven and earth, the Five Elements Great Cavern-world returned to Tianling Prefecture and began to emit pulses of abnormal spiritual energy outwards.

The spiritual energy concentration of the Xuanhuang Realm would rise slightly in a short period.

Cultivators would find it difficult to detect the abnormality of this newly generated spiritual energy. Only when [Bug Transformation] was activated would they be caught off guard and lose their "right to use" the spiritual energy of heaven and earth.

Seeing the plan proceeding smoothly, Saint Emperor Li Ping finally withdrew his gaze.

He stomped his foot and returned to the Sacred Dynasty's Great Qi.

Deep within the Saint Emperor's throne.

The core of the Heaven and Earth Myriad Spirits Grand Array.

In addition, numerous other formations like the Sentient Beings Refinement Formation were layered on top. Even the consciousness of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, which was closely connected to the Saint Emperor, would be severed here.

This ensured that all external prying eyes would be blocked.

The Saint Emperor's disciple, Lin Ling, formerly a spirit wood avatar from the Spiritual Wood Realm, had now revealed her true form.

However, what looked peculiar was that the tree was inverted, with its crown at the bottom.

Dense roots extended upwards.

The buildings of the Sacred Dynasty, such as the Heroic Spirit Seat, the Sacred Medicine Institute, the Sacred Academy, the Sacred Heart Hall, and the Sacred Supervision Court, were all connected to the roots of the inverted spiritual wood.

At the heart of the tree, all scenes that occurred within the Sacred Dynasty's Great Qi were synchronized and displayed.

After playing back a scene, it transformed into green light and was absorbed by the inverted spiritual wood.

Li Ping looked at the inverted spiritual wood before him, a rare hint of hesitation flashing in his eyes.

"To consider defeat before victory, this is truly great wisdom!" Li Ping said beside him.

It was the Daoist Yijue of the Du'er Sect, who was complaining incessantly.

He sat on the Book of Du'er, his eyes fixed on the inverted spiritual wood before him.

"Moreover, Your Majesty's plan this time is for the Xuanhuang Realm, not for yourself, so it can't be considered a blow to your morale," Daoist Yijue continued.

The Saint Emperor remained silent.

He occasionally cast hand seals, causing the roots of the inverted spiritual wood to sway.

And at the heart of the tree, the absorption of the Great Qi's light became even faster.

After a long while, the Saint Emperor stopped his movements.

He suddenly spoke, "This battle with the Myriad Immortals Alliance, your Du'er Sect need not intervene."

"Just as I said before, hide in secret and observe..."

"Whether there are other prying eyes," the Saint Emperor deliberately added.

"The battle between the Sacred Dynasty and the Immortal Alliance is a change in the Xuanhuang Realm unseen in ten thousand years. If that force secretly observing the Xuanhuang Realm is still active, it will inevitably supervise this matter and then transmit the information. I do not ask you to find the final destination of the information. Just confirm whether the event has occurred," the Saint Emperor instructed word by word.

Daoist Yijue's tightly furrowed brow finally began to slowly relax.

He clapped his hands and praised, "Your Majesty's actions are truly in line with the Great Dao of our Du'er Sect. If Your Majesty is willing, I can even abdicate the position of Sect Master of the Du'er Sect..."

Before Daoist Yijue could finish speaking, the Saint Emperor interrupted him, "Regardless of whether I or the Law Transmitter wins, you must report the result to the victor. As for after completing the mission... you are free to go."

Daoist Yijue did not show the joy of imminent freedom; instead, he looked surprised. He pointed his blurry hand at the inverted spiritual wood, "I'm not going with you?"

The Saint Emperor chuckled, "This [Outlying Wood]'s only living being is Lin Ling, the main body. I have not made any arrangements for you. Do you Du'er Sect still expect to follow?"

Daoist Yijue's face instantly crumpled, "Your Majesty, please reconsider. Can that newly born tree spirit accomplish anything alone? The Star Sea is vast; perhaps it will encounter some disaster and perish halfway." "Isn't this escape method of Your Majesty's going to be half-hearted..."

Li Ping, however, waved his hand, interrupting him.

Staring at the inverted spiritual wood, he corrected, "It is not an escape method, but information preservation."

Daoist Yijue sighed sadly, "What's the difference?"

Li Ping narrowed his eyes and remained silent.

This [Outlying Wood] not only preserved records of all events that had occurred in the Sacred Dynasty since its inception but also transferred the true spirits and memories of those who had fallen in the Heroic Spirit Seat during this period.

This was a contingency plan established by the Saint Emperor, inspired by the 'immortality of information' theory of the Taiyan Sect, for the entire Sacred Dynasty.

Or perhaps, "proof" would be a more appropriate term.

If Li Ping won, there would be no need to mention it. The Outlying Wood would not activate.

However, if Li Ping lost, then upon the destruction of the Great Qi, the Outlying Wood would carry the true spirits of the Sacred Dynasty's citizens and fly into the depths of the void.

If it were a physical entity, it would be unable to escape the Law Transmitter's interception.

But if it were merely information, the Law Transmitter might not care.

Moreover, the Du'er Sect would create some interference at that time.

This was not because the Saint Emperor was wavering about the decisive battle. After all, there were no arrangements for any living beings on the Outlying Wood.

It was because the Saint Emperor wished to leave behind a testament to the existence of his countless subjects who had followed and believed in him.

Li Ping knew that during the thousands of years of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's rule over half of the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Sacred Dynasty's Great Qi was not the first to rebel.

There had been an incident five hundred years ago where various realms united in rebellion.

But after their failure, all information about them was erased and sealed by the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

It was as if these failed rebels had never existed.

Li Ping's actions were to prevent such a thing from happening again.

"Even if we lose, our existence will not be erased!"

"If, after countless years, the Outlying Wood returns to the Xuanhuang Realm and attracts the attention of future generations, that would be even better."

Various thoughts flashed through Li Ping's mind.

A flicker of emotion surged, then was quickly suppressed.

"Law Transmitter Heavenly Venerate." Li Ping repeated the name silently in his heart.

In fact, with his current strength, he already had a thirty percent chance of not losing to the Law Transmitter, and even winning.

After all, after comprehending the Dao in the Star Sea, he had understood the current limitations of this Utmost Darkness Star Sea.

Even though the Law Transmitter had dominated the Xuanhuang Realm for nearly ten thousand years, he had definitely not broken the current limits of the Star Sea.

But what made Li Ping feel a vague sense of unease was the shadow behind the Law Transmitter.

The Heavenly Physician.

Although Li Ping knew little about this person, a vague intuition told him that this person was definitely not to be underestimated.

Being able to conspire with the Law Transmitter, his strength should not be weak either.

"I can still deal with the Law Transmitter alone, but if the Heavenly Physician is added..."

Although the situation was not optimistic, the Saint Emperor's decision to launch a general offensive in three years was not impulsive. Three years later was an extremely special time point.

The peculiarity was not within the Xuanhuang Realm, but throughout the entire Utmost Darkness Star Sea. Three years later, the Star Sea would erupt with a surge of primal force recovery.

At that time, the recuperation force from the Star Sea would engage in a large-scale conflict with the residual calamity forces scattered throughout the Star Sea.

Under the mutual collision of these two massive forces, any cultivator within the Star Sea who had not yet reached a level capable of resisting both would inevitably be affected.

This applied to cultivators who had attained Dao in the Star Sea, as well as believers of the calamity forces.

And this impact would manifest as a significant weakening of the upper limit of their strength.

Just as larger beings experienced more wind and waves in the ocean, cultivators with higher cultivation levels would be more deeply affected by the Star Sea's forces and calamity forces.

The Law Transmitter and the Heavenly Physician, two beings at the pinnacle of the Star Sea, would be forcibly suppressed for a short period.

Although the Saint Emperor's strength would also be weakened, on one hand, a large part of his combat strength came from the Sacred Dynasty's luck. As long as the Sacred Dynasty did not fall, his strength could always remain relatively stable.

On the other hand, he had a mysterious connection with the Star Sea's primal force. Protected by it, compared to other beings in the Star Sea, he would only need to face the backlash of the calamity forces.

"Through brief communication with the Star Sea's primal force, I confirmed that there were no cultivators who had contacted it before me. Although I don't know why the Law Transmitter and the others haven't discovered the Star Sea's primal force recovery over the past ten thousand years, it is undoubtedly fortunate for me."

"Not only did it significantly reduce the gap between us, but I can also borrow the power of this vast Star Sea to some extent."

"However, compared to the Xuanhuang Realm's lack of options, this Star Sea is currently undergoing vigorous rebirth, and my power is too meager. I only have one chance..."

The Saint Emperor stood before the inverted spiritual wood, deducing various possible scenarios of the decisive battle three years later.

He remained unmoved, regardless of Daoist Yijue's repeated persuasion.

"Perhaps, if I could borrow the power of the calamity forces, the chances of victory might increase."

The Saint Emperor couldn't help but think this.

And he would never have imagined that at the far end of the Star Sea, a group of beings attempting to control the Star Sea's calamity forces had also discerned the impending anomaly three years later.

Xuanxianzhou, Broken Immortal Tower.

Zhao Xian, also known as the Saint Embryo Li Fan, who was in seclusion, was urgently summoned.

At the general meeting of all core members of the Broken Immortal Tower, Ai Tianjue delivered a speech, announcing an event that might have a major impact on the Immortal Boat.

"The residual calamity forces in various parts of the Star Sea are constantly strengthening, expected to reach their peak within three years?"

"Affected by this, the True Immortal power attached to the relics on the Sea of Relics will also resonate. The normal fluctuations will greatly intensify, providing us with an excellent opportunity to search for effective World-Extinguishing Relics. This opportunity is a once-in-a-millennium chance!"

"If all goes well, we might be able to gather enough relics for the next hundred years in one go!"

Upon hearing Ai Tianjue's report, everyone became extremely excited.

Currently, due to the scarcity of World-Extinguishing Relics, the Broken Immortal Tower's research on True Immortal scripts had been progressing very slowly.

Often, several cultivators had to share the same relic. Only the true leaders and their disciples had the opportunity to have exclusive use.

Almost every cultivator in the Broken Immortal Tower was confident that their talent was no less than others. If they could each have sufficient relics to study, the research difficulty would undoubtedly be greatly reduced.

"What I'm more concerned about is why this phenomenon is occurring," came the voice of Chi Gongdao.

He was not present at the meeting, and only his voice, carried by a brush made of flesh and hair, spoke.

The flesh and hair brush constantly danced in the void, drawing and gesturing: "The Immortal Boat has always meticulously recorded the fluctuations of calamity forces. Never before has there been such an abnormal phenomenon."

"And abnormality either means opportunity, or it represents..."

"Misfortune!"

The flesh and hair brush wrote a character in the air.

A peculiar fluctuation emanated from the character, giving everyone present an involuntary feeling of bone-chilling cold, as if they were standing beside a bottomless abyss.

"Gongdao, stop fooling around," said a blue-haired elder sternly.

He gazed at the character, and it was actually absorbed into his eyes.

The speaker was Gan Jingda, the second elder of the Broken Immortal Tower and the host of this meeting.

After stopping Chi Gongdao's antics, Gan Jingda said solemnly, "However, what you said is not entirely without merit. In fact, the several of us have already analyzed it privately."

"This anomaly is different from the previous Star Power ebbing and flowing. I'm afraid its origin stems from this Star Sea itself."

Upon hearing this, the entire venue fell silent.

Everyone was contemplating the deeper meaning of this statement.

They were not foolish people, and they understood the implications of this sentence very well. Their current source of power came from the residual True Immortal power in the Star Sea.

But for the entire Star Sea, this power was an alien entity, an anomaly that needed to be purged.

From the current trend, there was no possibility of the two merging.

What would be the possible outcomes of the impending anomaly?

Would the calamity forces go out of control? For the Xuanxianzhou, which was already struggling to survive, precarious like walking on thin ice, this might not necessarily be a good thing. Even if they could utilize more True Immortal power in the future, the corresponding crises they would face would also increase synchronously.

This was the price of mortals attempting to wield True Immortal power.

And if the Star Sea gained the upper hand, the future for the Xuanxianzhou would be even more bleak.

They, the remnants of True Immortal power, would undoubtedly experience a significant decline in strength after losing their former powerful tools. Unless they were willing to change their allegiance and return to the path of enlightenment and cultivation.

But...

A subtle atmosphere circulated amongst them.

Having tasted the power of commanding True Immortal power with a simple gesture, who would be willing to painstakingly cultivate slowly?

Ai Tianjue coughed lightly, breaking the silence in the venue. "Everything is still conjecture at this point; there is no concrete evidence."

"The Xuanxianzhou has endured countless trials since ancient times. I believe we will be able to safely overcome this anomaly as well."

The cultivators responded with applause.

"However, this anomaly is of great importance. Starting today, the Immortal Boat will enter a state of emergency preparedness."

"Be prepared to enter wartime status at any time," Gan Jingda announced the purpose of the meeting.

Although no one objected, the heavy expressions on their faces were evident.

Just then, Li Fan suddenly spoke, attracting everyone's attention.

"When the anomaly occurs, will the suction from the Star Sea also be affected?"

"I heard before that beyond the Star Sea, there is a realm called Xuanhuang Realm. Compared to our Immortal Boat, that relatively intact cultivation world has far more abundant resources. It was previously considered too far and affected by the Star Sea's suction, making it not worth the trip for the Immortal Boat. But now..."

As Li Fan spoke, everyone's eyes lit up.

Gan Jingda and Ai Tianjue exchanged glances, seemingly discussing something.

Then, under the expectant gazes of the crowd, Gan Jingda said, "Regarding the feasibility of this matter, the Elder Council will conduct a thorough assessment after research."

"If it is feasible..."

"Perhaps our Immortal Boat can find a place to settle in the realm beyond the Star Sea."

Chapter 1288: Immortal Artifact Connects Two Realms

The atmosphere of the meeting reached its peak with the announcement of Gan Jingda's resolution.

A realm that was still intact and abundant in resources, something that had only existed in the fantasies of the Immortal Boat's inhabitants, now seemed within reach. How could this not stir their hearts and minds?

Before the meeting, the vast majority of cultivators on the Profound Immortal Boat had only a limited understanding of the Xuanhuang Realm, primarily gleaned from the captured flying boat that originated from it. After the meeting, they began a frantic effort to learn more about the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Profound Immortal Boat had a long history. Although it had suffered the tragedy of splitting into two, its heritage had not been severed.

Ten days after the council ended, a detailed report on the Xuanhuang Realm was compiled by the joint efforts of the Immortal Severing Tower, the Immortal Pivot Institute, the Proving Dao Academy, and the major families of the Immortal Boat.

The Immortal Severing Tower contributed the most content, derived from the confession of Lan Yu, who had been captured and attained the Harmonious Dao.

The content from the Immortal Pivot Institute and other organizations originated from records left behind during the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's several secret visits to the Xuanhuang Realm before the great calamity of the Star Sea.

At a small-scale meeting among the Profound Immortal Boat's higher-ups, this Xuanhuang report was distributed to everyone present.

Although Li Fan's status was not high enough, he was brought along as Ai Tianjue's disciple to attend.

"Currently, we cannot definitively determine the extent to which the Star Sea anomaly in three years will develop. Therefore, whether we can expedition to Xuanhuang still requires further observation. However, this does not preclude us from making preparations," said Lu Yu Zhi, a refined man and one of the six cultivators who had attained the Dao from the Immortal Severing Tower, as he summarized the findings for the attendees.

"Everyone, please look..."

"Our Profound Merchant Immortal Boat, in ancient times, had visited the Xuanhuang Realm three times. One was a formal visit, warmly received by the Xuanhuang Realm. The other two were for gathering resources, conducted secretly. At that time, the Xuanhuang Realm had two special products that were considered priceless even throughout the entire Star Sea. One was the [Fruit of the Ruomu], and the other was the [Immortal Realm Gifted Artifact]."

"This Fruit of the Ruomu contains the most primordial life essence of the Xuanhuang Realm. For cultivators who consume it, their lifespan can be greatly increased."

"As for this Immortal Realm Gifted Artifact..."

Lu Yu Zhi paused, and Li Fan could detect a slight tremor in his voice.

"The Xuanhuang Realm, according to records, was one of the few cultivation worlds that had the most frequent contact with the Immortal Realm in ancient times. Therefore, it received a considerable number of Immortal Artifacts as rewards. Some of these Immortal Artifacts, over the passage of time, gradually became unclaimed. There were specialized cultivators in the Star Sea who went to the Xuanhuang Realm to secretly gather information on these lost Immortal Artifacts, attempting to seek exorbitant profits."

"Although the success rate was extremely low, they did succeed a few times. Our Profound Immortal Boat's two secret visits back then were actually to provide support for those who succeeded."

Lu Yu Zhi's words immediately caused a stir in the audience.

Even some of the Immortal Boat's high-ranking officials had never heard of such secrets.

"Of the two Immortal Artifacts we collected from the Xuanhuang Realm, one was resold before the Star Sea calamity arrived. The other, during the incident where the Immortal Boat split, fell into the hands of the [Merchant Immortal Boat]," Lu Yu Zhi said with regret.

Everyone's breathing hitched, and expressions of intense resentment appeared on their faces.

Gan Jingda, the second elder of the Immortal Severing Tower, coughed lightly, suppressing the murmurs in the room, and gestured for Lu Yu Zhi to continue.

"Although the Immortal Artifacts that flowed out of the Xuanhuang Realm are no longer in our possession, our Immortal Boat still retains the [Fruit of the Ruomu]."

Lu Yu Zhi sought permission and the representative from the Immortal Pivot Institute from the audience cast several spells.

Under the radiant light, a crystal-clear, round fruit resembling white jade appeared before everyone's eyes.

Even under layers of restrictive seals, the cultivators present could still feel the surging vitality emanating from this Fruit of the Ruomu.

For the cultivators of the Immortal Boat, who were facing severe resource shortages, this was undoubtedly a great temptation. Even the high-ranking officials present had never enjoyed such a treasure.

Most of them stared intently at the Fruit of the Ruomu, swallowing their saliva.

Li Fan also observed it carefully.

"A familiar aura."

"It is indeed from a Ruomu, but the vibrant life force emanating from the fruit is not something that the current Ruomu can produce. It seems the injury to the Ruomu back then was truly severe."

"And..."

Li Fan's heart stirred. He noticed that faint wisps of life force seemed to be emanating from the Ruomu fruit and disappearing into the void, or rather, flowing into the void.

Lu Yu Zhi said in a deep voice, "Everyone should understand that the life force of this Fruit of the Ruomu has been dissipating for ten thousand years. Even though our Immortal Boat has used many secret techniques over the generations to greatly slow down the rate of life force dissipation, we are ultimately unable to stop this process."

Someone in the audience exclaimed, "Ten thousand years of life force dissipation, and the life force nurtured within is still so powerful. It's truly hard to imagine what the original Fruit of the Ruomu was like."

"No wonder it's called a priceless treasure throughout the entire Star Sea."

"Hmm, strange. Such a treasure, how could those old fellows from the Immortal Pivot Institute hold onto it and not devour it directly?"

Amidst the discussions, someone seized upon a key point in Lu Yu Zhi's introduction of the Fruit of the Ruomu.

"Brother Lu, do you mean that the life force dissipating from this Fruit of the Ruomu is returning to the Xuanhuang Realm?"

Everyone fell silent upon hearing this. Their gazes shifted towards the Fruit of the Ruomu, filled not only with greed and desire but also with a different kind of meaning.

Lu Yu Zhi nodded: "Precisely!"

"The Star Sea is vast and boundless. Even that Xuanhuang Lan Yu we captured could not remember the way back. But through this Fruit of the Ruomu, we can accurately pinpoint the location of the Xuanhuang Realm in the vast Star Sea!"

After a moment of silence, fierce discussions erupted again.

"Does the Xuanhuang Realm still have the Fruit of the Ruomu? If we each had one, the taste would be unimaginable..."

"No wonder those fellows from the Immortal Pivot Institute didn't devour it. Although the treasure is good, it is entangled with the origin power of another cultivation world. For other cultivators, it might be fine, but for the wielders of the Immortal Boat, they absolutely cannot. Unless they are willing to give up their position."

"Wait, can such a coincidence exist? Moreover, the way the fruit's life force drifts towards its original world seems too deliberate. Could it be that this fruit is actually a bait to lure beings from the Star Sea to hunt?"

...

While everyone debated, Lu Yu Zhi, the moderator, did not stop them.

Instead, he closed his eyes in thought.

Only when the room became quiet again did Lu Yu Zhi continue, "From the memory of the Xuanhuang Lan Yu, we have ruled out the possibility of this being a trap. Even if there was a conspiracy involving the Ruomu fruit in ancient times, it is not something we need to worry about in the current Xuanhuang Realm. Although the Xuanhuang Realm survived the great calamity of the Star Sea, it has also undergone unimaginable changes."

"The current Xuanhuang Realm is under the joint rule of the Myriad Immortals Alliance and the Five Elders Council..."

Lu Yu Zhi introduced the relevant information about the Xuanhuang Realm in detail to everyone.

"This is not right. Why is this Xuanhuang Realm much larger than recorded in our Profound Immortal Boat's archives?"

"Preliminary judgment suggests that it should be the combined efforts of the Star Sea survivors to resist the suction of the Immortal Ruins. The so-called Xuanhuang Realm is more accurately called [Land of Survival for All Realms]."

"Then, there must be hidden experts in the Xuanhuang Realm. It is definitely not just the publicly known Law Transmitter and the five Longevity Heavenly Venerates."

"Defying the principles of heaven and earth to attain Longevity... It is indeed interesting. Being bound to the world can indeed grant longevity unattainable by ordinary cultivators. Even their strength can increase in tandem with the world's prosperity. It's a pity that once they are outside the world, their strength is greatly weakened. And when the world is destroyed, they can only perish together."

Everyone seriously examined the information about the Xuanhuang Realm.

"Everyone, do not forget that the Xuanhuang Realm contains numerous Immortal Realm Gifted Artifacts. This Heaven's Profound Mirror of the Myriad Immortals Alliance is clearly one of them. Are there other Immortal Artifacts in the Myriad Immortals Alliance? If we were to launch an expedition, we must consider this factor. Believe everyone understands how powerful True Immortals are. Can we truly win so easily?"

"In my opinion, there's no need for fighting and killing. According to Lan Yu's memory, the resources of the Xuanhuang Realm are still quite abundant. Our Immortal Boat is, at most, equivalent to less than half a state of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. We could adopt a trading approach to obtain what we need."

"Indeed, even if we cannot conquer the Xuanhuang Realm, exploring the so-called Immortal Ruins would be greatly beneficial. Such surging True Immortal power... perhaps there are complete [True Immortal Scripts] inside!"

"Alas, I still advise everyone to be more cautious. While we covet the various resources of the Xuanhuang Realm, the Xuanhuang Realm also desperately wants to break free from the constraints of the Immortal Ruins. To us, the Profound Immortal Boat, aren't they also a piece of fat meat?"

...

Whether to embark on an expedition to Xuanhuang or not was definitely a matter that could completely change the fate of the Immortal Boat. It was difficult to make a decision in a short period. And due to historical reasons, no one present proposed sending a part of their forces to test the waters.

No matter what, the Profound Immortal Boat had to advance and retreat together. It could no longer afford a second split.

The council decided to reconvene in thirty days to make a final decision.

After everyone dispersed, only nine cultivators remained.

Four from the Immortal Severing Tower, three from the Immortal Pivot Institute, one from the Proving Dao Academy, and one from the Immortal Boat's Star Forging Workshop.

Li Fan, as a direct disciple, was not qualified to be among them and waited outside.

Gan Jingda lightly gestured with his finger, and a picture immediately appeared before everyone. A beam of sword light sliced through the sky.

Sixteen characters, shining brightly on the heavenly screen.

Beyond the Star Sea, beneath the high wall, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat drifted through tribulations.

Gan Jingda spoke slowly, "What do you all think?"

"This communication method... [Boundless]?" Nangong Lie from the Proving Dao Academy looked solemn.

"Did the Immortal Boat have a traitor?"

"Not necessarily, it could also be those who defected back then. Trying to provoke trouble? And then reap the benefits?"

"No matter what, in the face of absolute strength, any conspiracy and tricks are all in vain. The only thing to consider is whether it is worth it or not."

...

Several people discussed the future of the Profound Immortal Boat, each offering their own opinions.

Meanwhile, outside the council space, Li Fan did not leave early, waiting for his master.

He looked down at the buildings scattered throughout the Immortal Boat's divine tree, his thoughts focused on the Fruit of the Ruomu that had appeared in the council.

"The life force of the Fruit of the Ruomu does indeed dissipate and drift towards the Xuanhuang Realm. But it's not through ordinary means; it involves the very fabric of the Star Sea."

"It is impossible to pinpoint the location of the Xuanhuang Realm through its life force alone."

"They are lying. They must be using another method."

Li Fan's mind raced through several possibilities, but he lacked the access to the true core of the Immortal Boat's highest levels to pinpoint the correct answer.

Just as he was pondering, a transmission interrupted his thoughts.

"Brother Zhao, hurry over!"

It was a message from Wang Hai, his fellow disciple under Ai Tianjue.

Under normal circumstances, Wang Hai would rarely seek out Li Fan proactively. This urgent message indicated a matter of great importance.

Li Fan no longer waited for Ai Tianjue and directly returned to Wang Hai's residence.

"Brother Zhao, take a look at this."

"This report from the Immortal Boat actually contains such a major flaw."

Wang Hai had not attended this meeting, but he had already obtained the Xuanhuang report compiled by several factions of the Immortal Boat.

Li Fan narrowed his eyes and looked. Wang Hai held a jade slip emitting an ancient aura.

And the content recorded in the jade slip surprised Li Fan immensely.

"...Thus, the Profound Immortal Boat has reached a critical juncture in its survival. To solve the problem of survival for the cultivators of the Immortal Boat at that time, the only remaining Immortal Artifact on the Immortal Boat was finally used."

"[Seed of Life Creation]."

"As a seemingly unremarkable black seed was planted, a divine tree took root and sprouted on the shattered body of the Immortal Boat."

"It was precisely with the reinforcement of the divine tree that the fractured Immortal Boat was gradually stabilized."

"As the saying goes, everything is destined. Who would have thought that this immortal artifact from the Xuanhuang Realm, which was once deemed worthless, would ultimately become the lifeline of the Immortal Boat..."

Li Fan looked at the content of the jade slip, which was a record of the Immortal Boat's history after its split and his personal reflections.

"Where did this come from?" Li Fan was slightly stunned.

"Where did it come from? Of course, it's from my family's inheritance?" Wang Hai looked somewhat perplexed and answered righteously.

"As a child, I read all the collected jade slips in my family. Therefore, I have an impression of this section. The Immortal Boat's divine tree originated from the Xuanhuang Realm. This report states that the Immortal Boat has no Immortal Artifacts remaining..."

Seeing Li Fan's somewhat strange expression, Wang Hai quickly explained: "I know there must be something fishy going on, so I haven't publicized it yet. That's why I asked you here."

"I just wanted to test if pointing out this error would count towards the [Error Correction] merit. If not, then I take back what I said."

The so-called [Error Correction] merit was one of the most significant merits that cultivators of the Profound Immortal Boat could accumulate. During their cultivation and study, if they discovered and pointed out errors in the inherited texts of the Immortal Boat, or proposed opinions for improvement, they would receive extremely generous rewards.

Over countless years, the Immortal Boat had not stagnated but had survived in the Star Sea through the wisdom of successive generations of cultivators.

Li Fan returned the jade slip and replied directly: "In my opinion, this is not an error, but rather the Immortal Boat deliberately concealing the connection between the Immortal Boat's divine tree and the Xuanhuang Realm."

"Why? There's no need for that..." Wang Hai was astonished.

Li Fan then showed him the sixteen characters from Lan Yu's memory.

"Ah, I remember now."

"The reason why the Myriad Immortals Alliance dispatched a flying boat to the other side of the Star Sea was..." Wang Hai said thoughtfully.

Li Fan then whispered: "This is the [Boundless] communication method, a secret technique of the Immortal Boat."

Wang Hai was shocked and was about to say something more, but Li Fan stopped him.

"The Immortal Boat's divine tree came from Xuanhuang, and Xuanhuang cultivators might still retain the method to control it. Is it possible that the divine tree saved the Immortal Boat, but we are going to conquer the cultivation world that sent us the divine tree? Is this not ungrateful?"

"If the truth were revealed, it would inevitably cause many considerations among the upper echelons of the Immortal Boat. It would be more appropriate to conceal this matter, as many years have passed and few people are aware of the events of that year." Li Fan explained.

"Moreover, there might be spies from the Xuanhuang Realm within the Immortal Boat. If this secret were known to them, it would be extremely disadvantageous to our Immortal Boat." Wang Hai also recovered his senses and transmitted his voice.

Li Fan nodded in agreement.

"Alas, it's a pity. I thought I had finally found another error," Wang Hai said somewhat dejectedly.

"You don't need to worry. The Star Sea anomaly is about to occur. As the residual True Immortal power in the Star Sea slowly becomes active, comprehending True Immortal scripts will become easier for us." Li Fan comforted him, his expression inscrutable.

Chapter 1289: Grand Wish Ascension Method

"But..." A hint of unwillingness flashed in Sun Tianci's eyes. "Isn't this harming others and benefiting oneself? I can achieve the same results by slowly cultivating, right?"

Li Fan did not ridicule Sun Tianci's pedantry but slowly explained, "The Dao of Heaven diminishes the excess and replenishes the insufficient. The cultivation method I am imparting to you is in harmony with the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao. Otherwise, how could there be such divine efficacy?"

"Cultivators sacrifice the essence of heaven and earth to achieve Dao Integration. They are truly thieves of Heaven. Returning the treasure to its owner, is it good or evil?"

"If you look at it from the perspective of a cultivator, your actions are undoubtedly unforgivable and utterly evil; but if you look at it from the perspective of the Xuanhuang realm, you are an undeniable contributor to the world..."

Every word was spoken with a deliberate cadence, as if implying some profound truth of heaven and earth.

Listening to Li Fan's words, the hesitation in Sun Tianci's eyes gradually turned to firmness.

The content Li Fan had shown his avatar, Wu Ninglu, naturally contained truth mixed with falsehood.

Although Sun Tianci's talent was outstanding, without guidance from a renowned master, how could he so easily convert the cultivation of other Dao Integration cultivators?

"Born with Dao Integration, one is already superior to the vast majority of worldly cultivators. Furthermore, with my assistance..."

Li Fan stared at Sun Tianci, observing the faint, hidden aura condensing around him, and thought to himself, "Soon. Once his strength grows further and his connection with the Xuanhuang Realm deepens, I can let him venture to the Fallen Immortal Realm."

Li Fan painstakingly nurtured Sun Tianci, not only because he viewed him as a chess piece to adjust the balance between the Myriad Immortals Alliance and the Sacred Dynasty in the future, but more importantly, to have him inherit the position of [Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate].

When creating the Sacred Emperor's avatar, Li Fan had severed all memories related to the Fallen Immortal Realm and the trials for the Xuanhuang Heavenly Venerate.

Therefore, the Sacred Emperor had never had any intention of going to the Fallen Immortal Realm.

He had earned the Xuanhuang Realm's recognition entirely through his own practical actions that benefited the Xuanhuang Realm.

However, the position of [Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate], besides requiring the Xuanhuang's acknowledgment, more crucially involved a succession ceremony.

This was a control mechanism implicitly passed down from the time Xuanhuang was first created, independent of the will of the Xuanhuang Realm's Heavenly Dao.

Even though the inheritance had been severed for now, it remained deeply hidden in the depths of the Fallen Immortal Realm.

Becoming the true Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate not only allowed one to mobilize the power of the Xuanhuang Realm to the greatest extent but also held the possibility of inheriting the memories and legacies of past Great Heavenly Venerates.

The so-called "casting a stone to ask for directions."

Li Fan was not interested in becoming the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate, but he was very keen on the secrets of the Xuanhuang Realm and potential surviving Immortal Artifacts.

In his sea of consciousness, the final trial scene he experienced in the Fallen Immortal Realm reappeared.

"Detonating nine Immortal Artifacts, and extracting the colossal immortal spiritual power. World-ending power, enough to cross the high walls."

"Four Immortal Artifacts, including the [Great Sun Golden Bell], still remain. These are indeed [Immortal Artifacts] passed down from ancient times."

Having glimpsed three parts of the [Primordial Profound Spirit Grand Formation] and successfully recreating some of its power, Li Fan was acutely aware of just how formidable the power of a True Immortal was. If Immortal Formations were so powerful, Immortal Artifacts were no less.

These were ultimate trump cards capable of completely turning the tide of battle, even capital for him to explore beyond the High Walls in the future.

"Mr. Bai might have been concerned about the safety of the Xuanhuang Realm and refrained from using the power of these Immortal Artifacts to confront the Dharma Transmitter. But I do not mind..."

"Of course, the prerequisite is to gain the recognition of the Immortal Artifacts."

"The Immortal Artifacts left behind by the Great Heavenly Venerate should have some restrictions."

...

Various thoughts flashed through Li Fan's mind. He looked again at Sun Tianci, who was engrossed in enlightenment from Li Fan's teachings, "There are less than three years left, which should be enough."

Sun Tianci's cultivation did not last long before it was interrupted by an unforeseen incident.

One day, a Sun family servant rushed in with a report.

"The entrance to the Sun family has been blocked? And they're specifically challenging me?"

Startled awake, Sun Tianci's expression was somewhat dazed.

The Sun family servant replied with a crestfallen face: "Yes, young master. Those who tried to force their way out were all beaten up and thrown back. It's been happening for more than ten days. The family head is busy with urgent matters and cannot come. We had no choice but to disturb your cultivation."

Seeing the servant's terrified expression, Sun Tianci couldn't help but comfort him, "It's alright, bring me to see them."

For Sun Tianci, enlightenment and cultivation were as simple as eating and drinking. Being interrupted occasionally was acceptable, and he could resume it later. He naturally had no reason to be angry.

Arriving outside the Sun family's cave dwelling, Sun Tianci saw the person blocking the entrance.

It was a child of a similar age to himself, around five or six years old.

He wore purple clothes and had pure eyes... or perhaps, a somewhat simple-minded expression.

"You... let's fight." The child pointed at Sun Tianci and said concisely.

Sun Tianci immediately shook his head: "No."

The child's eyes narrowed instantly upon hearing his request rejected.

Sun Tianci kindly reminded him: "You are only at the Nascent Soul stage, you will never be my opponent. I will not bully the small ones."

He spoke with genuine sincerity, and the killing intent emanating from the child in front of him gradually dissipated.

Sun Tianci's ears, however, were filled with whispers from his family members: "Tianci, don't be careless. We've investigated. This little fellow is not simple. He's obsessed with martial arts and possesses terrifying strength. Although he's only at the Nascent Soul stage, he can defeat God Transformation cultivators with just his actions..."

"Yes, this person's origin is mysterious, and the Myriad Immortals Alliance seems to be ignoring him. People call him the [Martial Fanatic Child]."

Sun Tianci nodded to his family, indicating he understood.

At the same time, he looked at the Martial Fanatic Child and said seriously, "A Nascent Soul cultivator can defeat God Transformation, but the difference between God Transformation and Dao Integration is like a chasm. You have no chance of winning."

"I'm afraid I'll be too heavy-handed and hurt you."

The Martial Fanatic Child shook his head, disagreeing with Sun Tianci's assessment: "Victory in battle has nothing to do with cultivation realm."

"Fight!"

"I'm not afraid of death!"

Sun Tianci looked at the burning fighting spirit in the child's eyes and felt a sense of helplessness.

He knew that this battle was unavoidable, so he could only lead him to the Sun family's training ground.

Although the Sun family was a newly established aristocratic family, and their cave dwelling appeared ordinary on the outside, it truly possessed hidden wonders within. The various functional buildings of the cave dwelling were built no less impressively than those of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's ancient aristocratic families.

Take this training ground for example; it was built upon the corpse of an ancient fallen long-life cultivator, painstakingly collected. It could easily withstand the attacks of Dao Integration cultivators.

Inside the training ground, Sun Tianci and the Martial Fanatic Child, two children, stood facing each other, their expressions solemn.

The onlookers were all incredibly tense.

Sun Tianci was currently the most precious existence in the Sun family. Although he had a crushing advantage in cultivation, if he were to sustain even the slightest injury, all the Sun family members present who failed to intervene would face severe punishment.

"Please!"

The Martial Fanatic Child let out a low shout. The next moment, a silver spear cut through the air and stopped precisely at Sun Tianci's forehead.

"So fast!" Sun Tianci was somewhat surprised, but that was all.

The attack of a Nascent Soul cultivator couldn't even shake his defenses.

The spear dissolved like ice in water, vanishing on its own.

"Hmm?" However, after neutralizing the opponent's offensive, Sun Tianci felt a surge of astonishment.

While he was momentarily stunned, the space before him rippled like water. Then, the silver spear leaped out like a flying fish from the sea and reappeared, thrusting directly at Sun Tianci's body.

"Martial!" The Martial Fanatic Child simultaneously let out a powerful roar.

Silver light flowed all over the spear. In an instant, it split into seventeen other weapons, surrounding Sun Tianci in the center.

Sabers, spears, swords, halberds, axes, battle-axes, hooks, forks...

It was as if eighteen different cultivators were wielding them, simultaneously executing different moves.

They all slashed out in unison.

Boom!

Sun Tianci's body was completely engulfed by the violent silver explosion.

"Young master!"

"Tianci!"

The Sun family members present cried out in alarm.

If the training ground hadn't been sealed, they would have rushed in to rescue him.

"No need to panic, this level of power won't harm Tianci," Sun Luoyuan's voice rang out. The crowd immediately relaxed.

Having heard that the Sun family's prodigy was sparring, Sun Luoyuan, who had arrived late, observed the battle in the training ground.

The Martial Fanatic Child also understood that his attack would not be effective in a single blow.

The moment the silver light engulfed Sun Tianci, he had already darted forward, launching relentless attacks.

There were weapons wielded by martial artists to injure people, magical treasures used by cultivators to manifest their forms, surprise hand-to-hand combat, and even the power of heavenly phenomena representing Dao Integration cultivators...

The training ground rumbled continuously, shaking incessantly. It appeared precariously close to shattering, its defenses seemingly capable of breaking at any moment.

Sun Luoyuan's expression was grave as he cast a spell to reinforce it.

Sun Tianci, hailed as the greatest genius of the Myriad Immortals Alliance in a century, could only parry defensively, appearing quite battered.

In fact, everyone present could not comprehend Sun Tianci's shock at that moment.

Because he discovered that the profound technique bestowed by his master, which could dissolve an opponent's attack and return it to heaven and earth, had actually lost its effect when facing the Martial Fanatic Child!

"How can this be? Could it be that his cultivation realm is too low? The technique for dealing with Dao Integration cultivators is actually ineffective against him?"

Ever since birth, he had been cultivating. Although he had experienced numerous battles in his master's illusions and against Dao Integration cultivators of the Immortal Alliance, this was the first time his trump card had completely failed.

The young Sun Tianci couldn't help but feel a hint of panic.

But he was extraordinary after all.

Moreover, although the Martial Fanatic Child's attacks were fierce, he was still two major realms behind Sun Tianci.

While enduring the barrage of blows, Sun Tianci gradually adapted to the opponent's attacks and began to discern some clues.

"That's not right! It's not that the technique has failed! Just like the Dao Integration cultivators before, the Martial Fanatic Child's moves, after being executed and neutralized by me, still cause his aura to decline for a short period. But..."

"The strength he loses is quickly replenished from heaven and earth?!"

Understanding this, Sun Tianci's shock deepened.

One must know that his technique wasn't simply about consuming spiritual energy. It was about stripping away the cultivator's origin and Dao foundation, then scattering them back to the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao.

On the contrary, the Martial Fanatic Child's performance at this moment was equivalent to him continuously absorbing the origin power of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao while fighting him.

"How is this possible?"

"Completely defying the new method created by the Heavenly Venerate?!"

No wonder Sun Tianci was so shocked. The Martial Fanatic Child's actions were akin to him constantly devouring the Xuanhuang's innate essence, the origin of its birth, and the very spirit of heaven and earth...

Yet, the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao seemed to show no malice or retaliation whatsoever!

This was something Sun Tianci's understanding deemed impossible.

Having discerned the secret, Sun Tianci, momentarily lost in thought, was seized by the Martial Fanatic Child, whose technique pierced through his defenses and directly struck him.

Spitting out a mouthful of blood, Sun Tianci's eyes turned serious.

White light, like flowing silk, appeared on his body, instantly repelling the Martial Fanatic Child's technique.

It was Sun Tianci's Heavenly Dao's essence, Bai Chou.

However, Bai Chou at this moment, after being trained by Li Fan and cultivated by Sun Tianci for several years, was qualitatively different from when it was first born.

"To actually force me to this extent..."

"Master said it well, there are countless geniuses in the world, and I am nothing special."

With white light swirling around him, Sun Tianci resolved the Martial Fanatic Child's attacks one by one.

"Regardless of the reason, strike based on the method!"

Sun Tianci's mind flashed with his master's teachings.

"If I can't figure out why this Martial Fanatic Child can continuously absorb the Xuanhuang's origin, then I won't bother!"

"Strike at the root, directly sever his connection with the Xuanhuang Realm!"

A bright light flashed in Sun Tianci's eyes.

The illusory white silk swirled like a tornado, rapidly spinning and enveloping Sun Tianci's body.

Within the vortex of white light, he floated into the air.

He pointed one finger at the sky and the other at the Martial Fanatic Child.

He softly uttered a command.

The Martial Fanatic Child's originally fluid attacks were forced to pause slightly.

Then, he completely stopped his offensive, looking at Sun Tianci in the air with surprise.

Two fingers, like a pair of scissors.

Temporarily severed his connection with heaven and earth.

An unprecedented sense of weakness surged into his heart.

And in Sun Tianci's eyes, the Martial Fanatic Child's figure seemed to blur the moment his connection was severed!

"This is..."

"Heavenly Dao's essence, born as a human?"

A faint realization flashed in Sun Tianci's mind.

His fingers did not stop moving.

He was using his method of communicating with the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao to completely occupy the Heavenly Dao's perception of this space.

Temporarily excluding the Martial Fanatic Child.

This was destined to be unsustainable.

"Suppress!" Sun Tianci, suspended high in the sky, pressed down his finger pointing at the Martial Fanatic Child.

Infinite white silk light, like gushing rivers, converged within it.

A colossal index finger phantom formed into a tangible entity, like a sky-piercing mountain, pressing down from above.

The space around the Martial Fanatic Child was sealed by this immense power, rendering him unable to move.

As the suppressing finger descended, intense roars accompanied the whistling sound of space being crushed into cracks, echoing throughout the entire training ground.

Sun Tianci's expression was neither joyful nor sorrowful.

However, the Martial Fanatic Child beneath the suppressing finger, also maintained a look of contemplation.

His eyes showed no fear, but rather a thoughtful expression.

Just as the suppressing finger was about to crush him, he surprisingly imitated Sun Tianci's action and pointed a finger upward toward the sky.

The purple garment on his body transformed into vast purple energy, surging into it.

Compared to the suppressing finger displayed by Sun Tianci, the momentum was much smaller, yet it seemed more condensed and sacred.

The Martial Fanatic Child's face held expressions of enlightenment akin to joy and the solemnity of executing a profound technique.

One purple, one white; one rising from the earth, one descending from the sky.

They collided violently near the ground.

Boom!

Blinding light instantly engulfed everything.

"Not good!" Sun Luoyuan's expression changed drastically. With a decisive wave of his sleeve, he enveloped the Sun family members who were watching and teleported away.

At the same time, he did not forget to activate the protective formations around the training ground.

Sun Luoyuan's choice proved to be wise. The impact of the collision of the suppressing fingers engulfed the entire training ground.

And then continued to spread outwards.

The Sun family's meticulously arranged protective formations were like paper in the face of this terrifying power, shattering one after another.

The immense force swept through, eventually engulfing half of the Sun family's cave dwelling.

The two Dao Integration cultivators of the Sun family simultaneously cast spells, finally halting the aftermath.

Looking at the devastated Sun family cave dwelling, Sun Luoyuan's facial muscles twitched.

Fortunately, Sun Tianci's powerful aura reassured him.

After the chaos subsided, he arrived at the location of the former training ground, which was now a mere expanse of void.

He saw that the Martial Fanatic Child had already disappeared.

Sun Tianci, the Sun family's prodigy, stood motionless, as if meditating and comprehending something.

Strictly ordering everyone not to disturb him, Sun Luoyuan personally guarded him.

Looking at the ruins surrounding him, Sun Luoyuan suddenly felt a sense of powerlessness.

"Both of us are in the Dao Integration realm, yet the difference in power is so vast."

"Even more terrifying is that Tianci is only five years old. In the future..."

A word that he had never considered before suddenly appeared in Sun Luoyuan's mind.

"Xuanhuang Realm, it's been how many years since a Longevity Heavenly Venerate has appeared?"

"Given Tianci's talent, it's not impossible, not impossible at all!"

"Especially with the great changes that are about to occur. With the convergence of winds and clouds, a chaotic world produces sages..."

Sun Luoyuan, a cultivator who had been in the Dao Integration realm for over five hundred years, found his hands trembling uncontrollably.

He could only close his eyes tightly, fearing that his thoughts would be perceived by others.

Meanwhile, within Sun Tianci's consciousness, the child cultivator was engulfed in self-reproach.

"I didn't intend to kill him."

"But the spell was cast, and he also counterattacked with the 'Suppress' technique..."

"I really couldn't control myself."

Sun Tianci was extremely frustrated.

But Li Fan's cold reprimand interrupted him: "Fool! How could an existence like that be easily killed by you?"

"Don't worry. Even if your entire Sun family is wiped out, he won't disappear."

Ignoring his master's harsh words, Sun Tianci, upon hearing that the Martial Fanatic Child had not perished, emerged from his remorse with some relief.

"Master, who exactly is that Martial Fanatic Child?"

"Is he a Heavenly Dao Essence born into human form?" Sun Tianci couldn't help but ask curiously.

Li Fan let out a light snort: "You do have some insight."

Li Fan actually had more to say.

"Zhang Qianmo's reincarnation method indeed has some merit."

"The body created by destroying demonic beings and merging it with the basic laws of Xuanhuang."

"And this body of the Martial Fanatic Child..."

In Li Fan's previous reincarnations, although he had encountered the Martial Fanatic Child, he lacked the vision to comprehend the profound mysteries behind him.

However, with the significant gains from this life, his connection with the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao becoming increasingly intimate, and even undergoing multiple rounds of enlightenment in the Star Sea, he now possessed the ability to discern the true nature of Zhang Qianmo's reincarnation body.

"Zhang Qianmo made three great vows. First, to exterminate all demons in the world; second, to replace the Ten Great Immortal Sects; and third, to collect all cultivation techniques and share them with all cultivators in the world."

"To exterminate demons completely can be called [Annihilation]."

"In the world of cultivation, the strong are respected. Replacing the Ten Great Immortal Sects can be called [Martial]."

"To share cultivation techniques so that all people in the world can cultivate, can be called [Literary]."

"Ancient sages achieved enlightenment and transformed the world, ascending to the heavens in broad daylight, benefiting future generations. This is an ancient, supreme method capable of achieving True Immortalhood..."

A sharp glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

"Even if the hope of completing each vow is extremely slim, the reincarnated body can, like my simulations, infinitely amplify the probability of success."

"If the immortal path still existed, Zhang Qianmo might truly have achieved True Immortalhood through this method."

"It's a pity..."

Li Fan shook his head slightly: "Time flows, the immortal path is severed, and the world faces imminent destruction. This method..."

"It's not the fault of the method, but the change in the Great Dao!"

"The techniques that could achieve True Immortalhood in the past can now at most only allow one to prance around in a single realm." Li Fan seemed to have a sudden realization.

"But compared to the cultivators who have long since turned to dust in the same era, Zhang Qianmo's method is still far superior. Even if, in the future, the Xuanhuang Realm can survive and the immortal path is reopened..."

"Zhang Qianmo might indeed have a chance to ascend to the True Immortal realm."

Li Fan couldn't help but fantasize about the future: "The process might be a bit long, but if one can achieve True Immortalhood, it will all be worth it."

After pondering for a moment, Li Fan's thoughts returned to the present: "The Xuanhuang Realm has become the last sanctuary in the entire Star Sea. Zhang Qianmo's method of 'Great Vow to Ascend' can only achieve its second step; it's already quite difficult. If it weren't for Emperor Yi actively leading the other leaders away, he would have spent thousands of years on this step."

"And now, this second step..."

Li Fan watched the battle between Zhang Qianmo's reincarnated body and Sun Tianci from beginning to end.

He naturally saw the scene where the Martial Fanatic Child was born as if he were the essence of heaven and earth.

"This method of 'Great Vow to Ascend' truly relies on the feedback power from the world's sublimation..."

"By lodging oneself within the world, it is the complete opposite of the Heavenly Venerate's new method."

"It can also be seen as a parasitic method. The new method only knows how to devour and plunder, while this 'Great Vow to Ascend' method benefits the world."

"No wonder the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao is willing to support him unconditionally. After all, in this world, who else is willing to stand on the side of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao? There are simply too few."

"The method is indeed marvelous, but without the prospect of ascension, it is ultimately not worth mentioning."

"At the very least, it's far inferior to directly achieving [Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate]."

...

As Li Fan's thoughts churned, Sun Tianci, who had been relieved to learn that the Martial Fanatic Child had not died, began to sort out the gains from this battle.

This was the first time he had encountered an opponent of similar age and fought on equal footing. He couldn't help but feel a surge of excitement.

"I didn't expect Master's 'Suppress' technique to be so powerful."

"I've only grasped less than a third of it. If I were to fully unleash it..."

Sun Tianci traced shapes in the void, immersed in the profound and unfathomable rune patterns.

This 'Suppress' technique was, naturally, not a true [True Immortal Script].

It was merely a remnant character that Li Fan had comprehended himself through his research on the Profound Immortal Boat.

However, even this imperfect existence was still unimaginably terrifying for cultivators.

As the saying goes, "Using stones from other mountains to attack jade." Li Fan had taught Sun Tianci the partially comprehended [Suppress Character Technique] precisely to see what this Xuanhuang prodigy could comprehend from it.

He could then use it as a reference.

...

Although Sun Luoyuan had ordered that the details of the battle between the Martial Fanatic Child and Sun Tianci be kept confidential, the devastated state of the Sun family cave dwelling after the battle could not be hidden from the world.

As a result, the reputation of the Sun family's prodigy grew even more prominent.

Even some battle-thirsty Dao Integration cultivators began to proactively seek him out for sparring matches.

Sun Tianci, however, welcomed them all, accepting every challenge.

Through continuous battles, his combat ability rapidly improved.

And after cumulatively transferring a portion of the Heavenly Dao essence from thirty Dao Integration cultivators back to the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, the accumulated power surpassed that of a complete Dao Integration cultivator.

Quantity finally led to a qualitative change.

One day, Sun Tianci stood stunned, gazing up at the sky.

Tears even welled up in his eyes.

"Xuanhuang..."

He murmured softly, his expression filled with grief.

A gust of wind seemed to sweep across his body, swirling incessantly.

A familiar aura descended upon Sun Tianci's body, unheard and unseen.

"Finally met the conditions?"

"With the Sacred Emperor as a supporter, the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao's requirements have become much higher."

"Compared to the past, when simply slaughtering a few new method cultivators could achieve similar results."

Li Fan mused inwardly while observing from the side.

"However, it is not yet time for him to undergo the trial of the Great Heavenly Venerate."

Li Fan keenly sensed that the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao's attention towards Sun Tianci was different from that towards the Sacred Emperor.

Perhaps because Li Fan was hidden within Sun Tianci's sea of consciousness, the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, while showing affection, also exhibited a degree of vigilance and suspicion.

This emotion was minuscule, and Sun Tianci himself did not notice it, remaining immersed in the supreme joy of connecting with the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao.

Only Li Fan, who had personally experienced the Heavenly Dao's true closeness through the Sacred Emperor's body, could perceive this difference.

"I still need to do more..."

"Thinking carefully, perhaps only that matter would be the most efficient."

Li Fan did not feel annoyed by the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao's reaction, but instead began to ponder countermeasures.

"To take, one must first give."

"Let me let you taste some sweetness first."

Li Fan coldly snorted inwardly, waiting for Sun Tianci to awaken from his enlightenment.

Ultimately, three days later, Sun Tianci reported his triumphant news to Li Fan.

But Li Fan's words left him somewhat astonished: "Master, aren't we going to spar with other Dao Integration cultivators anymore?"

"I feel it's very effective."

"Too slow! Too slow! Master, I could be scattered into ashes at any moment, I can't wait that long."

Li Fan snorted coldly and directly infused the information into Sun Tianci's mind.

"This..."

Sun Tianci's eyes widened: "Master, this is a major crime in the Myriad Immortals Alliance!"

"I myself would be fine, but if it implicates the family..."

After understanding his master's plan, Sun Tianci couldn't help but hesitate.

Because his master wanted him to go to the Myriad Immortals Alliance's [Eternal Immortal Wall] and release the power originally belonging to the Xuanhuang Realm from the cultivators imprisoned there for eternity.

Chapter 1290: The Holy Emperor Suddenly Realizes

“Master, does the Myriad Immortals Alliance really possess the [Eternal Immortal Wall]? It sounds too outrageous.” After a long while, Sun Tianci still found it hard to believe.

“The Myriad Immortals Alliance’s atrocities are far more than just that.” Li Fan sneered.

Li Fan’s initial knowledge of the Eternal Immortal Wall came from the 114th life, Xuan Tian Lock Spirit, and the Xuan net enveloping Xuanhuang.

He had initially thought it was a product unique to the Immortal Alliance of that era.

But later, in the 119th life, he impersonated Sun Xingwang, the Dharma King of the Xuan Heaven Sect, and using the Three Calamities and Hundred Tribulations Divine Bright Method, he refined countless imprints of demonic gods within the bodies of tens of thousands of cultivators. The method the Myriad Immortals Alliance ultimately used to deal with these cultivators was similar to the [Eternal Immortal Wall]. From the information revealed by Mo Ru Bin after he possessed the Law Transmitter, the Myriad Immortals Alliance did indeed secretly seal away many cultivators to maintain the stability of the Xuanhuang Realm.

And it was not located in just one place.

Transmitting a blurry image to Sun Tianci, the young prodigy of the Sun family was instantly shocked by the brutal scene.

“Master, what should we do?”

Not long after, he woke up from his shock, his tone firm as he asked.

“Your [Profound Nether Art] is still too slow. Even if we successfully infiltrate the Immortal Wall, we won’t have much time to act.”

“Get faster first!”

The Profound Nether Art, naturally, was the wondrous method secretly passed down by Li Fan, which dissolved a cultivator’s cultivation and returned it to the Xuanhuang Heaven and Earth.

As Li Fan’s clone flew out of Sun Tianci’s sea of consciousness and manifested a phantom form.

Li Fan’s clone looked up at the sky and slowly whispered, “To corrupt the Heaven and Earth Essence…”

As he softly chanted, a scene that made Sun Tianci’s scalp tingle occurred.

An invisible vortex instantly appeared above Li Fan’s head.

A familiar aura, that of the Heaven and Earth Essence, seemed to be brewing within the vortex.

Looking at the blurry humanoid figure gradually emerging from it, Sun Tianci became even more certain of his guess.

“Summoning the Heaven and Earth Essence with a single word? Master’s true identity is…”

Just as Sun Tianci was somewhat stunned by the scene before him, Li Fan’s reprimand sounded in his ears: “Why are you still standing there? Do you really want the Heaven and Earth Essence to descend?”

Sun Tianci immediately came to his senses and launched a Profound Nether Art directly at the blurry figure about to form in the vortex.

It was as if the descent process was being obstructed. A gust of wind blew, and the Heaven and Earth Essence, summoned by Li Fan’s corruption, returned to the heavens and earth.

During this process, Sun Tianci did not feel that his connection with the Xuanhuang Heaven and Earth had deepened. Clearly, it was because the Heaven and Earth Essence still belonged to the Xuanhuang Heaven and Earth and had not been refined and occupied by a cultivator.

And because the “Heaven and Earth Essence’s erroneous descent” was interrupted just as it was about to be achieved, the vigilance from the Xuanhuang Heaven and Earth was minimal.

Li Fan narrowed his eyes and sensed it, then cast another [Corrupt Heaven and Earth Doctrine].

Sun Tianci’s reaction this time was quick. The blurry figure had just taken shape when it was sent back again.

They repeated this process over a hundred times until it was about to alert the Xuanhuang Heaven and Earth to Li Fan’s presence, only then did he stop.

Sun Tianci breathed a sigh of relief, wiping sweat from his pale forehead.

Clearly, continuously casting the Profound Nether Art for a long time, “decomposing” over a hundred Heaven and Earth Essences, even if they were only half-formed, was a considerable burden for him.

“Let’s move to another location and continue,” Li Fan said coldly.

Since the day he defeated the Martial Fanatic Child and displayed his true combat power, Sun Tianci was no longer restricted by the Sun family. Even though he was actually only a little over five years old.

However, Sun Luoyuan constantly admonished him to prioritize safety. He also bestowed upon him numerous magical treasures for self-defense.

The special training lasted for fifteen days, covering all corners of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. Apart from travel time, the remaining time was almost entirely spent on dissolving the Heaven and Earth Essence. And Sun Tianci’s progress was astonishing.

With a casual gesture, he could continuously return the corrupted, half-descended Heaven and Earth Essence back to heaven and earth.

“Well, that’s about enough.” Li Fan nodded slightly, observing Sun Tianci’s performance.

“What are you thinking about?” Li Fan asked again, seeing Sun Tianci seem to fall into contemplation.

“Uh, Master, ten days ago, we came to this place before. The spiritual energy concentration seemed lower than it is now?” Sun Tianci asked uncertainly.

Li Fan smiled: “The spiritual energy in the world ebbs and flows like the tide, sometimes receding, sometimes rising, how can it be abnormal? How could it be like your cave dwelling where you’ve lived since childhood, always unchanging?”

Sun Tianci nodded upon hearing Li Fan’s explanation. But deep in his eyes as he surveyed his surroundings, a trace of doubt flashed.

“This little fellow has such keen observation skills.”

Li Fan naturally also sensed the abnormality in the world. He even detected a familiar aura from the pervasive spiritual energy.

“Dao Yi Bug. It seems to be the work of the Saint Emperor’s clone. The source should be from the [Five Elements Great Cavern-world]. Is it to return the cavern-world to the Xuanhuang Realm, thereby creating a combat environment suitable for the Great Qi soldiers? Perhaps it can also use the bug transformation of spiritual energy to launch a fatal blow…”

The arrangements made by the Saint Emperor’s clone were almost all derived from the exploration of the main body in past lives. It was natural that after a moment of thought, he saw through the mystery.

But Li Fan did not expose it, merely pretending to be ignorant.

Returning to Sun Tianci’s sea of consciousness, they headed towards one of the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s [Eternal Immortal Walls].

Tongyan Prefecture, within a cave hidden among surrounded mountains and cliffs.

“This place…”

Sun Tianci looked from afar, sensing something extraordinary: “If it weren’t for Master’s guidance, even if I had seen this cave earlier, I would have subconsciously ignored it. I wouldn’t have even been prompted to enter and investigate…”

“Hmph, this is said to be a blessed land that only those with fate can enter. The unique creations of Xuanhuang, without the need for formation concealment, can almost block the prying eyes of most people. The Myriad Immortals Alliance has hidden quite a few such hidden cave-heavens. They are almost all divided up by those Law Transmitters and used as their own residences.” Li Fan’s mind flashed back to the 119th life, the hidden cave-heaven he encountered when he infiltrated the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters with Mo Ru Bin.

It was exactly the same as this place.

“Because of its natural characteristics, the stationed cultivators will certainly not be highly vigilant. But we must still act cautiously…” Li Fan set up a series of formations around Sun Tianci’s clone, and then the two flew into the cave.

After passing through a narrow, downward passage, they arrived before a deep cave, only as wide as a person’s waist.

Pitch black, it went straight down, seemingly bottomless.

“Don’t use your divine sense to probe, it will trigger the alert.”

Li Fan, however, saw the mechanism of this underground cave at a glance.

Leaping into the deep cave, they sped downwards.

It took a full hour, as if they had penetrated the Xuanhuang Realm and arrived at the depths of the Nine Netherworlds.

After passing through a horizontal passage, a massive underground cave, shaped like an inverted cone, finally appeared before Sun Tianci.

The cave walls were densely packed with square openings.

Upon closer inspection, these openings were filled with amber-colored crystals.

And inside these crystals, without exception, a cultivator slumbered.

One could occasionally see Immortal Alliance guards patrolling in mid-air. Sun Tianci did not dare to release his divine sense to probe, but he roughly estimated that this underground cave contained at least over a hundred thousand cultivators sealed and imprisoned.
