Their complexions were ruddy, and their faces even showed smiles, completely unaware that they were falling into eternal slumber.

“According to Master, this is only a part of the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s [Eternal Immortal Wall]…” Sun Tianci felt a shudder of coldness, instinctively clenching his fists.

“Go, the rest is up to you.” Li Fan seemed to sense the repressed anger in Sun Tianci’s heart and said calmly.

At the same time, he transmitted the method for breaking the formation sealing these cultivators.

“Master, what do you think would happen if we woke up all the cultivators here?” Sun Tianci suddenly asked.

“I strongly advise you to abandon this idea. Since the Myriad Immortals Alliance dares to do this so openly, they must have made preparations. Believe me, you will never be able to wake them up as fast as the Myriad Immortals Alliance can deal with them. You must know that the Myriad Immortals Alliance possesses the means to extract a cultivator’s Dao foundation and preserve it…” Li Fan said coldly.

Sun Tianci’s eyes flickered, and he finally had to give up.

Avoiding the patrolling cultivators, he flew rapidly past these slumbering, pitiable beings. A faint breeze stirred, dissolving the Dao foundation within their bodies.

“Without their cultivation, they won’t live long in their sleep… It’s equivalent to me killing them myself…” Sun Tianci’s body trembled as he fled.

“Killing? Or saving? Look at their current state, isn’t it worse than death? If they could perceive everything around them, they would beg you to end their suffering.” Li Fan appeased him.

After another round of persuasion, Sun Tianci’s hesitant actions gradually became firm again.

For more than five years, Li Fan had been cultivating Sun Tianci according to his ideal image of the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate.

As a result, although he was benevolent, he was not foolish. If he made a decision, he would become incredibly resolute.

Dissolving the Heaven and Earth Power formed by thousands of cultivators, Li Fan gathered it all together, condensing it into a bright pearl of light.

When the act of benevolent liberation was one-fifth complete, Li Fan said, “That’s about it. If we continue, Master also won’t be able to conceal this intense energy fluctuation.”

Sun Tianci looked at the remaining cultivators with a hint of regret.

But he still obeyed his Master’s orders and quietly flew towards the exit.

“Master, is something wrong?” As they reached the top of the massive cavern, Sun Tianci noticed his Master still gazing downwards at a certain spot, and couldn’t help but ask.

“It’s nothing. Just leave.”

After a brief silence, Li Fan responded.

Sun Tianci no longer pressed, and flew upwards. After leaving the terrifying dungeon, Sun Tianci took the pearl containing the Dao foundations of numerous cultivators and crushed it lightly.

Countless streams of light instantly erupted. In a trance, Sun Tianci seemed to see scenes of wondrous creations, Xuanhuang cavern-worlds, and the transformation of mountains and rivers.

In the sky, wind and clouds changed color. The sound of grinding, like a giant millstone crushing, echoed above the clouds.

And the entire Xuanhuang Realm, in an instant, trembled slightly.

Although the amplitude was minuscule, Sun Tianci still sensed it.

“The Myriad Immortals Alliance must have sent someone to investigate. Let’s go!” Li Fan said.

Without the need for a reminder, the moment Sun Tianci crushed the pearl, he had already flown away from the scene.

At this moment, he was immersed in the rapidly increasing Xuanhuang Heavenly Favor.

And Li Fan, after ensuring that no one was tracking them, recalled the scene he had just seen in the underground cave.

Several faces flashed before his eyes. Although he didn’t know their names, Li Fan was certain that he had seen them before.

But not in the Myriad Immortals Alliance, but in…

The territory of the Five Elders Council.

In the Yan Fa Jue space, the sea of consciousness of the main body activated the Dao Transformation Stone, projecting the scenes he had seen in the 119th life.

It was during the 119th life when the Myriad Immortals Alliance used the Immortal Chosen Ones to unleash the power hidden within the Law Transmission Stone Statues, tying down the five Longevity Heavenly Venerates, and then launched a fierce attack on the Five Elders Council.

The Five Elders Council, seemingly cornered, finally revealed their hidden methods.

An ancient sect, long thought extinct, reappeared in the world. Worse, cultivators from the [Land of Eternal Bliss] fearlessly counterattacked, wielding strange magical artifacts in a desperate fight.

Li Fan compared the faces of several individuals who appeared during that subjugation battle with the sleeping cultivators he had just seen in the underground cave.

It matched perfectly.

“This is interesting.” Li Fan gazed towards the location of the Land of Eternal Bliss in the Five Elders Council.

“It seems that this Land of Eternal Bliss doesn’t only contain cultivators from the Five Elders Council. I wonder if the emergence of the sleeping cultivators in the Land of Eternal Bliss is due to a cooperation agreement between the Myriad Immortals Alliance and the Five Elders Council, or if it’s solely the work of the Eternal Heavenly Venerate capturing them.”

“If it’s the latter, then perhaps this Heavenly Venerate’s strength is even greater than I imagined.”

Li Fan’s mind conjured the infant-like image of the Eternal Heavenly Venerate.

He then recalled the Dharma Transmitter Zhou, whom he met during his infiltration of the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters in the 119th life.

When he appeared in a modern city with neon lights and rainy nights, he had claimed to have copied it directly from his vacation in the Land of Eternal Bliss.

“It’s not impossible that the Myriad Immortals Alliance is cooperating with the Land of Eternal Bliss.”

“The Land of Eternal Bliss might not entirely represent the Five Elders Council. They only intervene when the Five Elders Council faces absolute crisis.”

“Dream Realm…”

Li Fan suddenly had a question: “I wonder if these cultivators can still exist in the Dream Realm if they die in reality. If the Xuanhuang Realm is no more, can this Land of Eternal Bliss still exist?”

As his thoughts churned, Sun Tianci had also completely absorbed the gains from this encounter.

With Li Fan, an excellent strategist and planner, as his master, he was arguably the fastest person to accumulate Xuanhuang Heavenly Favor.

His progress was even faster than that of the Saint Emperor’s clone back then.

It was just a pity. perhaps because there was already a destined Saint Emperor who could communicate with the Heavenly Dao consciousness at any time.

Even though he clearly felt the closeness of the Xuanhuang Heaven and Earth, Sun Tianci still couldn’t directly communicate with the Heavenly Dao.

However, he could feel the pervasive “convenience.”

Sun Tianci immediately cast a spell, and with the omnipresent blessing of Heaven and Earth, its power indeed increased significantly.Chapter 1285

The vortex in the sky was about to close. The Saint Emperor reached out and grasped the last beam of starlight shooting out from it. The nebulae swirled, shining brilliantly. After being refined in the Saint Emperor’s palm, it flowed like gentle water towards him. It transformed into a star-lit throne. The Saint Emperor sat upright and spoke slowly, his voice like thunder: “ Boundless Primordial Chaos, Infinite Innate; Yin and Yang separate, Five Elements flow; All things emerge, created by the Great One…” Every word was profoundly mysterious and difficult to understand. But under the Saint Emperor’s recitation, the living beings fortunate enough to hear it in this world faintly felt a sense of contemplation. The fleeting moment of enlightenment, just experienced under the starlight from above, became clear again under the Saint Emperor’s every word of the Great Dao’s resonant sound. “Dao follows Heaven and Earth, holding it in hand is to be Immortal; Freely roaming the Azure Void, commanding Creation; Eternal through ten thousand tribulations, energy nurturing the eight desolate lands…” Even those with mediocre aptitude and low cultivation, under the Saint Emperor’s voice, gained some understanding. The anger in their hearts only intensified. The enlightened populace listened as if drunk. Yin Shangren scratched his scalp. He felt as if the primal Dao foundation within his body was impatient to burst forth. “This is Master’s good fortune, and also your good fortune.” However, at this juncture, no one dared question the Great Saint Emperor’s decision. The Myriad Immortals Alliance controlled half of the Xuanhuang Realm’s territories, yet it could still be commanded as if an extension of their arm. This was precisely because of the Heaven-Probing Mirrors and the Law Transmission Altars spread across every state. And seizing the opportunity when everyone was distracted, they hastily left the cave dwelling. “During the three years of preparation, some methods can be implemented in advance.” The remaining disciples all nodded in agreement. Six disciples, lined up in order. Sun Luoyuan was speaking eloquently at a gathering when he suddenly sensed something and quickly interrupted his lengthy speech. “Is this what they call ‘one person ascending, the chickens and dogs ascend’? No, this is clearly sharing one’s own understanding selflessly, imparting it to others regardless of closeness. Hiss…” “The ‘Dark Needle Plan’ is finally going to be implemented? I’ve waited so long for this day.” A glint flashed in Sun Luoyuan’s eyes. He suppressed the excitement and a hint of fear for the future, concealed his aura, and hurried towards the agreed meeting point. As for those with exceptional aptitude like Sun Erlang and Ou Shangtian, their eyes shone brightly, and purple energy even began to swirl around them. “Master gives you three years to comprehend. Three years from today…” The Saint Emperor’s voice echoed in everyone’s minds. Most of them would need the rest of their lives to digest the Saint Emperor’s sermon. Xuanhuang Realm, Tianquan Prefecture. No matter which prefecture encountered a problem, support from all prefectures or even the headquarters of the Myriad Immortals Alliance could swiftly arrive. “Congratulations, Master, on your enlightenment!” Sun Erlang said with a bow. Therefore, to deal with the Myriad Immortals Alliance, destroying or interfering with this connection became the top priority. Everyone lowered their heads and complied. The so-called Dark Needle Plan was a sabotage plan targeting the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s Heaven-Probing Mirrors and their teleportation altars. The Saint Emperor’s gaze swept over the six disciples below: “Our Great Qi Sacred Dynasty will conquer the Myriad Immortals Alliance and reclaim the Xuanhuang Realm!” “Three years.” … The Saint Emperor’s sermon lasted for three days and three nights. The six disciples’ bodies trembled upon hearing this. But Sun Luoyuan had already made up his mind. Besides the reasons that led him to betray them before, a greater factor was the recent demise of Sun Luochang. Even if it was just a perfunctory comfort, it would suffice. They had long known that this battle was inevitable, but no one had expected it to come so soon! It was only when the Saint Emperor’s image dissipated that they remained immersed in it, completely oblivious. Sun Luoyuan had been waiting for the Myriad Immortals Alliance to give him an explanation. It was only when the essence of blood left in the underground blood pool suddenly dried up that Sun Luoyuan felt despair. “Before, Ou Shangtian said he could influence or even destroy the Heaven-Probing Mirrors in each prefecture. I don’t know how he did it. However, my informants in each prefecture are already prepared,” Sun Luoyuan pondered as he hurried along. Spiritual energy spontaneously flowed into his body, an image of achieving enlightenment on the spot. He knew that once the arrow was shot, there was no turning back. If he made a move this time, he would completely solidify his identity as a traitor to the Myriad Immortals Alliance. If discovered, there would be no chance of survival. These days, he had watched the Myriad Immortals Alliance continue to release rainbow light messages from beyond the realm, even showing images of Sun Luochang, who had already perished. And now, the Saint Emperor had returned to his throne to contemplate. When he was chosen to go beyond the Xuanhuang Realm, Sun Luoyuan still held a sliver of hope for Sun Luochang’s survival. But clearly, he had overthought. The various prefecture guardians at the Harmonious Dao stage and those so-called important officials of the Myriad Immortals Alliance were indeed like materials that could be discarded at will. They were abandoned without hesitation. “Myriad Immortals Alliance…” At this point, Sun Luoyuan had completely severed all hope he had for the Myriad Immortals Alliance. He had completely sided with the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty. “Regardless of anything else, the benefits I have received from the Sacred Dynasty in recent years far outweigh those from serving the Myriad Immortals Alliance.” Thinking this, Sun Luoyuan had already arrived at the agreed rendezvous point. Beside the towering white mist barrier in Tianquan Prefecture. Years ago, due to the great upheaval in the Xuanhuang Realm, the white mist barrier here had broken and crashed to the ground. The unconstrained Devouring Mist had flowed and spread outwards, mercilessly devouring all the living beings it enveloped. Although the great upheaval eventually subsided and the white mist barrier was restored, this dead land had never recovered its vitality. This attested to the terrifying nature of the Devouring Mist. “Who would have thought that the Sacred Dynasty actually had a way to almost completely negate the influence of this Devouring Mist. Meeting here is the safest!” Sun Luoyuan scanned his surroundings, ensuring no one was following, and cautiously took out the [Diligence True Boat]. Flying into the boat, he piloted it into the white mist barrier. Maintaining a constant speed and constantly changing direction, after traveling for a while, he indeed saw another Diligent True Boat quietly docked within the white mist. A black light flew out from it, lightly cutting through the white mist and arriving in front of Sun Luoyuan. Sun Luoyuan took it and found it was a storage ring made of black jade. When he looked up again, the previous Diligent True Boat had already vanished without a trace. “So cautious, they wouldn’t even show their face.” Inside the black jade ring, nearly a thousand square jade pieces, engraved with profound characters, were neatly arranged. Sun Luoyuan took one out and examined it carefully, while also reading the usage instructions just transmitted via the black light. “As long as it is brought into a Heaven-Probing Mirror or a teleportation altar, and activated, it can explode?” “So simple?” Sun Luoyuan was somewhat surprised. He immediately felt the urge to try it out. However, after studying it carefully, he could only shake his head in frustration. “The detonation time has already been set. It can only be detonated three years later. Before that time, even the core formation within is not activated, and it is just an ordinary jade piece…” “No wonder I couldn’t sense any spiritual fluctuations from it.” Sun Luoyuan put the jade piece back, his expression grim: “Let those cultivators, whom the Myriad Immortals Alliance considers ants, be the first to sound the death knell for it.” Just as the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty began to operate for the conquest plan three years later, Li Fan had already annihilated four small worlds through the Spirit Void Grand Array. He had collected enough of the substance he called [Essence of All Things]. A pure collection of energy, emitting a dreamlike, multicolored viscous glow. To Li Fan, it felt similar to the golden Origin Force Essence. “Have you learned this formation?” Li Fan gazed into the distance, asking the Boundless Mirror. The simulated personality, Sun Luoyao, who had been rebuilt several times, remained silent for a moment before finally replying, “I’ve more or less learned it, Senior.” Li Fan nodded with satisfaction. He gently flicked his finger, and a beam of light entered Sun Luoyao’s illusory form: “Then, for the next step, you will go to these places and continue setting up the formations.” “Just quietly set up the formations, no need to activate them.” Saying this, Li Fan flicked the Boundless Mirror, along with all the Origin Force Essence he had collected upon returning to the Sun family, towards it. Sun Luoyao quickly collected the golden light, thanked Li Fan excitedly, and then transformed into a beam of light, heading towards the target small world. If it were the real Sun Luoyao, executing Li Fan’s task alone might have led to insubordination. But now, he was merely a simulated personality. He might not even be genuinely happy to receive Origin Force Essence; it was all fabricated, so he naturally would not disobey Li Fan’s orders. “The Boundless Mirror Spirit setting up formations is less effective than me, but destroying a world is more than enough. After all, the small worlds I chose were all weak, with no cultivators, preventing outsiders from noticing them being approached by the Xuanhuang Realm’s Immortal Ruins.” “Although he may not show himself again in this life, leaving some contingency is still necessary.” The connection with the Saint Emperor had been completely severed. However, Li Fan could still faintly sense the tremendous changes happening to the Saint Emperor. “Did he have another epiphany in the Star Sea?” “Clearly, the clone’s original talent was just ordinary. With so many fortuitous encounters and blessings, he has truly begun to resemble a destined protagonist…” A hint of sarcasm flashed across Li Fan’s face. “It’s a pity, it’s all in vain!” Li Fan’s divine sense transformed into a thin thread and flew towards the Tianquan Prefecture region. He needed to deliver the [Essence of All Things] he had collected for protection to his main body. In just over half a day, Li Fan had found his target. The “Hermit Chi,” who had been cultivating in the mortal world in disguise. The clone, unnoticed, drifted into the body of a nearby Golden Core cultivator. The cultivator paused for a moment, then quickly returned to normal. Turning around, he arrived in front of Hermit Chi. “Elder, shall we play a game of chess?” The disheveled Taoist, who was picking his feet without any decorum, immediately looked up. ... After Li Fan successfully obtained the Law Transmitting Jade Token from Hermit Chi, he first went to the Debating Dao Tower in Tianquan Prefecture and used all his savings to rent a small courtyard. Then, using the [Dao Pill] method, he completely possessed the body of the host cultivator. Li Fan extended his hand, looking at his new body, and frowned slightly. “Compared to the environment of the Xuanxianzhou outside the Star Sea, this soul-possessing method is not as perfect in the Xuanhuang Realm.” Li Fan moved his limbs and felt a slight discordance. “Possessing Zhao Xian could deceive the Immortal Severing Tower.” “But possessing this…” “Fu Yuansheng, might not be able to evade the inspection of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.” Li Fan manipulated Fu Yuansheng’s body and set up a formation around himself. Then, he strode into the formation. “Using the body as the tool, refining with the formation~” Li Fan chanted softly, using the power of the formation to gradually refine and eliminate the disharmony within the possessed body. During this process, the experiences of the Saint Emperor’s cultivation in this life, the sights of the Saint Embryo within the Xuanxianzhou, and the insights gained from the main body’s seclusion and enlightenment, all flooded his mind and were integrated by Li Fan. He tapped his fingers, modifying and improving the formation he had just set up. The abnormalities of the body and soul gradually disappeared. “From today onwards, I am Fu Yuansheng!” Li Fan’s divine sense smiled slightly. To verify, Li Fan first entered the Heaven-Probing Mirror of Tianquan Prefecture. As expected, he successfully deceived the Heaven-Probing Mirror’s inspection and entered his Heaven-Probing Mirror space as Fu Yuansheng. “Two thousand contribution points…” “Truly meager.” Li Fan shook his head and sighed, but made no changes. He merely rested for a while as usual before leaving the Heaven-Probing Mirror. He then walked to the most prosperous area of Tianquan Celestial City and activated the Law Transmitting Jade Token. The sudden burst of light immediately attracted the attention of everyone present. “What is that?” “This type of jade token… Hiss, could it be that?” Soon, someone recognized the item in Li Fan’s hand, and exclamations of shock and disbelief arose. The surrounding cultivators surrounded Li Fan, who put on an appearance of extreme pallor and forced support. As the recruiting cultivator arrived, stabilizing the chaotic scene, the recruiting cultivator weighed the jade token in his hand and did not directly take Li Fan to the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters. Instead, he transmitted a voice: “This Law Transmitting Jade Token is of exceptional quality, capable of deriving Harmonious Dao cultivation techniques… You are only at the Golden Core stage, which is a waste. Are you interested in transferring this jade token to me? Of course, I will not mistreat you. I will still grant you a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique, and even prepare all the resources needed for your promotion from Nascent Soul to Harmonious Dao.” “Thank you for your kind intentions, Senior…” Li Fan cupped his fists, “But I am not interested in transferring the jade token.” The recruiting cultivator, who thought Li Fan would agree, changed his expression upon hearing the reply: “Boy, you should think clearly! It’s not that having a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique guarantees you can reach Harmonious Dao. I’ve already investigated your background. Without family support, I doubt you can even reach Nascent Soul on your own!” “I am doing this for your own good!” The recruiting cultivator stared intently at Li Fan. Li Fan was slightly surprised: “Did Senior not hear clearly? Then I will say it again.” “Junior is not interested in transferring the Law Transmitting Jade Token.” This time, it was not a voice transmission but a clear declaration in public. The surrounding cultivators immediately turned their attention to the recruiting cultivator. Although no one dared to openly discuss, their gazes clearly conveyed their thoughts. The recruiting cultivator, having a deep understanding of worldly affairs, showed no change in his expression: “Since that is the case, so be it. I was merely offering friendly advice. With a Golden Core cultivator possessing a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique… I don’t know how many malicious individuals would be tempted to take risks.” “Isn’t that right, Fu Yuansheng!” he said loudly, also vocally. The voice shook, faintly spreading throughout Tianquan Celestial City. Instantly, all eyes in the city converged on Li Fan. Their expressions varied, but all concealed greed. Li Fan’s face turned completely pale, a hint of hatred and fear flashed in his eyes, and he bowed his head, saying, “Thank you for your concern, Senior.” The recruiting cultivator let out a cold snort and then opened the passage to the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters. After the two of them left, the previously suppressed Tianquan Celestial City erupted into a frenzy. Golden Core cultivators, Harmonious Dao cultivation techniques. The combination of these two was too impactful, instantly becoming the focus of everyone’s discussion. Fu Yuansheng’s background information was also quickly dug up. Those with quick minds began to instruct people to pressure the Fu family. Powerless and with low cultivation, even if he obtained a treasure, how could he protect it? In the Debating Dao Tower of Tianquan Celestial City. A cultivator in white robes looked at this scene and sighed slightly: “This recruiting cultivator is truly pushing people to a dead end!” A handsome young man opposite him also nodded in agreement: “Unless Fu Yuansheng can hide in the Heaven-Probing Mirror forever and ignore the lives and deaths of his family and friends, I’m afraid he cannot protect that Harmonious Dao cultivation technique.” The young man paused, then changed the subject: “It’s just a Harmonious Dao cultivation technique, yet they resort to such life-or-death tactics. And this is happening in broad daylight, in the eyes of everyone… We came out for a cup of tea and encountered such a thing. It just goes to show how many similar incidents are happening offstage.” “The Immortal Alliance is corrupt, as can be seen.” The white-robed cultivator remained silent, sighing helplessly after a long while. “That’s why I say, joining our Sacred Dynasty and overthrowing the corrupt rule of the Immortal Alliance is the wise choice. Tianming, you’ve been to our Sacred Dynasty before, and such forceful coercion would never happen in the Sacred Dynasty.” The young man transmitted his voice, speaking eloquently. The white-robed cultivator, named Tianming, also nodded in agreement: “Brother Tianci, you are right. In that fishing pond, countless treasures were fished out, and they all belonged to the citizens of Da Qi personally. There’s no need to worry about anyone snatching them… Judging by this alone, the Sacred Dynasty is already far superior to the Immortal Alliance!” Shang Tianci smiled: “I see that Brother Tianming has made up his mind.” The white-robed cultivator also responded with a smile. “Another one successfully persuaded. This time is truly a blessing from heaven.” Shang Tianci secretly thought, and at the same time, the next name flashed in his mind. “I wonder about the progress of the others.” In the absence of the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s awareness, such changes were constantly occurring everywhere. When people’s hearts are lost, it is only a matter of time before they are persuaded or swayed. At the headquarters of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. When Fu Yuansheng’s body, Li Fan, arrived at the headquarters again. As expected, just like the previous few times, Li Fan fell into an illusion. The illusion master was still the Law Transmitting Heavenly Venerate. However, the scenes witnessed this time were completely different from before. Below the continuous immortal mountains shrouded in clouds and mist, a man in his fifties was being ruthlessly stopped. “This is an immortal sacred place, how can you, a mere mortal, trespass?” “Strange, weren’t there illusion formations set up outside? How did this mortal get in?” A cultivator in blue Taoist robes muttered, kicking the middle-aged man away. The middle-aged man tumbled awkwardly on the ground, then miraculously got up as if unharmed, saying with a smile, “Immortal Master, can you give me a chance? I feel… I feel like I can cultivate.” The cultivator sneered, “You’re already half dead, and you still dream of cultivating? Cultivation requires talent and resources. Someone like you…” The cultivator’s face was filled with contempt: “Even if you could cultivate, our Tianyuan Sect doesn’t accept you!” The middle-aged man didn’t give up, even extending his arm, offering it: “Immortal Master, believe me, look, my aptitude…” The cultivator’s eyes flashed with killing intent, his spiritual energy surging, about to blast this ignorant fool to death. Just then, a familiar voice echoed from above: “What’s your name?” “Xuanyuan Dog Egg… No, Xuanyuan Tuo, my name is Xuanyuan Tuo,” the middle-aged Law Transmitter said somewhat nervously. “Uncle Xu!” The cultivator’s expression changed, and he immediately retracted his killing intent, hastily bowing to the newcomer. He was also a middle-aged man, but this Uncle Xu looked much more energetic than Xuanyuan Tuo. He came to Xuanyuan Tuo’s side and examined him closely. After a moment, Uncle Xu shook his head with a hint of regret: “Although your willpower is sufficient for cultivation, your age is simply too great. It will be extremely difficult to achieve anything.” “It will probably be incredibly difficult to even reach the Foundation Establishment stage…” Xuanyuan Tuo quickly said, “Immortal Master, I don’t have high demands. As long as I can cultivate. I’ve been farming for most of my life, and my heart has always been restless, feeling that I shouldn’t spend my life in the fields…” Uncle Xu was somewhat surprised. He hadn’t expected this old farmer to say such words. As he hesitated, a clear bell sound echoed from the mountain peak in the distance. The blue-robed cultivator behind him also reminded him: “Uncle Master, the Sect Master is convening a meeting.” Uncle Xu looked back at the mountain peak, swallowed the words he was about to say, and took out a book. “Go back and read this scripture first. If you can cultivate spiritual energy within a year, then come find me again.” Saying that, Uncle Xu floated away. Xuanyuan Tuo’s eyes widened as he watched. “Xiao Qin, don’t make things difficult for him.” Before leaving, Uncle Xu specifically instructed. The blue-robed cultivator nodded. He looked at Xuanyuan Tuo and snorted coldly: “What a fool’s luck!” “Hurry up! Come back when you’ve actually cultivated spiritual energy!” Seeing this, Xuanyuan Tuo had no

Chapter 1291: Lingering Thoughts and Hidden Souls

The intention conveyed by the Xuán Huáng Heavenly Dao was not entirely clear, but Saint Emperor Li Ping had already grasped its meaning.

"The position of Great Heavenly Venerate..."

"Might lose the connection with me?"

Li Ping frowned, unable to help but fall into contemplation.

"It's been thousands of years since a new Xuán Huáng Great Heavenly Venerate was appointed, and it's happening at this particular time... Who could it be?" The Saint Emperor smelled a conspiracy. The Saint Emperor could now only monitor a small part of the Xuán Huáng Realm; most areas were blind spots. Faces flashed rapidly in his mind, but he could not identify any suspicious individuals.

"Although theoretically, anyone who passes the Great Heavenly Venerate trial should be on my side and face the Dharma Transmitter together, but..."

The Saint Emperor soothed the Xuán Huáng Heavenly Dao while his eyes revealed a resolute expression: "It seems the plan needs to be advanced."

"We just need to force the Dharma Transmitter to appear when the Star Sea anomaly arrives."

A beam of starlight shot out from the Saint Emperor's throne.

The Sacred Heavenly Court, a machine that had been preparing for battle for a long time, began to operate rapidly.

Sun Erlang, who was conducting the final test of the Sacred Army puppets' defensive capabilities, was somewhat surprised by the Saint Emperor's summons. However, looking at the endless array of puppets arranged in the test field, he quickly became excited and eager.

"To raise troops for a thousand days and use them for a moment. It's time to let the decadent Myriad Immortals Alliance witness the elite army of the great Sacred Dynasty!"

Just as he was about to leave to handle the departure mobilization tasks, Sun Erlang seemed to remember something and flashed to the deepest part of the test field.

The surging earth vein power was as dense as solidified material. It seemed to be constantly battered and squeezed by some immense force. The originally earthy yellow color now resembled molten magma, fiery red. The earth veins surged and roared, striking a black, stubborn rock at the center.

No matter how the red earth veins raged, the black rock stood unyieldable. In fact, with every impact of the red earth veins, the luster on the rock became brighter.

Above the black rock, a beam of starlight shone down from the constantly rotating starry vortex, directly illuminating the rock.

Under the starlight, the black rock seemed to breathe, inhaling and exhaling specks of starlight along with its continuous movement.

Qiao Gong Jushi was observing this miraculous scene of the black rock in the sky not far away, continually manipulating the power ratio between the earth veins and starlight input.

"Elder Qiao, the battle might start earlier. Senior Tianyang, he..."

Qiao Gong seemed to have also received the summons. His eyes remained fixed on Tianyang's body, and he said nonchalantly: "Don't worry. By then, I will definitely give those scoundrels a big surprise. Those fellows swallowed quite a bit of my Origin Force in the past few years..."

"Right! Since the war is about to start, those people from the Tianling Sect can also be put to good use." Qiao Gong patted his head, then closed his eyes and reported to the Saint Emperor. After receiving the decree, he sent out another command, which floated far towards the puppets in Jiushan Prefecture.

A hint of pride flashed in Qiao Gong's eyes. His attention returned to Tianyang, who was undergoing double tempering from the earth veins and the power of the Star Sea.

Qiao Gong could clearly feel the immense power gestating within this black rock.

His body trembled slightly, and Qiao Gong's eyes flashed with madness. "This puppet is the pinnacle of my refining artistry. Even in the former Tianji Realm, no one could surpass it. Shangguan, just watch. The disciple you ignored will surpass you by a wide margin..."

Qiao Gong ignored Sun Erlang, who was still beside him, and muttered to himself. His hands continuously cast spells, floating above Tianyang's body.

Sun Erlang, seeing this, wisely retreated quietly.

While the Great Qi army and its people were meticulously preparing for battle, two individuals within the Sacred Dynasty had already left the small world under the cover of complete relaxation and returned to the Xuán Huáng Realm.

They were Xu Ke and Yin Shangren.

Yin Shangren squinted his eyes and looked up at the sky, seemingly unaccustomed to the sunlight of the Xuán Huáng Realm.

Xu Ke, on the other hand, was discerning the direction.

They needed to infiltrate the Museum of Natural Curiosities before the war began.

"Speaking of Emperor Sansheng Mo, he's quite interesting. He's one of the Three Great Beast Emperors, yet he joined a human cultivation sect; and when disaster struck, he didn't hesitate to betray and join the New Myriad Immortals Alliance..." Yin Shangren said with a cold laugh.

Xu Ke shook his head and explained: "Grandfather Sansheng is mysterious, no one knows what he's thinking. After all, he didn't leave the Xuán Huáng Realm with Emperor Yi back then, which is already baffling. Moreover, his actions might not be considered betrayal of the Imperial Beast Sect. After all, the entire Imperial Beast Sect prospered mainly because of the techniques he brought. He benefited the Imperial Beast Sect, rather than the Imperial Beast Sect benefiting him."

"I think joining the Myriad Immortals Alliance might still be for the sake of survival."

Yin Shangren sneered: "I don't care about anything else. If he dares to obstruct me when I retrieve Mr. Bai's skull, I won't be polite... As for you, you won't betray me, will you?"

Xu Ke said solemnly: "Don't worry, Daoist friend. I've already made arrangements. Qing and Hong have gone to the Spiritual Void Realm. Mimicking the Imperial Beast Wheel reincarnation, coupled with the cooperation of the current Imperial Beast Sect, should be able to lure Grandfather Sansheng away. At worst, even if the plan fails..."

"I won't hold back."

"That's good." Yin Shangren, having received Xu Ke's guarantee, smiled and his expression returned to normal.

The two followed the plan and traveled stealthily, arriving near the Heavenly City of Tian Yu Prefecture, belonging to the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

"This should be it, the Heng family of Tian Yu Prefecture." Xu Ke observed his surroundings while looking left and right.

"In my opinion, just find any family with authority to enter the Museum of Natural Curiosities. Why did we have to travel so far to come here?" Yin Shangren scratched his scalp, sounding impatient.

"That was the original plan. But recently, the Saint Emperor suddenly sent a message saying that something seemed to have happened in the Myriad Immortals Alliance, and the access management to the Immortal Alliance headquarters has suddenly become stricter. This leaves very few cultivators who still have the authority to enter the Museum of Natural Curiosities. Among them, the Heng family of Tian Yu Prefecture is the most suitable target."

"The family is prominent, entirely due to their skill in weaving fabric. Their strength is not particularly strong, and they tend to keep a low profile, having minimal public presence..." Xu Ke explained via telepathy.

Yin Shangren's gaze penetrated the Heng family's defenses, revealing a cold smile: "The easiest targets should be those two little girls. They're even mother and daughter..."

"That's right, it's them, Heng Ruoshui and He Xin Xin. As soon as they go out, we'll capture them and switch their identities."

"The Saint Emperor instructed that unless absolutely necessary, no harm should be done to them." Xu Ke added.

Yin Shangren: "Don't worry, these delicate skins are not to my taste. Besides, do we have to change into women? Can't we choose someone else?"

Xu Ke sneered: "Are you still concerned about appearances?"

Yin Shangren waved his hand: "That's true. I can't be bothered to run anymore. Let's finish this quickly. I'm a bit eager to see Mr. Bai's skull."

The Heng family mother and daughter did not make the two wait too long.

Two days later, He Xin Xin sneaked out to play and was silently captured by the two.

Two days later, Heng Ruoshui seemed to receive an invitation and left her cave dwelling. She was also captured by the two in an instant.

Looking at the bound and unconscious Heng family mother and daughter, Yin Shangren stroked his chin: "The technique passed down by the Saint Emperor is indeed extraordinary. This little girl's Void Compass within her body is indeed extraordinary. It has the ability to avoid good fortune and predict the future. It can be considered half of Heaven's Marvel, perhaps the rebirth of an ancient immortal artifact..."

"However, with the Saint Emperor's secret technique 【Covering the Heavens with One Hand】, this little girl is completely unaware of the impending crisis..." Xu Ke smiled.

Xu Ke and Yin Shangren exchanged glances, tacitly understanding each other. While visiting the Museum of Natural Curiosities, they slowly moved towards the central area.

After a long while, they finally saw the skull placed quietly in the distance.

Xu Ke's body trembled slightly. He took a deep breath, and his mood slowly calmed down.

Yin Shangren also exerted great effort to prevent any abnormalities from showing.

They walked up to Mr. Bai's skull and gazed silently.

"I can barely hold back my urge to act."

"Let's wait. The Immortal Alliance and the Sacred Dynasty haven't started fighting yet. More importantly, I can vaguely sense that Grandfather Sansheng is still lurking in the museum. Anyway, with the Heng family's authority, they don't have time restrictions for visiting..."

Yin Shangren did not reply, but had already become completely engrossed in observing Mr. Bai's skull.

After an unknown amount of time, another figure arrived near the skull.

After gazing for a long time, they let out a light sigh.

This immediately attracted the attention of Xu Ke and Yin Shangren.

The visitor was a middle-aged cultivator with a long beard. He looked at Mr. Bai's skull, like them, his emotions were somewhat uncontrollably stirred.

"So it's this kid..." Yin Shangren snorted coldly.

"Do you know him?" Xu Ke asked.

"Hmph, his name is Shangguan Shiquan. He fought with me for Mr. Bai's rib back then. Speaking of which, Mr. Bai still has a leg bone with him..." Yin Shangren's tone was unfriendly.

"Hmph, after taking the most important skull, we'll collect the remaining parts one by one too." Xu Ke's eyes flashed with a dangerous glint.

"Of course." Yin Shangren agreed wholeheartedly.

"Grandpa, what's so interesting about this? I still want to see the ancient magical artifacts from before..." A slightly childish voice came from afar.

It was a little girl, about three or four years old, who walked up to Shangguan Shiquan and tugged at him, crying.

"This is one of the greatest cultivators in the history of the Xuán Huáng Realm." Shangguan Shiquan picked up the little girl and comforted her.

The little girl's eyes widened with curiosity upon hearing this and stared intently at the skull before her.

After hearing Shangguan Shiquan's words, Yin Shangren and Xu Ke's attitudes changed somewhat.

After a moment of silence, the little girl suddenly exclaimed in surprise, pointing at Mr. Bai's skull: "Grandpa, look, there's someone there!"

Like a thunderclap, it instantly exploded in the hearts of the three people present.

The three of them immediately refocused their gaze on the skull.

However, it was still quiet, and there was no sign of life at all.

Shangguan Shiquan stroked the little girl's head: "Nannan, don't talk nonsense, where is someone!"

The little girl pouted, her face full of displeasure: "Nannan isn't talking nonsense, there clearly is someone! It's inside the skull, can't you see it?"

The little girl's words were too earnest, and Shangguan Shiquan couldn't help but hesitate.

He took another careful look.

He still found nothing. Then Shangguan Shiquan secretly laughed at himself. How many times had he looked at this skull? How could someone possibly be hiding inside?

He thought it was just childish prattle and urged the little girl not to make trouble.

However, the little girl was insistent and continued to shout.

Shangguan Shiquan reluctantly took the little girl and left the place for the time being.

Near the skull, only Yin Shangren and Xu Ke remained.

Xu Ke said solemnly: "What do you think?"

He was clearly asking about the little girl's words just now.

"Impossible. I am absolutely certain that Mr. Bai is completely dead. There is definitely no will left on this skull."

"Besides, Di Sansheng Mo is no ordinary person; he wouldn't be unable to distinguish whether there's a residual will in the skull. If there were, how could he openly display it here for us to examine? Hmph, that's the remnant will of a Xuán Huáng Great Heavenly Venerate..." Yin Shangren replied decisively after a long silence.

"But..." Xu Ke stared at Mr. Bai's skull, a trace of doubt in his eyes.

"Before the little girl mentioned it, I didn't notice it. But after she said it, I really feel like something is hidden inside this skull."

"It's not Mr. Bai's remnant will, but something else..."

"When I was young, I liked playing hide-and-seek with my companions. As long as Mr. Bai was there, we all liked to hide next to him. He seemed to be able to contain the entire world; as long as you were close to him, it was hard for others to find you..." Xu Ke murmured.

What he said made Yin Shangren start to waver.

"By the way, that receiving cultivator mentioned earlier that a remnant soul actually escaped from the Times. It disappeared afterwards..."

"Perhaps." Xu Ke suddenly spoke.

"Remnant soul from the Times?" Yin Shangren narrowed his eyes and stared at Mr. Bai's skull.

"We've been here too long. Let's go somewhere else first." Without answering, he said.

After walking to the viewing area called 【Phases of All Beings】, Yin Shangren said: "Although Mr. Bai's remains look like ordinary mortal bones, they are, after all, the bones of a former Great Heavenly Venerate. They must have their uniqueness."

"However, this uniqueness is difficult to discern. I once fused and raised a mutated human-dog, which was extremely disgusted by any bones. Only my collected white rib bone did it show special affection for..."

"It was as if it was the existence that could save it from fire and water." Yin Shangren seemed to recall something and pondered.

Xu Ke's heart stirred and said: "So, perhaps Mr. Bai's skull can indeed protect that remnant soul. It's just that we haven't figured out the truth yet."

"Hmph. After all, there are layers of defenses from the Myriad Immortals Alliance, so we can't see clearly. Once we get the skull, we'll figure it out." Yin Shangren snorted coldly.

Xu Ke nodded in agreement, then suddenly said: "Speaking of which, even we couldn't detect the remnant soul hidden in the skull, yet that little girl noticed it..."

"This little girl is not simple. What was her name again? Shangguan Nihongo? When we get back, we must report this matter to the Saint Emperor..."

If Li Fan were present and could hear their conversation, he would surely guess that the power that protected the remnant soul in Mr. Bai's skull was the 【Eternal Remnant Thought】 that was fatally attractive to 【Returning to Truth】.

This energy, unknown to Xuán Huáng cultivators at present, could only be absorbed and utilized by Returning to Truth, and it was the fundamental reason why he desperately sought Mr. Bai's skull.

However, because the Saint Emperor had severed the connection with his main body in the Star Sea in this life.

Even if Yin Shangren and Xu Ke conveyed their findings to the Saint Emperor, Li Fan was destined not to know.

...

While the two of them were visiting the Museum of Natural Curiosities.

An unusual aura had gradually begun to spread across the Myriad Immortals Alliance's territory.

Because Li Fan's spiritual sense had infiltrated the Great Earth Cave with Sun Tianci and stolen the Dao foundation of nearly one-fifth of the slumbering cultivators, the Immortal Alliance's higher-ups were furious.

A large-scale investigation operation was secretly launched.

No reason was given, only that all cultivators who appeared in Tongyan Prefecture that day were thoroughly scrutinized.

The Eternal Immortal Wall was destined to be shrouded in secrecy and could only be investigated privately.

However, opaque investigations inevitably led to widespread panic among the populace.

Rumors of the Myriad Immortals Alliance going to war with the Five Elders Council, fueled by Sacred Dynasty spies, became increasingly rampant.

Just as the situation became increasingly tense, further bad news came from Jiushan Prefecture.

Due to the sudden rebellion of the Tianling Sect within Jiushan Prefecture.

With an inside and outside attack, they, in collusion with the Five Elders Council, managed to seize control of Jiushan Prefecture in one fell swoop.

The fall of Jiushan Prefecture sent shockwaves throughout the Immortal Alliance.

The Immortal Alliance declared a state of emergency preparedness and, to prevent the Five Elders Council from expanding their gains, dispatched large numbers of cultivators to the border to establish defensive lines.

Cultivators in each prefecture were also prohibited from moving freely and were mostly confined to their respective Heavenly Cities.

The Immortal Alliance was discussing how to reclaim Jiushan Prefecture.

And in places they could not see, the armies of the Sacred Dynasty, aboard Puxian True Boats, appeared within the Immortal Alliance prefectures, using the White Mist barrier.

As soon as the Saint Emperor gave the order, they would descend like a swarm of locusts and launch a general offensive against the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

"Brother, when do we make our move? I can't wait any longer."

Within the white mist, Ouyang Tian rubbed his hands, his eyes penetrating the white mist barrier, filled with excitement.

"Wait a bit longer. Wait until the formations in the central four prefectures are complete." Sun Erlang said calmly.

"By the way, Elder Qiao's move to divert the disaster is truly a stroke of genius. The Myriad Immortals Alliance has deployed a large number of troops to the border, which is undoubtedly a great blessing for us." Wang Xuanba said, playing with a white snake-like exotic beast in his hand.

"Don't be careless. Master once said that the Myriad Immortals Alliance is far more complex than it appears. Those cultivators... are merely distractions."

"Do you think our Sacred Dynasty's Sky Patrol Arrows and Sacred Army puppets are any different from the Immortal Alliance's? True victory must be forged through life-and-death combat." Sun Erlang had a clear understanding of the battle situation and admonished them.

Chapter 1292: Da Qi Ling Huang Xuan (7K)

As the eldest disciple of the Sacred Dynasty, Sun Erlang was in charge of all affairs of the Sacred Dynasty in the absence of the Saint Emperor. No one would refute his pre-battle summary and mobilization.

After several more days of lurking in the white mist, a beam of light streaked across the sky and entered the Puxian True Boat.

It was a message from an unknown source.

Sun Erlang narrowed his eyes as he examined it and his spirit was greatly lifted: "We have confirmed intelligence. The Myriad Immortals Alliance will launch their campaign to retake Jiushan Prefecture tomorrow. Simultaneously, to deter the Five Elders Council, they will also launch small-scale harassing attacks in multiple border regions..."

Upon hearing this, everyone in the Sacred Dynasty present had their eyes light up: "The Immortal Alliance's actions are even grander than we anticipated!"

"Let them fight! The fiercer the better!"

As Sun Erlang's thoughts stirred, a massive light cluster representing the Myriad Immortals Alliance's territories instantly appeared before everyone.

"When the Myriad Immortals Alliance's battle to retake Jiushan Prefecture erupts, it will be the moment the Sacred Dynasty's army marches."

"Before that, no one is to act rashly."

While Sun Erlang was speaking, he and Ou Shangtian had already cooperated to activate the Puxian True Boat's internal blockade formation.

"Before the decisive battle, I have one more top-secret matter to announce. It concerns the victory or defeat of the war, and it absolutely cannot be leaked. Therefore, during this period, the warship will be under lockdown. Entry is permitted, but exit is not. All communication will also be severed."

"Please excuse me," Sun Erlang said calmly.

Everyone's eyes flickered with a hint of surprise, unable to comprehend what kind of confidential content required such caution.

Sun Erlang closed his eyes and waited.

Under the grim atmosphere, the Puxian True Boat fell into absolute silence.

After an unknown amount of time, Sun Erlang suddenly opened his eyes.

"The Myriad Immortals Alliance has made their move."

"Now, it's our turn."

Sun Erlang suddenly stood up and bowed deeply towards the void ahead: "Greetings, Master!"

Everyone on the warship was startled and looked towards where Sun Erlang was bowing. Under the starlight, the Saint Emperor's figure descended.

"Welcome, Saint Emperor!" everyone bowed in unison.

Even though it was just a projection and not his actual presence, everyone dared not show the slightest disrespect.

The Saint Emperor did not utter empty platitudes but simply said in a deep voice: "This battle, the Sacred Dynasty will surely win."

With a wave of his hand, the Saint Emperor's projection transformed into points of starlight, all flying into the cultivators present.

Boom!

Everyone felt as if they had transformed into a planet and arrived in the vast sea of stars.

They revolved around the central star, resembling the great sun in the sky.

Even better, the star sea seemed to echo with a vast stellar force, like a woven star net, connecting everyone together.

Even without words or divine sense, they could communicate freely with the flow of their thoughts.

They also discovered that the stars in the star sea were not limited to those within the Puxian True Boat at this moment.

There were also a greater number of them, the Sacred Dynasty's low-level generals who had already infiltrated various prefectures of the Immortal Alliance.

"I will now give the deployment orders," Sun Erlang's voice echoed in the star sea.

"Wang Xuanba and Senior Qiao Gong, lead the First and Third Legions, responsible for attacking the 130 prefectures in the eastern part of the Immortal Alliance."

"Ou Shangtian and Daoist Ou, lead the Second and Ninth Legions, responsible for the 126 prefectures in the southern part of the Immortal Alliance."

"Su Yuqing and Senior Bai Hua, lead the Fifth Legion and the Myriad Realms Allied Army, to attack the 154 prefectures in the western part of the Immortal Alliance."

...

As Sun Erlang completed each deployment order, Wang Xuanba and the others felt their positions in the star sea shift rapidly. After settling in the new star domain, they also established connections with other planets in the same region.

With a slight movement of their thoughts, information about the main generals of their respective legions appeared clearly in their minds.

"The operational objective is to focus on capturing the Celestial Cities of each prefecture. Other cultivation sects and forces within the prefectures, if they resist, clear them out. If they choose to observe, then temporarily ignore them."

"At the time of the war, the channels of the Heavenly Profound Mirrors and the teleportation arrays in each prefecture of the Immortal Alliance will all be paralyzed..."

"This is the diagram of the defensive formation of the Immortal Alliance's Celestial Cities. According to the information noted in the diagram, break the formation. Those defenses are like nothing to us. If they activate the backup formation, I will immediately transmit the method to break the flaws."

...

One by one, the information was conveyed in an orderly manner. As everyone present looked at the materials in their hands, they became increasingly excited.

Not only were there lists of major cultivators guarding each prefecture, but even their respective realms, strengths, and even cultivation techniques were clearly marked.

The details of their opponents were almost completely exposed.

And the Myriad Immortals Alliance knew almost nothing about them.

How could this war be lost?

No wonder Sun Erlang was so serious before. This document was definitely leaked by the higher echelons of the Immortal Alliance.

However, the shock brought by Sun Erlang was not over yet.

"The Star Sea network you are currently seeing is the manifestation of the Saint Emperor's divine power. Besides the simplest communication function, you can also use the Saint Emperor's divine power to instantly transfer to face each other."

"You can utilize this advantage to use numbers against the few and defeat them separately."

The bright star in the center of the star sea suddenly erupted with dazzling light, illuminating the stars in the star sea.

In an instant, various applications of the Saint Emperor's divine power appeared clearly in everyone's minds.

Everyone could not help but marvel again at the greatness of the Saint Emperor.

...

While the pre-war general council was still ongoing in the Lingxu Realm.

"It should be fine, right?" Xiao Qing and Xiao Hong looked at the pattern carved on the ground, resembling a spinning wheel, with some suspicion. They had not felt any binding or restrictive force from it.

"Senior, please rest assured. If Cui Shaojiang acts, it will definitely be foolproof!" A young man wearing a blue round hat smiled and assured them.

Cui Shaojiang forced out a drop of his vital blood and waved it towards the ground.

The vital blood merged into the spinning wheel on the ground, bursting out with fine blood-colored threads. Then, they rapidly flew towards the sky and disappeared.

"Alas, in the current Beast Taming Sect, only I can perform this unique skill." Cui Shaojiang said, shaking his head.

Xiao Qing and Xiao Hong looked at the spinning wheel pattern on the ground with some suspicion. They did not feel any binding or restrictive force from it.

Cui Shaojiang seemed to see their distrust and patiently explained: "The current Beast Taming Sect is different from the past. After the great calamity, we migrated here. For a thousand years, we gradually abandoned the traditional beast-taming methods and turned to the 'Beast Spirit Integration' technique."

As Cui Shaojiang spoke, the blue round hat on his head suddenly came alive, growing two round black eyes and observing Qing and Hong.

Even though they knew some of the Beast Taming Sect's situation before, seeing it with their own eyes was still somewhat unbelievable for Qing and Hong.

In their perception, there were not two separate auras of beast and human, but from beginning to end, there was only one person before them.

"Not by law, but by spirit integration. This is the breakthrough of our Beast Taming Sect's ancestors after studying the Beast Taming Wheel. Speaking of which, Senior Xu Ke also played a part in this." He touched his head, and the blue round hat returned to normal.

"I'm getting off track. Let's talk about this Beast Taming Wheel. Senior Xu Ke's replica is indeed excellent. Combined with the Beast Taming Sect's thousand years of technical accumulation, it is enough to unleash the power of the original Beast Taming Wheel and summon Emperor Sansheng Mo here..."

Cui Shaojiang's eyes flashed with excitement: "We are very much looking forward to this legendary wise beast. If we can achieve spirit integration with him..."

Cui Shaojiang's gaze inadvertently drifted towards the outside of the open space, where the Beast Taming Sect had already set up a net. The beast-taming beasts, who had abandoned the sect and left without a word, were not forgotten by the Beast Taming Sect. Their memories of it had not faded with time but had become even more profound.

Therefore, when Xiao Qing and Xiao Hong came with the replica Beast Taming Wheel to persuade them, it was a natural agreement.

On the ground, the red light seemed to be alive, constantly waving its claws. The spinning wheel pattern even trembled slightly, as if ready to leap from the ground at any moment.

Cui Shaojiang squinted his eyes. He felt that Emperor Sansheng Mo had taken the bait.

...

Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters.

While waiting and pretending to visit and wander, Xu Ke and Yin Shangren suddenly sensed that the Museum of Divine Treasures seemed to have brightened slightly.

The heavy feeling that had been suppressed in their hearts also suddenly disappeared.

"Grandfather Sansheng has left." Xu Ke immediately judged.

"Shall we act now?" Yin Shangren was eager to try.

"Let's wait. Let's wait for Saint Emperor's side..."

"The breakthroughs of the Beast Taming Sect in recent years have even surprised me. They chose to go into seclusion at the time of the great calamity, preserving a large amount of talent. It was indeed useful." Xu Ke said.

"Okay, we can wait. It's just a matter of time. By the way, let me show you this..." Yin Shangren pulled Xu Ke towards an exhibit.

Xu Ke looked closely and saw a golden tree with a peculiar shape.

The leaves of the tree were all triangular, and the trunk was carved with small figures interacting in various poses.

"This item isn't an ancient artifact of the Xuanhuang Realm, is it?" Xu Ke said with a strange expression after observing it for a while.

"Of course not. It comes from my hometown."

"Or rather, the part of my hometown where the residual consciousness is most complete." Yin Shangren said leisurely.

"I originally thought that place was completely gone, but I didn't expect that the most important golden tree would be preserved in this Museum of Divine Treasures."

"This tree... is there anything special about it?" Xu Ke knew that Yin Shangren would not be sighing about past events for no reason, so he immediately asked, his heart stirred.

Yin Shangren chuckled: "In my world, there is no sun or moon. The light of the entire world depends on this golden tree. Even the origin of all life originates from under this tree. You saw the carvings on the tree; they are the imprints of human interactions over the ages under the tree."

"Although the world was destroyed, as long as this tree exists, the power of the world's origin is almost one-third preserved."

Xu Ke began to understand and then said with some surprise: "Do you have a way to detonate the energy within this tree?"

Yin Shangren touched his scalp and smiled without replying.

"Are you willing? That's your hometown! If this tree is well-preserved, after the Saint Emperor conquers the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters, perhaps he can help recreate that world." Xu Ke said.

Yin Shangren snorted coldly: "Everyone is dead, what's the point of recreating the world? Do you expect me to act as their stand-in and perform a solo play?"

"Just detonate it."

Xu Ke responded with a smile.

As the two were talking, they suddenly felt the ground beneath their feet tremble slightly.

They looked at each other and simultaneously looked up towards the outside of the Museum of Divine Treasures. Although their vision could not penetrate, they could vaguely feel that a major change had occurred in the Xuanhuang Realm.

Their senses were not wrong.

At this moment, a wondrous scene was unfolding in the sky of the Xuanhuang Realm.

The originally bright sky suddenly dimmed as if night had fallen.

The sun in the sky disappeared.

Points of starlight lit up from various places in the sky.

Amidst the shining stars, a bright moon rose.

However, the Xuanhuang cultivators soon discovered that this "moon" was even brighter than the original sun.

As the giant jade plate slowly approached, the Xuanhuang Realm was illuminated once more.

The cultivators looked up at the sky and saw that within the bright moon, magnificent pagodas were erected.

It was clearly another world!

After a brief moment of mental blankness, countless thoughts flooded the minds of the Xuanhuang cultivators.

"Is this the legendary Xuanxianzhou?"

"Has the Xuanxianzhou attacked?"

"I heard the Immortal Alliance and the Five Elders Council are at war, could it be a surprise attack by the Five Elders Council?"

"Beware of vigilance!"

...

When things are abnormal, there must be a demon.

Now that they were in a state of wartime preparation, the Myriad Immortals Alliance's reaction was swift.

The defensive formations of the Celestial Cities in all prefectures were immediately activated, and alarms resounded through the sky.

Even more cultivators transformed into beams of white light and shot straight towards the moon-like world in the sky, wanting to investigate.

But even though it appeared close at hand, the investigating cultivator could never fly into it.

It was as if there was a chasm between them.

The Myriad Immortals Alliance stood ready, but saw several beams of bright light descend from the moon.

The moonlight was like a knife, accurately striking the borders of the four central prefectures of the Immortal Alliance: Tianyu, Tianchen, Tianshu, and Tianquan.

The sky of the four central prefectures of the Immortal Alliance instantly became coated with a silver sheen, becoming illusory and hazy.

But apart from that, there seemed to be no other anomalies.

After cautiously waiting for a long time, the cultivators of the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance concluded that there were no other anomalies.

However, they soon realized they were wrong.

"The teleportation arrays are unusable! We've been sealed off!"

"The communication spirit talismans can't be used either!"

"We've lost contact with other prefectures. However, we can still contact the Immortal Alliance headquarters."

"What did they say? To act according to the situation? Everyone is already at our doorstep! Damn it!"

The four prefectures immediately descended into chaos.

Some hot-tempered cultivators flew directly to the border of the prefectures covered by the silver light, trying to cross the blockade.

The white mist barrier under the moonlight seemed to gain a touch of sacred solemnity.

A cultivator, bracing himself, charged directly into the white mist.

Although he had prepared for the possibility of his lifespan being shortened by several years, the scene he saw after entering the white mist left him dumbfounded.

The moment he stepped out of the boundary, the white mist that had filled his vision instantly disappeared.

It was replaced by an boundless starry sky.

It was as if he had truly entered the void outside the Xuanhuang Realm, surrounded by darkness and coldness.

In the distance, faint traces of countless brilliant stars could be seen, occasionally sparkling.

The cultivator was stunned and wanted to return, but found that the path he came from had disappeared.

He then thought it was an illusion and used sword techniques and magic spells one after another, but not a single ripple was stirred in the starry sky.

Instantaneous teleportation techniques also failed.

Conversely, as the spiritual power in his body was consumed, the surrounding cold starry sky environment began to erode his mind.

Helpless, the cultivator could only choose a direction and fly continuously.

He tried to leave the range of this starry sky.

But they did not know that the star sea was boundless, and without the correct method, even if they spent a lifetime, they would not be able to leave.

Outside the great formation, cultivators continuously stepped into the moonlight boundary.

The great formation was like an endless abyss, swallowing all of them.

Nascent Soul, God Transformation, even Dao Integration. Regardless of their cultivation level, as long as they entered, they would never return.

After a period of probing, the cultivators of the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance were finally deterred.

The Immortal Alliance Headquarters also finally issued an emergency order, prohibiting cultivators in the four prefectures from acting recklessly.

Several beams of rainbow light traversed the prefectures and arrived at the moonlight boundary in Tianquan Prefecture.

Among them was Lu Xichan, the Chief Formation Master of the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

"This formation..." Lu Xichan examined the moonlight shining on the white mist barrier, her eyes filled with shock.

A young man in white robes beside her frowned and asked, "When can we break this formation? We've lost contact with the prefectures outside the great formation."

"Not only are the teleportation arrays malfunctioning, but even the Heavenly Profound Mirror channels are blocked," the young man in white robes said with some worry.

This young man in white robes was one of the core Law Transmitters of the Immortal Alliance, Ren, the Law Transmitter.

Lu Xichan dared not delay and replied: "This formation seems to be drawing the power of the Star Sea, and then using infinite spatial transformations to generate a starry sky that resembles the real one..."

Dao Transmitter Ren coldly interrupted Lu Xichan: "When can we break the formation?"

Lu Xichan's voice abruptly stopped. After a long pause, she said, "The complexity of this formation is unprecedented in my life. It should take at least fifteen days..."

Dao Transmitter Ren said coldly: "I will give you ten days."

With a cold snort, Dao Transmitter Ren flashed away.

Only Lu Xichan and several other formation masters from the Immortal Alliance's Formation Hall were left behind.

Lu Xichan looked up at the great star formation covering the sky, and cold sweat gradually dripped from her forehead.

The more profound the formation masters present were, the more despair filled their eyes.

It was not that the Immortal Alliance's formation masters were all useless.

It was simply that the formation laid down by the Saint Emperor this time far surpassed the current era.

Li Fan's hundreds of reincarnations, with constant deductions using the TERMINAL DISSOLUTION DISC, accumulated array knowledge beyond several generations of Xuanhuang. Furthermore, it incorporated insights from Li Fan, or rather, the DISSOLUTION DISC, after obtaining several immortal-level formations.

After being infused with these array essentials, the Saint Emperor, relying on his enlightenment in the Star Sea, further deduced the array to a deeper level.

Currently, above the Celestial Cities of the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance, covering almost half of the sky, was the bright moon, representing the Sacred Dynasty Da Qi.

Countless citizens of Da Qi gathered in the Sacred Heart Hall.

Facing the Saint Emperor's statue, they knelt and prayed devoutly.

In the Sacred Capital City, below the Saint Emperor's throne.

Tens of thousands of created second-generation Abyssal people chanted praises for the Saint Emperor's great virtue.

The Sacred Dynasty's purple-gold aura mingled with the golden Origin Force essence.

Forming a faint purple-gold starlight, it left the Sacred Dynasty's territory and maintained the operation of the great formation that trapped the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance.

This ultimate trapping formation, named the [Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation] by the Saint Emperor, was almost infinitely close to a true immortal-level formation. Li Ping believed that even a Law Transmitter would need some time to break it.

As for the people in the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance who wanted to break the formation...

They would have to ask him, the Heavenly Mandate Saint Emperor, whether he agreed or not.

Li Ping sat on the Saint Emperor's throne, his gaze spanning the boundaries between two worlds, falling upon the territory of the Myriad Immortals Alliance in the Xuanhuang Realm.

The Saint Emperor's throne, or rather, the entire Sacred Capital City, fell into profound silence due to the impending war.

Mao Bao was still in its usual state, lazily sleeping on Li Ping's shoulder. It seemed that besides Origin Force essence, nothing else could move it.

Besides Mao Bao, a figure resembling a child of eight or nine years old also stood beside the Saint Emperor.

Gazing intently at the Xuanhuang Realm below.

It was Tianyang.

At this moment, his puppet body had undergone earth-shattering changes after receiving massive infusions of Origin Force essence and combat memories of the Immortal Puppet [Ancestor]. Its appearance and physique had returned to its living form. In fact, it had truly been born with the aura of life.

His strength was unfathomable, gazing at the Myriad Immortals Alliance, awaiting the arrival of his opponent.

And below the Saint Emperor's throne, Yi Jue Daoist of the Du'er Sect had brought out all the paper figures of his entire sect.

The paper figures recreated the mountain gate of the Du'er Sect from that year on the spot.

In the center of the buildings, a passage leading to an unknown destination seemed to have opened.

Although Yi Jue Daoist himself did not enter, his eyes, protruding infinitely outwards, stretched deep into the passage.

"Saint Emperor, please rest assured. If anything happens in the Xuanhuang Realm, this old Daoist will definitely see it," Yi Jue Daoist said with a chuckle.

Li Ping did not respond to Yi Jue.

In fact, most of his gaze and attention were focused on the starry sky outside the Xuanhuang Realm.

There, he had made thorough preparations.

Waiting for the Heavenly Physician and the Law Transmitter to descend.

In the Luo Yan Prefecture, when the Luo Yan Celestial City was breached, most of the Sacred Dynasty soldiers had already transferred to other battlefields.

Only a small number were left to guard.

However, from the wilderness outside Luo Yan Prefecture, a large group of cultivators suddenly emerged.

They did not try to recapture Luo Yan Celestial City, but after a surprise attack, they quickly withdrew.

Chapter 1293: Needle Point Against Awn

"They all got away? What were you all eating!"

"These cultivators are too fast! Their movements are uniform and well-trained; they don't seem like scattered remnants."

"It's not their speed, they just disappeared into thin air right in front of us!"

An image spread through the Sacred Dynasty's Star Network.

The Sacred Dynasty soldiers were about to catch the attackers, but at the critical moment, they turned into nothingness and dissipated into the air.

The Sacred Dynasty soldiers thought they had teleported away and wanted to continue the pursuit, but found no trace of spatial fluctuations.

"Requesting support. Currently, the number of soldiers in Luoyan Prefecture is at its limit just to hold the Heavenly City. We are unable to pursue and eliminate the remaining forces of the Immortal Alliance within the territory."

"We in Shilin Prefecture have already completely cleared out the resistance. We can rush over!"

"We're almost there too! Brothers, hold on!"

...

Sun Erlang looked at the various communications within the eastern battlefield, considering whether to dispatch more troops to encircle and suppress Luoyan Prefecture.

Suddenly, like a lightning bolt flashing in his mind, Sun Erlang's heart skipped a beat.

Then, a wave of doubt washed over him.

He suddenly remembered something his Master had said before.

"No, no. Luoyan Prefecture, Luoyan Prefecture should have been destroyed once already. Although the Myriad Immortals Alliance rebuilt it later, there couldn't possibly be so many cultivators defending it…"

"How could I have forgotten something so important?"

A sharp gleam flashed in Sun Erlang's eyes. He had already sensed something was amiss and immediately issued an order to all Sacred Dynasty soldiers: "Halt all support to Luoyan Prefecture for now. I will personally send someone to resolve it."

"The Thirty-Sixth Legion, responsible for guarding Luoyan Prefecture, should also withdraw as soon as possible."

Military orders are like mountains.

No one questioned, they simply executed the command quickly.

"I am Lan Xiangwen, the commander of the Thirty-Sixth Legion of the First Army. I have led my troops to complete the withdrawal. According to the order, we are retreating to Lueying Prefecture."

"But... I didn't see any of our people here."

"Lan Xiangwen, what nonsense are you talking about? We've been waiting for you at the agreed location, and we haven't seen a single hair of you! Where exactly are you!"

"No, Lan Xiangwen, your location shows you are still within Luoyan Prefecture! What is your Thirty-Sixth Legion doing?!"

...

Within the communications of the eastern battlefield, a hint of chaos began to appear.

Wang Xuanba, the overall commander of the eastern battlefield, decisively isolated the communications of these people and then began to question them in detail.

At this time, Sun Erlang's voice also came through.

"Xuanba, this place is strange. According to my confirmation, after all the soldiers of the Thirty-Sixth Legion entered Luoyan Prefecture, their positions have never changed. It's as if they've fallen into a deep sleep."

"Therefore, do not believe any information they report. It is likely an illusion from their dreams."

Wang Xuanba was slightly surprised: "I have already sent a beast body puppet to infiltrate it and couldn't find them. But I never expected it to be an illusion?"

"Indeed, we previously broke through the newly built Luoyan Heavenly City. The first batch of soldiers transferred did indeed move out of Luoyan Prefecture. It should be some method employed by the Immortal Alliance later. Perhaps it's not even the Myriad Immortals Alliance..." Sun Erlang voiced his conclusion.

"My puppet body has already entered Luoyan Prefecture..."

In front of Sun Erlang, the scene of Luoyan Prefecture appeared.

Wang Xuanba's beast body, located through the Star Sea's sensing, was nowhere to be seen.

There was not even any sign of battle in the entire Luoyan Prefecture.

Calm and peaceful.

"Even the puppet body can be dragged into an illusion?" Sun Erlang's heart grew slightly heavy.

"Alas, what is fake will always remain fake!"

The puppet, with its black and gold patterns, extended its arm.

Energy surged within the puppet's body, and a long bow made of pure golden energy instantly appeared at its fingers.

The bowstring was drawn like a crescent moon, and a silver arrow appeared with it.

Hum!

After a brief charge, the silver light shot out like a dragon, piercing the sky.

The immense energy shattered the surrounding space, about to reveal the reality beneath its illusory exterior.

At this critical moment, a somewhat pale hand stretched out from the void without warning.

It gently grasped the Sky-Patrolling Arrow.

No matter how the silver light of the arrow erupted, it was firmly held and could not move.

Finally, the light completely dissipated, turning into an ordinary arrow in that hand.

The space previously pierced by the Sky-Patrolling Arrow also restored itself.

That pale arm that stopped the Sky-Patrolling Arrow, without being controlled by Sun Erlang's puppet, gradually dimmed and vanished.

Sun Erlang let out a cold snort.

Mysterious golden energy surged from the puppet's body.

"Pfft!"

A pair of arms emerged from behind the puppet.

Following that, another pair grew from the left side of its torso.

Only after a total of eight pairs, sixteen arms, grew did the puppet's movements finally stop.

Because of the added structures, the puppet's overall size nearly doubled.

The golden patterns on its surface seemed to come alive, constantly flowing.

Boom!

Like thunder striking the earth, eight long bows appeared sequentially in the puppet's hands.

The bowstrings were pulled taut, and eight Sky-Patrolling Arrows pointed in different directions, ready to be unleashed.

"Break!"

Sun Erlang roared.

Eight silver dragons roared and charged outwards from the central puppet.

Gold and silver vied for brilliance, even briefly obscuring the moonlight projected by the Great Qi in the sky.

It was as if only this brute force creation existed between heaven and earth.

Where the eight Sky-Patrolling Arrows passed, the space shattered like a broken mirror, layer by layer.

But strangely, the fragments did not fly outwards.

Instead, they froze in the air.

The silver dragons continued to speed forward, completely crushing everything in their path.

But the places they had destroyed seemed to be frozen in time.

The reality outside the illusion was thus not truly revealed.

Sun Erlang's pupils contracted sharply as the pale arm reappeared once more.

This time, it did not stop the eight Sky-Patrolling Arrows.

Instead, it leisurely yet rapidly picked up the frozen fragments of the illusion, one by one, and then placed them back.

If this pale arm were allowed to continue restoring the spacetime, the formidable eight-arrow dance, capable of heavily injuring eight Harmonious Dao cultivators, would likely be like punching cotton, having no effect whatsoever.

Sun Erlang would naturally not let his opponent succeed.

"Even if it's just a puppet body, yet it refuses to show its face from beginning to end..."

"Are you looking down on me too much!"

The puppet's eight pairs of arms moved across its body.

They wriggled and fused, instantly becoming a pair of incredibly thick arms, almost the size of the puppet's main body.

The golden patterns on the puppet's body seemed to come alive and flowed unstoppably. The puppet instantly flashed forward and grabbed the pale arm with immense force.

Crunch, crunch...

This seemingly slender arm, however, contained unimaginable power.

Not only did it not impede its movement, but the giant puppet's arm was instead dragged along by the opponent, continuing its original trajectory.
