However, the profound principles of the Great Dao he was explaining did not stop.

His speaking speed, however, involuntarily quickened slightly.

Amidst the anomalies of Xuanhuang's heavens and earth, some Immortal Alliance cultivators had already guessed what was happening.

Their faces turned pale, cold sweat beaded on their foreheads, and they could no longer focus on the Saint Emperor's sermon. Their bodies trembled uncontrollably from fear.

While other cultivators' eyes flickered, they gathered to listen to the Saint Emperor's teachings, inwardly praying that the Dharma Transmitter would return a little later.

"Transience of ancient and modern, principles of the Great Dao."

"The method of transmitting the Dao cannot be tolerated by Xuanhuang."

"I have attained the Dao today and will attempt to change it..."

Finally, the Saint Emperor's sermon approached its end.

The Saint Emperor's gaze completely shifted from the masses below to the figure outside the Xuanhuang Realm in the starry sea.

He nodded slightly and suddenly vanished into the horizon.

Without the Saint Emperor's protection, various anomalies descended upon Xuanhuang's heavens and earth.

Rolling dark clouds inexplicably formed, continuously shrouding the bright moon transformed by the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty.

On the ground, birds and beasts that had ventured out to listen to the Saint Emperor's sermon, as if startled, fled in disarray, rushing back to their nests for refuge.

Even the plants and trees, in the increasingly violent winds, began to wither and shatter.

Boom!

Thunderclaps erupted from the dark clouds.

Then, torrential rain pounded the ground.

With winds, rain, and thunder, the entire Xuanhuang Realm instantly transformed into a doomsday-like scene.

Although the Dharma Transmitter himself had not yet arrived, all living beings in the Xuanhuang Realm trembled under his shadow.

Those Immortal Alliance cultivators whose hearts had wavered from listening to the Saint Emperor's sermon suddenly felt as if a basin of cold water had been poured on their heads, dispelling their fervent emotions and bringing them back to their senses.

"What am I thinking! That is the Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate! The Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate who has suppressed the Xuanhuang Realm with one hand for thousands of years! How could I possibly fantasize that the Saint... No, that these bandits would win?"

"The Saint Emperor... Although the Saint Emperor is powerful, he will never be a match for the Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate. Damn it, I must quickly forget this new method too."

"Heavenly Venerate above, please forgive my momentary bewitchment..."

"When the Heavenly Venerate takes action, everything will be alright!"

The Immortal Alliance cultivators, intimidated by the Dharma Transmitter's might, trembled in fear.

Meanwhile, the Sacred Dynasty soldiers, due to the vast difference in their innate realms, also experienced a moment of terror.

But soon, their eyes regained their determination.

Some of them recalled what the Saint Emperor had told them before this expedition.

So, someone shouted towards the sky, "The Sacred Dynasty will surely win, the Saint Emperor will surely win!"

Initially, it was just scattered shouts.

But soon, it spread like wildfire. Without any intentional command, all the Sacred Dynasty soldiers, as if connected by their hearts, roared in unison.

Their voices grew louder and louder, escalating from shouts to roars, and from roars to furious cries.

The sound of the Great Qi soldiers, like rolling waves, surged across the entire Xuanhuang Realm with the force of overturning mountains and seas.

As if responding to their calls, the bright moon in the sky erupted with purple-gold light.

It emerged from the boundless dark clouds once more.

Xuanhuang's swaying winds and rain actually showed signs of slowly subsiding amidst the thunderous roars.

Hearing the distant sounds, the Dharma Transmitter Ren sneered, "A dying struggle."

As if in response to his words, in the central four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance, teleportation gates appeared one after another.

Vast arrays of flying ships flew out from them, instantly filling the skies of the four prefectures.

At the bows of these flying ships stood Dharma Transmitters.

The Dharma Transmitters gazed up at the sky and bowed slightly towards the Dharma Transmitter Heavenly Venerate outside the starry sea.

Lu Xichan secretly observed this scene, inwardly amazed: "These should be the forces from the small worlds of the various Dharma Transmitters. Since Heavenly Venerate has already appeared, they naturally won't hide behind the scenes anymore."

"Judging by the auras emanating from those flying ships, there are no lack of Harmonious Dao cultivators among them."

"The hidden strength of the Immortal Alliance is far greater than I imagined..."

As Lu Xichan pondered, a mocking voice suddenly came from the sky: "You're deploying the Dissolution Discs, along with nineteen secondary Heavenly Profound bodies, and after all this time, you still haven't broken a mere containment formation."

"Your Formation Strategy Hall is truly getting worse with each generation. If Lu Xia knew, she would probably be angered back to life."

Upon hearing her master's name and the ridicule directed at her, Lu Xichan felt a surge of anger. However, she recognized that the speaker was Dou, one of the Dharma Transmitters, so despite her anger, she did not show it at all. She merely lowered her head and said, "Your subordinate is incompetent."

"Forget it, have your people step aside." With a casual remark from Dharma Transmitter Dou, a troop of young boys and girls nonchalantly floated down from the flying ships in the sky.

They first bowed slightly to the Mirror Wielders guarding the Dissolution Discs. After receiving the formation data analyzed by the Dissolution Discs so far, they began to break the formation.

There were thirty-six such young disciples.

Their faces were devoid of any expression. There wasn't even the slightest emotional fluctuation in their eyes.

One of them extended his hand into the beam of light of the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation.

Then, his body instantly became illusory.

From his hand to his body, he gradually became like the starlight of the formation.

As the Dao child testing the formation was about to be completely engulfed by the starlight, his figure suddenly disappeared and transformed into a stream of light, flying to another Dao child.

This second Dao child also touched it with his hand and then tested the formation with his body.

This process repeated.

Until the thirty-sixth Dao child, just as he was about to transform into starlight,

His body trembled, shaking out all thirty predecessors. He himself returned to his normal appearance.

The thirty-six Dao children huddled together, whispering and chattering amongst themselves.

Then, as if reaching a consensus, they all nodded.

They split into two groups. One group began to break the formation, while the other group repeated the process of testing the formation with their bodies.

The Immortal Alliance formation masters observing from the side immediately sensed that these children were extraordinary.

Judging by their speed of breaking the formation, the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation would absolutely be torn open within half a day at most.

As the chief of the Formation Strategy Hall, Lu Xichan's shock far surpassed that of ordinary people.

She looked at these thirty-six formation-breaking children, and in her mind, she recalled four words: "Formation Spirit Sacred Body."

This was an extremely special physique, as if their bodies were naturally formed by formations. Not only did they have a natural sensitivity and affinity for various formations, but they could also merge with the formation, greatly increasing its strength.

Like artifact spirits to magical treasures, they could transform into formation spirits, causing formations to sublimate and transform.

The Formation Spirit Sacred Body was a rare sight, appearing only once in a hundred years.

Lu Xichan's master, Lu Xia, had wished to find cultivators with this physique before his death to inherit his mantle. Unfortunately, he couldn't fulfill his wish until his death and had no choice but to pass on all his lifelong learning to Lu Xichan.

She never expected that more than thirty of them would appear today!

Lu Xichan looked up at the sky again, at the figures standing on the densely packed flying ships above.

She felt a slight chill in her heart: "How many secrets are these Dharma Transmitters hiding?"

Dharma Transmitter Ren, after understanding the progress of breaking the formation, couldn't help but flash a murderous intent in his eyes.

The Myriad Immortals Alliance had been put in such a plight this time, and Heavenly Venerate would surely not let him off the hook.

Since that was the case, before receiving punishment, he would take out his anger on these troublemakers.

With a wave of his hand, the group of black-robed cultivators who had been concentrating their attacks and were forced to stop due to the Saint Emperor's sermon, began to act again.

Several more cultivators dressed in green Daoist robes, holding whisks and talismans, descended silently from the flying ships.

With the flick of their whisks and talismans, they molded the accumulated power within the light sphere into ferocious-looking divine-like figures radiating killing intent.

These energy deities descended upon the world, and the might they exuded made Lu Xichan, a Harmonious Dao cultivator, feel genuine fear.

The Myriad Immortals Alliance's counterattack was poised to strike.

Outside the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation, the Sacred Dynasty soldiers were also prepared for a head-on collision with the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

Sun Erlang, the overall commander of the eastern battlefield, was methodically issuing orders through the Saint Emperor's Star Network.

"Those below the Nascent Soul stage are to remain in their positions and not move rashly. Continue to supervise the construction progress of the suppression formation. Remember, completing the formation on time is a great merit!"

"For cultivators at the Nascent Soul stage and above, I will make the following deployment adjustments."

The brighter stars in the sea of stars rapidly dispersed and regrouped under the command of Sun Erlang.

"Do not engage the Myriad Immortals Alliance head-on. Extend the battle line to every corner of the Myriad Immortals Alliance."

"We do not need to attack the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters. What we need is to wait for the Saint Emperor to return victorious from the Star Sea!"

Sun Erlang said with great determination.

The Great Qi soldiers responded with a roar.

After everyone's emotions were stirred up, Sun Erlang observed the scene within the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation and made final adjustments to the appointments of the officers.

Meanwhile, his mind, which still had spare capacity, connected with the silently standing dark gold Sacred Punishment Puppet.

"Finally, I can stretch my limbs."

Under Sun Erlang's calm gaze, an extremely fervent fighting spirit surged forth.

Three hours later.

After seven days of tightly sealing the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance, the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation was finally torn open by a small gap.

In an instant, powerful attacks filled with the wrath of the Immortal Alliance cultivators poured out from this gap.

Condensed magical techniques, manifested divine spirits with angry eyes, and countless magical treasures' lights...

They shone brilliantly, Erupting outwards.

The terrifying energy, capable of easily leveling several prefectures of the Immortal Alliance, was eagerly seeking targets.

However, what awaited the Myriad Immortals Alliance's accumulated counterattack was merely an ordinary dark gate.

As the dark gate opened, all the ferocious attacks were swallowed by it.

Like a colossal beast of the abyss opening its bloody maw.

Not a single ripple of energy was left for the Myriad Immortals Alliance.

After swallowing all the accumulated explosive energy, the dark gate disappeared as silently as it had appeared.

It left the Myriad Immortals Alliance people in a state of stunned bewilderment.

"Sea of Darkness?" Dharma Transmitter Ren's expression changed slightly. He sensed a familiar aura from this gate.

And as he had predicted, this "colossal" energy swallowed by the Sea of Darkness only formed another accumulation cloud in the depths of the Sea of Darkness. Aside from that, no other ripples were made.

"It seems the anomalies in the Sea of Darkness a while ago were also related to these scoundrels."

Old grudges compounded with new ones, Dharma Transmitter Ren's heart was filled with extreme rage.

The thirty-six Dao children continued to break the formation, aiming to completely tear open the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation.

The cultivators under the command of other Dharma Transmitters also poured out from the gap in the great formation, intending to clear out and annihilate the bandits in each prefecture.

However, Dharma Transmitter Ren's plan encountered setbacks in the very first prefecture.

The entire prefecture was empty.

It seemed the bandits had completely withdrawn, and even the Heavenly City's interior had been ransacked.

Not a single person was left behind.

"They ran away?" Dharma Transmitter Ren was somewhat surprised and uncertain.

While the Immortal Alliance cultivators were looking around in confusion, flashes of light appeared from various corners of the prefecture,

Suddenly striking towards them at high speed.

The silver light seemed to have received special augmentation, its speed several times faster than when they had teleported away.

They arrived in an instant.

"What is this..."

"Sky Patrol Arrows?!"

Some Dharma Transmitters recognized the objects presented before them.

Their expressions changed drastically.

In the next moment...

Boom! Boom! Boom!

Continuous, violent explosions echoed through the sky.

...

And at this moment, outside the Xuanhuang Realm, in the Utmost Darkness Star Sea.

The figure rapidly returning to the Xuanhuang Realm also suffered almost the same fate.

However, what was detonated in the Star Sea was not merely Sky Patrol Arrows.

Instead, it was the residual True Immortal power scattered throughout the Star Sea.

Saint Emperor Li Ping was not an obstinate person who insisted on a head-on confrontation with the Dharma Transmitter.

What he wanted was simply victory.

Using the "great wind" stirred up by the resurgence of the Star Sea, Li Ping utilized the power of the Star Sea's resurgence to alter the positions of the residual True Immortal powers.

Then, he used formations to conceal them, creating traps in a certain sense.

This road back was one the Dharma Transmitter had traveled countless times.

He was intimately familiar with it.

But he never expected to encounter an ambush this time.

Like wind and waves rising, the figure became indistinct and distorted under the influence of the various True Immortal residues.

It appeared somewhat disheveled.

The Saint Emperor watched the opponent from afar. The figure's appearance was identical to the tall stone statues erected throughout Xuanhuang.

Undoubtedly showcasing the opponent's identity.

High crown and long beard.

The Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate.

However, this figure, even when attacked, maintained the same expressionless face as the stone statues on the ground.

The Saint Emperor did not wait for the opponent to recover from the surprise attack.

The Sacred Dynasty's projection behind him, accompanied by swirling starlight, instantly appeared.

"Destiny is with me..."

"The ultimate Dao is with me..."

"The future is with me!"

The Sacred Dynasty's accumulated destiny and luck were instantly bestowed upon him.

The devout prayers of countless Da Qi citizens, soldiers, and the surviving You Clan, pierced through space and time, sounding like profound celestial music around the Saint Emperor.

In the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, a fierce wind stirred around the Saint Emperor.

Darkness receded, and starlight gradually brightened.

At this moment, the Saint Emperor seemed to have become the center of the entire Utmost Darkness Star Sea.

Infinite star domains, endless void, countless stars.

All revolved around the Saint Emperor at this moment.

All living beings in the Xuanhuang Realm felt a sense of connection.

They involuntarily looked up at the sky, beyond the overcast heavens.

Brilliant silver swirling starlight illuminated the world, like nighttime.

And amidst the swirling stars, the majestic and solemn figure of the Saint Emperor could be seen.

His starlit imperial robe danced with the galaxy.

Shining brightly, dazzling endlessly!

"Dao annihilation..."

"Dao creation!"

The Saint Emperor's figure, accompanied by calm and grand Daoistic pronouncements, vanished into the swirling starlight.

Brilliant silver light instantly unfurled.

Like a Milky Way, it descended from the nine heavens.

It charged straight towards the high-crowned old man who had yet to stabilize his form!

The Dharma Transmitter's eternally unchanging face finally showed a ripple of emotion.

In the boundless starlight, he seemed to behold the prosperous era of immortal cultivation in the Primordial Immortal Realm, and this Star Sea.

He also seemed to see the gradual emergence of discordant phenomena in the Star Sea as prosperity declined.

He also seemed to see, as the immortal path collapsed, all sorts of terrifying calamities silently descending upon the Star Sea, and one flourishing immortal cultivation realm after another perishing amidst the tribulation.

The Dharma Transmitter's gaze fluctuated. Before his eyes, the brilliant Star Sea was beginning to dim.

Starlight entered his eyes, his body, his soul.

The Dharma Transmitter's high crown and robes began to decay.

The Dharma Transmitter's beard and hair began to fall out.

The Dharma Transmitter's tall and majestic figure became hunched.

Those residual True Immortal powers that had not yet fully detached continued to entangle him.

The Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate appeared precarious.

"Cough, cough..."

"What a move, [Dao Annihilation, Dao Creation]."

Amidst the whistling wind of the Star Sea, the Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate finally spoke.

His voice, unlike the benevolent tone of his teachings remembered by the beings of Xuanhuang,

Seemed to be due to the heavy blow, rendering him powerless and extremely weak, like a dying mortal.

The Saint Emperor did not respond.

He did not even show his figure.

The impact and erosion of the river of starlight were nearing their end.

However, the Saint Emperor's move had not yet finished.

What had just happened to the Dharma Transmitter was merely [Dao Annihilation].

And next...

Was [Dao Creation]!

Dark black hair emerged from the Dharma Transmitter's head and grew rapidly in the wind.

With muffled thuds, sounds of flesh and bone bulging outwards could be heard from various parts of the Dharma Transmitter's body.

Thump! Thump! Thump!

Intense heartbeats accompanied the reviving wind of the Star Sea.

With every heartbeat, a piece of flesh burst from the Dharma Transmitter's body.

The new Dao is born, the old law must be executed.

The Dharma Transmitter, an ancient being incompatible with the resurgence of the Star Sea, was undergoing intense Dao devouring.

The heartbeats grew faster and faster, the Dharma Transmitter's contorted body was already incomplete.

Even his bones had vanished beneath the flesh.

Like a broken puzzle piece, it drifted amidst the violent explosions.

His newly grown hair circled the Star Sea once before returning to its original place.

It fiercely strangled his neck.

Tightening and tightening, as if a sharp sword was determined to sever his head.

Bang!

The heartbeat reached its limit, and the Dharma Transmitter's chest exploded with a deafening sound.

There was no mist of blood, only pure, absolute void.

Not even energy remained, a complete sign of Dao annihilation!

The Dao annihilation spread from the void in his chest, creeping outwards.

His already broken body seemed on the verge of being completely devoured by the void.

The wind of the Star Sea grew more violent.

As if celebrating this victory.

However...

Just as the void of Dao annihilation was about to engulf the Dharma Transmitter's head.

The Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate, this mysterious and extremely powerful being who had suppressed the Xuanhuang Realm for several eras.

Specks of starlight suddenly lit up in his eyes.

Although the lower half of his head had already been devoured, there was still a voice that echoed in the Star Sea.

It was precisely the same words the Saint Emperor had shouted.

"Dao annihilation..."

Following the Dharma Transmitter's words, the Star Sea seemed to fall into silence and darkness once more.

The whistling wind gradually subsided.

The wildly growing hair slowly fell off.

The void that was devouring the Dharma Transmitter was also stopped by some power, its spread halted.

However, in just an instant, all the destructive phenomena on the Dharma Transmitter disappeared.

It was as if an invisible barrier existed around him, preventing any approaching power.

The wind still blew, and the starlight still shone.

But it could not harm him in the slightest.

Even though only the upper half of his head remained.

"Dao creation."

The Dharma Transmitter spoke again, his voice calm.

Black hair reappeared, and flesh and blood regenerated from the void, evolving.

His high crown and robes were all restored in the blink of an eye.

In just a moment, the previously heavily injured and near-death Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate had actually recovered completely!

What a terrifying sight this was!

"What a pity, just a little bit more." The Saint Emperor's sigh suddenly echoed.

A beam of starlight swept past, and Li Ping's figure reappeared.

He stared at the Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate, the regret in his eyes long gone, replaced by infinite fighting spirit and unwavering faith.

The Dharma Transmitter did not immediately counterattack but insteadsize-d the attacker who had tried to kill him without warning.

As if he had seen something extremely interesting, the Dharma Transmitter first paused.

Then he said, "When did this Star Sea gain another expert at the [Supreme] realm?"

With a hint of emotion and感慨, he said.

"Supreme..." The Saint Emperor savored the two words.

Then he shook his head slightly: "It's just the current limit of this Star Sea."

"Not the limit of this Star Sea."

"How can one speak of Supreme?"

The Dharma Transmitter did not refute.

Instead, he looked back towards the center of the distant Star Sea: "Fellow Daoist, do you know the saying 'when the tide rises, the boat floats'?"

"My Supreme, and your Supreme..."

"Are still somewhat different."

The Dharma Transmitter spoke plainly.

There was no boasting in his words, only the calmness of stating facts.

The Saint Emperor listened to the Dharma Transmitter's words and fell into contemplation.

He naturally understood the Dharma Transmitter's meaning.

The current combat power displayed by the Dharma Transmitter was limited by the maximum capacity of the Star Sea. However, the power the Dharma Transmitter could control was still above this limit.

But due to the current ceiling, it could not be revealed.

Once the Star Sea's limit was broken, his strength would continue to grow.

As for the Saint Emperor, although he had also reached the current limit of the Star Sea,

It was with the blessings of the Sacred Dynasty's destiny, the Star Sea's favor, and various other factors.

Once the Star Sea's limit was broken, he would still need some time to cultivate to catch up.

This was the gap between the Dharma Transmitter and himself.

"After all, he is a Dharma Transmitter who has lived for who knows how long." The Saint Emperor's heart held no surprise.

Nor was there any fear.

Even though his killing move was blocked, and there was a gap in their strength.

But...

The Saint Emperor's attack had only just begun.

Saint Emperor Li Ping reached out his hand forward, sensing the wind rising in the Star Sea.

This time, it was not the wind of the Star Sea's resurgence.

But the chaotic wind gradually rising from the conflict with the residual True Immortal powers!

The Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate also sensed the Saint Emperor's actions.

"Fellow Daoist, your previous move [Dao Annihilation, Dao Creation] was indeed extraordinary."

"It triggered my emotions and benefited me greatly."

"I also have a move. Please, fellow Daoist, sample it."

For the first time, the Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate attacked first.

"This technique is called..."

"Object in Hand."

As the three words "Object in Hand" echoed in the Saint Emperor's ears, a sense of unease surged in his heart.

Then, the scene before his eyes rapidly changed.

His body instantly began to shrink infinitely.

The surrounding scenery rapidly magnified.

The high-crowned old man, who was originally smaller than his three-zhang-three-cun body, rapidly grew.

The moment the Saint Emperor realized what was happening, the Dharma Transmitter had already become as colossal as the magnificent stone statues erected on the surface of Xuanhuang.

It was not just a change in size.

The Saint Emperor even felt that his connection with the Sacred Dynasty, with Xuanhuang, and even with the entire Star Sea was continuously weakening as he shrank.

The Saint Emperor had a vague premonition that if this continued, their connection might be completely severed.

And he would be eternally lost in this miniaturized scene.

As his thoughts raced, the Dharma Transmitter's attack had already arrived.

In the time it took to merely think, the Dharma Transmitter's full form could no longer be seen.

Only the Dharma Transmitter's palm, like a mountain, like the earth, like the heavens, pressed down from above.

The surrounding space was locked, and the Saint Emperor could not escape.

Looking up, even the patterns on the Dharma Transmitter's palm resembled continuous mountains.

Facing the Dharma Transmitter's colossal palm about to descend, the Saint Emperor's eyes held no trace of fear.

"Xuanhuang Realm..."

"Is it truly your possession?"

A cold glint flashed in the Saint Emperor's eyes.

"Let me show you the true power of Xuanhuang."

"Body Manifestation..."

"Xuanhuang Heaven!"

His body was completely engulfed by the Dharma Transmitter's colossal palm.

Then...

Infinite Xuanhuang light shone from beneath the colossal palm.

At this moment, the beings of the Xuanhuang Realm instantly felt the ground beneath their feet shaking violently.

The dark clouds in the sky were also scattered by this tremor.

What's more, many keen-eyed cultivators saw as if some lines were missing between heaven and earth.

With creaking sounds, as if celestial pillars were breaking.

The sky of the Xuanhuang Realm seemed to have fallen a little.

Chapter 1297: Holy Transmission United Against a Common Enemy

"Heavenly Dao Resonance… The Saint Emperor contemplated, sensing the surging energy within Tianyang’s remains. After a long silence, he let out a sigh. “The Dao can prove immortality, but it does not align with me.”

The Saint Emperor’s tone held little regret as he withdrew from Tianyang’s armor state. Returning the remains, Li Ping instructed Tianyang, “The Dao of Strife is empty, but this resonant relic is undoubtedly a rare treasure for you. Contemplate it further. Although immortal paths are not apparent now, the resonance exists, proving the Dao still endures.” “Perhaps, in time, you might truly achieve the True Immortal realm through this!”

Daoist Yijue of the Du’er Sect watched enviously as Tianyang put away the remains, then retreated back into the passage with his elongated eyeballs. “A pity, a pity…” Daoist Yijue lamented.

“What profound insights does the Sect Master of the Du’er Sect have?” Tianyang, however, was not provoked by the Du’er Sect’s taunts this time. Yijue shook his head, chuckling, “Merely lamenting that the Du’er Sect missed a rare opportunity. As the saying goes, ‘When one person achieves the Dao, their chickens and dogs ascend.’ If His Excellency the Saint Emperor contemplates this remnant knowledge, perhaps one day he will truly attain the Great Dao. We too might benefit.” “As for you…” “Perhaps there will be such a day. But our Du’er Sect will likely not live to see it.” His words unabanshly conveyed his pessimistic outlook on Tianyang’s potential to achieve immortality.

This time, however, Tianyang was not angered by the Du’er Sect’s provocation. He merely sensed the unyielding thoughts within his remains, reminiscent of his human form. But perhaps due to his current state as a puppet, after much effort, Tianyang still could not rekindle the fervor in his heart. “Tianyang’s life, never inferior to others.” The words, when spoken, felt different than before.

A moment of silence descended upon the Saint Emperor’s throne hall. However, it wasn’t long before the commotion from the Myriad Immortals Alliance below captured their attention. Beams of light flashed, and a group of grim-faced cultivators dressed in black appeared at the moonlight border of Tianquan Prefecture. They first bowed slightly to the Mirror Wielder in the sky, then, with solemn expressions, prepared their techniques and formations towards the still-unbroken Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation. It was as if they were about to launch a full-scale assault on the formation at any moment.

Indeed, various techniques were unleashed, but their expressions were as if time had been paused, frozen in mid-air. Purple lances like heavenly thunder, spatial rifts that writhed, and continuous yellow talismans… All were activated and then converged. Waiting for a gap to appear in the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation, they would erupt in unison. The black-clad cultivators of the Immortal Alliance took turns, transforming their internal power into techniques and condensing them.

After several hours, the black-clad cultivators rotated, and the accumulated techniques at the edge of the great formation reached a truly astonishing level. A flicker of solemnity crossed the Saint Emperor’s face. Undeniably, this suspended ball of light, if detonated on the surface of the Xuanhuang Realm, could easily turn several prefectures into ruins.

“I’ll go.” Tianyang was about to step forward to resolve this hidden danger when Li Ping stopped him. “Wait a little longer. I have a way to handle it,” Li Ping said in a deep voice. Tianyang nodded slightly, not daring to overexert himself.

Another half-day passed, and a total of over a thousand full-power attacks were channeled. The condensed mini light sphere was even more dazzling than the moon in the sky. Even the Mirror Wielder seemed to feel a hint of apprehension. An imprint on its forehead released a small bronze mirror, enveloping itself, nine Dissolution Discs, and other secondary phantom bodies. Within the Dissolution Discs, the light and shadow generated by analyzing the formation rapidly shifted, and feedback was finally received.

Occasionally, a strand of colored light escaped and floated towards Lu Xichan not far away. And as Lu Xichan comprehended the content of these strands, her body trembled, and she revealed an expression of entrancement. She then transmitted her insights to the formation masters present, which elicited waves of admiration. At this moment, looking at the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation before them, their eyes held no trace of despair. Led by Lu Xichan, the formation masters began to decipher the great formation. The moonlight, originally substantial and like a silver ribbon, began to become hazy under the influence of external forces.

The Saint Emperor sensed that these Immortal Alliance formation masters were like small insects, constantly gnawing at the foundation of the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation. Admittedly, Li Ping could fine-tune the great formation. And he was confident that the speed of decryption by the twenty-eight combined Dissolution Discs would absolutely not match his speed of changing formations. If the Immortal Alliance did not employ any special methods, he could eternally trap them with formations alone. But… his goal was never merely to trap them.

The arrangements made outside the Xuanhuang Realm informed him that the Star Sea was already in turmoil. The power of the Star Sea’s resurgence and the struggle with the residual immortal power were about to formally begin. The Saint Emperor, who had been seated throughout, slowly rose. In a single thought, his majestic figure was projected onto the Xuanhuang Celestial Curtain. As if cooperating, the Great Qi Sacred Dynasty, bright as the moon, suddenly dimmed slightly, yielding the stage to the Saint Emperor of Great Qi.

The moment Li Ping’s image appeared, the generals fighting in various prefectures of the Immortal Alliance felt their blood boil, their fighting spirit soaring. They shouted in unison, “All hail the Saint Emperor!” The deafening cheers echoed throughout the Xuanhuang Realm, unwavering. The captured and besieged cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance looked fearfully at the imposing figure that filled the entire sky, their minds involuntarily recalling legends of the Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate. “At this moment, where is the Heavenly Venerate?”

And those Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators still fighting a desperate battle, witnessing this figure that filled their vision, were all stunned into a daze. “In ancient times, the Dharma Transmitter attained enlightenment, transmitted it to all living beings, and established a glorious millennium of cultivation. However, the Dharma-Transmitting method goes against Heaven. Heaven and Earth nurture cultivators. Devouring Heaven and Earth is like patricide and matricide.” “It is not the righteous path.”

… The Saint Emperor’s voice echoed throughout the Xuanhuang Realm. Amplified by the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, it clearly reached the ears of every living being. Initially, the cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance did not react to what the Saint Emperor of Great Qi intended to do. But when they heard the phrase “not the righteous path,” their expressions drastically changed. The Mirror Wielder, who was overseeing the Dissolution Discs, had a grim expression. In the central four prefectures, lights flickered continuously; these were the high-ranking officials of the Immortal Alliance headquarters who had finally been provoked.

Slandering the Dharma Transmitter was equivalent to slandering the entire Myriad Immortals Alliance. It shook the legitimacy and foundation of the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s rule. For the high-ranking officials of the Immortal Alliance, the consequences of this matter were even more severe than the loss of all their territories. After all, territories could be regained, but once the hearts of the people were lost… “Break the formation! Break the formation immediately!” Lu Xichan heard the furious roar of Transmitter Ren in her ear. The Immortal Alliance formation masters were silent as cicadas in winter, desperately trying to break the formation. However, while breaking the formation, they could not help but secretly listen to the voice from the heavens above.

Accompanied by various divine and auspicious phenomena appearing in the sky, the Saint Emperor’s words drifted to every corner of the Xuanhuang Realm. “I also possess a method, not relying on the power of Heaven and Earth, to tread the immortal path.” “It is, to establish my foundation, to achieve Primordial Golden Core, to form Nascent Soul, to transform Divine Essence…” “Star Sea Convergence of Dao…” “Resonating Dao for Longevity!” The Saint Emperor’s words struck the Xuanhuang Realm like a thunderclap, echoing between Heaven and Earth.

It had already captured the attention of all cultivators. After all, judging solely by its name, the Saint Emperor’s method seemed much superior to the Dharma Transmission method. Furthermore, with auspicious clouds and golden light filling the world, showing signs of good fortune, the cultivators were left in a state of reverie. The last time a supreme being preached the Dao in the Xuanhuang Realm was thousands of years ago, during the era of the Dharma-Transmitting Immortal Venerate. After the Dharma Transmission method was verified by the world, the Dharma-Transmitting Immortal Venerate, who was at the Dao Integration stage at the time, also became the Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate of the Longevity stage. If this new method proved effective, would it not mean that the Xuanhuang Realm would have another peerless expert capable of rivaling the Dharma Transmitter?

Surrendering to a bandit of unknown origin might lead to retribution from the Myriad Immortals Alliance later. But if they joined the Saint Emperor… A strange atmosphere began to circulate among the Immortal Alliance cultivators. The Saint Emperor’s sermon continued. “The path to immortality, the first step, is to establish my foundation.” “Utilizing the wonders of Heaven and Earth, one can build a foundation. Why? Because the wonders of the world are the embodiment of laws.” “However, the greatest wonder in the world is not an object, but spirit.” “To establish my foundation, one must lay down the principles of all things in the world!”

… The seemingly profound method of establishing one’s foundation, when explained by the Saint Emperor, became simple and easy to understand. At this moment, even mortals in the Xuanhuang Realm who had not yet embarked on the path of cultivation could vaguely grasp the general idea. Not to mention those Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators who had already walked the path of Dharma Transmission. The Saint Emperor’s new method was actually built upon the foundation of the Dharma Transmission method, but broke through its shackles and underwent a transformation.

The Immortal Alliance cultivators who practiced the Dharma Transmission method naturally felt an immense sense of familiarity. Even just by listening, thoughts of “So that’s how it is,” “It’s indeed feasible,” and “Marvelous” arose in their hearts, expressing their approval. Some cultivators who were at the peak of Qi Refining and were struggling to break through to the Foundation Establishment stage, lamenting the lack of Foundation Establishment wonders, suddenly had an epiphany. It was as if they had been enlightened by divine revelation. “Why bother going through all the trouble to find wonders? The Saint Emperor is right, I am the wonder myself!” “Foundation Establishment! Foundation Establishment!” They immediately entered seclusion to comprehend the method.

While the method of establishing one’s foundation was not easy to cultivate in practice, the number of Qi Refining stage cultivators in the vast Xuanhuang Realm was the largest. With such a massive base, even with a small probability, the final result would still be tens of thousands! The Saint Emperor had only reached the middle chapter of Primordial Golden Core in his sermon, and new cultivators practicing the Foundation Establishment method had already begun to emerge throughout the Xuanhuang Realm! Unlike the breakthrough treatment of those practicing the Dharma Transmission method, after the new method cultivators broke through, the spiritual energy of Heaven and Earth seemed to surge towards them spontaneously, as if they were the fated protagonists in legends, favored by the Heavenly Dao. Some even had auspicious clouds and golden light descending upon them during their breakthroughs, accompanied by celestial treasures, as if gifts from Heaven.

The stark difference in Heaven and Earth’s attitude made it impossible for other cultivators not to feel envious. Cultivators at the Golden Core stage or above might have some reservations. However, for those at the Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment stages, abandoning their old cultivation and restarting carried no burden. After all, even if this Saint Emperor’s new method proved unworkable, as long as the Foundation Establishment wonders remained, they could always try again. After abandoning their cultivation, they could temporarily store the wonders and focus on practicing the Foundation Establishment method. The number of Qi Refining and Foundation Establishment cultivators in the Xuanhuang Realm far exceeded the sum of all other realms.

Even if only one out of ten chose the Saint Emperor’s new method, it would be a devastating blow to the Dharma-Transmitting Heavenly Venerate and the Myriad Immortals Alliance. Apart from Transmitter Ren, other Dharma Transmitters could no longer sit idly by. Because the Immortal Alliance headquarters had already proven the feasibility of the Foundation Establishment method through experimentation. If they allowed the Saint Emperor to continue preaching… The high-ranking officials of the Myriad Immortals Alliance could not help but shudder.

Deep within the Immortal Alliance’s Nether Prison. In the deepest part of the spatial confinement holding thousands of heinous criminals. A figure that seemed to be nothing but bones, with limbs spread wide in a cruciform shape, was nailed to the void. Upon closer inspection, every bone in the figure seemed to be perpetually burned by flames, struck by lightning, and gnawed by strange insects… The suffering was indescribable, yet the figure seemed accustomed to it, its face peaceful. Or rather, on its skeletal face, no expression could be seen anymore.

At this moment, the endless suffering of its physical form caused the figure to slightly lift its head. Its eyes, completely black, pierced through the layers of the Nether Prison’s space and gazed towards the Xuanhuang Realm’s firmament. “Establish my foundation…” “Establish my foundation…” A wisp of black flame, like a black serpent, emerged from the void and flew directly towards it, instantly piercing its chest. The black flame passed through its heart, yet some of it lingered at the wound, burning the figure’s remaining flesh and bones… and even its residual soul. Even with the figure’s immense endurance, it could not help but let out a muffled groan.

“Establish my foundation, establish my foundation…” He continued to murmur, and tiny specks of starlight began to flicker within his black eye sockets. For a long time, besides suffering, no other sensation had appeared in his heart. But now, he dimly saw a glimmer of hope. A glimmer of hope for escape. How long had he been imprisoned? In the pitch-black Nether Prison, he had almost forgotten the concept of time. But judging by the injuries to his body, it must have been a full five hundred years. After being captured and imprisoned here, he had given up all hope of escape. After all, all his abilities had been drained by the Myriad Immortals Alliance. Even if he were to escape from here by some miracle, it would be difficult to find his way back under the pursuit of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. But now, perhaps through this voice reaching the depths of the Nether Prison, he might truly escape this place.

“Every bit of pain is built upon my body.” “It is 【I】 who feels it.” “The source of the pain is 【I】.” “I establish my foundation…” Specks of golden light began to flicker as the figure spoke. These golden lights seemed to emanate from the figure’s remaining bones. Hidden all along, they were only ignited now in this desperate gamble. With creaking sounds, the golden light, like flames, baked the bones. The bones dissolved like candles, but after condensing, they formed a smaller body that had regained its normal shape.

The surrounding restrictions sensed the figure’s movement and constantly triggered chastisements, bombarding the figure. But the figure had long grown accustomed to it, even absorbing these punitive measures to condense the energy for its new body. Under the illumination of the golden light, the figure grew smaller and smaller. Eventually, it was only the size of an adult’s palm. Emerging from the original skeleton, “Establishing my foundation has actually returned me to my initial state of cultivation.” “It truly is an ultimate and profound method!” “Even if I was delayed in the High Walls for over five hundred years, it would still be worthwhile if I could bring this method back.” The tiny figure transformed into a beam of golden light and flew directly out from the deepest part of the Nether Prison. Ignoring all restrictions along the way. Even the jailers of the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s Nether Prison did not notice this escaping golden light. The golden light figure arrived on the ground, gazing at the Saint Emperor’s projection in the sky. “In desperate circumstances, true talents emerge. In five hundred years, another such figure has appeared in the world…” “Primordial Golden Core.” The tiny golden figure listened intently for a long time, its brow furrowed. “It’s a bit strange. Could it be that I’ve been imprisoned for too long and have become foolish?” “Regardless, I’ll record it first. Once I get out, there will be plenty of people to study it.”

… The Great Qi Saint Emperor was naturally unaware that he had gained another listener from outside the High Walls. At this moment, his sermon was nearing its end, reaching the final stage of “Resonating Dao for Longevity.” “Beyond the Xuanhuang, above the Star Sea, lies the great Dao of proving immortality.” “True Immortals fall, the Dao is empty.” “Reversing the Dao’s shadow, the true meaning of resonating Dao, can glimpse the realm of longevity…” The Saint Emperor preached solemnly. Even the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao itself seemed to comprehend these profound and esoteric words.

All the winds in the world stood still. The vast Xuanhuang Realm, apart from the voice of the Great Qi’s sermon, was utterly silent. Even the Myriad Immortals Alliance cultivators, who had been eagerly trying to break the Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation, were now all stunned, listening to the Saint Emperor’s words in a daze. The higher their realm and strength, the greater the shock they felt.

At the Myriad Immortals Alliance Headquarters. Xu Ke and Yin Shangren, while pretending to visit and wander, suddenly sensed that the Museum of Divine Treasures seemed to have brightened slightly. The heavy feeling that had been suppressed in their hearts also suddenly disappeared. “Grandfather Sansheng has left,” Xu Ke immediately judged. “Shall we act now?” Yin Shangren was eager to try. “Let’s wait. Let’s wait for the Saint Emperor’s side…” “The breakthroughs of the Beast Taming Sect in recent years have even surprised me. They chose to go into seclusion at the time of the great calamity, preserving a large amount of talent. It was indeed useful,” Xu Ke said. “Okay, we can wait. It’s just a matter of time. By the way, let me show you this…” Yin Shangren pulled Xu Ke towards an exhibit.

Xu Ke looked closely and saw a golden tree with a peculiar shape. The leaves of the tree were all triangular, and the trunk was carved with small figures interacting in various poses. “This item isn’t an ancient artifact of the Xuanhuang Realm, is it?” Xu Ke said with a strange expression after observing it for a while. “Of course not. It comes from my hometown.” “Or rather, the part of my hometown where the residual consciousness is most complete,” Yin Shangren said leisurely. “I originally thought that place was completely gone, but I didn’t expect that the most important golden tree would be preserved in this Museum of Divine Treasures.” “This tree… is there anything special about it?” Xu Ke knew that Yin Shangren would not be sighing about past events for no reason, so he immediately asked, his heart stirred. Yin Shangren chuckled: “In my world, there is no sun or moon. The light of the entire world depends on this golden tree. Even the origin of all life originates from under this tree. You saw the carvings on the tree; they are the imprints of human interactions over the ages under the tree.” “Although the world was destroyed, as long as this tree exists, the power of the world’s origin is almost one-third preserved.” Xu Ke began to understand and then said with some surprise: “Do you have a way to detonate the energy within this tree?” Yin Shangren touched his scalp and smiled without replying. “Are you willing? That’s your hometown! If this tree is well-preserved, after the Saint Emperor conquers the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters, perhaps he can help recreate that world,” Xu Ke said. Yin Shangren snorted coldly: “Everyone is dead, what’s the point of recreating the world? Do you expect me to act as their stand-in and perform a solo play?” “Just detonate it.” Xu Ke responded with a smile.

As the two were talking, they suddenly felt the ground beneath their feet tremble slightly. They looked at each other and simultaneously looked up towards the outside of the Museum of Divine Treasures. Although their vision could not penetrate, they could vaguely feel that a major change had occurred in the Xuanhuang Realm. Their senses were not wrong. At this moment, a wondrous scene was unfolding in the sky of the Xuanhuang Realm. The originally bright sky suddenly dimmed as if night had fallen. The sun in the sky disappeared. Points of starlight lit up from various places in the sky. Amidst the shining stars, a bright moon rose. However, the Xuanhuang cultivators soon discovered that this “moon” was even brighter than the original sun. As the giant jade plate slowly approached, the Xuanhuang Realm was illuminated once more. The cultivators looked up at the sky and saw that within the bright moon, magnificent pagodas were erected. It was clearly another world!

After a brief moment of mental blankness, countless thoughts flooded the minds of the Xuanhuang cultivators. “Is this the legendary Xuanxianzhou?” “Has the Xuanxianzhou attacked?” “I heard the Immortal Alliance and the Five Elders Council are at war, could it be a surprise attack by the Five Elders Council?” “Beware of vigilance!”

… When things are abnormal, there must be a demon. Now that they were in a state of wartime preparation, the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s reaction was swift. The defensive formations of the Celestial Cities in all prefectures were immediately activated, and alarms resounded through the sky. Even more cultivators transformed into beams of white light and shot straight towards the moon-like world in the sky, wanting to investigate. But even though it appeared close at hand, the investigating cultivator could never fly into it. It was as if there was a chasm between them. The Myriad Immortals Alliance stood ready, but saw several beams of bright light descend from the moon. The moonlight was like a knife, accurately striking the borders of the four central prefectures of the Immortal Alliance: Tianyu, Tianchen, Tianshu, and Tianquan. The sky of the four central prefectures of the Immortal Alliance instantly became coated with a silver sheen, becoming illusory and hazy. But apart from that, there seemed to be no other anomalies. After cautiously waiting for a long time, the cultivators of the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance concluded that there were no other anomalies. However, they soon realized they were wrong.

“The teleportation arrays are unusable! We’ve been sealed off!” “The communication spirit talismans can’t be used either!” “We’ve lost contact with other prefectures. However, we can still contact the Immortal Alliance headquarters.” “What did they say? To act according to the situation? Everyone is already at our doorstep! Damn it!” The four prefectures immediately descended into chaos. Some hot-tempered cultivators flew directly to the border of the prefectures covered by the silver light, trying to cross the blockade. The white mist barrier under the moonlight seemed to gain a touch of sacred solemnity. A cultivator, bracing himself, charged directly into the white mist. Although he had prepared for the possibility of his lifespan being shortened by several years, the scene he saw after entering the white mist left him dumbfounded.

The moment he stepped out of the boundary, the white mist that had filled his vision instantly disappeared. It was replaced by an boundless starry sky. It was as if he had truly entered the void outside the Xuanhuang Realm, surrounded by darkness and coldness. In the distance, faint traces of countless brilliant stars could be seen, occasionally sparkling. The cultivator was stunned and wanted to return, but found that the path he came from had disappeared. He then thought it was an illusion and used sword techniques and magic spells one after another, but not a single ripple was stirred in the starry sky. Instantaneous teleportation techniques also failed. Conversely, as the spiritual power in his body was consumed, the surrounding cold starry sky environment began to erode his mind. Helpless, the cultivator could only choose a direction and fly continuously. He tried to leave the range of this starry sky. But they did not know that the star sea was boundless, and without the correct method, even if they spent a lifetime, they would not be able to leave.

Outside the great formation, cultivators continuously stepped into the moonlight boundary. The great formation was like an endless abyss, swallowing all of them. Nascent Soul, God Transformation, even Dao Integration. Regardless of their cultivation level, as long as they entered, they would never return. After a period of probing, the cultivators of the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance were finally deterred. The Immortal Alliance headquarters also finally issued an emergency order, prohibiting cultivators in the four prefectures from acting recklessly. Several beams of rainbow light traversed the prefectures and arrived at the moonlight boundary in Tianquan Prefecture. Among them was Lu Xichan, the Chief Formation Master of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. “This formation…” Lu Xichan examined the moonlight shining on the white mist barrier, her eyes filled with shock. A young man in white robes beside her frowned and asked, “When can we break this formation? We’ve lost contact with the prefectures outside the great formation.” “Not only are the teleportation arrays malfunctioning, but even the Heavenly Profound Mirror channels are blocked,” the young man in white robes said with some worry. This young man in white robes was one of the core Law Transmitters of the Immortal Alliance, Ren, the Law Transmitter. Lu Xichan dared not delay and replied: “This formation seems to be drawing the power of the Star Sea, and then using infinite spatial transformations to generate a starry sky that resembles the real one…” Dao Transmitter Ren coldly interrupted Lu Xichan: “When can we break the formation?” Lu Xichan’s voice abruptly stopped. After a long pause, she said, “The complexity of this formation is unprecedented in my life. It should take at least fifteen days…” Dao Transmitter Ren said coldly: “I will give you ten days.” With a cold snort, Dao Transmitter Ren flashed away. Only Lu Xichan and several other formation masters from the Immortal Alliance’s Formation Hall were left behind. Lu Xichan looked up at the great star formation covering the sky, and cold sweat gradually dripped from her forehead. The more profound the formation masters present were, the more despair filled their eyes. It was not that the Immortal Alliance’s formation masters were all useless. It was simply that the formation laid down by the Saint Emperor this time far surpassed the current era. Li Fan’s hundreds of reincarnations, with constant deductions using the TERMINAL DISSOLUTION DISC, accumulated array knowledge beyond several generations of Xuanhuang. Furthermore, it incorporated insights from Li Fan, or rather, the DISSOLUTION DISC, after obtaining several immortal-level formations. After being infused with these array essentials, the Saint Emperor, relying on his enlightenment in the Star Sea, further deduced the array to a deeper level. Currently, above the Celestial Cities of the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance, covering almost half of the sky, was the bright moon, representing the Sacred Dynasty Da Qi. Countless citizens of Da Qi gathered in the Sacred Heart Hall. Facing the Saint Emperor’s statue, they knelt and prayed devoutly. In the Sacred Capital City, below the Saint Emperor’s throne. Tens of thousands of created second-generation Abyssal people chanted praises for the Saint Emperor’s great virtue. The Sacred Dynasty’s purple-gold aura mingled with the golden Origin Force essence. Forming a faint purple-gold starlight, it left the Sacred Dynasty’s territory and maintained the operation of the great formation that trapped the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance. This ultimate trapping formation, named the [Bright Moon Starlight Great Formation] by the Saint Emperor, was almost infinitely close to a true immortal-level formation. Li Ping believed that even a Law Transmitter would need some time to break it. As for the people in the four prefectures of the Immortal Alliance who wanted to break the formation… They would have to ask him, the Heavenly Mandate Saint Emperor, whether he agreed or not. Li Ping sat on the Saint Emperor’s throne, his gaze spanning the boundaries between two worlds, falling upon the territory of the Myriad Immortals Alliance in the Xuanhuang Realm. The Saint Emperor’s throne, or rather, the entire Sacred Capital City, fell into profound silence due to the impending war. Mao Bao was still in its usual state, lazily sleeping on Li Ping’s shoulder. It seemed that besides Origin Force essence, nothing else could move it. Besides Mao Bao, a figure resembling a child of eight or nine years old also stood beside the Saint Emperor. Gazing intently at the Xuanhuang Realm below. It was Tianyang. At this moment, his puppet body had undergone earth-shattering changes after receiving massive infusions of Origin Force essence and combat memories of the Immortal Puppet [Ancestor]. Its appearance and physique had returned to its living form. In fact, it had truly been born with the aura of life. His strength was unfathomable, gazing at the Myriad Immortals Alliance, awaiting the arrival of his opponent. And below the Saint Emperor’s throne, Yi Jue Daoist of the Du’er Sect had brought out all the paper figures of his entire sect. The paper figures recreated the mountain gate of the Du’er Sect from that year on the spot. In the center of the buildings, a passage leading to an unknown destination seemed to have opened. Although Yi Jue Daoist himself did not enter, his eyes, protruding infinitely outwards, stretched deep into the passage. “Saint Emperor, please rest assured. If anything happens in the Xuanhuang Realm, this old Daoist will definitely see it,” Yi Jue Daoist said with a chuckle. Li Ping did not respond to Yi Jue. In fact, most of his gaze and attention were focused on the starry sky outside the Xuanhuang Realm. There, he had made thorough preparations. Waiting for the Heavenly Physician and the Law Transmitter to descend.

In the Luo Yan Prefecture, when the Luo Yan Celestial City was breached, most of the Sacred Dynasty soldiers had already transferred to other battlefields. Only a small number were left to guard. However, from the wilderness outside Luo Yan Prefecture, a large group of cultivators suddenly emerged. They did not try to recapture Luo Yan Celestial City, but after a surprise attack, they quickly withdrew.

Chapter 1298: Star Sea Melee

"Master, does the Myriad Immortals Alliance really have this 【Eternal Immortal Wall】? It sounds too terrifying."

After a good while, Sun Tianci still asked incredulously.

"The Myriad Immortals Alliance's brutality is far from limited to this." Li Fan sneered.

Li Fan first learned about the Eternal Immortal Wall in the 114th life, during the Heavenly Profound Lock Spirit and Profound Net covering the Xuanhuang Realm. He initially thought it was a unique product of the Immortal Alliance in that era.

But in the 119th life, when he impersonated Sun Xingwang, the Dharma King of the Xuan Tian Sect, and refined countless will-demons within the bodies of tens of thousands of cultivators using the Three Tribulations and Hundred Tribulations Divine Manifestation Technique, the Myriad Immortals Alliance's final method of dealing with these cultivators was similar to the 【Eternal Immortal Wall】 technique.

From the information revealed by Mo Ru Bin after he possessed the Dharma Transmitter, the Myriad Immortals Alliance did indeed secretly imprison many cultivators to maintain the stability of the Xuanhuang Realm.

Furthermore, they were not located in just one place. Li Fan transmitted a blurry image to Sun Tianci, and the young prodigy of the Sun family was instantly shocked by the brutal scene.

"Master, what should we do?" Not long after, he recovered from his shock and asked resolutely.

"Your 【Profound Nether Art】 is still too slow. Even if we successfully infiltrate the Immortal Wall, we won't have much time to act."

"Become faster first!"

The Profound Nether Art, of course, was the profound technique taught by Li Fan, which dissolved the cultivation of cultivators and returned it to the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao.

As Li Fan's clone flew out of Sun Tianci's sea of consciousness, manifesting a phantom form. Li Fan's clone looked up at the sky and slowly whispered, "Erman Tian Di Li..."

As he chanted softly, an invisible vortex appeared above Li Fan's head. A familiar aura, belonging to the Essence of Heaven and Earth, seemed to be brewing within the vortex. Looking at the blurry humanoid figure gradually emerging from it, Sun Tianci became even more certain of his guess.

"One word to summon the essence of heaven and earth? Master's true identity is actually..."

Just as Sun Tianci was somewhat stunned by the scene before him, Li Fan's reprimand sounded in his ears: "What are you still spacing out for? Are you waiting for the essence of heaven and earth to descend?"

Sun Tianci instantly came to his senses and immediately aimed a Profound Nether Art at the blurry figure about to be born in the vortex.

As if the process of descent was obstructed, a gust of wind blew, and the essence of heaven and earth, which had been summoned by Li Fan's 'ermanning,' returned to the heavens and earth.

Sun Tianci did not feel his connection with the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao deepen during this process. Clearly, because the essence of heaven and earth still belonged to the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao and had not been refined and occupied by a cultivator.

And due to the "erroneous descent of the essence of heaven and earth" being stopped just as it was about to be completed, the vigilance from the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao was minimal.

Li Fan narrowed his eyes and felt it again, sending out another "Erman Tian Di Li."

This time, Sun Tianci reacted quickly. As soon as the blurry figure was about to take shape, it was sent back.

They repeated this process hundreds of times until it was about to attract the attention of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, and only then did Li Fan stop.

Sun Tianci breathed a sigh of relief, wiping the sweat from his pale forehead. Clearly, continuously casting the Profound Nether Art for a long time, "decomposing" hundreds of essences of heaven and earth, even if they were only half-formed, was a significant burden for him.

"Let's change locations and continue." Li Fan said coldly.

Since the day he defeated the Martial Maniac and displayed his true combat strength, Sun Tianci was no longer restricted by the Sun family. Even though he was actually only a little over five years old.

However, Sun Luyuan constantly warned him to prioritize safety and even bestowed many magical treasures upon him for self-defense.

The special training lasted for fifteen days, covering all corners of the Myriad Immortals Alliance. Apart from travel time, the remaining time was almost entirely spent on decomposing the essence of heaven and earth. And Sun Tianci's progress was astonishingly rapid. Casually, he could continuously return the half-formed essence of heaven and earth back to heaven and earth.

"Hmm, that's about enough." Li Fan said, nodding slightly as he observed Sun Tianci's performance.

"What are you thinking about?" Li Fan asked, noticing Sun Tianci seemed lost in thought.

"Uh, Master, ten days ago, we came to this place. The spiritual energy concentration seemed to be lower than it is now?" Sun Tianci asked somewhat uncertainly.

Li Fan smiled: "The spiritual energy in the world is like the ebb and flow of the tide; it rises and falls, how can it be constant? Why would it be like your cave dwelling, where you've lived since childhood, always unchanging?"

Hearing Li Fan's explanation, Sun Tianci nodded slightly, but his eyes, scanning the surroundings, still held a trace of doubt.

"This little fellow has such keen observational skills." Li Fan naturally noticed the anomaly in the surrounding environment. He even detected a familiar aura within the permeated spiritual energy.

"Dao Yi Worm. It seems to be the Saint Emperor's clone's method. The source should be from the 【Five Elements Great Caves】.... Is he returning the cave to the Xuanhuang Realm to create a combat environment suitable for the Great Qi soldiers? Perhaps he can even launch a fatal blow by utilizing the worm-transformed spiritual energy..."

The Saint Emperor's arrangements were almost entirely derived from the main body's explorations in previous lives. Naturally, with a little thought, he could see through the mystery. But Li Fan did not expose it, merely pretending to be unaware.

Returning to Sun Tianci's sea of consciousness, they headed towards one of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's 【Eternal Immortal Walls】.

In Tongyan Prefecture, amidst the mountains and cliffs, lies a cave.

"This place..." Sun Tianci looked into the distance and felt something unusual: "If it weren't for Master's guidance, even if I had seen this cave before, I would have subconsciously ignored it. I wouldn't have had the slightest desire to enter and investigate..."

"Hmph, this is what is said to be a blessed land accessible only to the predestined. A peculiar creation of the Xuanhuang, requiring no array formations for concealment, making it almost impossible for most people to spy on. There are many such hidden caves in the Myriad Immortals Alliance. Most of them have been occupied by those Dharma Transmitters as their own residences."

Li Fan's mind flashed back to the hidden cave he encountered when he met Mo Ru Bin in the Myriad Immortals Alliance headquarters in the 119th life. It was exactly the same as this place.

"Because of its natural characteristics, the stationed cultivators will certainly not have high vigilance. But still, proceed with caution..."

Li Fan's spiritual sense set up a series of formations around Sun Tianci, and then the two of them flew into the cave.

After passing through a narrow, downward passage, they arrived before a deep cave, only wide enough for one person's waist, plunging straight down into the abyss. It was pitch black, and they plummeted downwards.

It took a full cup of tea's time, as if they had pierced through the Xuanhuang earth and arrived at the deepest parts of the Nine Netherworld.

The narrow cave passage finally began to widen. After passing through a horizontal passage, a huge cave resembling an inverted cone, located deep underground, suddenly appeared before Sun Tianci.

The cliff walls of the cave were densely covered with square openings. Upon closer inspection, these openings were filled with amber-colored crystalline bodies. And within these crystalline bodies, without exception, a cultivator slept.

Occasionally, one could see Immortal Alliance guards patrolling in mid-air.

Sun Tianci dared not release his divine sense to investigate, but could roughly estimate that this underground cave imprisoned and sealed at least over a hundred thousand cultivators. Their faces were ruddy, and even smiles appeared on their faces, completely unaware that they were doomed to eternal slumber.

"According to Master, this is only a part of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's 【Eternal Immortal Wall】..." Sun Tianci couldn't help but feel a chill run down his spine and subconsciously clenched his fists.

"Go, the rest is up to you now." Li Fan seemed to see Sun Tianci's suppressed anger and said calmly.

At the same time, he transmitted the method for breaking the seal formation of the sleeping cultivators to him.

"Master, if we were to awaken all the cultivators here, what do you think would happen?" Sun Tianci suddenly asked.

"I advise you to abandon this idea. Since the Myriad Immortals Alliance dares to do this so openly, they must have made precautions. Believe me, you will not be able to awaken them faster than the Myriad Immortals Alliance can deal with them. You must know that the Myriad Immortals Alliance possesses the means to extract and preserve a cultivator's Dao foundation." Li Fan said coldly.

Sun Tianci's eyes flickered, but in the end, he had no choice but to give up.

Avoiding the patrolling cultivators, he flew rapidly past these sleeping, pitiful figures. A barely perceptible breeze stirred, dissolving the Dao foundation within their bodies.

"Without their cultivation, they won't live long in their sleep... It's equivalent to me killing them with my own hands..." Sun Tianci's flying body trembled slightly.

"Killing? Or saving? Look at their current state, isn't it better than death? If they could consciously perceive everything around them, they would surely beg you to end their suffering." Li Fan said, comforting him.

After another round of persuasion, Sun Tianci's hesitant actions finally became resolute.

For more than five years, Li Fan had been cultivating Sun Tianci according to his ideal image of the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate. As a result, although he was benevolent, he was not pedantic. Moreover, once he made a decision, he became extremely resolute.

The Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao power, condensed from the decomposition of tens of thousands of cultivators, was gathered by Li Fan into a bright pearl of light.

When the act of "mercy killing" was one-fifth complete, Li Fan said, "That's about enough. If we continue, even I won't be able to conceal this intense energy fluctuation."

Sun Tianci looked at the remaining sleeping figures with a hint of regret. But he still obeyed his master's command and quietly flew towards the exit.

"Master, is there anything wrong?" As he reached the top of the vast cave, Sun Tianci noticed that his master seemed to be still gazing at a certain spot below, and couldn't help but ask.

"It's nothing, just leave as instructed." After a brief silence, Li Fan finally responded.

Sun Tianci asked no further questions and flew upwards.

After leaving the terrifying dungeon, Sun Tianci took the pearl containing the Dao foundation of countless cultivators and gently crushed it. Countless rays of light instantly burst forth.

In a daze, Sun Tianci seemed to see wondrous phenomena of the world, the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, and the changing landscapes of mountains and rivers.

In the sky, the clouds and mist changed, as if being ground by a giant millstone, with creaking sounds echoing through the clouds. And the entire Xuanhuang Realm instantly trembled.

Although the amplitude was minimal, Sun Tianci still perceived it.

"The Myriad Immortals Alliance must have sent people to investigate! Let's go!" Li Fan said.

Without needing further reminders, Sun Tianci had already flown away from the site of the incident the moment he crushed the pearl. At this moment, he was immersed in the rapid increase of Xuanhuang Heavenly Favor.

And Li Fan, after ensuring that no one was tracking them, returned to the Saint Emperor's seat.

Deepest part of the Sacred Heavenly Court. The core of the Myriad Spirits Great Formation. In addition, the Soul Refining Great Formation and many other formations were superimposed. Even the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao consciousness, which was closely related to the Saint Emperor, would have its connection severed here. Ensuring that all external probing was cut off.

Lin Ling, the Saint Emperor's disciple, formerly the spirit entity of the Spiritual Wood Realm, had now revealed her original form. However, it looked quite bizarre: the tree was inverted, with its crown at the bottom. Dense roots were at the top.

The buildings scattered throughout the Sacred Heavenly Court, such as the Heroic Spirit Seat, the Sacred Medical Hall, the Sacred Academy, the Sacred Heart Hall, and the Sacred Supervision Court, were all connected to the roots of the inverted spiritual tree.

In the heart of the tree, all the scenes that had occurred within the Sacred Heavenly Court were synchronously displayed. After an image was played, it turned into green light and was absorbed by the inverted spiritual tree.

Li Fan looked at the inverted spiritual tree before him, a rare hint of hesitation flashing in his eyes.

"To prepare for victory, one must first prepare for defeat. The Saint Emperor's actions are truly the actions of supreme wisdom!"

Beside Li Fan, a yellow paper figure with a distressed face was unrestrainedly praising the inverted spiritual tree. It was Yi Jue Daoist of the Tribulation Crossing Sect. He sat on the Book of Tribulation Crossing, staring intently at the inverted spiritual tree before him.

"Moreover, the Saint Emperor's plan is for the Xuanhuang Realm, not for himself, so it cannot be said to be undermining his morale." Yi Jue Daoist continued.

The Saint Emperor remained silent. However, from time to time, he would issue hand seals, causing the roots of the inverted spiritual tree to sway. And in the heart of the tree, the absorption of the Great Qi images seemed to accelerate.

After a long while, the Saint Emperor stopped his movements. He suddenly spoke: "This time, the battle against the Myriad Immortals Alliance, your Tribulation Crossing Sect does not need to act."

"Just hide in the dark and watch..."

"Whether there are other prying eyes." The Saint Emperor's tone was enigmatic.

"The Sacred Heavenly Court and the Immortal Alliance are engaged in a great battle. This is a shift in the Xuanhuang Realm not seen in millennia. If that power secretly monitoring the Xuanhuang Realm is still in operation, it will surely supervise this matter and transmit information. I do not require you to find the final destination of the information. Just determine whether the event has occurred." The Saint Emperor instructed word by word.

Yi Jue Daoist of the Tribulation Crossing Sect finally relaxed his tightly furrowed brow. He clapped his hands and praised: "The Saint Emperor's actions are truly in line with the Great Dao of our Tribulation Crossing Sect. If the Saint Emperor is willing, I can cede the position of Sect Master of the Tribulation Crossing Sect..."

Before Yi Jue Daoist could finish speaking, the Saint Emperor interrupted him: "Regardless of whether I or the Dharma Transmitter wins, you must inform the victor of the outcome. As for after completing the task... do as you please."

Yi Jue Daoist did not show the joy of gaining freedom, but rather looked stunned. His vaguely shaped paper hands pointed at the inverted spiritual tree: "I won't go together?"

The Saint Emperor laughed lightly: "This 'Outside Wood' contains only Lin Ling, the only living being within. I have not left any escape routes for her. Do you, the Tribulation Crossing Sect, expect to follow her?"

Yi Jue Daoist immediately looked dejected: "Saint Emperor, please reconsider. Can that tree spirit, which has only recently been born, achieve anything on its own? In the vast Star Sea, it might encounter some disaster and perish on the way. Won't the Saint Emperor's escape plan be abandoned midway..."

Li Ping waved his hand, interrupting him. Staring at the inverted spiritual tree, he corrected: "It is not an escape plan, but the preservation of information."

Yi Jue Daoist sighed mournfully, "What's the difference?"

Li Ping squinted his eyes, remaining silent.

This 【Outside Wood】 not only preserved the image data of all events that had occurred in the Sacred Heavenly Court since its founding. Even the true spirits and memories of those who had fallen during this period, originally residing in the Heroic Spirit Seat, would be transferred here when activated.

This was a backup plan conceived by the Saint Emperor, inspired by the theory of information immutability from the Great Evolution Sect, for the entire Sacred Heavenly Court. Or rather, the word "proof" was more appropriate.

If Li Ping won, then naturally there was nothing more to say. The Outside Wood would not be activated. But if Li Ping lost, then this Outside Wood would, upon the destruction of the Great Qi, carry the true spirits of the Sacred Heavenly Court's subjects and fly into the depths of the void.

If it were a physical entity, it would certainly not escape the Dharma Transmitter's obstruction. But if it were merely information, the Dharma Transmitter might not care. Coupled with the interference from the Tribulation Crossing Sect at that time.

It was not that the Saint Emperor had wavered about the decisive battle. After all, there was no place left for any living being in this 【Outside Wood】. It was rather that the Saint Emperor wanted to leave a "proof of existence" for the countless subjects who had followed and believed in him, in the end.

Li Ping knew that during the thousands of years of the Myriad Immortals Alliance's rule over half of the Xuanhuang Realm. The Sacred Heavenly Court was not the first to rebel. There had been an example of a coalition of worlds rising up in resistance five hundred years ago. But after their failure, all information about them was erased and sealed by the Myriad Immortals Alliance. It was as if these losers had never existed.

Li Ping's action was to prevent such a thing from happening again. "Even if we lose, our existence will not be erased!" "If, after many years, the Outside Wood can return to the Xuanhuang Realm, it would be even better."

Various thoughts flashed through Li Ping's mind, and he quickly suppressed them.

Chapter 1299: Immortals Descend Upon All Things Void

The Xuanhuang Realm was revitalized by a surge of celestial spiritual energy, transforming the land and its inhabitants. However, this abundance fueled rampant greed among cultivators, leading to widespread slaughter as they fought over the precious energy. Only the Great Qi Imperial Guards and the Qingxuan Army, practicing the [Profound Yellow Immortal Heart Incantation], retained their sanity.

The Saint Emperor, sensing the Dharma Transmitter's approach, propagated a new cultivation method, the [Foundation Establishment method], which bypassed traditional cultivation requirements and garnered immense favor from the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao. This move threatened the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s legitimacy, prompting desperation among their ranks. Simultaneously, a prisoner in the Nether Prison broke free, reborn and seeking to exploit the chaos.
