"As expected. It's exactly the same as the ancient immortal array protecting the Nine Stars Crimson Pearls."

The ancient imprints, like natural birthmarks, were almost integrated into the space of the Root of Heaven and Earth. If Li Fan hadn't been fortunate enough to see similar existences before, he would have mistaken them for characteristics of the Root of Heaven and Earth itself. A part of the imprint had already penetrated the space itself, so Li Fan could not discern the original appearance of this immortal array. However, when compared with the existing array deduction data within the ultimate separation disc, most of it matched.

"Finally found you." Li Fan's eyes shone with brilliance. The Vast Crossing Star Sea Array, in Li Fan's previous deductions, was composed of four sub-arrays. In his previous reincarnations, Li Fan had already identified three-quarters of them. These were the golden chains used to lock onto and capture outer cultivation worlds; the Heaven-Beast Eye, serving as an observation station; and the Gloomy Sea, which helped escape the suction of the Immortal Ruins, also known as the Spirit Gathering and Immortal Ascension Array. The remaining one, however, could not be found anywhere in the Xuanhuang Realm. Even during the world-ending immortal array in the previous life, Li Fan couldn't pinpoint its possible location. He hadn't expected that by returning to his old stomping grounds in this life to absorb anchors, he would have an unexpected surprise.

"This Vast Crossing Star Sea Array should have been modified by Xuan Tianwang based on the original world-protecting immortal array." "Unlike the other formations, the modifications here are very slight, almost as if it were untouched." "With the constant weaving and creation of the Root of Heaven and Earth, even when navigating the star sea, the Xuanhuang Realm has the ability to constantly repair and even grow." "This self-growth, unlike the stitching together of fragmented realms by the Dharma Transmitter and Heavenly Physician, does not cause the anomalies of conflicting world laws or side effects during the fusion process..." A scene suddenly appeared before Li Fan's eyes. In the endless dark void, the Xuanhuang Realm was like a colossal starship, slowly moving forward. The Heaven-Beast Eye was responsible for observation and Locus, the golden chains searched for external enemies and collected resources; the Gloomy Sea provided endless power; and the Root of Heaven and Earth was responsible for repair and growth. This was a perfect survival strategy for the star sea.

"Vast Crossing Star Sea, Vast Crossing Star Sea." "With this formation, it is indeed possible to traverse the star sea and overcome all calamities. Xuan Tianwang is truly a peerless genius!" Li Fan praised him sincerely.

"What a pity..." "Such a remarkable person, at the verge of ascending to immortality, suddenly met with misfortune." Li Fan's eyes narrowed. Xuan Tianwang's disappearance was one of the biggest mysteries in the Xuanhuang Realm's history. Even after so many reincarnations and with the world-ending immortal array revealing all hidden truths, Li Fan still couldn't uncover the truth. He could only vaguely guess that the process of officially ascending to immortality might carry immense risks.

"Although Xuan Tianwang is no longer present, this Vast Crossing Star Sea Array can be used by me." "Previously, I speculated that Xuan Tianwang might have hidden in the final Vast Crossing Star Sea Array after his mysterious disappearance. But now it seems..." Because Li Fan had aided in "birth control," the Root of Heaven and Earth had decided to forgive his previous actions of devouring the Five Elements Great Grotto-Heavens. However, it did not generate any positive feelings. It merely allowed Li Fan to roam freely within this confluence of laws. This place, though seemingly boundless, was an illusion created by the intricate weaving of laws and immortal arrays. Li Fan, being proficient in formations, did not get lost. He quickly searched the entire interior of the Root of Heaven and Earth. As Li Fan had suspected, there were no traces of Xuan Tianwang's potential presence.

"During the world-ending immortal array in the previous life, I never saw Mo Ruobin either." "If he were within the Xuanhuang Realm, with his strength, he would certainly have been able to resist to some extent. Could it be..." Li Fan frowned. Mo Ruobin had no reason to abandon his long-held goal and flee the Xuanhuang Realm. Therefore, there was a high probability that he had gone to the [Heaven-Beast Eye] located somewhere unknown outside the Xuanhuang Realm. "The Heaven-Beast Eye can serve as a reconnaissance array for Vast Crossing Star Sea. Its observation range should be even wider than I imagined, perhaps even beyond the void of the realms..." A glimmer of realization flashed in Li Fan's mind. "The Vast Crossing Star Sea Array is almost integrated with the Xuanhuang Realm. Perhaps the Heaven-Beast Eye can also reverse its gaze and observe the Xuanhuang Realm itself. However, Mo Ruobin might not know its exact location, and rashly searching the star sea carries a certain risk. That's why in the 119th life, he chose not to pursue this path when I pretended to cooperate with him. And in the previous life, when he was pursued by the Saint Emperor's clone and had nowhere to run, he was forced to make that choice." Li Fan knew about the Heaven-Beast Eye from a unfortunate soul who was randomly teleported there while using a teleportation array from Jiushan Prefecture. He even encountered the Heavenly Physician who sensed its aura. Fortunately, relying on his wit, he gained the Heavenly Physician's trust and, as a result, obtained the secret Heavenly Physician technique, the "Mending Heaven Records." The chance of being randomly teleported to the Heaven-Beast Eye was extremely slim, so Li Fan naturally wouldn't try it himself. However, Jiushan Prefecture was formed from the bones of the Heaven-Beast, and it must have some connection with the distant Heaven-Beast Eye. Perhaps this connection could be used to locate the Heaven-Beast Eye. "The Vast Crossing Star Sea Array is also extremely important for the sublimation of the Xuanhuang Realm in this life." "Although the array is broken, if I can repair and re-activate it..." During Xuan Tianwang's era, the Vast Crossing Star Sea Array only covered a small area of the original Xuanhuang Realm, which was the central core region compared to the current merged Xuanhuang Realm. "But by expanding the array, I can control the Xuanhuang Realm without anyone's knowledge." The ultimate separation disc was too busy with its numerous tasks to assist. Li Fan relied solely on his own understanding of formations to deduce. In his sea of consciousness, the Vast Crossing Star Sea Array radiated from the center, gradually covering the Xuanhuang light mass, eventually transforming into a colossal starship. "When expanding and rebuilding the formation, I can incorporate the world-ending immortal array I comprehended in my previous life." "When the Xuanhuang Realm finally completes its transformation, even if the descended immortal soul is incredibly powerful and beyond my expectations, with the formation as a restraint, it will be impossible for it to escape my grasp," Li Fan mused inwardly. It had to be said that working on the shoulders of giants made things much easier. With Xuan Tianwang's foundation, Li Fan could save more than half the effort in his plans. Or rather, without Xuan Tianwang's arrangements, Li Fan, with his current formation cultivation, would find it impossible to build a new Vast Crossing Star Sea Array. "There is still too little information about the four formations of the Vast Crossing Star Sea Array." Li Fan's thoughts naturally turned to Mo Ruobin. In his battle with the Saint Emperor in the previous life, Mo Ruobin's techniques were all seen by him. As long as he made arrangements in advance, Li Fan was confident he could handle him. The time of being toyed with by Mo Ruobin was over, and it was time for reckoning. However... before seeking revenge on Mo Ruobin and seeking information, Li Fan first visited another Dharma King of the Xuan Tian Sect. Dongyong Prefecture, the impact crater. Flowers of spiritual energy filled the air, a beautiful sight. Li Fan knew that hidden within these exquisite flowers were the memories of Ji Yuzhen, one of the former Dharma Kings of the Xuan Tian Sect. Or rather... soul fragments. Ji Yuzhen cultivated the Immeasurable Heavenly Pivot Divine Separation Technique. Even Xuan Tianwang, Xuanyuan Hong, praised this divine technique as unparalleled in his lifetime. Although Ji Yuzhen appeared to have perished, there was still a flicker of hope, hidden within these countless soul flowers. In the latter part of his previous life, amidst the world-ending immortal array storm, this place was one of the few remaining bright spots in the Myriad Immortals Alliance’s territory. "My previous soul-searching technique should still have some flaws." "Ji Yuzhen's memories still hide true secrets." Li Fan's eyes flashed with brilliance. A seemingly ordinary white circle suddenly appeared in his hand. This was [Descending to the Mortal Realm]. He tossed it upwards gently, and the white circle instantly enveloped the entire impact crater. It fell silently, transforming everything it covered into spiritual energy. The vast impact crater, inch by inch, cracked open. The soul flowers, integrated with the mountain and hidden within, almost impossible to detect by ordinary means, slowly floated out.

Chapter 1314: Memory of Ji Yuzhen

The Memory of Ji Yuzhen

After cultivating the "Myriad Spirits Severing Divinity Art," there was a distinction between the myriad soul clones and the primordial soul. What Li Fan had found earlier in the circular mountain of Dongyong Prefecture were merely memories from one of the myriad soul clones.

However, the truly important primordial soul had never been discovered.

It wasn't until the white circle, "Descending to the Mortal Realm," acted upon the circular mountain, annihilating it completely, that the primordial soul hidden within was finally revealed.

Unlike the myriad spiritual energy flowers scattered outside, the soul flowers hidden within the circular mountain seemed to remain dormant. Even when Li Fan actively contacted them, they did not attack.

As these soul flowers were exposed after losing their hiding place, they began to gather spontaneously in a patterned manner, slowly coalescing into a giant, radiant white flower. Within the circular mountain region, the countless spiritual energy flowers drifting in the heavens and earth seemed to have found their leader and began to revolve around the luminous white flower.

In the rising storm, the primordial soul flower gradually became like the spiritual energy flowers, seemingly attempting to conceal itself through this method. Unfortunately, at the instant the circular mountain disintegrated and the soul flowers scattered outwards, Li Fan's immense divine sense had already locked onto all of them. How could a clumsy illusionary technique possibly deceive Li Fan?

However, Li Fan soon realized he was mistaken. When his divine sense came into contact with a piece of the primordial soul flower, the scenes transmitted from within made Li Fan feel a sense of familiarity. It was precisely the scenes he had encountered before in the ordinary spiritual energy flowers!

"As expected, there is some skill involved. Even when locked onto by me, it can silently transfer and swap…" Looking at the trillions of flowers before him, Li Fan snorted coldly, "But since I've discovered you, how can you escape now!"

"You hide within the endless sea of flowers, so I shall boil the sea!"

"Xuanhuang World-Ending Transformation: [Heavenly Punishment and Earthly Destruction, Gathering Souls and Creating Life]!"

Overpowering malevolent energy surged from Li Fan's body. Li Fan's eyes turned completely black, the malevolent energy condensing into tangible form, like countless tiny tentacles swaying in the wind. Within this black malevolent energy, faint bolts of lightning could be seen, as if heavenly punishment was descending, intending to annihilate all living beings in the world!

This was a variation of Li Fan's Xuanhuang World-Ending Transformation. When Xuanhuang encountered a desperate situation of destruction, for its own survival, it would annihilate all living beings within the realm, absorbing their flesh and blood, and souls, to increase its chances of withstanding the world-ending crisis. This transformation was even more extreme than the "[Heaven and Earth Fall Silent, All Things Froze Still]" that Li Fan had used before. It was a desperate gamble, a survival transformation where only oneself exists.

Above the Dongyong Prefecture, boundless black clouds rolled in from the horizon. This was the reaction of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, sensing the extreme change occurring in this location. Li Fan even sensed that because of the birth of this Heaven and Earth transformation, the Xuanhuang Realm's attitude towards him was rapidly deteriorating. The goodwill he had painstakingly accumulated moments ago had almost instantly vanished.

However, Li Fan did not care. The malevolent energy tentacles continuously differentiated into new branches, enveloping all the spiritual energy flowers they could touch and piercing into them fiercely. The spiritual energy flowers withered one by one. Simultaneously, streams of incomparably pure, yet eerily strange energy, were absorbed and concentrated, mixed with various fragmented memory snippets. Some were Ji Yuzhen's, others belonged to cultivators who had perished here.

Li Fan classified and organized those belonging to Ji Yuzhen, gradually piecing together complete scenes. At the same time, he focused his attention, waiting for the primordial soul clones to be discovered. The immortal techniques of the Xuan Tian Sect each had their own mysterious aspects. To be safe, Li Fan did not greedily absorb the energy transformed from these spiritual energy flowers directly. Instead, he gathered them in one place and sealed them with Origin Force Essence.

The black tentacles brandished themselves wantonly. The sea of flowers disappeared in large swathes at a rate visible to the naked eye. Soon, the first primordial soul clone could no longer hide and was found by Li Fan. Without fully draining or destroying the soul, he merely peered into the memories hidden within the soul.

*Boom!* Like a fleeting glimpse of a life, images rapidly flashed by. As if covered in a layer of white light, they flickered intermittently, like flowers seen through mist, appearing and disappearing.

"Zhen'er, have you remembered how to activate the [Golden Lock Across the Heavens Formation]?" Xuan Tianwang's voice echoed, but his face was hidden beneath the white light, making him indistinguishable.

"Brother Xuanyuan, do you think I'm that foolish in your heart?" Ji Yuzhen said with a hint of teasing.

Xuan Tianwang quickly explained, "Zhen'er, don't misunderstand. I know your talent is no less than mine. However, this formation is an improvement based on an immortal formation. The difference between immortal and mortal is something that, unless personally experienced, is difficult to grasp correctly."

"Since Brother Xuanyuan is so worried, teach me again then." Ji Yuzhen said softly.

"Uh… alright." Xuan Tianwang hesitated for a moment before nodding in agreement. He said solemnly, "Golden locks across the heavens, spanning all realms. Even if the target is at the far end of the distant star sea, once locked onto, the chains can reach it in an instant and capture it."

"I've told you before that this effect is achieved because it's embedded with the [Distance Within Reach] great array. This array was originally inscribed on the Ascension Platform in the Immortal Realm, and I moved the entire immortal array down when I escaped…"

Ji Yuzhen looked at Xuan Yuanhong, as if seeing him collecting immortal artifacts from the Immortal Realm while escaping for his life. She couldn't help but let out a soft laugh again, "Even though it's not the first time you've told me, I still find it hard to imagine that Brother Xuanyuan could be such a person."

Xuan Yuanhong coughed awkwardly, "The Immortal Realm suffered a catastrophe, which would inevitably affect the lower realms. Naturally, I had to make more preparations. Besides, they were ownerless objects anyway…" Xuan Tianwang earnestly defended himself, then continued his explanation, "The deviation of star sea spacetime means that the location observed by the Heaven-Beast Eye in the cultivation world might have a slight error compared to its actual location. Therefore, when using the golden lock for capture, corresponding adjustments must be made. Currently, there is no good way to resolve this deviation, so it relies entirely on the host's experience and intuition."

"The [Distance Within Reach] great array consumes a lot. After a period of use, it needs to be repaired and replenished. However, there's no need to worry about damage. I've already replicated three main copies of the core components. At most, the capture efficiency will decrease, but it won't affect the array's usage..."

Xuan Tianwang explained in great detail, and Ji Yuzhen listened to every word. However, her gaze remained fixed on Xuan Yuanhong's face, never shifting away.

…

Returning from the memory to reality, Li Fan carefully sealed this primordial soul clone. Then, he turned his attention to the rest of the sea of flowers. As more incorrect options were eliminated, the collection of primordial soul clones accelerated. Ji Yuzhen's memories emerged one after another.

…

Vaguely, in a secret chamber. Ji Yuzhen and Xuan Yuanhong stood facing each other.

"Brother Xuanyuan, you've finally opened your eyes. Inviting me here alone." Ji Yuzhen's beautiful eyes rippled slightly as she gazed at Xuan Tianwang.

"Zhen'er, stop fooling around. We have important matters today." Xuan Yuanhong said earnestly.

"The other eleven brothers have all chosen their immortal techniques, but you've been hesitant…"

"I said, I want Brother Xuanyuan to choose for me." Ji Yuzhen interrupted Xuan Yuanhong.

Xuan Yuanhong revealed a helpless expression, "I sought you out precisely for this matter."

"Brother Xuanyuan has already picked it for me?"

"The Myriad Spirits Severing Divinity Art. Even among the numerous immortal techniques I've collected, it is a top-tier existence. It allows for myriad soul clones, making the soul unending and indestructible. More importantly, it can nurture one's soul and differentiate primordial souls. Each primordial soul can ascend its own immortal path…" Xuan Tianwang spoke eloquently.

"I believe in Big Brother. I'll cultivate this one." Before Xuan Tianwang could finish, Ji Yuzhen decided.

Xuan Yuanhong paused, then nodded slightly. He pointed a finger at his own brow, and then dark characters flew out from it. Xuan Yuanhong closed his eyes, his expression calm, only occasionally furrowing his brows as if enduring immense pain.

"The divine is the flower of life. Wandering the void, its splendor is like the new green of spring willows, abundant but not chaotic, divisible yet capable of reunion…" The moment she saw those undulating dark characters, an extremely profound cultivation technique appeared in her mind. Not only the content of the technique but also countless memories of cultivating it and specific insights. Although she was just beginning, it was as if she had reincarnated thousands of times and had cultivated it countless times.

After an unknown period, the dark characters slowly returned to Xuan Tianwang's sea of consciousness.

"Brother Xuanyuan, are you alright?" Ji Yuzhen asked with concern, stepping forward to check on him. Xuan Yuanhong's face suddenly flashed with myriad distorted countenances, attempting to take over. However, in the end, it returned to Xuan Yuanhong's original face.

"Brother Xuanyuan, you could have just transferred the technique. Why use this method of inheritance?" Ji Yuzhen's tone carried a hint of blame.

Xuan Yuanhong sighed softly, "Zhen'er, the complexity of immortal techniques is far beyond that of lower realm cultivation methods. Although your talent is extraordinary, without the guidance of inheritance, it would take more than ten years to even begin cultivating the Severing Divinity Art. We don't have that much time…"

Ji Yuzhen remained silent.

Xuan Yuanhong added, "Moreover, looking at the cultivation progress of the other eleven brothers, there's a clear difference whether they received inheritance or not. It should be a limitation of the technique itself within the [Azure Nether Pearl]."

"This [Azure Nether Pearl] might not be a good thing," Ji Yuzhen snorted coldly.

Xuan Yuanhong did not agree, "There is no distinction between good and evil in cultivation methods; it all depends on the cultivator. This Azure Nether Pearl is the same." "It can absorb the corpses of fallen cultivators and refine the cultivation methods they practiced, which is enough to show the extraordinary nature of this treasure." "It's a pity I obtained it too late. I only managed to glance at the nearby corpses before hastily leaving," Xuan Yuanhong said regretfully.

…

Scene after scene flashed through Li Fan's mind. All of them were the life stories of Ji Yuzhen, a Dharma King of the Xuan Tian Sect in her past. Compared to the fragments preserved in the spiritual energy flowers before, the memories within the primordial soul were more complete. Moreover, they all involved numerous secrets of Xuan Tianwang of the Xuan Tian Sect. For instance, the origin of the Xuan Tian Sect Dharma Kings' cultivation of immortal techniques, and the mysterious immortal treasure, the Azure Nether Pearl. Also, the methods for activating and controlling the Floating Crossing Great Array and the Golden Lock Across the Heavens. And then, the moments Ji Yuzhen and Xuan Yuanhong spent together.

However, what puzzled Li Fan was that the memories within the primordial soul here were still incomplete. Certain crucial fragments were missing. Li Fan swept his gaze around, ensuring no other stray spiritual energy flowers were present. "Did it escape while I wasn't paying attention? Or…" "Were those primordial soul clones never preserved in the first place?"

From Ji Yuzhen's memories, Li Fan obtained the complete content of the Severing Divinity Art. Although there was no so-called inheritance guidance, allowing for initial entry, he had a general understanding of this immortal technique's content. Besides being able to split into myriad souls, be indestructible, and immortal, the primordial soul had another greater function: after achieving the Dao, it could serve as a medicinal catalyst. Whether consumed by oneself or others, it could perfectly merge and combine two completely different Dao paths.

True Immortals pursued a single Great Dao. A Great Dao is singular. Not only would it repel other cultivators practicing this Dao, but it would also be difficult to cultivate two different Dao paths simultaneously. However, the Severing Divinity Art could cleverly resolve this limitation. The healing effect of consuming primordial souls was insignificant compared to this heaven-defying [Dao Integration] function.

"From the memories I previously obtained, when Xuan Tianwang was injured, Ji Yuzhen had intended to feed him her primordial soul." "Now that her most important primordial soul clone is missing, could it be that she found Xuan Tianwang at the last moment and sacrificed herself to him?" Li Fan couldn't help but speculate. Ji Yuzhen clearly loved Xuan Tianwang deeply. However, for some unknown reason, Xuan Yuanhong had never accepted her affections and had even deliberately maintained a distance. Sacrificing herself to save Xuan Tianwang was entirely something Ji Yuzhen would do.

"Xuan Tianwang." Li Fan murmured to himself, looking up at the sky. The accumulated dark clouds in the Xuanhuang Realm had reached their limit, as if they could descend at any moment. Li Fan had absorbed all of Ji Yuzhen's scattered soul clones and removed the "Heavenly Punishment and Earthly Destruction" transformation. His figure flickered, and he disappeared from the spot. The anomalies in the sky also dissipated. The cultivators of the Myriad Immortals Alliance, who had been blocked by an invisible barrier outside, arrived late. Discovering the circular mountain and spiritual energy flowers that had vanished into thin air, they were greatly alarmed and quickly reported to the Immortal Alliance headquarters.

…

Li Fan did not immediately go to find Mo Rubin. Instead, he first entered seclusion to digest the memories from Ji Yuzhen's soul clones. The life of a Dharma King, even with the most crucial parts missing, was still immense. Especially within the primordial soul, it contained not only memories but also thoughts and emotions of that time. While probing, he was inevitably tainted by these emotions. To prevent himself from being influenced and Ji Yuzhen from taking over, Li Fan had to pause after experiencing each segment of memory and dispel those infiltrating emotions.

"The memories of Ji Yuzhen's first meeting with Xuan Tianwang are also missing. It seems to be the important reason why she fell in love with Xuan Tianwang, and one of her most precious memories." "However, Ji Yuzhen's memories of the other eleven Dharma Kings have been preserved."

Chapter 1315: The Law King of Xuan Tian Sect

"Discussing research findings..." Li Fan contemplated for a long time before finally agreeing.

Zhong Daogong let out a long sigh. He conjured black and white free-floating lines with his hands, writing characters in the void.

"Daoist friend, please observe." Zhong Daogong said with utmost seriousness. Even though they were in the无人 (wúrén - deserted/unmanned) depths of the Star Sea, he still set up a prohibition around them to prevent the characters from leaking.

The characters flickered faintly, like living creatures, swirling and flowing.

Li Fan glanced at them and remarked casually, "So it's [Hate]..."

"However, Daoist friend's [Hate] seems to have some slight errors."

Zhong Daogong's expression changed slightly. Just as he was about to speak, he heard Li Fan say proudly, "But watch how I write this [Hate] character!"

With swift and elegant strokes, another character, seemingly identical, suddenly appeared.

The two [Hate] characters stood side by side.

Zhong Daogong looked at the True Immortal script Li Fan had written, first stunned. Then, his body trembled uncontrollably.

As the Great Elder of the Severed Immortal Tower and the cultivator most deeply involved in researching True Immortal scripts within the Profound Immortal Boat, Zhong Daogong could naturally discern the subtle differences between these two characters.

Judging from the faint fluctuations emanating from the two characters, the completeness of the inscription by the other party was clearly superior to his own!

Moreover, the degree of advancement seemed to far exceed that of the [Li] character encountered earlier!

"This, this..." Repeatedly struck, Zhong Daogong found it difficult to accept. However, his research instincts, honed over years, made him temporarily set aside all other thoughts and focus on deciphering the [Hate] character Li Fan had written.

Each subtle modification brought the inscription closer to its original intent. If he were to explore it himself, it would likely take decades to reach this level.

But now, a single glance was equivalent to countless nights of painstaking research.

Zhong Daogong naturally did not know that the [Hate] character Li Fan had written was from his own future self, decades later. At this moment, only one thought resonated in his mind:

He must "invite" this cultivator back to the Profound Immortal Boat, by any means necessary!

True Immortal scripts were simply too important for the Profound Immortal Boat. Every additional inscription known undoubtedly allowed the Immortal Boat to greatly enhance its combat power.

Furthermore, the crucial plan conceived by the Immortal Boat required the collection of as many different types of True Immortal scripts as possible.

With this thought, after deeply imprinting the new [Hate] character in his mind, Zhong Daogong turned to look at Li Fan and sighed, "Daoist friend's skill is profound, I am far inferior!"

"However... in my homeland, there are still over a dozen scholars like me who study True Immortal scripts. They have delved deep for many years, and their understanding of True Immortal scripts is no less than mine... If Daoist friend is willing to share and exchange ideas, I guarantee that new discoveries will be made."

"Daoist friend must also know the difficulty of studying True Immortal scripts. If we can complement each other's weaknesses..."

Zhong Daogong's persuasion was eloquent. Li Fan slowly began to show interest.

Finally, Zhong Daogong delivered a powerful blow: "In my homeland, there is also a True Immortal script artifact. If our exchange is pleasant, perhaps we can even allow Daoist friend to witness it firsthand..."

Zhong Daogong was very clear about the immense temptation that a True Immortal script artifact held for people like them. Therefore, after speaking, he stared intently at Li Fan.

As expected, Li Fan's eyes lit up, and his hesitation disappeared. "Is what you say true?"

Upon receiving Zhong Daogong's affirmative reply, Li Fan finally nodded in agreement.

"However, for our first exchange, let's do it here in the void," Li Fan suddenly added.

With a casual wave of his hand, silver-white lines interweaved, and a great array gradually unfolded.

Within the great array, pavilions and towers rose, and bridges over flowing water were nestled among them. Clear springs flowed beneath the bridges, shimmering with light. Fish could even be seen swimming playfully.

Light and shadow shifted, creating an illusion that was as real as reality.

"As expected, this pavilion and flowing water scene was conjured instantly by the great array!" Zhong Daogong observed his surroundings, vaguely sensing that this seemed to be merely a formation for constructing buildings in the Star Sea. However, its ability to create such an illusion, making even him unable to distinguish between reality and deception, undoubtedly indicated its extraordinary nature.

"It's merely a trivial skill," Li Fan said nonchalantly. "Studying True Immortal scripts has already exhausted all my efforts. How could I have the energy to study formations..."

Zhong Daogong nodded in agreement, believing him.

After observing the surroundings within the great array and finding no anomalies, Zhong Daogong cupped his hands and said, "Then it's settled. Daoist friend, please wait here. Before this incense burns out, I will definitely return with my companions."

As Zhong Daogong spoke, he waved his large sleeve, and a clump of earthy yellow incense flew out from his sleeve and stood in the air.

The flame had already ignited, and smoke curled upwards. Zhong Daogong bowed, bid farewell, and his figure vanished into the dark Star Sea.

Li Fan gazed into the distance for a long time before finally returning to Yin Shangren and the others.

"Saint Master..."

Li Fan's sudden departure and prolonged absence naturally made Yin Shangren and the others realize that they must have encountered trouble. Now that Li Fan had reappeared, they asked with concern.

"I never imagined that there were still surviving civilizations in this frontier of the Star Sea. It must have been disturbed when I set up the formation to connect to the Xuanhuang Realm." Li Fan said with a heavy expression.

His words were earth-shattering, and everyone was stunned. "Here? It's all dead silence. Where do they live?"

"I'm not sure yet, we only had a brief encounter. However, given that they could survive the destruction of the Star Sea, these people are certainly not to be underestimated. You all should remain hidden for now. Wait for me to investigate thoroughly before we proceed." Li Fan instructed.

Everyone nodded in agreement.

Unknown entities in the Star Sea were more likely to be enemies than friends. Caution was never excessive.

Taking advantage of the time before the Immortal Boat group arrived, Li Fan continued to lecture Yin Shangren and the others.

"Relics contain True Immortal remnants, and so do world fragments. If we were to allow the Xuanhuang Realm to absorb world fragments filled with True Immortal remnants..."

"It might cause world turmoil and lead to the devastation of all living beings."

"However, so many years have passed since the Great Calamity of the Star Sea. There must be some remnant realms whose True Immortal power has mostly dissipated. Only such realms can serve as medicinal ingredients." Li Fan spoke eloquently.

"With so many of us working separately, it shouldn't be difficult to find suitable medicinal ingredients, looking at the continuous chain of remnant realms in the Remnant Realm Great Wall," Qiao Gong said, gazing at the distant Remnant Realm Great Wall.

Li Fan shook his head slightly.

With a flick of his finger, the Wooden Sword phantom instantly appeared at the edge of the Remnant Realm Great Wall.

"You might as well go out and try." Li Fan said.

Qiao Gong was the first to leave the scope of the Wooden Sword phantom's protection. The moment he stepped outside, his expression changed drastically. He felt like he was being pulled by a massive suction force, uncontrollably drawn towards the Remnant Realm Great Wall!

"Stabilize!"

A golden armor appeared on his body. Qiao Gong struggled frantically, and with great effort, he managed to stabilize himself in the void.

However, he still could not resist the tendency to move towards the Remnant Realm Great Wall. The light of his armor flickered continuously, seemingly reaching its limit.

Li Fan manipulated the Wooden Sword phantom to envelop Qiao Gong once more.

Freed from the terrifying suction, Qiao Gong looked at the Remnant Realm Great Wall before him with lingering fear.

"There's an Immortal Ruins here too?!" Everyone was shocked beyond words.

"It's not an Immortal Ruins. It's the High Wall," Li Fan said slowly, his tone ethereal.

"The suction force from the Immortal Ruins is blocked by the High Wall at the Star Sea frontier. Then, through means we cannot comprehend, it gathers beneath the High Wall. Over time, it has formed this anomaly."

"The reason the world fragments are connected is also to resist this [Echoing Star Power]..."

The scene Li Fan painted deeply shocked everyone present.

Even without seeing the invisible High Wall, the fact that it could contain the suction force that destroyed the entire Star Sea proved its power and mystery.

"Acting near the Remnant Realm Great Wall will not be much less dangerous than being near the Xuanhuang Realm's border. A slight misstep could lead to losing control and crashing into a remnant realm. If there are still True Immortal remnants within..."

"Also, influenced by the Echoing Star Power, the range of our divine sense exploration is greatly reduced. This is the difficulty in finding medicinal ingredients and suitable remnant realms to fill them," Li Fan said with a deep voice.

Li Fan extended his hand, and a crystal like a silk ribbon, shimmering with seven colors, appeared in his palm.

"This is [Empty Clarity Flowing Crystal]. Coupled with the [Splitting Light and Melting Rainbow] technique, it can resist this pervasive suction force to some extent."

"Remember, do not push yourselves too hard. When the remaining Hong light is only one-third, you can leave in advance."

Li Fan imparted the Empty Clarity Flowing Crystal and the Splitting Light and Melting Rainbow technique to everyone.

"Of course, if you could all reach the realm of 'No Sword, No Self' like me, perhaps you could ignore this Echoing Star Power to some extent." The Wooden Sword phantom flickered, bringing everyone back to a safe area.

"The Remnant Realm Great Wall contains countless world fragments. It is extremely difficult for me alone to find suitable medicinal ingredients. Therefore, I need your assistance." Li Fan said earnestly.

Bai Hua couldn't help but ask at this moment, "Saint Master, what is your ultimate goal in going to such lengths? Is it merely to aid Xuanhuang's ascension and benefit from it?"

Li Fan gave a faint smile. "Xuanhuang's ascension and escape from the catastrophic crisis. We, nurtured by heaven and earth, might have the chance to break through the mortal limit. It is a win-win situation, is it not enough?"

As the others wanted to ask further questions, Li Fan's eyes flickered. "More people are coming. I'll be back shortly."

"You all wait here for now and familiarize yourselves with the use of the Splitting Light and Melting Rainbow technique."

Before his words finished, Li Fan's figure vanished.

On the Wooden Sword phantom, everyone fell into a prolonged silence.

Finally, Xu Ke broke the silence. "Actually, with the Saint Master's strength alone, he could probably facilitate Xuanhuang's ascension. It would just take more time."

"Moreover, he still brought us 'burdens' along... It reminds me of Mr. Bai back then."

Xu Ke sighed emotionally, his eyes filled with endless nostalgia.

Upon hearing this, everyone else fell silent.

Indeed, from their perspective, they truly possessed nothing worthy of the Saint Master's schemes.

...

Outside the pavilion and tower formation.

The elders of the Immortal Boat gathered, observing from a distance without entering.

Their divine senses exchanged continuously. "How is it? Is it a trap?"

"It seems we were overly concerned. There are indeed no offensive measures; it should just be an illusion formation."

"However, it's just a mere formation. How powerful can it be? We have so many people; are we afraid of him alone?"

"That's right. Under the might of True Immortal scripts, what formation would not turn to dust?"

"Don't forget, the other party also understands True Immortal scripts. And perhaps even more profoundly than us..."

The elders' communication ceased abruptly.

At this moment, the true form of Li Fan, who had been lecturing on the Dao, emerged from the formation.

He held Zhong Daogong's incense in his hand.

The incense had about one-third remaining. Li Fan surveyed everyone and nodded. "As expected, they keep their word."

Zhong Daogong introduced everyone: "This is Gan Jingda. This is Nangong Lie..."

After a round of pleasantries, Li Fan invited everyone into the formation for a detailed discussion.

Residing in one of the pavilions, everyone present got straight to the point.

"May I ask how many True Immortal scripts your homeland has deciphered so far?" Zhong Daogong asked directly.

This question was crucial. The elders of the Immortal Boat all looked at Li Fan, awaiting his reply.

"Thirteen," Li Fan said calmly.

The elders of the Immortal Boat exchanged glances. Most wore expressions of disbelief.

"Of course, it's a few less. However, only those with an accuracy rate above ninety percent are counted," Li Fan added.

This time, the elders of the Immortal Boat could no longer contain themselves and eagerly asked, "Is what Daoist friend said true?"

Li Fan chuckled, his expression filled with pride. "I never utter falsehoods!"

"Moreover... there is no need for exaggeration." Li Fan dismissed them with a look of arrogance.

The elders of the Immortal Boat, who had been plotting in secret, instantly quelled their intentions.

They exchanged glances and whispered amongst themselves, discussing the credibility of Li Fan's words.

Nangong Lie: "One True Immortal script is worth more than all of ours combined? I don't believe such nonsense."

Gan Jingda: "It's better to believe it than not. The civilization this person belongs to has research capabilities comparable to ours. If they were lucky enough to discover something, acting rashly might cause us to miss this golden opportunity."

Lu Yuzhi: "Indeed. Possessing True Immortal scripts, it's too difficult to capture them alive. We can only strike swiftly and incapacitate him. In that case, we must extract as much knowledge from his mind as possible before acting."

"Regardless of the outcome, this child knows too many secrets of the Immortal Boat. We must not let him leave." This was a consensus already reached by the elders of the Immortal Boat. Therefore, after Zhong Daogong spoke these words, no one objected.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, posing a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"That scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"This divine soul trembled. Even more so than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion.

"Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"That scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"That scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

ed by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"
