In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!Chapter 1312

"The Remnant Realm Great Wall… how can such an anomaly appear at the frontier of the Star Sea?" Qiao Gong exclaimed in disbelief.

"No wonder worlds that were annihilated back then vanished without a trace. They were all gathered at the foot of the high wall? Remnant realms stretching endlessly, what kind of mighty power could create such a spectacle?" Bai Hua's face was also filled with shock.

Both of them had survived the destruction of the Star Sea and had witnessed countless cultivation realms turn into desolate lands with their own eyes. Therefore, compared to others, they could more profoundly grasp the awe-inspiring nature of the Remnant Realm Great Wall that stretched as far as the eye could see.

"I seem to..." As if recalling a memory buried deep in his mind, Yin Shangren pressed his forehead, wanting to speak but stopping.

Li Fan glanced at him but did not press further. Instead, he solemnly added, "Beyond the Remnant Realm Great Wall, there is another ring of Relic Great Walls serving as a barrier. These two safeguard the high wall, echoing each other and forming an array. The journey ahead is more perilous than going to the center of the Star Sea before. There is even a high possibility of falling to our deaths..."

Li Fan's gaze swept over everyone. "Whether to go or not is entirely up to you to decide."

"I will give you half a year to think. Do not blindly pursue higher levels of power. Even if you do nothing from now on, based on the merit of returning Xuanhuang's malevolent thoughts, you will still receive enough benefits when the Xuanhuang Realm completes its ascension." As Li Fan spoke, his figure slowly disappeared.

Qiao Gong and the others had varied expressions.

Certainly, the moment they saw the spectacle of the Remnant Realm Great Wall, their hearts were shaken, and the desire to witness it firsthand arose. However, Li Fan's words served as a reminder.

In this Star Sea, wonders often came with great power. Great power, therefore, meant danger.

The Remnant Realm Great Wall was like this, and so was the Immortal Ruins.

Moreover, only three or four fragments of remnant realms were needed as medicinal ingredients to stimulate the Xuanhuang Realm's swallowing and digestion capabilities. It was not necessary for everyone to go.

If this trip goes smoothly, there will be plenty of opportunities to contribute to the Xuanhuang Realm's ascension in the future.

With these thoughts, everyone began to calculate in their hearts.

Li Fan, of course, saw the subtle changes in their expressions. Through his many reincarnations, Li Fan understood the personalities of these people very well. He could guess their general thoughts at a glance.

"Seeking the Dao is the innate instinct of cultivators. However, this path is fraught with danger and hardship. Fear and hatred in one's heart are even greater obstacles to moving forward."

"How difficult it is to touch upon the so-called 'Dao'..."

Watching the choices of Qiao Gong and the others when faced with life and death and the pursuit of Dao, wisps of enlightenment inevitably arose in Li Fan's heart.

Waiting for the Heavenly Immortal Souls of the Super Xuanhuang Realm to merge with the Dao did not mean that Li Fan's cultivation would stagnate before then.

"Breathing, speaking, acting—all are cultivation."

"The thoughts of all sentient beings are like Dao scriptures."

On the Dao Platform, in the Great Profound Realm, the intentions and thoughts of countless beings poured into Li Fan's mind, one after another, and were perceived by him.

They transformed into the power that propelled the giant wheel of Li Fan's cultivation forward.

This life, he would be the Teacher of Heaven and Earth, not on a whim.

In his previous life, the Saint Emperor, while lecturing, mentioned the concept of "Thundering Dao Longevity." The reverse projection of the Dao could reveal the true meaning of Thundering Dao.

Through multiple attempts at "False becomes True," Li Fan had vaguely confirmed the conjecture of the loli regarding the Saint Emperor's new law.

The projection of the Great Dao from top to bottom formed the myriad realms.

Everything that existed in the Xuanhuang Realm, both material and conscious, could be seen as a projection of the Dao.

However, it was the very end of the projection, and tracing the Dao of the projection from bottom to top was an almost impossible task.

But as the only surviving land in the Star Sea, the Xuanhuang Realm had gathered too many impossibilities.

Just like the Eternal Relics, which resonated with the Dao, were peculiar existences.

In his previous life, Li Fan had gone to the Tianyang Cave Mansion in the Sea of Clouds. He had collected the Tianyang remains containing Eternal Relics.

He had tried various methods but could never sense the resonance of the Dao within.

However, Li Fan would not give up researching the resonance of the Dao because of this. Instead, he turned to find lower-level substitutes for the Eternal Relics.

In the 119th life, Li Fan used the faceless True Immortal statue as a guide and created the Red Dust Compassionate True Immortal Net. Among the countless believers, only Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi's intentions were the most dazzling and special.

Even within the Essence of Origin, they were extremely conspicuous.

They were undoubtedly "Seekers of Dao with Utmost Sincerity."

Previously, Li Fan thought this was merely due to their innate character. For Li Fan himself, it had no other benefit. But now, Li Fan discovered that the utmost sincere pursuit of Dao by Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi might be the seed of Eternal Relics.

In other words, if they were guided to continuously deepen their pursuit of Dao. After Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi died, perhaps by chance, "Eternal Relics" would be born.

"I cannot utilize Eternal Relics, but can I not use lower-level substitutes?"

This discovery from Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi inspired Li Fan. Coupled with the need to merge with the Heavenly Immortal Souls of the Super Xuanhuang Realm, Li Fan coincidentally became the "Teacher of Heaven and Earth" in this life.

On the Dao Platform, gathering the intentions of myriad beings. Like stars in the sky, each shining with a different brightness.

Some were exceptional, and Li Fan would pay special attention to them.

Unfortunately, he had not yet found anyone who could ascend to Eternal Relics.

However, Li Fan believed that with the Dao Platform eventually expanding to encompass the entire Xuanhuang Realm, besides Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi, he should be able to find others.

As for Kou Hong and Dao Xuanzi, with their current experience, they were still far from being the paramount Seekers of Dao they once were. Taking them as disciples would instead hinder their pursuit of Dao. Therefore, Li Fan did not act on them for the time being, and even added some difficulty to their cultivation.

He would wait for the flowers to bloom and bear fruit in the future before harvesting them.

"The Dao projects itself onto the myriad realms, and the beings within the worlds can always correspond to the traces of the Dao."

"These are materials I can use to increase my comprehension of the 'Transformation between True and False'."

Having personally experienced the power of "False becomes True," Li Fan had decided to prioritize promoting this matter to the second highest level. Second only to safeguarding his life.

As for realm, cultivation, and treasures.

These were things that could be obtained in every reincarnation, and could not be compared to it.

"However, it is said that these brilliant sentient thoughts should be like Eternal Relics; one can only enlighten them once. I wonder how many people in the entire Xuanhuang Realm can surprise me."

Li Fan's divine sense swept across the land, gazing at the Great Profound citizens who were still continuously arriving at the central Dao Platform. Li Fan nodded slightly.

His figure flickered, and in the next moment, Li Fan had already left the Great Profound Minor World.

He arrived at the Qiling Prefecture of the Xuanhuang Realm.

A vast underground space, filled with an invisible, eerie aura.

Even with Li Fan's current cultivation, he still had to gather enough Essence of Origin for protection before daring to enter this place.

Golden threads of Dao formed a protective formation, separating Li Fan from the terrifying power within this underground space.

"As I guessed. This Ancient Immortal-Miasma has also undergone a transformation and sublimation along with the Xuanhuang Realm," Li Fan concluded after careful observation.

In the 119th life, an earthquake occurred in Qiling Prefecture. The Ancient Immortal-Miasma sealed here leaked out, causing a bloodbath. Accumulated in the underground space for thousands of years, this Ancient Immortal-Miasma seemed to have undergone some change, becoming even more potent than its original version.

The Immortal-Miasma was created by Mr. Bai against the principles of heaven and earth. It was also a part of the principles of heaven and earth.

Now that the Xuanhuang Realm was beginning to evolve into a Super Xuanhuang Realm, the Ancient Immortal-Miasma in this underground space was also accumulating power for transformation.

"Mortals can also slay immortals..."

Li Fan reached out his hand, and the golden protective formation opened. An invisible force seized the opportunity and began to erode Li Fan's palm.

His brow furrowed. After sensing for just a moment, Li Fan decisively severed his entire arm.

Then, the Essence of Origin reapplied its protection, blocking the erosion of the Immortal-Miasma.

"Interesting."

In the time it took to breathe, Li Fan's severed arm had already regrown.

As for the arm that had remained in the Ancient Immortal-Miasma, it had been completely gnawed away by the surrounding invisible forces.

Not even bones were left, only a pile of sand-like residue.

A rare trace of excitement flashed in Li Fan's eyes.

Among his bound items for "Return to Reality," there was one called [Ten Thousand Man Essence Blood].

It was refined from tens of thousands of condemned prisoners.

However, the Immortal-Miasma power contained within this Ten Thousand Man Essence Blood was inferior to even a single wisp of this enhanced Ancient Immortal-Miasma.

"If the Xuanhuang Realm completes its final transformation, how potent will the Immortal-Miasma here eventually become?"

In Li Fan's deductions, the power of the Star Sea's resurgence, the legacy Immortal Spiritual Power of the Great Heavenly Venerates, and the remnants of power from the scattered realms in the Star Sea...

All these forces, pushing together, were enough to elevate the Xuanhuang Realm to a level infinitely close to the Immortal Realm.

Or, in a sense, this Super Xuanhuang Realm was the newly ascended Immortal Realm. It was just slightly weaker than the ancient Immortal Realm that had already been destroyed.

"At that time, even if I cannot slay immortals, I might be able to heavily injure them."

"More importantly, this Ancient Immortal-Miasma can continuously strengthen itself as the Xuanhuang Realm grows stronger. Its inherent nature of 'Mortals Slaying Immortals' determines its importance."

"One day, when I have the ability to truly elevate the Xuanhuang Realm to the Immortal Realm, this Immortal-Miasma will become a genuine Immortal-Slaying weapon!"

At this thought, Li Fan's gaze towards the invisible force within this vast space changed.

From Xuan Tian King's past experiences, and even from some clues obtained from outside the high wall, it could be inferred.

Achieving immortality within the Star Sea might involve unimaginable dangers.

And the birth of an Immortal Realm might also attract attention. However, Li Fan was not his main body. Even if a crisis descended, it would give Li Fan ample time for buffer.

Was it more difficult to achieve immortality oneself, or to facilitate the ascension of the Xuanhuang Realm into an Immortal Realm?

If one were not a madman, they would undoubtedly choose the latter.

But for Li Fan, the conclusion was the opposite.

"The legacy of the Great Heavenly Venerates and the Immortal Spiritual Power of Immortal Artifacts are resources that can be infinitely reused for me."

"In addition, there are other materials and powers in the entire Star Sea."

Li Fan's thoughts raced rapidly.

"Perhaps it's feasible."

"Just by waiting until the end of this life and seeing how far the Super Xuanhuang Realm, which I orchestrated, has come compared to the legendary Immortal Realm, I will be able to make a conclusion."

The transformation of the Ancient Immortal-Miasma opened Li Fan's mind.

Within the Xuanhuang Realm, embodied laws were countless.

As the Xuanhuang Realm ascended, these embodied laws, along with all beings nurtured within it, would transform.

Li Fan had clearly witnessed this process in his previous life.

"This is only when most of the Immortal Essence was used for the 'All Things Return to Void' great array. If all the Immortal Essence were fed back to catalyze the Xuanhuang Realm, the resulting Heavenly Immortal Souls would undoubtedly be unprecedentedly powerful..."

"With this Dao Integration, perhaps I can even master Immortal power," Li Fan deduced secretly.

Before Li Fan, all cultivators of the Xuanhuang Realm, except for the Dharma Transmitter Heavenly Venerate, were draining the essence of the Xuanhuang Realm.

Their cultivation and foundations were all built upon the Xuanhuang Realm.

No matter how they refined the principles of heaven and earth, they could not surpass the upper limit of power that the Xuanhuang Realm could provide.

What Li Fan intended to do was to first maximize the potential of the Xuanhuang Realm, and then proceed with Dao Integration.

"Furthermore, the uncontrolled ascension of the Xuanhuang Realm might even shake the foundation of the Dharma Transmitter..." Li Fan's gaze flickered as he deduced something.

It was still the same prison analogy.

The Great Heavenly Venerates of the Xuanhuang Realm were dismantling the prison beams, replacing them, filling them in, and integrating into the prison.

What Li Fan intended to do was to expand the prison.

Once its scale was expanded several times, he would then replace it.

The Dharma Transmitter had almost complete control over the old prison. But if the prison's area suddenly expanded several times...

He would face the risk of the Xuanhuang Realm falling out of control.

"This plan has another benefit."

"Based on my understanding of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, as long as I do not reveal my intention to integrate with the Heavenly Immortal Souls, it will not harbor any hostility towards me. In fact, it might even provide secret assistance."

"After all, I am helping it achieve sublimation."

"With the assistance of the Xuanhuang Heavenly Dao, I can successfully deceive the Dharma Transmitter and the Heavenly Physician outside the Star Sea without anyone noticing."

"By the time they realize something is wrong and want to return, the immortal array I have prepared in advance will be enough to hold them back."

...

Li Fan pondered the plan, nodding slightly.

In addition to improving his own realm, he could also enhance his combat power through external means.

For example: True Immortal script.

In his previous life, within the Profound Immortal Boat, Li Fan comprehended five completely new True Immortal scripts.

Although they were not complete True Immortal scripts, but imitations and reconstructions by the cultivators of the Immortal Boat.

They were sufficient to deal with Supreme Beings of the Star Sea.

In fact, Li Fan's greatest gain from the True Immortal script in his previous life did not come from the Profound Immortal Boat.

It came from the Dharma Derivation Jade.

The True Immortal script in the Dharma Der's memory was different from the purely destructive force that permeated the Star Sea.

Li Fan's heart stirred, and he flashed to the area above the clouds outside the Dissolution Mountain.

Although he only had the cultivation of the Foundation Establishment stage, his spiritual energy was condensed.

He used his hand as a brush, and with a wave, it was done.

An extremely profound character appeared and immediately disintegrated.

This was because the Foundation Establishment stage cultivation was insufficient to support it to display its full power.

But the moment this True Immortal script appeared in the world.

The Great Profound Minor World suddenly let out a thunderclap.

There were no dark clouds, yet a rain began to fall, covering the entire minor world.

The harsh winter season of the twelfth lunar month gradually turned warm like spring under the nourishment of the rain.

Li Fan even sensed wisps of spiritual energy in the world, emerging from nowhere.

Unlike the spiritual energy created by the Dao One Worm,

this spiritual energy, though weak, was naturally generated by the minor world itself.

Li Fan hovered high in the sky, observing the changes in the Great Profound Minor World as it came to life under the rain.

What surprised him even more was that the Heavenly Dao consciousness of the Great Profound Minor World seemed to be gestating.

Because there was no spiritual energy, the Great Profound had no Heavenly Dao consciousness before. Or rather, its Heavenly Dao consciousness was extremely weak, so weak that even Li Fan

Chapter 1316: A Sword Across the Star Sea

It was not truly that the flow of time had changed.

Rather, the Xuanhuang world surrounding the Boundless Mirror had expanded its rate of evolution countless times.

As if its acceleration button had been pressed, in the span of a single breath, light and shadow flickered tens of millions of times.

The ancient Boundless Mirror visibly grew more weathered.

One could even clearly see tiny, dust-like gray particles flying out from the Boundless Mirror, carried away by the wind, and then dissipating into the air.

A divine sense had remained almost an entire lifetime within the Boundless Mirror. Li Fan understood it better than its original spirit, Ling Sun Luyao. Therefore, he could discern the changes occurring to the Boundless Mirror.

"This is the process of Xuanhuang world digestion..."

Although the shell of the Boundless Mirror gradually dissolved, the power of the deduction laws contained within it remained. It was obvious that the energy level of an immortal artifact was still above the current Xuanhuang Realm. Therefore, Xuanhuang Realm did not have the ability to fully digest it.

Time continued to evolve at a rate of tens of millions of times. The ancient Boundless Mirror began to decay, being eroded until only the mirror surface remained.

Finally, it completely dissolved, leaving behind only a phantom, quietly floating in the air.

As if sensing the power of this dispersed immortal artifact law, Xuanhuang Realm underwent an inexplicable change.

Although this change was almost formless, with Li Fan's current strength and understanding of the Xuanhuang Realm, he could clearly see everything happening before his eyes.

A transparent human figure approached the phantom of the Boundless Mirror. The power of countless years of time and the changing of seas and lands seemed to have no effect on it.

The transparent figure floated closer and gradually overlapped with the phantom, as if swallowing the Boundless Mirror into its belly.

Then, like ripples on the surface of water, the human figure slowly merged into the Xuanhuang world and disappeared from Li Fan's sight.

From beginning to end, this human figure did not even glance at Li Fan.

It was as if taking away the power of the Boundless Mirror's law was the only thing it cared about.

"The Soul of Heaven and Earth, a type I've never seen before."

"And unlike all other Souls of Heaven and Earth, cultivators who see it have no greedy desire to devour it..."

Li Fan retracted his World-Ending Transformation divine ability and peered into the distance.

He seemed to see that at this very moment, in some corner of the Xuanhuang Realm, the transparent human figure was possessing a newborn infant.

As the infant grew, a new Boundless Mirror would be born. However, it would no longer be an immortal artifact, but a wonder of the Xuanhuang world!

Normally, the Xuanhuang Realm would take thousands or even tens of thousands of years to complete the entire process of digestion and transformation. But with the blessing of Li Fan's World-Ending Transformation, this process was completed in less than half a day.

Logically speaking, helping the Xuanhuang Realm digest and absorb an immortal artifact should have resulted in a slight increase in goodwill. However, Li Fan waited for a while but still did not detect any increase in the Xuanhuang Realm's goodwill.

After pondering for a moment, Li Fan understood. The Transformation of Seas and Lands was, in essence, a consumption of "lifespan" for the Xuanhuang Realm. One step forward, one step back, it was a wash.

Li Fan did not actually care about this. After all, the growth in the Xuanhuang Realm's strength was tangible. Every bit of growth in the Xuanhuang Realm's power would be synchronized to the future Xuanhuang Immortal Soul. And he would forever be the ultimate beneficiary.

He withdrew his gaze, and Li Fan vaguely sensed that as the power of the Boundless Mirror's law integrated into the Xuanhuang Realm. A qualitative change, from nothingness to existence, was brewing.

"The Dao of deduction from the Boundless Mirror does not currently exist in the Xuanhuang Realm. Once the Xuanhuang Realm swallows it and makes it its own..."

"The Heavenly Dao capable of foreseeing the future, how interesting."

The Heavenly Dao should have recorded most of the past and present events within the Xuanhuang Realm. With sufficient information, the accuracy of predicting the future might even surpass that of the Boundless Mirror at its peak.

"This is the highest realm of deduction mentioned in the Taiyan Sect's [Nine Scrolls of Heaven Deduction], using heavenly calculations instead of human calculations."

"Devouring immortal artifacts, for the Xuanhuang Realm, is not just an increase in power. It is more about the completion of laws. With each immortal artifact devoured, it gets one step closer to the true Immortal Realm." Threads of enlightenment suddenly surged in Li Fan's heart.

...

Ten days later.

On the Great Profound Dao Discussion Platform.

Yin Shangren, Bai Hua, Qiao Gong, and Xu Ke had already arrived, all waiting for Li Fan's arrival.

The determination to seek the Dao had ultimately overcome the fear of unknown risks.

"The last time we traveled to the center of the Star Sea, it took us nearly a month and a half. This time, going to the foot of the high wall, I wonder how long it will take," Qiao Gong sighed with emotion.

"The Saint Master said that the frontier of the Star Sea is even more dangerous. Perhaps taking several years to return is normal," Bai Hua frowned.

Yin Shangren smiled. "Let's think on the bright side. Perhaps we'll encounter some disaster along the way and never return?"

Qiao Gong and Bai Hua were speechless.

As the few were discussing, Li Fan's figure appeared on the Dao Discussion Platform at this moment.

Without immediately leading them out, he sat solemnly on the platform and began to expound.

This time, what Li Fan was teaching was "The Way of the Sword."

"There are three types of swordsmen in the world."

"The lowest: forge their will with resilient iron, temper their bodies with sharp weapons. They refine their hearts in the sword, their bodies and sword becoming one. They wield the sword to vanquish enemies, their bodies and sword united."

"Above that: the sword in hand is the sword in the heart; the sword in the heart can transform into the sword in hand. Whatever the mind conceives, all things in the world can become a sword."

"The highest: the realm of 'No Sword, No Self'."

...

After the initial overview of the three levels, Li Fan began to explain each level in detail.

Below the Dao Discussion Platform, everyone listened and gradually became engrossed.

Even Qiao Gong and the other three were captivated by Li Fan's lecture and temporarily forgot their mission to travel to the frontier of the Star Sea.

As Li Fan's lecture deepened, various auspicious phenomena appeared in the sky. Ignoring the ones that appeared regularly during each lecture.

The most eye-catching was the countless swords flying from all over the Great Profound, arriving as if summoned.

Although they were all ordinary mortal iron swords, they could now fly through the air. As if paying homage to a king or a sage, they stopped in the air, their sword bodies slightly bowed, performing a slight salute.

More and more swords gathered, obscuring the sky and sun, forming a forest of swords above the Dao Discussion Platform.

Tens of thousands of swords stood silently, as if also listening to Li Fan's sermon.

"Holding no sword in hand, nor in the heart; form is not revealed, yet intent always remains..."

When Li Fan uttered his last words after seven days,

All the flying swords erupted in dazzling light in unison.

After the sword light dissipated, the cultivators on the Dao Discussion Platform were shocked to discover that all the flying swords had vanished!

Most cultivators were bewildered, believing that all the flying swords had returned.

Only a few cultivators with exceptional comprehension stared blankly at the sky, as if struck by inspiration.

"No sword, no self, the sword intent remains forever..." Xu Ke muttered to himself, unfolding his palm, and a phantom of a long sword appeared above it.

The other three exchanged a sharp glance.

Just as they were about to discuss, they suddenly heard Li Fan's voice: "The preparations are almost complete, it's time to set off."

"Know this, the journey ahead is fraught with unknown dangers, and retreat is not an option." Li Fan confirmed with them one last time.

Everyone nodded, indicating their understanding.

"Sword..."

"Rise..."

A gust of wind blew, and the phantom of the wooden sword, like a giant flying ship, enveloped Yin Shangren and the others.

Li Fan's figure stood at the tip of the sword, pointing forward into the air.

The surrounding scenery changed dramatically. The world seemed to stretch and distort into countless twisted lines, speeding backward. Then, the light merged and transformed into twisted colors of various hues.

The phantom of the wooden sword isolated Yin Shangren and the others from the strange and chaotic sceneries outside.

Although they could feel the wooden sword carrying them rapidly towards the depths of the Star Sea, those inside the phantom of the wooden sword felt no change in their speed.

Outside the phantom of the wooden sword, the revealed light suddenly turned dark. The colors faded, leaving only distorted shadows. Yin Shangren's expression changed slightly. "Are we already leaving the influence of the Immortal Ruins?"

The response he received was the shocked expressions of the other three.

"Didn't you say the path ahead would be fraught with danger?" Qiao Gong's tone was unreadable.

They could vaguely sense that the phantom of the wooden sword was charging through the Star Sea, unstoppable.

Ignoring the hidden perils, it continuously accelerated towards its destination.

"No sword, no self, no sword, no self..."

"A sword inherently does not exist in the world. Even the calamity that destroyed the Star Sea can only be helpless against something that does not exist!" Xu Ke's eyes were fixed on the phantom of the wooden sword, becoming brighter and brighter.

At this moment, Li Fan's voice rang out again: "Having the courage and conviction to choose to follow me deep into the Star Sea has already proven your courage and faith."

"You have all managed to survive until now... unnecessary sacrifices should be avoided as much as possible."

"Saint Master..." The four looked at Li Fan's back as he stood at the tip of the sword, their expressions complex.

Li Fan did not concern himself with what the four behind him were thinking.

He was currently comprehending this Swordsmanship that had reached its limit.

Ten days ago, after helping the Xuanhuang Realm digest the Boundless Mirror, Li Fan had visited the Heavenly Sword Sect ruins.

In the center of the Sword Tomb, the wooden sword seemed to have become extraordinary due to the transformation of the Xuanhuang Realm in this life.

Compared to thousands of years ago when Mr. Bai casually created it, the wooden sword now seemed more profound, perhaps due to the erosion of time.

"Who knows how many immortal artifacts the Xuanhuang Realm Heavenly Dao has devoured."

"Perhaps there are some laws within them that have supplemented the Xuanhuang Sword Dao..."

Li Fan had previously encountered and sensed this wooden sword in the Fallen Immortal Realm and the real world.

The insights gained each time were different.

Especially now.

After personally coming into contact with Immortal Spiritual Power and personally setting up the World-Ending Immortal Array, upon seeing this wooden sword again, Li Fan had new ideas.

"The more one knows, the more one sees."

"Or rather, the projection of the Sword Dao onto the Xuanhuang Realm has become more vivid."

Li Fan comprehended the Dao in the Sword Tomb for seven days, not taking away the black sword from the Sword Tomb, allowing it to continue to be influenced by the wooden sword.

Upon returning, he transmitted all his insights onto the Dao Discussion Platform.

Finally, it transformed into a divine ability, which, carrying Yin Shangren and the others, rapidly flew towards the frontier of the Star Sea.

This phantom of "No Sword, No Self" was not merely a simple Dao of the Sword.

It was Li Fan's integration of various experiences, including the "[Transformation between True and False]," the forbidden technique "[Secluded Void Concealment]" taught by the Heavenly Physician, and the Golden Lock Across the Heavens array of the Vast Crossing Star Sea Array.

Not only was its speed extremely fast, but it could also exist between reality and illusion, almost disregarding the residual True Immortal script power along the way.

However, he had not truly reached the realm of transforming the virtual into the real. The phantom of the wooden sword would still be affected by some residual True Immortal power.

It was just that the phantom of the wooden sword was flying too fast, even exceeding the speed at which the residual True Immortal power could take effect, thus creating the illusion of charging forward unimpeded.

As the wielder of the sword, Li Fan could clearly sense that the energy maintaining the phantom of the wooden sword was rapidly depleting.

If not for his foundation being built on the Five Elements Great Grotto-Heavens and the Xuanhuang World-Ending Transformation, his immensely profound foundation, almost comparable to several cultivation realms combined, would be utterly insufficient.

"Throughout the entire Xuanhuang Realm, besides the Heavenly Physician, even the longevity cultivators of the Five Elders Council might not be able to unleash this sword." Looking at the rapidly changing space and time of the Star Sea, Li Fan couldn't help but feel a hint of pride.

With the enhancement of the wooden sword phantom, a journey that originally took more than half a year was now completed in just two to three days, with the destination appearing in the distance.

Upon seeing several familiar relics floating in the desolate Star Sea, Li Fan controlled the speed to slow down.

"Is this the Sea of Relics that the Saint Master spoke of?" Qiao Gong squinted, gazing ahead.

"It should be the accumulation of items left behind after the destruction of various realms in the ancient cultivation world," Bai Hua recognized some decorative objects among them and introduced them to everyone.

Yin Shangren, however, had been silent since arriving here. He occasionally pressed his temples, his expression gloomy and uncertain.

The phantom of the wooden sword slowly shuttled through the Sea of Relics. In no time, they had left this area.

Ahead of everyone, a larger aggregate of ruins suddenly appeared in view.

It almost filled the entire field of vision. Even though they were merely ruins and debris,

The accumulation of countless world corpses still sent shivers down everyone's spines.

The phantom of the wooden sword fell into deathly silence.

At this moment, the phantom of the wooden sword suddenly stopped.

"Hmm?"

Everyone woke up.

They saw Li Fan fly out of the phantom and begin setting up an array in a clear area between the Sea of Relics and the Remnant Realm Great Wall.

Golden lines, as if alive, quickly drew various patterns in the air.

They only shone for a moment before disappearing into the darkness.

Various items flew out from Li Fan's body and merged with the great array.

At a glance, this array was extraordinary.

Everyone at such close proximity, yet they could not sense the slightest fluctuation of the array.

"Fellow Daoist Yin, what kind of array is this?" Qiao Gong asked in surprise, whispering.

Yin Shangren shook his head, his gaze not on Li Fan's array, but occasionally drifting towards the distant Remnant Realm Great Wall.

Li Fan had no reservations. The array he set up in front of everyone was the Immortal Array he had recently learned from the primordial soul of Ji Yuzhen, a Dharma King of the Xuan Tian Sect.

The Heaven's End, Reachable Within a Thousand Miles!

Ji Yuzhen herself did not understand formations. She had only encountered the Heaven's End, Reachable Within a Thousand Miles formation several times under Xuan Tianwang's guidance.

But with the assistance of the Ultimate Separation Disc, Li Fan was able to roughly reconstruct it.

Chapter 1317: True Immortal Power Attracts Enemies

The array, as its name suggested.

The Great Array of Heaven's End, Within Reach, could transform the distance of the heavens' end into the space of mere inches. Once the great array was completed, it would connect the Xuanhuang Realm with the frontier of the Star Sea. Even without the technique of the Wooden Sword in the Sky, one could travel instantly through the great array.

It seemed to be a super-distance teleportation formation, but that was not the case.

Within the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, the residual power of true immortals permeated the area. The Xuanhuang Realm was located at the edge of the Immortal Ruins, subject to endless pulling forces, and even spacetime was subtly distorted. Traveling such a vast distance was uncontrollable. Teleportation was simply impossible.

The Great Array of Heaven's End, Within Reach, utilized the most primitive method of travel. It merely shortened the distance between the departure and destination infinitely, allowing one to reach it with a single step.

The entire Great Profound Minor World could not accommodate such a colossal immortal array. Therefore, Li Fan set up the great array in the void outside the Great Profound Minor World in the Xuanhuang Realm, and then laid down a concealment formation.

And here, at the frontier of the Star Sea, as Li Fan gradually completed the array, an extremely mystical fluctuation instantly descended, about to sweep outwards and spread.

However, Li Fan quickly used a finger gesture, and with another concealment formation, blocked it.

The golden light of the great array dimmed, and a bidirectional passage between the Xuanhuang Realm and the Star Sea frontier was silently born.

Li Fan hovered in the void, regulating his breathing and recovering.

"As expected of an immortal-grade great array. Even with the Ultimate Separation Disc assisting me, setting it up was quite strenuous." The accumulated Origin Force Essence was completely depleted. Li Fan was temporarily in a state of exhaustion.

"Origin Force Essence, compared to true Immortal Spiritual Power, still has a qualitative gap," Li Fan thought to himself. Within a few breaths, the power within his body became replenished.

He sent a trace of his divine sense into the Great Array of Heaven's End, Within Reach, and then activated it.

He felt his vision blur, and in the next moment, he was back in the void outside Great Profound, within the Xuanhuang Realm.

Li Fan then leisurely returned to the phantom of the Wooden Sword.

"I have set up a Dharma Transmission Array here. In the future, traveling back and forth will not be so troublesome," Li Fan said casually.

Yin Shangren and the others were all shaken by his words. With their understanding, they naturally knew how extraordinary such a teleportation array spanning the entire Star Sea was.

The super-distance teleportation arrays between the various prefectures within the Xuanhuang Realm often required more than ten formation masters working together for more than half a year to complete. Not to mention this grand formation that could connect the Star Sea frontier with the Xuanhuang Realm. Yet, such a formation was completed by a mere gesture from the Saint Master...

At first, the four of them were somewhat skeptical.

However, when Li Fan invited them to try it out, and they passed through the formation, feeling the familiar aura of the Great Profound Minor World once more, all their doubts vanished, replaced by immense shock and reverence for Li Fan.

"One formation appears, and the boundless Star Sea becomes a thoroughfare. The Saint Master's methods are truly comparable to a True Immortal," Qiao Gong marveled.

"This formation, this formation..." Yin Shangren murmured, deeply shocked.

Li Fan's voice drew them back. "This place will be our transfer and supply station for future explorations."

"Whether it's the Sea of Relics or the Remnant Realm Great Wall, their vastness far exceeds that of the Xuanhuang Realm. Finding suitable remnant realms is not an easy task."

Qiao Gong: "May the Saint Master enlighten us, what is the mystery behind this? Isn't it enough to find a remnant realm to serve as Xuanhuang's medicinal catalyst?"

Li Fan smiled faintly and extended his hand towards the distant Sea of Relics.

Swish!

A relic was attracted and flew rapidly towards their location.

Faintly visible, the relic was a blue and white robe. Eroded by time, it was already in tatters. The bloodstains on it had also turned black.

"Hmm?"

As the relic robe flew closer, Qiao Gong and the others' expressions changed in unison.

In their perception, the distance between themselves and their companions was rapidly increasing as the relic robe approached. It was as if the world had suddenly become vast, and their bodies had shrunk countless times. Even their communication became inaudible.

"True Immortal Power!" They finally realized that this was the influence of the True Immortal power carried by the relic robe.

As the robe drew nearer, their distances continued to widen.

Though standing beside each other, they could not see each other.

As if isolated by the entire world,

In the boundless emptiness, Li Fan's voice resounded from the heavens like peals of thunder.

"In the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, various realms have been shattered. But the perpetrators of world destruction, from the powers of True Immortal scripts, still pervade and remain."

"The various disasters we encountered on our journey to the center of the Star Sea are all manifestations of these residual True Immortal powers."

"The continuous relics and remnant realms before us also contain this power."

"This robe contains a character: [Separation]..."

Boom!

The vision instantly returned to normal. The relic robe also changed its flight direction and flew back into the Sea of Relics.

And above everyone's heads, a profound and extremely complex "character" flickered dimly.

"True Immortal... script?"

Everyone stared blankly at the character above their heads. They could faintly feel the terrifying power contained within.

"[Separation]..." Recalling the experience of being separated from everything around them just now, they used their hands as brushes, attempting to learn and imitate.

Unexpectedly, the character suddenly dimmed and vanished into the air.

Even the memories left in their minds became blurred. No matter how they tried to recall, they could never reproduce it.

"There are too many residual True Immortal powers in the Star Sea. Acting rashly might trigger a resonance with these remnants. To study True Immortal scripts, special methods are needed," Li Fan gently tapped his finger, and a method instantly flew into everyone's minds.

This was the [Myriad Laws] technique that Li Fan had learned from the Profound Immortal Boat in his previous life, a method used to study and teach True Immortal scripts, applicable to the Proof of Dao Academy, Immortal Hub Courtyard, and Severed Immortal Tower.

Every True Immortal script was a projection of the power of the Dao. Even if it was only a similar form and not the actual True Immortal script, it contained immense destructive power. If it exploded within the Immortal Boat, it would undoubtedly cause indelible damage. To avoid triggering the power of True Immortal scripts, yet still be able to study them, the Profound Immortal Boat had spent generations of painstaking effort to create this method.

Each stroke of the character, and even the process of wielding the brush, had been deliberately modified, appearing similar yet not. The dots were not dots, the horizontals were not horizontals, the strokes were not strokes. When combined, they looked like characters, but were not.

Like the most incompetent imitators. The True Immortal scripts replicated using this method had the form but lacked the essence, reducing the power of the True Immortal scripts by a million times.

As a result, the influence of the True Immortal scripts during the research process could be ignored. At the same time, when the true, complete True Immortal script was replicated, the energy fluctuation of the character that had abruptly increased several times could also serve as a good judgment standard.

To truly unleash the power of the True Immortal script, all modifications need only be erased when activated.

It was precisely because of this wonderful method that the Immortal Boat's generations of cultivators had been able to study and inherit True Immortal scripts.

Within the Immortal Boat, only by being accepted as a disciple by a ruling elder was one eligible to know this method.

At this moment, Li Fan, without any additional conditions, freely imparted this marvelous method to Yin Shangren and the others.

Both the Myriad Laws technique and the character [Separation] profoundly shocked the few of them.

If what Li Fan had taught before was still within the realm of the "mortal," then this character [Separation] was undoubtedly a genuine True Immortal power.

In the current cultivation world, possessing such great power, yet not cherishing it as a treasure, but teaching it to others for free...

Regardless of what speculations Yin Shangren and the others had about Li Fan's motives, they were all conquered by his selfless demeanor at this moment.

"He is worthy of the title 'Saint Master'." They all felt this way in their hearts.

Li Fan's lecture continued.

Using the Myriad Laws technique, Li Fan rewrote the character [Separation] again. He frankly admitted, "I have never seen the character [Separation] itself. I only inferred the origin of the True Immortal script from the residual power contained in the relic, based on the remnant power."

"Like a blind person touching an elephant, there are naturally errors. The smaller the error, the more it can reproduce the original power of the True Immortal script. This [Separation] character has been pondered by me to 98% similarity. However, I have not been able to make further progress for a long time." Li Fan said with a sigh.

Everyone eagerly gazed at the character Li Fan had written.

They did not slight it just because it was a similar form.

While they were studying, subtle fluctuations were transmitted from afar.

Yin Shangren and the others did not notice, but Li Fan's eyes flashed with a discerning light.

"Finally, they're here."

With a wave of his hand, he withdrew the Wooden Sword phantom and the concealment formation of the Great Array of Heaven's End, Within Reach. He himself sped towards the direction of the fluctuating signals.

In no time, two figures met head-on.

Li Fan looked at the approaching figures. It was the Great Elder of the Severed Immortal Tower, Zhong Daogong!

Zhong Daogong's expression was solemn. He looked at Li Fan, a hint of confusion flickering in his eyes.

He had sensed a familiar power fluctuation erupt and then disappear from the Immortal Boat earlier. Thus, he came to investigate.

He initially thought it was the residual True Immortal power from a relic erupting, but unexpectedly, the source of the power was a cultivator!

How many years had it been since he had seen a cultivator outside the Immortal Boat?

Zhong Daogong did not dare to be careless. "May I ask, Daoist friend, why have you summoned me here...?"

Li Fan, however, chuckled dismissively. "Fellow Daoist, you must have misunderstood. I was merely teaching my disciples True Immortal scripts, and I did not expect to attract your attention."

"I never imagined that there were still cultivators alive in this Star Sea frontier?" Li Fan's tone was filled with surprise and curiosity.

Zhong Daogong's eyes narrowed as he sized Li Fan up and pondered.

He had sensed a familiar power fluctuation erupt and then disappear from the Immortal Boat earlier. Thus, he came to investigate.

He initially thought it was the residual True Immortal power from a relic erupting, but unexpectedly, the source of the power was a cultivator!

How many years had it been since he had seen a cultivator outside the Immortal Boat?

Zhong Daogong did not dare to be careless. "May I ask, fellow Daoist, why have you summoned me here...?"

Li Fan, however, chuckled dismissively. "Fellow Daoist, you must have misunderstood. I was merely teaching my disciples True Immortal scripts, and I did not expect to attract your attention."

"I never imagined that there were still cultivators alive in this Star Sea frontier?" Li Fan's tone was filled with surprise and curiosity.

Zhong Daogong's eyes narrowed as he sized Li Fan up and pondered.

He keenly noticed Li Fan's words, "Star Sea frontier." At the same time, Li Fan's explanation about teaching True Immortal scripts also made his heart tremble.

Without confirming the other party's intentions, Zhong Daogong did not act directly but continued to probe. "Judging from your words, fellow Daoist, it seems you have come from the depths of the Star Sea? Could it be that within the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, there are still surviving civilizations?"

Li Fan sighed, "Traveling all this way, all I saw was emptiness. I also thought there were no other survivors in the Star Sea. To think that at the end of my journey, I would encounter a cultivator again..."

The two exchanged words, probing each other.

After a round of exchanges, Zhong Daogong only knew that the other party had come from the depths of the Star Sea, but he had no idea about the form, scale, or strength of the other party's world.

Clearly, this cultivator who could traverse the Star Sea was not a pure and innocent being.

Zhong Daogong re-examined Li Fan carefully.

Unable to discern the other party's background, Zhong Daogong suppressed the urge to act directly and capture him.

"You mentioned earlier that you were teaching your disciples True Immortal scripts. I wonder..." Zhong Daogong changed the subject, continuing to probe.

Unexpectedly, Li Fan did not hide this time and said generously, "The Star Sea civilizations have been destroyed, and True Immortal residual powers run rampant. To survive, one must naturally borrow these powers."

"After thousands of years of research, we have achieved some results. Survival is no longer as difficult as it was initially."

Li Fan's words were completely aligned with the philosophy of the Profound Immortal Boat. Zhong Daogong nodded, not refuting him.

"It seems that your homeland's research into True Immortal scripts has reached quite a level. To be frank, we have also studied True Immortal powers for thousands of years, but we have not dared to traverse the Star Sea so easily. We have only been confined to one region." Zhong Daogong said.

Li Fan smiled faintly. "Fellow Daoist, there is no need for modesty. I can sense... on your body..."

"The scent of True Immortal scripts." Li Fan's tone was unfathomable.

Zhong Daogong's expression changed slightly.

Before Zhong Daogong could speak, Li Fan directly used his hand as a brush and wrote a character [Separation].

"Fellow Daoist, please take a look at this character."

The faintly visible character drifted in the void.

Zhong Daogong could no longer hide his shock. He retreated sharply, looking at Li Fan with great caution.

"Who exactly are you? Why do you know our Profound Immortal Boat's [Myriad Laws]?"

"[Myriad Laws]?" Li Fan looked perplexed and then suddenly realized.

"You mean, the parallel technique?"

"This was naturally created by our ancestors through painstaking research to analyze True Immortal scripts."

Li Fan looked at Zhong Daogong with great interest. "Could it be that you also know this technique?"

Not only did he know it, but Zhong Daogong's thoughts raced furiously as he tried to find a list of people within the Immortal Boat who had been taught this technique.

There was no indication of anyone leaving the Immortal Boat.

"Could it be mere coincidence?" Zhong Daogong was somewhat unsure.

He stared at the character [Separation] that Li Fan had written.

"It's even further advanced than the Immortal Boat's research?!"

Discovering this, Zhong Daogong's heart was once again filled with immense shock.

Not only because the research on the True Immortal script [Separation] was still ahead of the Immortal Boat.

But also because the other party so easily displayed the incomparably precious True Immortal script to a stranger. One must know that every True Immortal script was an absolute secret within the Immortal Boat.

Even he, as the Great Elder of the Severed Immortal Tower, was not qualified to leak it casually.

" It can only mean that in this person's homeland, the research on True Immortal scripts has already reached a certain height. The character [Separation] is no longer necessary to keep secret." Zhong Daogong couldn't help but think.

A thought arose in Zhong Daogong's mind.

"Fellow Daoist, would you be interested in coming to our place as a guest?" Zhong Daogong asked.

Li Fan's expression immediately showed hesitation.

Zhong Daogong understood Li Fan's hesitation very well, so he frankly said, "If you are still worried, then we can do it here in the Star Sea void."

"Mainly, I wish to exchange research findings on True Immortal scripts with fellow Daoist in detail."

Chapter 1318: Transaction Under the High Wall

"Exchanging insights..." Li Fan pondered for a long time, remaining silent.

Seeing this, Zhong Daogong let out a long breath. Using black and white ink as a brush, he inscribed a character in the void.

"Observe, Daoist." Zhong Daogong was extremely solemn. Even in the deserted Star Sea, he laid down restrictions around them to prevent the character’s essence from leaking out.

The character flickered between light and dark, undulating like a sentient creature flowing through the air.

Li Fan glanced at it and said casually, "So it is [Abhorrence (憎)]..."

"However, your version of [Abhorrence] seems to contain several fallacies."

Zhong Daogong’s expression shifted. Before he could speak, Li Fan said proudly, "Observe my version of [Abhorrence]."

His brush moved like a dancing dragon and a startled snake. In an instant, another character—seemingly identical but fundamentally different—suddenly appeared.

The two [Abhorrence] characters stood side-by-side.

Zhong Daogong stared at the character Li Fan had written. He froze at first, and then his body began to tremble uncontrollably.

As the Great Elder of the Severing Immortal Tower (断仙楼) and the scholar with the deepest research into True Immortal Runes within the Profound Immortal Vessel (玄仙舟), Zhong Daogong could clearly distinguish the subtle differences between the two.

Judging by the fluctuations faintly emanating from the characters, Li Fan’s version was significantly more complete than his own! The degree of refinement far surpassed the previous [Separation (离)] rune!

"This... this..." Stunned by consecutive blows, Zhong Daogong found it difficult to accept for a moment. However, his lifelong research instincts took over, causing him to cast aside all distractions and begin contemplating the character Li Fan had provided.

Every detail modified brought it closer to its primordial essence. Had he explored this on his own, it would have taken ten or twenty years of painstaking research to catch up. But here, a single glance was worth countless nights of toil.

Zhong Daogong had no way of knowing that this version of [Abhorrence] actually originated from himself several decades into the future. At this moment, he had only one thought: he must "invite" this cultivator back to the Profound Immortal Vessel, even if it meant using force!

True Immortal Runes were far too important to the vessel. Every new rune understood meant a massive leap in their combat power. Furthermore, the vital plan they were working on required collecting as many different types of True Immortal Runes as possible.

With this in mind, after deeply etching the new [Abhorrence] into his memory, Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan with admiration. "Your level is profound, Daoist. I am far inferior!"

"However... in my homeland, there are more than ten scholars who research runes like I do. They have delved deep for many years; their collective understanding is not below mine..."

Li Fan shook his head, a flash of disdain in his eyes as he interrupted Zhong Daogong. "To be honest, in my Great Qi (大启)..." Li Fan paused. "Everyone is united in heart and purpose to survive this ruined Star Sea. All research on True Immortal Runes is shared. Conversely, on your side..."

Zhong Daogong was delighted by this. He explained seriously, "Actually, we have a similar sharing system. But since it involves the research results of others, it is inconvenient for me to display them without review. However, if you are willing to share and exchange, I guarantee there will be new gains."

"You surely know how difficult it is to study these runes. If we can complement each other's knowledge..."

Under Zhong Daogong’s persuasion, Li Fan slowly seemed to change his mind.

Finally, Zhong Daogong applied a "heavy dose" of temptation: "In my homeland, we also possess a genuine original copy of a True Immortal Rune. If our exchange goes well, it is not impossible for you to see it with your own eyes."

Zhong Daogong knew exactly how irresistible an original rune was to people like them. After speaking, he stared intently at Li Fan.

As expected, Li Fan’s eyes lit up, his hesitation vanishing. "Is that true?"

After receiving Zhong Daogong’s affirmation, Li Fan finally nodded in agreement.

"However, for the first exchange, let us do it here in the void," Li Fan suddenly added.

He gestured toward a nearby area, and silver lines began to interweave. A grand array slowly unfolded. Within the array, pavilions and towers rose from the ground, hidden among small bridges and flowing water. Clear springs flowed beneath the bridges, shimmering with light, and one could even see fish playing in the water.

The light and shadows flickered, appearing as real as a dream.

Seeing this, Zhong Daogong’s pupils constricted.

Li Fan flew into the array first, sitting in a pavilion by the water. He looked back and said, "This place will do."

"As they say, one must have a heart of caution. Coming to the edge of the Star Sea alone, I must naturally be careful." Li Fan spoke as if it were only logical.

Zhong Daogong pondered for a moment before flying into the array himself.

The sound of birds chirping filled his ears. Walking across the bridge, water flowed beneath him. Zhong Daogong could even feel the moist warmth of the air. It was hard to imagine that this scenery was generated in an instant by an array!

"I didn't expect that besides runes, you are also an expert in arrays?" Zhong Daogong surveyed the area. He could vaguely tell this was just an array for building structures in the Star Sea, but the fact that it could produce such a "False-is-True" illusion that even he found hard to distinguish spoke volumes of its quality.

"Just a minor trick," Li Fan said dismissively. "Studying runes has exhausted my heart's blood. How could I have energy for arrays?"

Zhong Daogong deeply agreed and nodded.

After observing the array and finding nothing suspicious, Zhong Daogong cupped his hands. "Then it is settled. Wait here, Daoist. I will return with the others before this incense burns out."

Zhong Daogong waved his sleeve, and a stick of earthy-yellow incense flew out, standing upright in the air. The fire was lit, and thin smoke drifted. Zhong Daogong bid farewell and vanished into the dark Star Sea.

Li Fan stared at his departure for a long time before returning to Yin Shangren and the others.

"Master..."

Li Fan’s sudden departure and long absence had worried them. As soon as he appeared, they asked with concern.

"I didn't expect a civilization to survive here at the edge of the Star Sea. I likely disturbed them when I set up the array to connect to the Profound Yellow Realm," Li Fan said with a heavy expression.

This revelation shocked everyone. "Here? In this dead silence? Where do they live?"

"It’s not yet clear; we’ve only had a brief encounter. However, anyone who survived until now in the ruined Star Sea is certainly not to be trifled with. Do not reveal yourselves for now. Wait until I have gathered more information." Li Fan cautioned.

Everyone nodded in agreement. Unknowns in the Star Sea were more likely enemies than friends; one could never be too careful.

Taking advantage of the gap before the Vessel cultivators arrived, Li Fan continued his lecture.

"Relics contain remnants of True Immortal power, and world fragments are no different. If we allow the Profound Yellow Realm to absorb fragments filled with such remnants..."
