Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

"Everyone, please watch carefully!" Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

"What about the rest?" Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

"This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!"

"We must obtain it at all costs!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, "Perhaps we can do this..."

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. "Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested."

"A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it."

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

"However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough," Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. "Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it..."

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, "Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, "Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!"

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, "What does Daoist friend mean by that?"

Li Fan cupped his hands. "In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!"

"If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them..."

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. "Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it."

"We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them."

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. "However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?"

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, "To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity..."

"Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat..."

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: "Old Zhong, is this true?"

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

"In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat," Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

"The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true..." Nangong Lie slowly said.

"Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact..."

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

"Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier."

"The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!"

"Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact..."

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the of Li Fan's mind. He focused on the character [Fall]. He tried to replicate it, but Jian Daosheng's expression was that of an elder of the Immortal Boat.

"The True Immortal script characters themselves are not powerful, but the Great Dao they point to."

Li Fan's eyes flashed. He had already accumulated knowledge on more than ten True Immortal script characters and their corresponding Great Daos.

"Yes, the value of the [Fall] character is not high, but it represents the Great Dao of falling. It only represents a small part of the Great Dao."

"In addition, the [Fall] character represents the meaning of destruction and chaos. However, it also represents the meaning of rebirth and prosperity."

"All things in the world have two sides. When the end comes, there is also the beginning."

"The [Fall] character can also represent the meaning of a new beginning."

"And the meaning of [Fall] itself is a small part of the [Creation] character."

"As for the [Destruction] character, it is a small part of the [Creation] character."

The elders of the Immortal Boat looked at each other. They couldn't believe what they were hearing.

How could this cultivator, who claimed to be from Great Qi, understand the "Great Dao" so deeply?

Li Fan then continued, "The value of a True Immortal script character is not determined by its power, but by its representation of the Great Dao."

"The more profound and complete the Great Dao it represents, the higher its value."

"Therefore, the value of this [Fall] character is far beyond the sum of ten other True Immortal script characters."

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all silent. They were not sure if Li Fan was telling the truth. However, they were profoundly impressed by his understanding of the Great Dao.

"If that is the case," Jian Daosheng said, "then we must see it."

"However, you have only shown us the [Fall] character. We must also reveal our secrets."

Li Fan nodded. "Of course."

"Here are five True Immortal script characters from my homeland," Li Fan said, projecting five characters into the void: [Chaos], [Non-existence], [Nothingness], [Xuān], and [Sadness].

The elders of the Immortal Boat looked at each other, not understanding the meaning of these characters.

However, the fact that Li Fan was willing to share his secrets, and that these characters were also True Immortal script characters, made them willing to continue the exchange.

"These five characters," Li Fan said, "represent the Great Dao of Chaos, Non-existence, Nothingness, Longevity, and Sadness, respectively."

"These five Great Daos are only slightly weaker than the Great Dao represented by the [Fall] character."

The elders of the Immortal Boat looked at each other, speechless.

They had never expected that Li Fan would be able to decipher so many Great Daos.

"However," Li Fan added, "there is one thing I need to remind you of."

"These five characters are only the weaker versions of the Great Daos. The complete versions are far more powerful."

"But even so, they are still far superior to any True Immortal script characters that your Immortal Boat has deciphered so far."

Li Fan's arrogance was not without reason. He had the Ultimate Separation Disc, and his understanding of the Great Dao far surpassed that of these Immortal Boat elders.

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all shocked. They had never imagined that there could be True Immortal script characters far more powerful than any they had encountered.

"If that is the case," Jian Daosheng said, "then we must see the complete versions."

"However, showing you the complete versions is not possible. Because the complete versions are simply too powerful, and they can only be displayed in the Immortal Realm."

"But," Li Fan said, "I can use the weakened versions to demonstrate the power of the Great Dao."

Li Fan then began to demonstrate the power of the five Great Daos.

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all dumbfounded. They had never seen such profound and powerful Great Daos before.

They looked at Li Fan with newfound respect. This cultivator from Great Qi was truly astonishing.

"We have lost this exchange," Jian Daosheng admitted.

"However, we are still willing to fulfill our promise."

"We will allow you to choose any three treasures from the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record]."

Li Fan nodded. "I accept your offer."

He then chose three treasures from the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record].

The first was the [Book of Ten Thousand Realms], the second was the [Origin Force Essence], and the third was the [Seed of Life].

With these three treasures, Li Fan felt that his plan to ascend the Xuanhuang Realm would be greatly accelerated.

After the exchange, Li Fan and the elders of the Immortal Boat parted ways.

Li Fan returned to the Great Profound Minor World, ready to continue his plan.

The elders of the Immortal Boat returned to their own world, deeply impressed by Li Fan's knowledge and power.

They knew that they had encountered a truly formidable opponent.

The exchange was over, but the competition between Li Fan and the Immortal Boat was far from over.Chapter 1319

Facing Li Fan's request, the elders of the Immortal Boat found nothing inappropriate. However, they also presented their own demands: "True Immortal script characters are absolute secrets of the Immortal Boat. Although this place is in the deserted depths of the Star Sea, we must guard against eavesdropping and prying eyes."

"Therefore, we must also set up an array here!"

Li Fan smiled, "As you wish. If you find setting up the formation strenuous, I can also help."

The elders of the Immortal Boat coldly snorted and paid no attention to Li Fan's teasing.

Joining forces, they set up another layer of formation within the "Illusion Formation" Li Fan had laid out. After finally feeling assured that everything was foolproof, they began the formal exchange.

"I am Jian Daosheng, please enlighten me!" Without unnecessary pleasantries, Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard of the Immortal Boat, solemnly wrote a True Immortal script character on the spot.

Perhaps to suppress Li Fan's arrogance and gain the upper hand, the True Immortal script character he chose this time was indeed not simple. Li Fan had never had the opportunity to come into contact with it during his studies with the Immortal Boat in his previous life, even when he later became Ai Tianjue's disciple and was almost a core member of the Immortal Boat.

Dark lines slowly drifted in the void. The moment the character was fully formed, it was as if a great sun illuminated the dark Star Sea where Li Fan and the Immortal Boat elders were located.

This True Immortal script character brought not only a change in light and darkness. Under the light, it actually brought a hint of vitality to the dead and silent Utmost Darkness Star Sea!

"A True Immortal script with a positive effect?" Li Fan's heart stirred, and his expression immediately turned serious.

Ignoring Jian Daosheng's rather proud demeanor, he focused solely on the True Immortal script character.

With Li Fan's current knowledge, especially after glimpsing the mysterious characters of "Creation" and the one that created the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate's bloodline, his ability to decipher True Immortal script characters was almost unparalleled in the Utmost Darkness Star Sea.

Carefully observing the character that occasionally moved and changed, yet remained like a high-hanging sun, it only took the time it takes for a cup of tea for the original meaning of the True Immortal script character represented by this character to appear in Li Fan's mind.

[ Sunrise ].

The myriad phenomena of the sun rising, vital energy circulating, and all things reviving... collectively formed this special True Immortal script character.

"So that's how it is."

After completing the deciphering of the [sunrise] character, Li Fan also resolved a long-standing question in his heart.

How did the Profound Immortal Boat survive the destruction of the Star Sea to this day?

At first, Li Fan thought it was the Immortal Boat Divine Tree formed by the Seed of Life. But after staying in the Immortal Boat for several years, he gradually discovered something was wrong.

The Immortal Boat Divine Tree needed to continuously absorb strange objects like the Dao-Confronting Giant and the Human Emperor Rabbit to provide sufficient energy for the Immortal Boat. This indicated that the Divine Tree itself was insufficient to offset the energy consumption of the Immortal Boat's normal operation.

In the past nearly ten thousand years, the Divine Tree was not always absorbing external energy. What guaranteed the lush growth of the Divine Tree during this blank period?

Moreover, the environment within the Immortal Boat, which was as vibrant and warm as a normal cultivation world, did not seem to be something that a mere otherworldly Divine Tree could provide. Let alone anything else, even the本体 of the Immortal Boat Divine Tree, the Otherworldly Divine Tree of the Xuanhuang Realm's Divine Tree Sect, did not possess such miraculous abilities back then.

Today, with the appearance of this [sunrise] character, the mystery was finally solved.

It was precisely this True Immortal script character representing the phenomenon of sunrise that had provided the Immortal Boat with a suitable living environment for a long time.

"This is the foundation of the Profound Immortal Boat's survival, an undeniable treasure. These people from the Immortal Boat actually took it out first..."

"It seems they don't intend to let me leave?" Li Fan was very familiar with the temperaments of these elders from his time in the Immortal Boat in his previous life. They valued the True Immortal script characters and the future of the Immortal Boat more than their own lives. Yet, they are now imparting the ultimate secret that determines the future of the Immortal Boat...

Even if it was "one character exchanged for one character," it seemed extremely suspicious.

"Unfortunately, your plan is destined to be in vain. You can act as a nuisance, but to keep me... Hmph!"

The formation jointly laid out by the elders of the Immortal Boat, in Li Fan's eyes, was like a child's play, full of loopholes. Moreover, with the peerless escape technique he now possessed, even if a True Immortal descended, he was eighty percent confident he could escape calmly. Naturally, he was not afraid of the siege by the elders of the Immortal Boat.

Pretending to be unaware of their scheme, Li Fan continued to focus on deciphering the [sunrise] character.

As his research deepened, he discovered something was amiss.

The [sunrise] character indeed represented the phenomenon of newborn sun. The morning sun was gentle, but that was from the perspective of the Immortal Realm.

For beings in the lower realms, the gentle sunlight from the Immortal Realm's morning sun was not something they could withstand. If the [sunrise] character descended, it would not bring vitality. Instead, it would instantly burn the world into a hellscape!

"So, this is not a True Immortal script character with positive effects either. It still represents destruction and chaos. It's just that the people of the Immortal Boat have weakened the completeness of the True Immortal script character and reduced its power, thus turning harm into benefit."

"Brilliant, worthy of a force that has survived the Great Tribulation. They truly have some tricks up their sleeves." Li Fan praised inwardly. However, his face changed drastically, and he glared at the elders of the Immortal Boat, "Is this not right?"

"This [sunrise] character's completeness is not even ninety percent! Are you trying to deceive me?"

Li Fan appeared furious, then full of disappointment. "Forget it. I didn't expect you to be such untrustworthy people. The exchange is canceled!"

The elders of the Immortal Boat were surprised that Li Fan could see through the weakness of the [sunrise] character so quickly. While shocked, Jian Daosheng quickly explained to Li Fan, "Fellow Daoist, you misunderstand! It's not that I deliberately hid it. In fact, for our lower realm, the [sunrise] character with thirty percent completeness is more useful than one with higher completeness!"

"Of course, if Fellow Daoist insists, displaying the complete [sunrise] character is also fine."

After speaking, Jian Daosheng wrote the [sunrise] character again.

Even though the [All Laws] greatly reduced the power of the True Immortal script character, Li Fan could still feel the suffocating heat waves that instantly replaced the warmth around him the moment the character took shape. Vitality vanished in an instant, turning into a grim killing intent.

Li Fan recorded the complete [sunrise] character, then said, "Alright, I must admit, you are right."

"Since it was a misunderstanding, let the exchange continue!"

Upon hearing Li Fan's words, the elders of the Immortal Boat secretly breathed a sigh of relief.

Li Fan coughed lightly, drawing everyone's attention. "Everyone, watch closely!"

With swift and elegant strokes, the [Fall] character was written instantly.

The moment the [Fall] character appeared, the expressions of the elders of the Immortal Boat became somewhat subtle. Especially Ai Tianjue.

He stared blankly at the character in the void ahead.

He probably never imagined that the True Immortal script character he had researched the most would be written by the other party first.

"The completeness has far exceeded the current progress of the Immortal Boat, likely approaching ninety percent. This..." Ai Tianjue couldn't help but feel a sense of loss.

Actually, Ai Tianjue didn't know that the [Fall] character Li Fan wrote at this moment had not reached ninety percent completeness. Following the teachings of Ai Tianjue from decades later in his previous life, Li Fan's deciphering of the [Fall] character was only around eighty percent.

However, Li Fan combined his understanding of "Creation" and the mysterious character that represented the transformation between Immortals and mortals, and even incorporated a trace of the "Transformation between True and False." He reorganized and modified the [Fall] character.

Infused with a deeper aura of power, Li Fan's written [Fall] character looked even more "advanced." It was even more like the original [Fall] character than the original [Fall] character.

Li Fan had no confidence before whether he could deceive the elders of the Immortal Boat with such a method. However, judging from their expressions now, it was definitely feasible.

At this moment, he sneered inwardly, feeling even more confident about the smooth progress of his plan.

"Elders, what do you think of this [Fall] character?" Li Fan asked loudly.

Although they desperately wanted to say that this [Fall] character overlapped with the Immortal Boat's research, they were inferior to the other party in research progress. And in a short period, the elders of the Immortal Boat would not be able to elevate their understanding of the [Fall] character to Li Fan's level.

The elders of the Immortal Boat looked at each other and deliberated. Finally, they decided to accept this loss.

This time, it was the Immortal Boat's turn to act again.

Lu Yuzhi of the Severed Immortal Tower wrote the True Immortal script character [Lone].

Although Li Fan's research on this True Immortal script character was still ahead of the Immortal Boat's, for the sake of "casting a long line to catch a big fish," Li Fan did not go too far.

He pretended to mutter, "[Lone] is a character not uncommon in the Star Sea. However, our research progress is indeed not as good as yours."

Li Fan cupped his hands, "I have learned from you!"

This time, the Immortal Boat elders breathed a sigh of relief.

After all, exchanges so far had resulted in significant losses for the Immortal Boat. This reversal of the situation was a good start.

It was Li Fan's turn. The [Suppress] character appeared in the world.

This [Suppress] character was also derived from the research of the Immortal Boat. However, the deciphering progress had not even reached one-third, and it was completely unsystematic.

In his previous life, Li Fan had passed on this incomplete [Suppress] character to Sun Tianci. With his extraordinary comprehension, he had completed further derivations.

In this life, adding his own understanding and reconstructing it, Li Fan completed the fabrication.

Similarly, he intended to test the level of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

The result...

After deliberation by Zhong Daogong and others, they approved the True Immortal script character provided by Li Fan.

Li Fan remained silent on the surface, but inwardly he understood: "It seems the Profound Immortal Boat has not encountered any True Immortal script characters of the [Creation] level."

"Imitating and replicating from top to bottom is truly not something they can see through in a short time."

"Of course, with time, they might notice some clues..."

Li Fan mused inwardly, and the Immortal Boat then presented a new True Immortal script character.

The moment the character appeared, both the formation jointly laid out by the Immortal Boat and Li Fan's "Illusion Formation" trembled slightly.

As an absolute master of formations, Li Fan keenly sensed that under the influence of this new True Immortal script character, the very finest units maintaining the formation structure were beginning to disintegrate.

Li Fan was instantly startled.

After all, the formation he had casually laid out was by no means a simple illusion formation.

It was a pseudo-immortal formation that integrated downscaled versions of two immortal-grade formations, "[Desolation, Empty Chamber Sprouts Flowers]" and "[Immortal Descent, Myriad Things Return to Void]!"

It hid killing intent in the unseen, capable of silently killing all enemies who entered the formation.

However, even such a formation was damaged to its foundation by a weakened True Immortal script character.

"If the power of this True Immortal script character were fully displayed, my pseudo-immortal formation would likely be shattered in an instant." As formations were Li Fan's most important trump card, his heart became incomparably solemn.

While re-repairing the gradually collapsing formation, he also studied this newly appeared True Immortal script character.

"Undoubtedly, it is a formation-specialized character."

"With this True Immortal script character, it is no wonder the Immortal Boat's formation level is so low."

"It is hard to say whether the Immortal Boat showing me this character has any intention of showing off."

"Learning this character makes this trip worthwhile." Li Fan was very satisfied with this exchange of True Immortal script characters.

At the same time, he gradually deciphered the true meaning of the character before him.

[Dissolve].

The moment he comprehended the original true meaning of the True Immortal script character, Li Fan thought of his treasure, the Ultimate Separation Disc.

"Perhaps, my Separation Disc now, like the Dharma Derivation Jade, can be considered a part of the Great Dao's projection from bottom to top."

"Perhaps, I can try to glimpse the Dao of [Dissolve] through the Separation Disc."

...

As the number of True Immortal script characters he mastered increased, Li Fan gradually discovered that what was powerful was not the True Immortal script characters themselves, but the Great Dao they pointed to.

The True Immortal script characters were merely shortcuts and tools to help ordinary people, and even ordinary immortals, to touch upon the Great Dao.

"Similarly, world wonders and eternal remnants are also similar shortcut tools."

"Their essence is actually interconnected."

"Dao Inscription Immortal."

Li Fan suddenly thought of this nameless True Immortal, who was said to have inscribed myriad Dao paths, making them more "approachable."

"Dao paths cannot be cultivated together. Yet this Dao Inscription Immortal can know so much about the myriad Great Daos..." It was truly beyond Li Fan's current imagination.

...

Li Fan's fleeting thoughts did not affect the True Immortal script exchange meeting in the void.

Li Fan used [Chaos], [Non-existence], [Nothingness], and the [Xuān] character he learned from the Immortal Boat in his previous life.

Li Fan nearly emptied the Immortal Boat's research foundation on True Immortal script characters over several thousand years.

Of course, [Chaos], [Non-existence], and others were not the complete versions he saw.

They were weakened versions modified slightly.

Besides [sunrise] and [dissolve],

Li Fan learned two more characters: [Cold] and [Loss].

At this point, both sides had almost exhausted their reserves.

The atmosphere in the venue gradually became subtle.

"Everyone!"

Li Fan spoke first, slightly breaking the stalemate.

"I must admit that your research on True Immortal script characters is indeed not inferior to ours in Great Qi."

"I never imagined that there would still be a surviving civilization within the Star Sea that could rival us..."

Li Fan sighed with emotion.

Suddenly, his expression changed. "However, there are still differences between True Immortal script characters!"

"All the True Immortal script characters we have exchanged so far, when added together, probably do not compare to this one I am about to display!"

These words were earth-shattering. The elders of the Immortal Boat instantly suppressed their scheming thoughts and stared blankly at Li Fan.

"Fellow Daoist, you shouldn't speak carelessly."

Chapter 1320: Shock of Creation

"'I never utter falsehoods!' 'Moreover... there is no need for exaggeration,' Li Fan said with an arrogant tone, glancing disdainfully at everyone.

The elders of the Immortal Boat, whose earlier restless intentions had been quelled, exchanged glances, murmuring amongst themselves about the credibility of Li Fan's words.

Nangong Lie: 'A single True Immortal script character, worth more than all of ours combined? I don't believe such nonsense.'

Gan Jingda: 'It's better to believe it than not. The civilization this person belongs to researches True Immortal scripts with a depth no less than ours at the Immortal Boat. If they were lucky enough to discover something, acting rashly might cause us to miss this golden opportunity.'

Lu Yuzhi: 'Indeed. Possessing True Immortal script characters, it's too difficult to capture them alive. We can only strike swiftly and incapacitate him. In that case, we must extract as much knowledge from his mind as possible before acting.'

'Regardless of the outcome, this child knows too many secrets of the Immortal Boat. We must not let him leave.' This was a consensus already reached by the elders of the Immortal Boat. Therefore, after Zhong Daogong spoke these words, no one objected.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, 'Perhaps we can do this...'

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. 'Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested.'

'A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it.'

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

'However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough,' Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. 'Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it...'

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, 'Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before.'

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, 'Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!'

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, 'What does Daoist friend mean by that?'

Li Fan cupped his hands. 'In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!'

'If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them...'

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. 'Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it.'

'We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them.'

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. 'However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?'

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, 'To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity...'

'Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat...'

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: 'Old Zhong, is this true?'

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

'In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat,' Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

'The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true...' Nangong Lie slowly said.

'Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact...'

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

'Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier.'

'The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!'

'Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact...'

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

'Everyone, please watch carefully!' Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

'What about the rest?' Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

'This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!'

'We must obtain it at all costs!'

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, 'Perhaps we can do this...'

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. 'Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested.'

'A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it.'

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

'However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough,' Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. 'Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it...'

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, 'Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before.'

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, 'Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!'

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, 'What does Daoist friend mean by that?'

Li Fan cupped his hands. 'In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!'

'If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them...'

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. 'Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it.'

'We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them.'

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. 'However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?'

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, 'To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity...'

'Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat...'

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: 'Old Zhong, is this true?'

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

'In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat,' Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

'The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true...' Nangong Lie slowly said.

'Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact...'

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

'Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier.'

'The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!'

'Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact...'

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

'Everyone, please watch carefully!' Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

'What about the rest?' Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

'This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!'

'We must obtain it at all costs!'

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, 'Perhaps we can do this...'

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. 'Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested.'

'A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it.'

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

'However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough,' Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. 'Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it...'

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, 'Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before.'

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, 'Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!'

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, 'What does Daoist friend mean by that?'

Li Fan cupped his hands. 'In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!'

'If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them...'

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. 'Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it.'

'We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them.'

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. 'However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?'

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, 'To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity...'

'Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat...'

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: 'Old Zhong, is this true?'

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

'In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat,' Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.

'The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true...' Nangong Lie slowly said.

'Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact...'

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

'Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier.'

'The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!'

'Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact...'

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.

'Everyone, please watch carefully!' Li Fan's voice suddenly rose several degrees.

The illusionary formation of pavilions and towers suddenly vanished, replaced by a boundless stretch of grassland.

On the grassland, a solitary stone stood tall.

Suddenly, the earth began to tremble.

Large patches of green grass, as if stimulated, began to grow wildly.

In an instant, it grew to be taller than a person.

It even pushed the solitary stone on the grassland up from the ground.

A luminous arc appeared in the sky.

The arc was seven-colored, and within it, lightning flashed and storms converged. Around the seven-colored arc, numerous invisible phantoms gathered. They converged in one place, as if awaiting something.

A bolt of dark lightning suddenly struck the ground from the arc.

Boom! Boom! Boom!

The world was split in two, and deep cracks appeared in space, which took a long time to heal. On the grassland, the lush green grass ignited, and fierce flames spread rapidly.

The grassland trembled, and beneath the raging inferno, something seemed to be awakening.

And high in the sky, the invisible figures around the arc gathered even closer.

Even conflicts arose as they vied for positions.

Continuous booming and clashing sounds echoed.

The storm reached its peak and then instantly fell silent. The rolling dark clouds vanished without a trace.

Within the seven-colored arc, under a clear sky for thousands of miles, a profound character appeared!

...

The scene abruptly ended.

The Immortal Boat elders, who had been deeply immersed, suddenly their eyes widened in anger and they turned to look at Li Fan.

'What about the rest?' Jian Daosheng shouted frantically, disregarding his appearance. This Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard had vaguely seen the True Immortal script contained within the arc.

Even though Li Fan had suddenly interrupted the scene, preventing him from seeing the complete picture.

However, Jian Daosheng was still certain that the power of that True Immortal script far surpassed any other True Immortal script they had ever seen.

'This scene... it's far more powerful than the first time I saw a True Immortal script. Its might is far superior to a single character!'

'We must obtain it at all costs!'

The elders of the Immortal Boat, while outwardly calm, were in an uproar inwardly.

At this moment, Ai Tianjue transmitted mentally, 'Perhaps we can do this...'

After a brief exchange, they reached a unified opinion. This time, Jian Daosheng acted as the spokesperson. 'Since Daoist friend is so confident, we are indeed very interested.'

'A value that surpasses the sum of more than ten True Immortal scripts... If what Daoist friend says is true, we are willing to pay any price to see it.'

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also nodded in agreement.

'However, what else can you produce? Just the genuine True Immortal script artifacts are not enough,' Li Fan said arrogantly, making a demand.

Jian Daosheng smiled faintly. 'Daoist friend, rest assured. Our world possesses the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record], passed down from ancient times. It contains records of treasures and specialties from ruined cultivation realms throughout the Star Sea. If what Daoist friend says is true, besides that True Immortal script artifact, we agree to let you choose any three treasures from it...'

Li Fan seemed unmoved by the conditions proposed by Jian Daosheng, constantly murmuring to himself, 'Hundred Hearing Immortal Record, Hundred Hearing Immortal Record... I seem to have heard this name somewhere before.'

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all stunned.

Suddenly, Li Fan seemed to recall something and exclaimed, 'Profound Merchant Immortal Boat?!'

Like a clap of thunder, the words echoed in the ears of the Immortal Boat elders.

Their auras shifted instantly, and they all became extremely vigilant, as if facing a great enemy.

Zhong Daogong saw that the situation was not right and secretly signaled the other elders to prepare for action. He forced a smile and asked, 'What does Daoist friend mean by that?'

Li Fan cupped his hands. 'In ancient times, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat traversed the myriad realms. Who doesn't know of it? I thought the Immortal Boat had disappeared with the silence of the Star Sea. To think that it has survived for ten thousand years!'

'If my teachers knew, they would surely be overjoyed. No, I must hurry and inform them...'

Li Fan's words made Zhong Daogong's eyelids twitch.

He quickly interrupted Li Fan and changed the subject. 'Daoist friend flatters us. Since our identity has been recognized by Daoist friend, we shall no longer conceal it.'

'We are indeed descendants of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. However, many things have happened over these ten thousand years. Although we survived the Great Calamity, the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two. We are from one of them.'

Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan, who seemed somewhat surprised, and raised an eyebrow. 'However, there is one thing I truly do not understand. The [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record] is a top secret within the Immortal Boat. How could an outsider like Daoist friend know of its existence?'

Ever since he learned the identity of the Immortal Boat, Li Fan's attitude had become much friendlier. He explained to the Immortal Boat elders, 'To be honest, my homeland, Great Qi, has a deep connection with the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. It was precisely through the Immortal Artifacts traded from the Immortal Boat in ancient times that we were able to survive the Great Calamity...'

'Furthermore, that Immortal Artifact is still protecting us. Therefore, the entire Great Qi feels a sense of gratitude towards the Immortal Boat...'

After hearing Li Fan's explanation, the elders of the Immortal Boat were somewhat bewildered.

Gan Jingda: 'Old Zhong, is this true?'

Zhong Daogong frowned, recalling the records of the Immortal Boat.

'In ancient times, the Immortal Boat did complete several transactions involving Immortal Artifacts. However, according to regulations and the demands of the customers, the relevant information was destroyed after the transaction was completed. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's central core should have backups, but due to internal strife... that portion of information should now be with the Merchant Immortal Boat,' Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, said.
