'The fact that the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat sold Immortal Artifacts was known only to a very small number of forces back then. Since this person can mention this matter, it should be true...' Nangong Lie slowly said.

'Deep research into True Immortal scripts, and protection from an Immortal Artifact...'

The great civilization of Great Qi, which had survived since ancient times, slowly emerged in the minds of the elders of the Immortal Boat.

At this moment, Li Fan gave them another huge surprise.

'Since you are from the Immortal Boat, things will be easier.'

'The Immortal Boat has always conducted business with integrity. I trust you!'

'Originally, I planned to adopt a wait-and-see approach, as this True Immortal script is too precious, obtained from the Immortal Realm's records within the Immortal Artifact...'

Every word Li Fan spoke tugged at the heartstrings of the Immortal Boat elders.'

Chapter 1321: Legal Transmission is Accused of Being a Mystery

"As expected of the secret vault inherited by the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat since antiquity, the Hundred Hearings Immortal Record truly contains many treasures."

"As the only surviving land in the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, the Profound Yellow Realm can be said to have accumulated the essence of the entire Star Sea. And Li Fan, through his hundred reincarnations, has practically scoured the Profound Yellow Realm clean. Ordinary secret treasures and riches naturally hold little appeal to him."

"But as he walked through this place, Li Fan still saw several items that piqued his interest."

"For example: a fabricated immortal crane. According to the information in the Hundred Hearings Immortal Record, this bronze immortal crane was actually cast from the remnants of numerous immortal artifacts. While it possessed no inherent immortal abilities, due to its material composition, it was incomparably hard. All divine abilities and techniques were incapable of damaging it in the slightest. It was not truly indestructible, but at the very least, the cataclysm that destroyed the Star Sea had failed to inflict any damage upon it."

"'Constrained by mortal materials, the Heavenly Sun Immortal Puppets refined in previous lives, despite being augmented by Origin Force Essence, still failed to break the mortal limit. Being able to hold off the Dharma transmission for a while was already a testament to the Heavenly Sun's resolute combat will. However, if this item were mixed into the smelting process...' Li Fan's thoughts flashed by."

"Another example: a streak of seven-colored flowing light. It looked remarkably similar to the [Seven-Colored Imperial Sky Flowing Light] that Elder Zhong had fished out from the Fishing Pond. However, the Seven-Colored Imperial Sky Flowing Light was refined from the seven streams of flowing light that illuminated the world, collected by a cultivator of great divine ability. It was an evolution of the Heavenly Dao, containing the origin of the world. This beam of flowing light in the Hundred Hearings Immortal Record, however, was a residue from an unknown cultivation world after its natural demise. It could be considered the corpse of a cultivation world."

"Li Fan had personally refined the Seven-Colored Imperial Sky Flowing Light before. In his perception, although the two seven-colored flowing lights were not identical in essence, they were subtly connected."

"'Perhaps it involves the evolution from death to life of a world...' Li Fan, who had already claimed the Fishing Pond as his own in this life, naturally felt the urge to collect both seven-colored lights for a detailed comparison."

"And then there was: a mannequin standing with empty hands, its eyelids lowered. The Profound Merchant Immortal Boat had acquired it by chance, but after studying it in every way possible, they couldn't figure out its function. Thus, it was placed in the secret vault, slowly forgotten by the world. When Li Fan passed by this mannequin, he clearly sensed a subtle disturbance from [Return to Reality]. Although it wasn't as excited as when he encountered an Eternal Relic, its ability to elicit a reaction from [Return to Reality] was enough to prove its extraordinary nature."

"'It should also be related to the [Dao Projection].' Li Fan remained expressionless, his gaze not lingering on the mannequin."

"..."

"Li Fan patiently selected items in the Immortal Boat's secret vault, while three elders from the Immortal Boat followed him closely. They did not interfere nor speak, but simply watched Li Fan's every move with unyielding scrutiny."

"'It seems the thief from back then caused the Immortal Boat quite heavy losses. Even with the [Severed Immortal Arm] as a failsafe, my fellow Daoists are still uneasy,' Li Fan remarked playfully as a thought flickered.

Gan Jingda, Nangong Lie, and Lu Yuzhi maintained their composure, as if pretending not to have heard him."

"'I wonder what priceless treasures the Immortal Boat lost back then?' Li Fan continued his treasure hunt, asking casually."

"'Hmph, hmph...' Most of the Immortal Boat elders wore expressions of righteous indignation.

Zhong Daogong's voice drifted from afar, "'The past is too painful to recall. But since so many years have passed, if you are interested, Daoist friend, I don't mind telling you.'

"'Among the treasures lost by the Immortal Boat, the most precious was the [Crystal Ice Immortal Amber],' Zhong Daogong's tone was tinged with reminiscence.

"Seeing Jian Daosheng, the Chief of the Severing Immortal Tower, seemingly being a direct witness to that event, he suddenly sighed, 'Even now, the dreamlike and ethereal appearance of the [Crystal Ice Immortal Amber] occasionally surfaces in my mind. I only regret not being more forceful in preventing it back then, thus leading to tragedy.'

"The other elders lamented in unison."

"Li Fan asked curiously, '[Crystal Ice Immortal Amber]? The name sounds beautiful. But what exactly is this thing?'"

"Zhong Daogong explained, 'The Crystal Ice Immortal Amber is, in fact, a frozen cultivation world. The origin of this item goes back to antiquity, which involved an extremely rare celestial phenomenon in the Star Sea.'

"Li Fan's curiosity deepened, and he humbly asked, 'I wish to hear the details.'"

"'At that time, the Star Sea was not as dead and silent as it is now. Besides the countless cultivation worlds brimming with life and diverse landscapes, there were also many Star Sea anomalies that appeared from time to time.'

"'The Leaping Celestial Whale, the Galloping Star Horse, the Yin-Yang vortex...'

"'When these anomalies erupted, they often covered an entire star region and affected dozens of cultivation worlds. Some merely manifested strange phenomena within the world's celestial dome, while others caused cataclysmic destruction to cultivation worlds!'

"'The [Crystalline Frost Wind], was one such anomaly.'

"'An unknown cold wind descended from the stars and swept across the land. Wherever the cold wind passed, whether it was Nascent Soul, Dao Integration, or Longevity cultivators, all were instantly frozen without even the slightest chance to react. All living beings in the world, and even the world itself, were turned into ice sculptures under the breath of the Crystalline Frost Wind,' Zhong Daogong tapped his finger lightly, and a terrifying scene of a world frozen by cold wind appeared above the Immortal Boat's secret vault."

"'A cultivation world sealed by ice, and thus remained isolated in the Star Sea forever, never to see the day of thawing. Any being that attempted to approach would be affected by the absolute cold, either fleeing with severe injuries or similarly becoming an eternal ice sculpture.'"

"Li Fan looked at the scene above, frowning slightly, 'I understand the meaning of the crystal ice now. But what does the term [Immortal Amber] mean?'"

"It was Jian Daosheng who answered Li Fan's question, 'If it were merely a world sealed by ice, it wouldn't be considered a treasure by the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat. In fact, although the probability of the [Crystalline Frost Wind] is low, given the vastness of the Star Sea and the accumulation of tens of thousands of years...'"

"'The number of preserved ice-sealed worlds would not be exceedingly small.'

"'The reason the one collected by the Immortal Boat back then was so valuable, however, was due to a highly unique existence within that ice-sealed cultivation world.' Jian Daosheng spoke with a trace of wistfulness, as if recalling the past."

"'The [Crystalline Frost Wind] descended from the starry sky, and the world should have instantly turned into an ice sculpture. However, a phantom figure appeared in that world, attempting to block the cold wind...'

"'But, could a Star Sea anomaly be resisted by mortals? It is said that during the most intense Star Sea anomaly, even True Immortals had to retreat. Let alone us mortals.'

"'So the result was obvious. The act of saving the world was but a futile struggle, leading only to self-destruction. However, it did manage to block the wind for a split second...'

"'Precisely this momentary change created a completely different ice sculpture. Faced with the world-ending catastrophe, the expressions of the beings varied. Some were terrified, some despairing, some looked at the figure with hope, some in disbelief... It truly embodied the spectrum of sentient beings.'

"'If it were only this, at most it would be a slightly rare ice-sealed world. It wouldn't warrant our Immortal Boat bestowing it the title [Immortal Amber].'"

"Jian Daosheng continued, 'We call it [Immortal] precisely because of the phantom figure that attempted to block the [Crystalline Frost Wind].'"

"Hearing this, Li Fan couldn't help but guess, 'Could it be that a True Immortal is truly sealed within that ice-sealed world?'"

"Jian Daosheng shook his head, 'Not exactly. If a True Immortal were sealed, our Immortal Boat would not dare to keep it on board. But, purely in terms of value, that phantom figure might be more precious than a True Immortal. After all, before the path to immortality was severed, every realm had those who ascended to become Immortals.'

"'But a solidified [Inner Demon], that is truly unprecedented and exceptionally rare!'"

"Li Fan's eyes narrowed, '[Inner Demon]? Solidified?'"

"While possessing Zhao Xian's body and cultivating in his previous life, Li Fan had already experienced the torment of Inner Demons in the core of the Star Sea. As long as one continued to cultivate, Inner Demons would accompany them throughout their journey, relentlessly. Even if forcefully suppressed by external forces, they would eventually return, escalating in intensity. It was precisely because Zhao Xian could no longer bear the interference of Inner Demons and its impact on his cultivation that Li Fan, impatient, directly possessed him using the Dao Core technique."

"This was still under the fragmented laws of the Star Sea. If the Inner Demons were to become materialized, how terrifying would they be when the Star Sea's laws were complete?"

"No wonder ancient cultivators treated Inner Demons with fear and avoided them at all costs."

"However, what Li Fan experienced through Zhao Xian's body was merely various illusions born from the heart. He had never seen the true source that triggered these illusions."

"'Inner Demons are a type of law, yet they can manifest physically?' Li Fan feigned astonishment and disbelief."

"'This is precisely the preciousness of the [Crystal Ice Immortal Amber]. If one had not seen it with their own eyes, no one would imagine that such a marvel could exist in this world.'

"'After the Immortal Boat collected this Crystal Ice Immortal Amber, everyone on board debated for decades. Only then did they finally confirm the identity of the phantom Inner Demon within the ice-sealed world. It was speculated that this Inner Demon might be an evolution of the Inner Demon laws from another cultivation world. We just don't know why it left its original world and suffered such an undespicable fate.'

"Zhong Daogong suddenly spoke again, 'Regarding this point, the Immortal Boat also had a reasonable guess. Inner Demons are formless and shapeless, unbound by space, and can freely traverse the Star Sea. Without the constraint of form, they can even appear directly within a cultivator's heart. Not a few cultivators have been influenced by Inner Demons, losing their minds and becoming like different people. The invasion of Inner Demons can be considered the highest form of possession.'

"'This solidified Inner Demon, although extremely special, still cannot escape the inherent characteristics of Inner Demons. Traversing the Star Sea, seeking suitable hosts to parasitize, is its instinct. Perhaps this is why it appeared in that ice-sealed world.'

"'Furthermore, judging by the power it displayed when the world was frozen, it wasn't just mortals. Even the Heavenly Dao consciousness of a world could be eroded by this solidified Inner Demon.'

"'Bewitching other world's Heavenly Dao and replacing it. Perhaps calling it a [Heavenly Demon] would be more fitting.'"

"..."

"Zhong Daogong spoke eloquently, his words filled with regret for the lost treasure."

"Li Fan, however, felt a stir in his heart."

"In his mind, he recalled the scene from his previous life during the Star Sea's World-Ending Immortal Array storm, where the Dharma Transmission's body gradually dissolved, revealing a transparent figure within."

"The moment Li Fan saw this transparent figure, a faint sense of familiarity washed over him."

"It wasn't that Li Fan had seen this transparent figure before."

"It was that he had encountered the 'kind' of the transparent figure's 'aura'."

"The familiarity came from Tian Jue, Tian Yu, Tian Yin, Tian Yi."

"Or rather..."

"From the Heavenly Dao Realm."

"'Heavenly Demon...' "

"Li Fan might now understand why the Dharma Transmission was under the control of the Heavenly Physician back then."

"'Is the Heavenly Demon also one of the Venerables of the Heavenly Dao Realm?'"

"'The Venerables of the Heavenly Dao Realm act on behalf of Heaven, upholding the Dao, while the Heavenly Demon is the manifestation of the Inner Demon Dao.' "

"'However, due to its inherent characteristics, the Heavenly Demon roams the Star Sea, often absent from the Heavenly Dao Realm. It might even be unlucky enough to encounter an extremely rare Star Sea anomaly, suffering eternal ice sealing.' "

"'If it weren't for the Dharma Transmission rescuing it later, it would have been forever frozen and become a collection item for the Immortal Boat.'"

"'But why did the Dharma Transmission rescue the Heavenly Demon? And why was he later corrupted by the Heavenly Demon?'"

"In Li Fan's mind, the figure of the Heavenly Physician suddenly appeared."

"From their interactions in the previous life, it was evident that the Dharma Transmission was under the control of the Heavenly Physician."

"Previously, Li Fan had speculated that the Dharma Transmission was a clone created by the Heavenly Physician."

"But now it seems their relationship might not be that simple."

"'The Dharma Transmission, Xuanyuan Gou Dan. Perhaps he is a reincarnation of Xuan Tian King...'"

"'The first half of his life, he was just a mortal. Then suddenly, he awakened, as if some consciousness had traversed realms and possessed him,' Li Fan's eyes narrowed."

"..."

"'Regardless of the circumstances, I finally understand why the Dharma Transmission is controlled by the Heavenly Physician. It is due to the influence of the [Heavenly Demon] deep within his soul.' "

"Li Fan also thought that the current Profound Yellow Realm no longer had Inner Demons."

"Perhaps it wasn't just the Dharma Transmission's new law."

"With the [Heavenly Demon], a materialized Inner Demon, naturally there would be no minor Inner Demons descending to interfere."

"With thoughts churning, Li Fan listened to the narration of the Immortal Boat elders and couldn't help but sigh with genuine emotion, 'So that is indeed an extraordinary treasure. To have it stolen by someone like that is truly detestable.'"

"'What did that thief look like? Are they still alive?' Li Fan asked."

"'If we have enough information, perhaps our Great Qi can help track down this thief.' "

"Zhong Daogong raised an eyebrow and asked, 'True Immortal Rune?'"

"Li Fan shook his head, 'No. It is a protective immortal artifact, combined with formation power. In short, it's hard to explain.' "

"Although Li Fan's explanation was vague, the power of [Creation] he previously displayed had already proven the foundation of the [Great Qi] civilization. Therefore, Li Fan's words did not arouse suspicion among the Immortal Boat elders."

"After all, Li Fan didn't guarantee anything, merely stating it was 'perhaps possible.'"

"The Immortal Boat elders conferred amongst themselves, and to avoid arousing Li Fan's suspicion, they still revealed the appearance of the thief from back then. As expected, it was the Dharma Transmission Heavenly Venerate."

"However, the recorded image left by the Immortal Boat differed slightly from the Dharma Transmission Li Fan had seen in his previous life."

"His expression was more lively, as if they were two different people."

Chapter 1322: Divine Tree Hides Immortal Script

"This person's face is full of compassion, not like a treacherous villain," Li Fan commented.

Seeing Dao Sheng snort, "Our Immortal Boat thought the same at the time. So, you can judge a person by their face but not their heart!"

Zhong Daogong then asked, "Can you track him based on his appearance alone? Do you need to supplement it with other methods?"

"If he had a personal token, that would be best. If not..."

"It's fine," Li Fan said with a confident air regarding the "Great Qi Immortal Artifact," "His appearance and life experiences are enough to deduce and track him."

"However, it will take time for me to return to Great Qi and report the information."

Li Fan's words caused some minor disagreements among the Immortal Boat elders.

Jian Dao Sheng said, "In fact, it is not imperative that we kill this person. The Great Qi civilization's research on True Immortal script characters is no less than that of the Immortal Boat. If we can use this opportunity to maintain contact and exchange information, it might not be a bad thing for our Immortal Boat."

Jian Dao Sheng's words were met with approval by several elders: "That's right. We intended to eliminate him earlier because we were worried about the leakage of the True Immortal script characters researched by the Immortal Boat. But from the current situation, the research of this Great Qi civilization has many commonalities with the Immortal Boat. And unlike us, they do not guard their heritage so strictly..."

"Moreover, from this person's words, the cultivation world where the Great Qi civilization is located is not small and lacks resources. Elders, don't forget the Immortal Boat's core business! Trading across realms, penetrating the universe – this has always been the creed of the Immortal Boat. Killing him is of no benefit. If we befriend him, perhaps we can escape the current predicament of the Immortal Boat!"

"Don't forget that plan! The more True Immortal script characters are collected, the better. Originally, according to our Immortal Boat's collection progress, it might take hundreds of years to complete. But if we can get the supplement from the Great Qi civilization, perhaps the goal is within reach!"

...

What the elders said was reasonable and logical. Gradually, the elders who were initially determined to kill Li Fan afterward began to hesitate.

After all, weighing the pros and cons was essential for the Immortal Boat to progress further. Sticking to the old ways and refusing to adapt would only lead the Immortal Boat to ruin. This was a lesson the Profound Immortal Boat had learned through numerous calamities to survive to this day.

Ultimately, it was Zhong Daogong who made the final decision and unified their opinions: "Let's first see the power of that True Immortal script character."

While the Immortal Boat elders were deliberating, Li Fan had already completed his selection in the secret vault.

They were the three items he was interested in: the Bronze Immortal Crane, the Seven-Colored Flowing Light, and the Hanging-Head Puppet.

“Daoist friend, are you certain about these items? Once selected, they cannot be changed,” Zhong Daogong swept his gaze over them and asked with a smile, reminding him.

Li Fan nodded in confirmation.

Zhong Daogong then joined forces with the other elders, performing incantations in the void and summoning a piece of white paper.

The [Severed Immortal Arm] from the Hundred Hearing Immortal Record was controlled, and an imprint of the arm was placed on the white paper.

The blank paper was instantly dyed black with ink.

Three profound patterns were formed, extremely similar to True Immortal script characters, but cruder. The shapes of the patterns also bore the characteristics of the three items.

At the same time, Li Fan noticed that the three items he had chosen from the secret vault vanished into thin air after a fluctuation.

It was as if they were engraved on the white paper.

Zhong Daogong waved his large sleeve, rolling up the completed imprint and holding it in his hand.

He looked at Li Fan and said, "The items Daoist friend needs are here. After the transaction is complete, I will hand them over!"

"Good! straightforward!" Li Fan's eyes showed appreciation.

"Originally, I planned to display the complete version after seeing the True Immortal script of the Immortal Boat. But now it seems, letting you feast your eyes first is also fine," Li Fan said, his tone even containing a hint of excitement.

"Both of us are researchers of True Immortal script characters. Witnessing this magnificent script, I believe our inner excitement will be the same. As the saying goes, 'When one hears the Dao in the morning, one can die in the evening!'”

"It might be difficult to unleash its full potential within the Immortal Boat. Shall we go to the void outside?" Li Fan asked, eager to begin.

How could the elders of the Immortal Boat, who had finally tricked Li Fan into their Immortal Boat, let the tiger escape back into the mountains?

Zhong Daogong waved his hand, "We can use the [Myriad Laws] here. Don't worry, this secret vault's Severed Immortal Arm has merged with countless incomplete characters. Under their mutual restraint, the influence of the True Immortal script can be minimized."

Li Fan looked somewhat disappointed, "I was hoping to display my skills in front of everyone..."

Zhong Daogong formed another incantation, and the Severed Immortal Arm exploded in front of everyone. It transformed into countless incomplete character structures, like tadpoles swimming, sealing off all directions.

Forming a True Immortal script cage.

"Daoist friend, you may begin."

As Zhong Daogong spoke, all the elders of the Immortal Boat focused their gazes entirely on Li Fan.

Li Fan coughed lightly, his expression solemn. "Elders, let me reiterate, the True Immortal script characters I am about to depict are derived from my own comprehension and memory. Compared to the original version from the Immortal Realm, and even the one from the Great Qi Immortal Artifact's memory, there are still some deviations..."

"However, please rest assured, my skill is top-notch throughout the entire Great Qi. I will not disappoint you!"

After saying a lot of nonsense, raising everyone's anticipation to its peak.

Li Fan finally unfolded the scene of the endless green fields filled with surging arc light once more.

As light and shadow shifted, an extremely mysterious character officially appeared before everyone's eyes.

Boom!

The moment [Creation] descended into the world, the characters constantly drifting within the surrounding cage instantly **flew wildly**.

Many directly flew out of the cage's structure and converged towards the central shining [Creation] character.

Even though it was just a phantom of light and shadow, it still caused the True Immortal script fragments to go mad.

The Severed Immortal Arm spontaneously disintegrated, and the elders of the Immortal Boat had to divert some of their attention to maintain its stability.

But in reality, like these characters, the attention of the elders of the Immortal Boat was completely focused on the [Creation] character!

"As expected, he didn't lie. This single character is worth more than all of them combined!"

"[Creation]... it's actually [Creation]!"

"The Immortal Boat is saved!"

...

The elders of the Immortal Boat, having spent half their lives researching True Immortal script characters, had exceptional comprehension. Upon seeing the true face of [Creation], they all quickly discerned its meaning.

All of them exclaimed in shock, without exception.

The so-called composure and schemes were all illusions in the face of the Great Dao.

While the elders of the Immortal Boat were completely engrossed, Li Fan quietly observed and analyzed the guardian of the Immortal Boat's secret vault, the Severed Immortal Arm.

It had to be said that the method of integrating all treasures into incomplete characters for anti-theft was indeed ingenious.

Even with Li Fan's multi-life experience, extraordinary knowledge, and the Ultimate Separation Disc, he couldn't find a suitable method to break it for the moment.

However, as the [Creation] character's revelation caused the characters that formed the Severed Immortal Arm to disintegrate and converge towards [Creation], it allowed him to glimpse

the specific structural composition of the Severed Immortal Arm.

"It will be difficult to completely shatter this severed arm instantly. However, it should be possible to seize some key items." Li Fan inwardly felt and deduced.

The True Immortal script character [Creation] was truly mysterious and profound, not something that could be comprehended in a single day.

The elders of the Immortal Boat were lost in their contemplation.Seeing Li Fan waiting quietly by the side, they did not pay much attention to him. This gave Li Fan ample time to decipher the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record].

"This one, this one, and this one, I should take them all later..."

Li Fan naturally saw the killing intent hidden by the elders of the Immortal Boat.

However, Li Fan himself did not have good intentions.

Taking advantage of the chaos caused by [Creation] in the secret vault, Li Fan had already quietly laid down his plundering technique.

It was the same incomplete True Immortal script characters, using deception to blend into the Severed Immortal Arm.

The longer the elders of the Immortal Boat were engrossed in comprehending [Creation], the more enriched the hidden hand Li Fan planted.

The more items he could plunder later.

"I won't make a move just yet." Li Fan narrowed his eyes, his hands moving non-stop.

In a flash, thirty days had passed.

Zhong Daogong was the first to emerge from his comprehension, looking somewhat dazed, then heaved a long sigh.

He then bowed to Li Fan, "Thank you, Daoist friend!"

"To personally witness [Creation] is a blessing from heaven! Without Daoist friend's favor, I fear I would never have had such an opportunity in this lifetime!"

Li Fan accepted the thanks calmly and waved his hand, "It's just a transaction!"

Zhong Daogong shook his head, "Mortal objects, how can they compare to [Creation]? This time, our Immortal Boat has gained an immense advantage!"

Li Fan laughed heartily and said nothing more.

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also gradually emerged from their enlightenment.

They all bowed slightly to Li Fan first, then their gazes intersected, and finally, they all fell upon Li Fan.

The meaning conveyed in their eyes was almost identical.

That was, they wanted to see a purer, more complete version of [Creation].

Greed knows no bounds. After witnessing the power of the True Immortal script Li Fan had written, and vaguely experiencing the infinite power contained within the character, their hearts inevitably gave rise to a deeper desire.

"Daoist friend, what about the [Creation] in the Great Qi's protective realm immortal artifact..."

"May we have the honor of seeing it?" Jian Dao Sheng asked very politely.

Li Fan heard this and put on a pained expression. "Even in our Great Qi, only direct disciples who have passed numerous audits are qualified to glimpse the immortal artifact's true memory. Others learn through layers of transmission..."

Li Fan looked at the expressions of the Immortal Boat elders and said with a smile, "I completely understand your feelings. However, this is just our first transaction. As we interact more in the future, perhaps we can agree to your request to visit."

The elders of the Immortal Boat had varied expressions.

However, they privately discussed amongst themselves again.

"Old Zhong, what do we do now?"

"We definitely can't kill him! Maintaining contact with Great Qi, in order to obtain a more complete [Creation]..."

"Indeed, compared to [Creation], those other True Immortal script characters seem insignificant."

"Great Qi can even share [Creation] with outsiders; we the Immortal Boat are truly petty in comparison."

After experiencing the power of [Creation], the attitudes of all the elders of the Immortal Boat had uniformly shifted.

Zhong Daogong saw this and had a decision in his heart.

"According to the agreement, from now on, we will lead Daoist friend to see that True Immortal script true writing." He said with a smile to Li Fan.

"This piece, although not as good as the [Creation] Daoist friend displayed, is still a True Immortal's handwriting after all. It should also provide some inspiration to Daoist friend." Zhong Daogong said confidently.

"Oh? Then I am indeed looking forward to it."

Sensing the hidden hand he had left in the Severed Immortal Arm, Li Fan smiled in return.

He followed the elders of the Immortal Boat and temporarily left the secret vault.

From the top of the divine tree all the way to the heart of the divine tree.

In the verdant space, a ruin floated.

Tens of thousands of branches stretched out from above, spreading to the trunk of the divine tree.

On the ground of the ruin, a True Immortal script was engraved.

However, due to the obstruction of the divine tree's branches, its full appearance could not be seen.

The moment Li Fan saw this ruin, his heart stirred.

Because the architectural style of this ruin was very similar to what he had seen before on the Immortal Ruins ground.

"Immortal Realm ruin?" Li Fan couldn't help but ask, feigning surprise.

"Daoist friend has good eyesight." The elders of the Immortal Boat were also surprised that Li Fan could recognize the origin of the ruin. Their evaluation of the Great Qi civilization was elevated once again.

"That's right. This ruin is from the upper realm that fell when the immortal path was severed." Zhong Daogong said in a low voice.

"At that time, the news of the severed immortal path had not yet spread throughout the Star Sea. Therefore, no one expected that this abruptly appearing structure was related to the Immortal Realm. It was just that the True Immortal script engraved within it caused a catastrophe."

"Our Immortal Boat discovered the source of this catastrophe in the Star Sea ruins ten thousand years later."

The elders of the Immortal Boat joined forces, formed incantations, and the divine tree branches entwined around the ruin slowly loosened.

The true appearance of the True Immortal script was revealed.

It seemed that due to the passage of time and the absorption of the divine tree, the energy fluctuations from the script were almost undetectable.

But this did not prevent Li Fan from instantly discerning the meaning of this script.

[Ancient].

"Ancient..." Li Fan murmured, using his hand as a brush, he attempted to imitate and write it.

This ancient script on the ruin seemed very similar to the chaotic character he had seen in the domain of white mist.

True Immortal script characters were descriptions of the Great Dao.

But as long as they were not the manifestation of the Great Dao itself, when written by different people, they would present different characteristics.

Li Fan, having studied True Immortal script characters for many years, could naturally clearly distinguish such characteristics.

This ancient character and the chaotic character were written by the same person.

However, the character [Hunger] on the Immortal Ruins ground was not of the same origin.

"If my guess is correct, [Ancient], [Chaos], and the True Immortal script character that caused countless world-ending disasters in the Utmost Darkness Star Sea were all done by the same person. The purpose was to sow chaos in the Star Sea."

"And the [Hunger] character in the Immortal Ruins might have been for the True Immortal's enlightenment."

"Although their original intentions were different, they both led to the destruction of the Star Sea and its complete descent into silence."

"In the eyes of True Immortals, we cultivators are truly like ants..."

Various thoughts flashed through Li Fan's mind.

"This true writing, although its energy fluctuations have all dissipated, still has its uses."

At this moment, Li Fan suddenly heard Zhong Daogong say this.Chapter 1322

"This person's face is full of compassion, not like a treacherous villain," Li Fan commented.

Seeing Dao Sheng snort, "Our Immortal Boat thought the same at the time. So, you can judge a person by their face but not their heart!"

Zhong Daogong then asked, "Can you track him based on his appearance alone? Do you need to supplement it with other methods?"

"If he had a personal token, that would be best. If not..."

"It's fine," Li Fan said with a confident air regarding the "Great Qi Immortal Artifact," "His appearance and life experiences are enough to deduce and track him."

"However, it will take time for me to return to Great Qi and report the information."

Li Fan's words caused some minor disagreements among the Immortal Boat elders.

Jian Dao Sheng said, "In fact, it is not imperative that we kill this person. The Great Qi civilization's research on True Immortal script characters is no less than that of the Immortal Boat. If we can use this opportunity to maintain contact and exchange information, it might not be a bad thing for our Immortal Boat."

Jian Dao Sheng's words were met with approval by several elders: "That's right. We intended to eliminate him earlier because we were worried about the leakage of the True Immortal script characters researched by the Immortal Boat. But from the current situation, the research of this Great Qi civilization has many commonalities with the Immortal Boat. And unlike us, they do not guard their heritage so strictly..."

"Moreover, from this person's words, the cultivation world where the Great Qi civilization is located is not small and lacks resources. Elders, don't forget the Immortal Boat's core business! Trading across realms, penetrating the universe – this has always been the creed of the Immortal Boat. Killing him is of no benefit. If we befriend him, perhaps we can escape the current predicament of the Immortal Boat!"

"Don't forget that plan! The more True Immortal script characters are collected, the better. Originally, according to our Immortal Boat's collection progress, it might take hundreds of years to complete. But if we can get the supplement from the Great Qi civilization, perhaps the goal is within reach!"

...

What the elders said was reasonable and logical. Gradually, the elders who were initially determined to kill Li Fan afterward began to hesitate.

After all, weighing the pros and cons was essential for the Immortal Boat to progress further. Sticking to the old ways and refusing to adapt would only lead the Immortal Boat to ruin. This was a lesson the Profound Immortal Boat had learned through numerous calamities to survive to this day.

Ultimately, it was Zhong Daogong who made the final decision and unified their opinions: "Let's first see the power of that True Immortal script character."

While the Immortal Boat elders were deliberating, Li Fan had already completed his selection in the secret vault.

They were the three items he was interested in: the Bronze Immortal Crane, the Seven-Colored Flowing Light, and the Hanging-Head Puppet.

“Daoist friend, are you certain about these items? Once selected, they cannot be changed,” Zhong Daogong swept his gaze over them and asked with a smile, reminding him.

Li Fan nodded in confirmation.

Zhong Daogong then joined forces with the other elders, performing incantations in the void and summoning a piece of white paper.

The [Severed Immortal Arm] from the Hundred Hearing Immortal Record was controlled, and an imprint of the arm was placed on the white paper.

The blank paper was instantly dyed black with ink.

Three profound patterns were formed, extremely similar to True Immortal script characters, but cruder. The shapes of the patterns also bore the characteristics of the three items.

At the same time, Li Fan noticed that the three items he had chosen from the secret vault vanished into thin air after a fluctuation.

It was as if they were engraved on the white paper.

Zhong Daogong waved his large sleeve, rolling up the completed imprint and holding it in his hand.

He looked at Li Fan and said, "The items Daoist friend needs are here. After the transaction is complete, I will hand them over!"

"Good! Straightforward!" Li Fan's eyes showed appreciation.

"Originally, I planned to display the complete version after seeing the True Immortal script of the Immortal Boat. But now it seems, letting you feast your eyes first is also fine," Li Fan said, his tone even containing a hint of excitement.

"Both of us are researchers of True Immortal script characters. Witnessing this magnificent script, I believe our inner excitement will be the same. As the saying goes, 'When one hears the Dao in the morning, one can die in the evening!'"

"It might be difficult to unleash its full potential within the Immortal Boat. Shall we go to the void outside?" Li Fan asked, eager to begin.

How could the elders of the Immortal Boat, who had finally tricked Li Fan into their Immortal Boat, let the tiger escape back into the mountains?

Zhong Daogong waved his hand, "We can use the [Myriad Laws] here. Don't worry, this secret vault's Severed Immortal Arm has merged with countless incomplete characters. Under their mutual restraint, the influence of the True Immortal script can be minimized."

Li Fan looked somewhat disappointed, "I was hoping to display my skills in front of everyone..."

Zhong Daogong formed another incantation, and the Severed Immortal Arm exploded in front of everyone. It transformed into countless incomplete character structures, like tadpoles swimming, sealing off all directions.

Forming a True Immortal script cage.

"Daoist friend, you may begin."

As Zhong Daogong spoke, all the elders of the Immortal Boat focused their gazes entirely on Li Fan.

Li Fan coughed lightly, his expression solemn. "Elders, let me reiterate, the True Immortal script characters I am about to depict are derived from my own comprehension and memory. Compared to the original version from the Immortal Realm, and even the one from the Great Qi Immortal Artifact's memory, there are still some deviations..."

"However, please rest assured, my skill is top-notch throughout the entire Great Qi. I will not disappoint you!"

After saying a lot of nonsense, raising everyone's anticipation to its peak.

Li Fan finally unfolded the scene of the endless green fields filled with surging arc light once more.

As light and shadow shifted, an extremely mysterious character officially appeared before everyone's eyes.

Boom!

The moment [Creation] descended into the world, the characters constantly drifting within the surrounding cage instantly **flew wildly**.

Many directly flew out of the cage's structure and converged towards the central shining [Creation] character.

Even though it was just a phantom of light and shadow, it still caused the True Immortal script fragments to go mad.

The Severed Immortal Arm spontaneously disintegrated, and the elders of the Immortal Boat had to divert some of their attention to maintain its stability.

But in reality, like these characters, the attention of the elders of the Immortal Boat was completely focused on the [Creation] character!

"As expected, he didn't lie. This single character is worth more than all of them combined!"

"[Creation]... it's actually [Creation]!"

"The Immortal Boat is saved!"

...

The elders of the Immortal Boat, having spent half their lives researching True Immortal script characters, had exceptional comprehension. Upon seeing the true face of [Creation], they all quickly discerned its meaning.

All of them exclaimed in shock, without exception.

The so-called composure and schemes were all illusions in the face of the Great Dao.

While the elders of the Immortal Boat were completely engrossed, Li Fan quietly observed and analyzed the guardian of the Immortal Boat's secret vault, the Severed Immortal Arm.

It had to be said that the method of integrating all treasures into incomplete characters for anti-theft was indeed ingenious.

Even with Li Fan's multi-life experience, extraordinary knowledge, and the Ultimate Separation Disc, he couldn't find a suitable method to break it for the moment.

However, as the [Creation] character's revelation caused the characters that formed the Severed Immortal Arm to disintegrate and converge towards [Creation], it allowed him to glimpse

the specific structural composition of the Severed Immortal Arm.

"It will be difficult to completely shatter this severed arm instantly. However, it should be possible to seize some key items." Li Fan inwardly felt and deduced.

The True Immortal script character [Creation] was truly mysterious and profound, not something that could be comprehended in a single day.

The elders of the Immortal Boat were lost in their contemplation. Seeing Li Fan waiting quietly by the side, they did not pay much attention to him. This gave Li Fan ample time to decipher the [Hundred Hearing Immortal Record].

"This one, this one, and this one, I should take them all later..."

Li Fan naturally saw the killing intent hidden by the elders of the Immortal Boat.

However, Li Fan himself did not have good intentions.

Taking advantage of the chaos caused by [Creation] in the secret vault, Li Fan had already quietly laid down his plundering technique.

It was the same incomplete True Immortal script characters, using deception to blend into the Severed Immortal Arm.

The longer the elders of the Immortal Boat were engrossed in comprehending [Creation], the more enriched the hidden hand Li Fan planted.

The more items he could plunder later.

"I won't make a move just yet." Li Fan narrowed his eyes, his hands moving non-stop.

In a flash, thirty days had passed.

Zhong Daogong was the first to emerge from his comprehension, looking somewhat dazed, then heaved a long sigh.

He then bowed to Li Fan, "Thank you, Daoist friend!"

"To personally witness [Creation] is a blessing from heaven! Without Daoist friend's favor, I fear I would never have had such an opportunity in this lifetime!"

Li Fan accepted the thanks calmly and waved his hand, "It's just a transaction!"

Zhong Daogong shook his head, "Mortal objects, how can they compare to [Creation]? This time, our Immortal Boat has gained an immense advantage!"

Li Fan laughed heartily and said nothing more.

The other elders of the Immortal Boat also gradually emerged from their enlightenment.

They all bowed slightly to Li Fan first, then their gazes intersected, and finally, they all fell upon Li Fan.

The meaning conveyed in their eyes was almost identical.

That was, they wanted to see a purer, more complete version of [Creation].

Greed knows no bounds. After witnessing the power of the True Immortal script Li Fan had written, and vaguely experiencing the infinite power contained within the character, their hearts inevitably gave rise to a deeper desire.

"Daoist friend, what about the [Creation] in the Great Qi's protective realm immortal artifact..."

"May we have the honor of seeing it?" Jian Dao Sheng asked very politely.

Li Fan heard this and put on a pained expression. "Even in our Great Qi, only direct disciples who have passed numerous audits are qualified to glimpse the immortal artifact's true memory. Others learn through layers of transmission..."

Li Fan looked at the expressions of the Immortal Boat elders and said with a smile, "I completely understand your feelings. However, this is just our first transaction. As we interact more in the future, perhaps we can agree to your request to visit."

The elders of the Immortal Boat had varied expressions.

However, they privately discussed amongst themselves again.

"Old Zhong, what do we do now?"

"We definitely can't kill him! Maintaining contact with Great Qi, in order to obtain a more complete [Creation]..."

"Indeed, compared to [Creation], those other True Immortal script characters seem insignificant."

"Great Qi can even share [Creation] with outsiders; we the Immortal Boat are truly petty in comparison."

After experiencing the power of [Creation], the attitudes of all the elders of the Immortal Boat had uniformly shifted.

Zhong Daogong saw this and had a decision in his heart.

"According to the agreement, from now on, we will lead Daoist friend to see that True Immortal script true writing." He said with a smile to Li Fan.

"This piece, although not as good as the [Creation] Daoist friend displayed, is still a True Immortal's handwriting after all. It should also provide some inspiration to Daoist friend." Zhong Daogong said confidently.

"Oh? Then I am indeed looking forward to it."

Sensing the hidden hand he had left in the Severed Immortal Arm, Li Fan smiled in return.

He followed the elders of the Immortal Boat and temporarily left the secret vault.

From the top of the divine tree all the way to the heart of the divine tree.

In the verdant space, a ruin floated.

Tens of thousands of branches stretched out from above, spreading to the trunk of the divine tree.

On the ground of the ruin, a True Immortal script was engraved.

However, due to the obstruction of the divine tree's branches, its full appearance could not be seen.

The moment Li Fan saw this ruin, his heart stirred.

Because the architectural style of this ruin was very similar to what he had seen before on the Immortal Ruins ground.

"Immortal Realm ruin?" Li Fan couldn't help but ask, feigning surprise.

"Daoist friend has good eyesight." The elders of the Immortal Boat were also surprised that Li Fan could recognize the origin of the ruin. Their evaluation of the Great Qi civilization was elevated once again.

"That's right. This ruin is from the upper realm that fell when the immortal path was severed." Zhong Daogong said in a low voice.

"At that time, the news of the severed immortal path had not yet spread throughout the Star Sea. Therefore, no one expected that this abruptly appearing structure was related to the Immortal Realm. It was just that the True Immortal script engraved within it caused a catastrophe."

"Our Immortal Boat discovered the source of this catastrophe in the Star Sea ruins ten thousand years later."

The elders of the Immortal Boat joined forces, formed incantations, and the divine tree branches entwined around the ruin slowly loosened.

The true appearance of the True Immortal script was revealed.

It seemed that due to the passage of time and the absorption of the divine tree, the energy fluctuations from the script were almost undetectable.

But this did not prevent Li Fan from instantly discerning the meaning of this script.

[Ancient].

"Ancient..." Li Fan murmured, using his hand as a brush, he attempted to imitate and write it.

This ancient script on the ruin seemed very similar to the chaotic character he had seen in the domain of white mist.

True Immortal script characters were descriptions of the Great Dao.

But as long as they were not the manifestation of the Great Dao itself, when written by different people, they would present different characteristics.

Li Fan, having studied True Immortal script characters for many years, could naturally clearly distinguish such characteristics.

This ancient character and the chaotic character were written by the same person.

However, the character [Hunger] on the Immortal Ruins ground was not of the same origin.

"If my guess is correct, [Ancient], [Chaos], and the True Immortal script character that caused countless world-ending disasters in the Utmost Darkness Star Sea were all done by the same person. The purpose was to sow chaos in the Star Sea."

"And the [Hunger] character in the Immortal Ruins might have been for the True Immortal's enlightenment."

"Although their original intentions were different, they both led to the destruction of the Star Sea and its complete descent into silence."

"In the eyes of True Immortals, we cultivators are truly like ants..."

Various thoughts flashed through Li Fan's mind.

"This true writing, although its energy fluctuations have all dissipated, still has its uses."

At this moment, Li Fan suddenly heard Zhong Daogong say this.

Chapter 1323: Reversing Entropy Returns to Youth

"Oh? I'd be happy to hear more," Li Fan said, his expression solemn.

"Daoist friend, can you discern the miraculous function of this rune, [Ancient]?" Zhong Daogong posed a question, leaving him to guess.

Li Fan pondered for a moment, his fingers tracing lightly in the void. "Ancient signifies the past, the old."

"...Time reversal?"

Observing the mysterious rune on the ground of the ruins, Li Fan savored it, his eyes gleaming.

Zhong Daogong clapped his hands in praise, "Daoist friend's comprehension is truly extraordinary! It takes our Immortal Boat elders several days at the very least to gain some insight from it. I did not expect you to grasp its essence with just a glance!"

"However, describing its power as 'time reversal' might be slightly inaccurate. It is more akin to things reverting to their primordial state..."

Li Fan nodded slightly as he listened to the explanation.

"When the [Ancient] rune was at its peak, within its sphere of influence, terrifying calamities would undoubtedly occur. All things would transform towards their past selves. From life to death, turning into dust. Truly, 'ancientness'..." Zhong Daogong waved his hand, and dozens of scenes materialized before him.

With the advent of [Ancient], cultivators, towering ancient trees, the continuous structures on the land, and even the world itself—all reversed as if time were flowing backward. Ultimately, they all dissolved into microscopic particles, scattered by the wind.

"If this original manuscript still contained residual power, even if we were incredibly envious, our Immortal Boat would have no choice but to steer clear and not dare to covter it. But now..."

Next, the Immortal Boat members demonstrated the miraculous use of the True Immortal Rune with actual actions.

The eldest among the elders, Jian Daosheng of the Severing Immortal Tower, slowly flew towards the [Ancient] rune.

He did not fly too close, instead hovering in the void.

As Zhong Daogong had said, the power of the [Ancient] rune had been exhausted, at least relatively speaking. In fact, there were still faint residual energies on the original manuscript. Compared to its peak potency, it was almost negligible. However, just like the [Separation] rune, when its power was weakened to a suitable level...

As Jian Daosheng remained within the coverage of the [Ancient] rune, the wrinkles on his face gradually receded. Streaks of black began to appear in his white eyebrows and hair. His body straightened, and his spirit became more vigorous.

This scene was clearly a process of reversing aging and regaining youth!

The elders of the Immortal Boat were already accustomed to this. Li Fan, however, narrowed his eyes, deep in thought.

He did not wait for the complete reversal to youth. He only stayed within the [Ancient] rune's range for a few breaths before Jian Daosheng gracefully retreated.

Li Fan understood that this was to prevent himself from being overly influenced by the [Ancient] rune's power.

After Jian Daosheng, the other elders of the Immortal Boat also took turns circling the rune manuscript. The duration varied, but all of them visibly grew younger.

"With the rune present, wouldn't one achieve immortality?" Li Fan exclaimed in amazement.

Zhong Daogong gave a wry smile, "It's not as simple as it seems. It can only prevent aging, not grant immortality..."

He shook his head. "Reversing aging through the [Ancient] rune can indeed increase one's lifespan limit, but the more it's used, the weaker the effect. Eventually, one's lifespan reaches its limit, and it will no longer increase."

"However, a youthful body is indeed far better than an aging one nearing its end."

After the elders of the Immortal Boat finished their turns, Zhong Daogong looked at Li Fan and asked, "Daoist friend, would you like to experience it as well?"

Li Fan politely declined, "I am only thirty years old, which is the peak of my physical condition. Reverting to childhood would be detrimental."

The moment he spoke, an absolute silence fell within the Divine Tree's space.

All the elders stared at Li Fan as if he were a monster.

Zhong Daogong's expression stiffened, "Daoist friend, are you joking?"

Based on Li Fan's own strength and his profound understanding of formations and runes, the Immortal Boat group had already categorized him as a cultivator who had lived for hundreds, if not thousands, of years.

Yet now, Li Fan claimed to be only thirty?

This was difficult for the Immortal Boat group to accept for a moment.

Li Fan chuckled, "It's just that I learn things quickly. In my Great Qi, there are indeed geniuses, though few, who are more exceptional than me. You elders need not be so shocked."

His words threw the Immortal Boat group into disarray.

They collectively re-sealed the [Ancient] rune and led Li Fan out of the Divine Tree's interior.

"Daoist friend, please rest here for now and do not leave. We have some matters to discuss..."

At the summit of the Immortal Boat, in a pavilion courtyard akin to a mountaintop, Zhong Daogong admonibrushed.

"By the way, these are the three items Daoist friend selected earlier." After handing over a roll of white paper, Zhong Daogong hastily departed.

Ignoring the Immortal Boat elders, Li Fan slowly unrolled the white paper in his hand. The three treasures then leaped out from the paper, floating before Li Fan.

The bronze immortal crane and the seven-colored flowing light had already been examined carefully.

Li Fan waved his hand, directly collecting and storing them.

His attention then focused on the mannequin with lowered eyelids.

Sensing the subtle tremor from [Return to Reality], Li Fan's mind focused.

Like the other two items, the mannequin vanished into thin air after a moment.

However, this time it was not collected but transformed into an inexplicable energy that was absorbed by [Return to Reality].

Li Fan stared intently at the [Return to Reality] panel.

As if tiny currents of electricity flashed, the characters on the [Return to Reality] panel flickered several times.

Finally, it returned to a state of calm.

Li Fan's gaze fell on the changed parameter.

"Void Depletion Charge Progress: 400%."

"Hmm?" Li Fan's eyes narrowed slightly.

Void Depletion Charge Progress was the prerequisite for activating [Return to Reality]'s reversal of everything. Only when the charge reached 100% could it transform reality into void and truth into falsehood.

This was why Li Fan had always stayed within the Great Profound Minor World after using [Return to Reality], waiting for the charge to complete before venturing out.

Previously, the maximum charge progress for Void Depletion was 200%.

The charge exceeding 100% could provide Li Fan with a shield against external attacks at critical moments, ensuring the smooth activation of [Return to Reality].

However, as Li Fan's enemies grew stronger, this protective function became rather redundant.

The progress depleted too quickly, offering minimal benefit.

But now, this mannequin had directly doubled the charge limit!

Moreover, Li Fan sensed that this additional 200% charge, if not consumed in this lifetime, would not disappear with the reset of [Return to Reality].

It would remain within [Return to Reality].

In other words, he could now perform [Return to Reality] three consecutive times.

"This is interesting."

Li Fan's mind replayed the image of the mannequin: "The origin of this mannequin is rather peculiar. Being able to replenish 200% of the charge limit is definitely an extraordinary item."

"I just don't know if, in the next life, when I encounter this item again and absorb it, the charge limit can still be increased?"

So far, Li Fan had not figured out the specific mechanism for [Return to Reality]'s charge.

The unknown catalyst required to activate [Return to Reality] could only be slowly accumulated through the passage of time.

"Perhaps, by carefully studying this mannequin, I can unravel this mystery." Li Fan narrowed his eyes, marking this objective.

A 400% charge limit was a significant boon for Li Fan, a formidable layer of protection. More importantly, when encountering existences at or above the level of Faceless True Immortal, Li Fan could use multiple consecutive [Return to Reality] activations to maximize his chances of escaping the threat.

Otherwise, with only a single use of [Return to Reality], if he were still in mortal danger upon returning to his anchor point, Li Fan would be in a perilous situation.

From this perspective, the actual life-saving significance of this mannequin was immense.

"The Immortal Boat is indeed my lucky star."

"Later, I can also inquire about the origin of this mannequin from them." Li Fan mused inwardly.

Not long after, Zhong Daogong returned with the elders.

It seemed their earlier deliberation had reached a consensus, as the hostility Li Fan had sensed from some of them earlier had completely vanished.

"Daoist friend, are you satisfied with this transaction?" Zhong Daogong asked first.

"I have gained much. My Master will surely reward me handsomely upon my return. Oh, right, rest assured, I will certainly do my best to investigate the information about that thief for you," Li Fan assured them.

"Heh heh, thank you in advance, Daoist friend."

After exchanging pleasantries, Zhong Daogong changed the subject. "Daoist friend has proven your trustworthiness to the Immortal Boat. After unanimous deliberation by the elders, perhaps we can engage in deeper cooperation."

Li Fan's interest was piqued. "Do you still possess True Immortal script characters that you haven't revealed?"

Zhong Daogong waved his hand. "Not True Immortal script characters. But they are even more important than True Immortal script characters."

The scenery of the surrounding pavilions suddenly shifted, as if they had instantly arrived in the Utmost Darkness Star Sea.

As Zhong Daogong moved, the surroundings rapidly changed, passing through the vast Sea of Relics and the Endless Remnant Realm Great Wall.

They arrived at a place of void.

"This place is..." Li Fan was slightly surprised.

"Beneath the High Wall. The foot of the High Wall," Zhong Daogong said with a complex expression and a solemn tone.

"Oh?"

Li Fan surveyed his surroundings, then said, "I have also been to the foot of the High Wall, at the end of the Utmost Darkness Star Sea. The path forward was cut off, yet I saw no actual High Wall..."

"You display the scene of the High Wall, and for what purpose?"

Zhong Daogong's gaze was profound. "The High Wall stretches endlessly, encircling the entire Star Sea. However, the location our Immortal Boat is currently displaying to Daoist friend is different from other places."

"Different? If it's all the same High Wall, what's the difference?" Li Fan's expression turned serious.

It was Jian Daosheng who answered Li Fan's question, "This area is arguably the weakest point of the entire High Wall. If there is any place in the Star Sea where one can cross the High Wall, it is here where the chance is greatest!"

"Your homeland must also have many cultivators who are unwilling to be trapped in the Utmost Darkness Star Sea for eternity and wish to escape. If we cooperate, perhaps we can succeed." Zhong Daogong said slowly.

"The weakest point of the High Wall... Li Fan stared at the scene presented by the Immortal Boat, repeating the words several times.

He did not give an immediate response but instead asked, "How did you determine this? The existence of the High Wall is beyond our current comprehension. It is formless and intangible, unseen. How did you accurately identify its weakest point?"

Zhong Daogong smiled slightly. "This matter involves the top secrets of the Immortal Boat. Before we confirm our cooperation, please forgive me for not divulging the details."

"However, Daoist friend can rest assured. This matter is absolutely true. You can report it to your superiors. When you send someone else later, the Immortal Boat can offer a demonstration."

Li Fan's expression was grave, and after a long period of contemplation, he clasped his hands. "This matter is indeed of great importance and beyond my authority to decide. I will report it to my superiors upon my return. Regardless of the outcome, I will give you a reply."

"Then we shall await Daoist friend's good news!"

Under the watchful eyes of the elders, Li Fan's light vanished, disappearing into the vast Star Sea.

"This is a risky move. If this matter is exposed..."

"What are we afraid of? Even if someone from this Star Sea were to attack us, would they demand we share the location of the High Wall's weakness? Frankly, it would be better if they did. We are all fish in the same boiling pot; we should unite!"

"Correct, the Great Qi civilization is superior to us, not weaker. After all, they have survived the Great Calamity and occupy an entire cultivation world. They are a suitable partner for cooperation."

"And that realm-protecting immortal artifact..."

The elders discussed amongst themselves.

On the other side, within the phantom of the Wooden Sword, Li Fan was contemplating the information revealed by the Immortal Boat.

Although the Immortal Boat did not explicitly state it, based on crucial information obtained in his previous life during his infiltration, it was not difficult to deduce the reason for their knowledge of the High Wall's weakness.

"In my previous life, Zhong Daogong mentioned that the reason the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat split into two was that a faction within decided to crash into the High Wall as a means of escaping the Star Sea."

"And they succeeded in the end."

"This weakest point of the High Wall might be the location where the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat impacted the wall. Due to the mutual sensing between the Profound and Merchant Immortal Boats, the Profound Immortal Boat was able to determine the exact location..."

If the Immortal Boat elders had not revealed this matter, Li Fan would have activated the hidden hand within the [Hundred Hearings Immortal Record] the moment he left, plundering all its treasures.

However, since the Immortal Boat still had secrets to uncover, Li Fan decided to wait a bit longer.

"The Immortal Boat's persistent pursuit of True Immortal script characters, besides the innate power of the characters themselves, might be related to this plan for escaping the Star Sea."

"Crashing into the High Wall..."

"I wonder how the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat managed it back then." Li Fan mused inwardly.

Within the phantom of the Wooden Sword, Yin Shangren was resting.

The others were still traversing the Remnant Realm Great Wall, searching for suitable world fragments to serve as Xuanhuang's medicinal primers.

After Li Fan replenished their supply of [Clear Void Flowing Crystal] again, he did not seek out the Immortal Boat elders. Instead, he returned to the Profound Yellow Realm through the Great Heavenly Abode Array.

In the Great Profound Minor World.

Li Fan's figure flashed, appearing beside Ou Shangtian, who was fast asleep.

Sensing the [Qiankun Ancient Hand] still gestating within him, Li Fan used his hand as a brush and wrote a character, [Ancient].

Focusing his divine sense, he observed the changes within Ou Shangtian's body.

His understanding of the [Ancient] rune was still in its nascent stages, and he hadn't injected much spiritual energy, so the power of the [Ancient] character was extremely weak.

It barely enveloped Ou Shangtian's body.

All Done.

Chapter 1324: Blood Sees True Immortal Memory

Unlike the scene when interacting with the Immortal Boat elders regarding the Ancient script, the young body of Ou Shangtian did not exhibit any regression. Instead, subtle tremors emanated from the [Kun Qian Bone Hand] hidden within him, absorbing and assimilating the power of the Ancient script. Li Fan was unsure if "absorption and assimilation" was the right description for this process. However, in his perception, the Ancient script and the Kun Qian Bone Hand seemed to resonate, causing the power of the True Immortal script, which should have affected Ou Shangtian's body, to be entirely drawn into the wondrous artifact, the Kun Qian Bone Hand.

Meanwhile, the other wondrous artifact within Ou Shangtian's body, the [Tome of Ten Thousand Deaths], remained completely dormant. Stirred by the power of the [Ancient] script, the Kun Qian Bone Hand underwent a subtle transformation. On its originally bare white bones, hints of dark red flesh began to appear, mere thin lines, almost imperceptible. However, Li Fan, having witnessed the entire process of change, was the first to notice this anomaly. The birth of flesh made the Kun Qian Bone Hand appear even more mystical, as if it had instantly gained sentience and come alive. Without Ou Shangtian's control, its bony fingers trembled slightly on their own.

"Uh... hmm..." Ou Shangtian, while in deep slumber, let out a muffled groan. Clearly, the disturbance within him from the wondrous artifact caused him considerable pain. Li Fan placed his hands on Ou Shangtian's head. He then drowsily fell back asleep. A golden light emerged from Li Fan's hand, transforming into a sharp surgical knife. He made a slicing motion toward Ou Shangtian's arm.

The flesh did not tear; the golden surgical knife directly entered Ou Shangtian's body and arrived beside the Kun Qian Bone Hand. As if sensing the approach of an external enemy, the Kun Qian Bone Hand trembled violently and incessantly. It even seemed to want to break free and escape, disregarding the life of its host.

However, how could Li Fan allow it to succeed? Thin lines extended from the golden light knife, transforming into chains that firmly secured the Kun Qian Bone Hand in place. The light and shadow of the small knife flickered and shifted rapidly, scraping off the newly formed flesh on the bone, inch by inch.

Sharp, resentful howls seemed to echo in his ears. Li Fan, with an impassive face, used Origin Force Essence to weave a golden net, collecting and sealing all this flesh. Without the influence of the newborn flesh, the Kun Qian Bone Hand returned to its quiet and peaceful state. However, Ou Shangtian appeared as if he had suffered a severe internal injury, his face frighteningly pale.

With a casual wave of spiritual energy, Li Fan nourished Ou Shangtian's body. He then took the flesh, curled up within the net of Origin Force Essence and seemingly devoid of life, and flickered away to the area beneath the Dao Discussion Platform.

On the Dao Discussion Platform, the phantom of the preacher continued its discourse uninterrupted. Below, within the excavated immense cavity, Li Fan had already begun his research on this flesh.

"The appearance of the Kun Qian Bone Hand is exactly the same as the White Bone Vanguard Realm. According to He Dao Zi Miao, the former owner of the Vanguard Realm, the White Bone Vanguard Realm was a replica based on an illustrated booklet he once saw, which recorded the [True Immortal Remains]..."

"Meaning, this is very likely True Immortal flesh?" Li Fan narrowed his eyes, looking at the dark red tissue within the golden net. Having escaped from True Immortals several times and even witnessed a True Immortal being swallowed whole by a feline creature, Li Fan's awe of True Immortals had long since vanished. In this life, through a fortunate coincidence, the [Return to Reality] charging progress had doubled, allowing him to activate [Return to Reality] three consecutive times. With the assurance of safety, Li Fan began to study this True Immortal flesh.

First, he conducted a rough analysis of the True Immortal flesh's composition. The Origin Force Essence surgical knife cut off a small piece. Then, golden light continuously rotated, acting like a grinder, shattering this small piece of flesh.

"There is no Immortal Spiritual Power," Li Fan thought, not feeling disappointed as it was within his expectations. "The body tissue is separated from the blood. The tissue's activity is clearly inferior to True Immortal blood. This blood seems to contain some kind of special energy..."

Li Fan's eyes lit up. He extended a wisp of his divine sense, attempting to penetrate the separated blood. To his surprise, the moment his divine sense touched the True Immortal blood, it felt like hitting a scorching hot iron door. He felt dizzy and nauseated, and a large portion of his divine sense was immediately evaporated by the intense heat contained within the blood.

"Huh?" Although it was only a wisp of divine sense, the vibration and burning sensation were synchronously transmitted to Li Fan's main divine sense. His head felt as if he had been struck by a heavy blow, and then a blazing flame erupted in his soul, burning fiercely. The suffering was almost equivalent to soul annihilation. If an ordinary cultivator were caught unprepared, they would likely be reduced to ashes.

But Li Fan was no ordinary person. With the enhancement of the Innate Grandmaster Technique, his soul flowed and regenerated, becoming virtually indestructible. Even though it felt like being in purgatory, Li Fan eventually endured it. With Li Fan's current resilience, even after enduring this round of counterattack from the True Immortal blood, cold sweat dripped from his forehead, and his muscles cramped uncontrollably. The scorching sensation in his soul gradually subsided. Once everything calmed down, Li Fan let out a long sigh, dispelling all discomfort.

"The chasm between Immortals and mortals..." "True Immortals are untouchable." This was the feeling Li Fan had after the experience. Even a single drop of blood still demonstrated, in its own way, the insurmountable difference between Immortals and mortals. However... this small warning did not make Li Fan withdraw. Instead, it made him even more interested. The more he was forbidden from looking, the more he wanted to pry. Burning his soul? With the Five Elements Harmonization and the Innate Grandmaster Technique, his soul was indestructible and could withstand the backlash, allowing him to forcibly probe the mysteries within the True Immortal blood. Endless pain? Li Fan, having come this far, had long since learned to disregard it.

With a slight movement of his heart, he instantly differentiated into myriad strands of divine sense. Like fearless soldiers charging to their deaths, they all surged towards the True Immortal blood within the golden net. Boom! Boom! Boom! The counterattacks from the True Immortal blood continuously echoed in Li Fan's soul, like a giant hammer relentlessly striking. The myriad impacts brought myriad backlashes. Within Li Fan's soul, it felt as if it had instantly ignited, countless sparks spreading and burning fiercely. The pain was indescribable. Even with the Immortal Heart Incantation's assistance and his own overwhelmingly strong willpower, he was on the verge of collapse, barely holding on. Li Fan first glanced at the Return to Reality panel. The charging progress remained at 400%, not decreasing due to the backlash of the True Immortal blood. This indicated that the backlash from a single drop of blood was still not enough to threaten Li Fan's current strength.

With safety assured, Li Fan did his best to maintain the Innate Grandmaster Technique, simultaneously focusing his attention on the True Immortal blood that resembled a fiery wall. Under the impact of countless divine senses, its defenses seemed to show faint cracks. The stalemate continued for an unknown duration. Finally, Li Fan broke through the defenses of the True Immortal blood. The backlash vanished out of thin air, and his soul instantly felt clear and cool. A beam of light emerged from the True Immortal blood, enveloping Li Fan's divine sense. Afterward, a segment of light and shadow appeared before him. It was as if it were covered in mist, and all surrounding scenes were indistinct. An enraged voice was heard from a distant, towering figure. It was sporadic, and only the general meaning could be understood: "...Qionglang Star Domain... Yan... guarding..." "...Target found..." "Your subject obeys the order." A low voice emanated from his own body. The light and shadow shifted again. In the next moment, he was already within the Xuanhuang Realm. Standing high above, overlooking the myriad sentient beings within the realm. However, his body's attention seemed not to be on the Xuanhuang Realm below, but rather on the outside of the starry sky. He appeared to be waiting for something. After an unknown amount of time, a beam of light suddenly arrived from beyond the heavens. His gaze immediately locked onto it. But he did not interfere, allowing the beam of light to fall into the Xuanhuang Realm. Only when the light completely dimmed and settled did his figure descend to the mortal world to investigate specifically. "Not yet." "But it's not bad. If it were years ago, ascension would have been possible. What a pity..." The figure seemed accustomed to this outcome, shaking his head with neither joy nor sorrow, and then returned to the Xuanhuang Realm's celestial dome. Silently watching, waiting for the arrival of the next target... The scene abruptly froze, then rapidly faded and dissipated like a vintage photograph. Li Fan jolted back to reality, returning to the present. Although the memories experienced within the True Immortal blood were fleeting, Li Fan felt as if he had lived through dozens of lifetimes. This longevity was also reflected in his physical body. His long hair, which had been flowing freely, had now grown to his waist, interspersed with white strands. His face, palms, and even the skin all over his body had become somewhat wrinkled. Li Fan looked at his age on the Return to Reality panel. His mental age had not changed, but his physiological lifespan limit had been directly reduced to 50 years. He was still thirty years old in spirit, yet his life was nearing its end. "Is this the price of prying into True Immortals?" After attempting to use the Xuanhuang Realm's celestial treasures that increased lifespan and confirming they could not increase this reduced lifespan limit, Li Fan's heart filled with dread. "If it were an ordinary cultivator, they would surely be driven to a desperate situation by this." "Fortunately, I have [Return to Reality]. A 50-year lifespan limit makes little difference to me." "There are still 20 years left in this life, which is enough to complete my plans." Li Fan's mood calmed down, and he couldn't help but recall the scenes he had seen within the True Immortal blood earlier. "The True Immortal who owned this blood should have been ordered to come to Xuanhuang to find a certain target..." "The word 'subject' is quite interesting." "Moreover, that beam of light from beyond the heavens..." Li Fan narrowed his eyes. Combining the information from the ancient immortal formations in the Xuanhuang Realm and the clues obtained from outside the high wall, a guess emerged in Li Fan's mind: "The ancient Xuanhuang Realm was also 'capturing' things." "Unlike the later capture of other cultivation worlds, the target at that time was... 'Humans'?" Li Fan's eyes flickered. "But it's not bad. If it were years ago, ascension would have been possible..." Li Fan repeated the True Immortal's words several times. "The 'light from beyond the heavens' that had the 'potential for ascension' was not the target that True Immortal was waiting for. What exactly is it..." Suddenly, Li Fan, for some unknown reason, began to associate himself with it. Although the True Immortal's memories were vague and from countless years ago, Li Fan inexplicably felt a sense of having narrowly escaped a catastrophe. When he came to his senses, his back was already drenched in cold sweat. This was not due to Li Fan's timidity, but rather a primal fear and relief after realizing the situation in hindsight. "This..." His rapidly beating heart slowly calmed down. Li Fan temporarily left the underground space of the Dao Discussion Platform and flickered back to the sky above the Great Profound Minor World. Boundless clouds obscured the sight of the living beings on the ground. Li Fan savored the premonition he had just experienced. "Although it's hard to believe..." "But a premonition from the depths of my being tells me that years ago, the True Immortal's target in Xuanhuang might actually have been me?!" "Or rather, not me, but [Return to Reality]!" Li Fan closed his eyes, preventing his inner turmoil and shock from being exposed. "[Return to Reality], [Return to Reality]..." As he spoke, the surrounding scenery became illusory and ethereal again. Being isolated from the real world gave Li Fan a slight sense of peace. "[Return to Reality] involves the Great Dao of [True and False] and [Illusion and Reality]." "Wondrous artifacts of heaven and earth, True Immortal script characters, and even the mysterious symbol that created the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate's bloodline, are all partial projections of the Great Dao." "But only [Return to Reality] stands above all else." "It can be said to be almost the embodiment of the Great Dao of [True and False] and [Illusion and Reality] itself..." Li Fan's thoughts churned as he calmly contemplated. "The fact that the True Immortal called himself 'subject' suggests that the towering figure in the memory must have an extraordinary status." "Qionglang Star Domain... Yan..." Li Fan attempted to deduce the possible truth of the matter from the fragmented information. "It appears the Immortal Realm was already facing a crisis at that time." "Yan..." "With the power of a True Immortal, perhaps they could deduce a solution to the Immortal Realm's crisis, which was [Return to Reality]." "That's why they were 'lying in wait' in the Xuanhuang Realm?" "However, for some reason, I arrived here tens of thousands of years too late." ... After breaking free from the True Immortal's memories for a long time, the lingering sense of narrowly escaping death in Li Fan's heart eventually dissipated.
