With his emotions calmed, Li Fan re-examined his earlier speculation and found it almost absurdly laughable. "What is the truth?" Li Fan, his mood having calmed, flickered from the sky back to the underground. He looked at the remaining True Immortal blood in the golden net, pondering for a long time. "I cannot pry into it further in this life." "I will see in the next life if I can find more clues." "Even if my guess is confirmed, it doesn't matter. After all, the Immortal Realm faced a great calamity, and those True Immortals who wanted to 'hunt' me have already disappeared first!" A glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes, and his state of mind became steady once more. Although he could not further pry into the memories from the True Immortal blood in this life, it did not prevent Li Fan from continuing his research on the True Immortal flesh. "Next, let me see how the True Immortal flesh resists the power of True Immortal script characters." With his Origin Force Essence surgical knife, he cut off a small piece of flesh. Then, golden light continuously rotated, transforming into a grinder, crushing this small piece of flesh.Chapter 1324

"Wondrous artifacts of heaven and earth, True Immortal script characters, and even the mysterious symbol that created the Xuanhuang Great Heavenly Venerate's bloodline, are all partial projections of the Great Dao." "But only [Return to Reality] stands above all else." "It can be said to be almost the embodiment of the Great Dao of [True and False] and [Illusion and Reality] itself..." Li Fan's thoughts churned as he calmly contemplated. "The fact that the True Immortal called himself 'subject' suggests that the towering figure in the memory must have an extraordinary status." "Qionglang Star Domain... Yan..." Li Fan attempted to deduce the possible truth of the matter from the fragmented information. "It appears the Immortal Realm was already facing a crisis at that time." "Yan..." "With the power of a True Immortal, perhaps they could deduce a solution to the Immortal Realm's crisis, which was [Return to Reality]." "That's why they were 'lying in wait' in the Xuanhuang Realm?" "However, for some reason, I arrived here tens of thousands of years too late." ... After breaking free from the True Immortal's memories for a long time, the lingering sense of having narrowly escaped death in Li Fan's heart eventually dissipated. With his emotions calmed, Li Fan re-examined his earlier speculation and found it almost absurdly laughable. "What is the truth?" Li Fan, his mood having calmed, flickered from the sky back to the underground. He looked at the remaining True Immortal blood in the golden net, pondering for a long time. "I cannot pry into it further in this life." "I will see in the next life if I can find more clues." "Even if my guess is confirmed, it doesn't matter. After all, the Immortal Realm faced a great calamity, and those True Immortals who wanted to 'hunt' me have already disappeared first!" A glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes, and his state of mind became steady once more. Although he could not further pry into the memories from the True Immortal blood in this life, it did not prevent Li Fan from continuing his research on the True Immortal flesh. "Next, let me see how the True Immortal flesh resists the power of True Immortal script characters." With his Origin Force Essence surgical knife, he cut off a small piece of flesh. Then, golden light continuously rotated, acting like a grinder, shattering this small piece of flesh.

Chapter 1325: The Beginning of Creating Immortals

"The name suggests. The Horizon Distance Array could transform a horizon's distance into a mere foot. After the array was completed, it would connect the Xuanhuang Realm to the border of the Star Sea. Even without the Emptying the Wooden Sword technique, one could travel back and forth in an instant with the array."

"It seemed to be a long-distance teleportation formation, but it was not."

"Within the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, True Immortal remnant power permeated everything. The Xuanhuang Realm was even situated on the edge of the Immortal Ruins, affected by endless suction, and even space and time seemed to be distorted. A long distance meant too many uncontrollable factors. It was simply impossible to use 'teleportation' to reach the destination."

"The Horizon Distance Array used the most primitive means of travel. It merely infinitely shortened the distance between the starting point and the destination, so that one could reach it with a single step."

"The entire Great Profound Minor World could not accommodate this immense immortal array. Therefore, Li Fan set up the array in the void outside the Great Profound Minor World, on the Xuanhuang Realm side. Then, he laid out a formation to conceal it."

"On the Star Sea border side, as Li Fan gradually finished laying out the formation, an extremely profound wave suddenly descended and was about to sweep across the surroundings."

"Li Fan pinched his fingers, using a concealment formation to block it off."

"The golden light of the array dimmed, and a two-way passage between the Xuanhuang Realm and the Star Sea border was born silently."

"Li Fan stood in the void, adjusting his breath and recuperThe user provided context for previous chapters, setting up a specific translation style and consistency requirements. The user also provided multiple chapter headers and indicated a preference for the Chinese raw if available. The user wants me to translate the following chapters.

Chapter 1326: Seeing the High Wall While Pretending to be Mad

"Hehehe, fellow Daoist, please don't joke! Beyond the High Wall..." Zhong Daogong's eyes flickered as he directly denied Li Fan's insistent questioning.

"Do I look like I'm joking?" Li Fan interrupted him rudely. Fierce light appeared in his eyes, and his aura surged, as if he would erupt if they disagreed.

The elders of the Immortal Boat were all too familiar with the fluctuation emanating from Li Fan's body. It belonged to True Immortal script! Seeing that Li Fan seemed serious, the elders of the Immortal Boat paled.

"Fellow Daoist, don't be rash. Let's talk this through properly!" They attempted to pacify him while simultaneously distancing themselves from Li Fan and activating the Immortal Boat's multiple layers of defenses.

Li Fan's expression remained grim, "I am perfectly calm now! I merely wish to seek an explanation!"

"It is precisely because I tried to deduce the source that shook the High Wall that I suffered this backlash and now have so little time left to live... There is absolutely no such terrifying existence within this Utmost Darkness Star Sea."

"It was clearly the work of an unknown civilization beyond the High Wall, yet you Immortal Boat elders feign it as your own achievement. Stealing credit is utterly shameless! You may seek fame and reputation, but you have harmed me..."

The more Li Fan spoke, the more agitated he became, and the fluctuations of the True Immortal script on his body grew more intense. He glared at the people of the Immortal Boat as if they were his mortal enemies, ready to fight to the death.

This speech was, in truth, almost unreasonable, lacking any logical basis. But let's not forget, Li Fan, in this incarnation, had only twenty years of lifespan left. For cultivators, twenty years was but a fleeting moment. The Immortal Boat elders naturally would not argue with a dying person in a fit of emotion. They could only placate him helplessly, "Fellow Daoist, you misunderstand us!"

"We are truly not lying. The source that caused the disturbance of the High Wall, both originates from beyond the High Wall and is closely related to our Immortal Boat; in essence, they share the same origin..."

"You? Beyond the High Wall?" Li Fan calmed down slightly upon hearing this. However, his eyes remained filled with deep suspicion.

The elders of the Immortal Boat conferred amongst themselves. The matter of the Merchant Immortal Boat breaking through the High Wall was certainly a top secret, but Li Fan was a dying man. They were currently too close to the Profound Immortal Boat. If he were to go mad and release True Immortal script runes indiscriminately, it might cause irreparable damage to the Immortal Boat. It was not impossible to temporarily placate him with secrets.

"Alas, this matter is complicated. Fellow Daoist, please listen as I slowly explain..." Zhong Daogong began to recount the story of the Profound Merchant Immortal Boat's split and how the Merchant Immortal Boat eventually collided with the High Wall, breaking through it and achieving freedom.

Meanwhile, the other elders of the Immortal Boat joined forces, casting spells in the void to quietly isolate the space. On one hand, it was to prevent this absolute secret of the Immortal Boat from leaking, and on the other hand, it was to confine Li Fan.

Li Fan appeared oblivious to their subtle manipulations. The dark and white intertwined hair beside him stirred as if moved by an unseen wind. Whispers of silver-white threads emerged from his hair, weaving a formation in the void before the Immortal Boat elders could react. This formation also confined and sealed the Immortal Boat elders. This act of using their own methods against them did not immediately raise suspicion among the Immortal Boat elders. Attracted by Li Fan's voice, they momentarily turned their attention away.

"Everyone, look! This is the scene related to the High Wall that I saw through the Immortal Artifact that Protects the Realm!"

The Immortal Artifact that Protects the Realm, beyond the High Wall – these keywords, when combined, could not fail to shake the hearts of the Immortal Boat elders. They all turned their eyes towards Li Fan.

The perspective soared infinitely upward, revealing the entire Utmost Darkness Star Sea. The cold, silent Star Sea, for some unknown reason, seemed to be boiling, with an ominous and terrifying aura echoing endlessly. Soon, the sound of immense roaring came from the edge of the horizon. Then, the Utmost Darkness Star Sea seemed as if a giant stone had been thrown into it, creating colossal waves!

...

The scene abruptly ended. Although it was just a brief glimpse, the Immortal Boat elders had already seen what the scene depicted. The High Wall had collapsed, and unknown entities had descended upon the Star Sea! This scene was so lifelike, it was as if it were a recorded documentary! The Immortal Boat elders were mesmerized, unable to shake off the shock of the great upheaval in the Star Sea for a long time.

"This..." Zhong Daogong also seemed dazed and looked at Li Fan.

"Now you understand why I suffered this backlash and have so little time left to live?" Li Fan said calmly.

"The High Wall collapsing, the Star Sea in turmoil. If it truly comes to that, perhaps even Great Qi, with its current strength, cannot protect itself. This is also why we have not made a decision."

"Freedom is good, but it must be premised on safety..." Li Fan sighed deeply. The scene fell into silence. The Immortal Boat elders, while outwardly silent, were engaged in a fierce internal debate.

"Is this... true or false?"

"This scene is definitely not something that cultivators like us could fabricate. Even in our most terrifying nightmares, it is difficult to conjure such a scenario."

"I think it's not fake. That fluctuation was too real. To be honest, I almost couldn't resist fleeing just now. It's just that it seems the surroundings were sealed by a formation; I actually couldn't escape."

"What about our plan? Combining the power of True Immortal script characters, drawing upon the residual Immortal spiritual power of the Star Sea, to form a tsunami that impacts the weak points, and ultimately leap over the High Wall. We've planned for a long time, and now we're thinking of replicating the feat of the Merchant Immortal Boat. Who knew the final outcome would be this? Could it be that in our deductions, the High Wall is not what we thought it was, but rather what we ourselves broke down?"

"Wait, I just tried it. This kid's formation is truly formidable. Even the three of us together couldn't break it."

...

A subtle atmosphere gradually spread among the Immortal Boat elders. Firstly, they were deeply shocked by the scene of the Star Sea's great upheaval, and secondly, they were horrified to discover that they had been silently confined by Li Fan's formation.

"Fellow Daoist, what is the meaning of this?" Zhong Daogong narrowed his eyes and questioned.

Li Fan avoided the question, instead muttering to himself as if possessed, "My Master and the elders, for the sake of Great Qi's safety, abandoned cooperation with you and testing the weak points of the High Wall. I can actually understand..."

"But if that's the case, then I would have died in vain after twenty years, wouldn't I?"

"Great Qi intends to give up. What about your Immortal Boat?" Li Fan stared intently at the Immortal Boat elders and asked.

Zhong Daogong was momentarily unsure of Li Fan's state of mind and hesitated to answer. Seeing that he would not get a reply, Li Fan's emotions immediately became agitated again, "What about you all!"

"If you all give up too, then let everything here be as if it never happened. Then my unauthorized use of the Immortal Artifact, deduction of the future, and the subsequent reduction of my lifespan, would have been meaningless!"

"I originally had a bright future. Among the young disciples of Great Qi, my talent is unmatched. If not to become a great scholar remembered through the ages, at least I could have become a renowned master like my Master, imparting knowledge and resolving doubts..."

"All of this has vanished into smoke because of one sentence from your Immortal Boat," Li Fan's tone became increasingly frantic. Unidentified black marks appeared on his face, making him look terrifying.

"Death is death."

"If even after death, I become a laughingstock..."

"I will not agree!" Li Fan pointed his finger at Zhong Daogong.

"Give me an answer!"

"Your Immortal Boat, will you continue with the plan, or abandon it!"

"If you are afraid and cancel the plan..."

"Then you can all perish with me!"

As Li Fan spoke, countless silver threads in the surrounding void suddenly lit up. It was as if thousands of suns had risen simultaneously on the horizon, illuminating the space where the Immortal Boat elders were. Every elder's expression was illuminated with frightening clarity. A silver wind blew through the void. Even a gentle gust across their faces left trails of wounds, forcing the Immortal Boat elders to use their defenses. However, as the formless wind in the void intensified, their expressions changed drastically.

"This... what kind of formation is this!"

"Danger! Everyone be careful, this formation's ferocity is unparalleled in my life!"

"Quickly use the [Release] character to break the formation!"

The elders reacted quickly. Before the words could even fall, Jian Daosheng, the Grand Elder of the Immortal Hub Courtyard, wrote a [Release] character. Under the influence of the True Immortal script's power, the silver-white formation lines instantly collapsed. However, before the Immortal Boat elders could cheer, a shocking scene unfolded. From the surrounding darkness, countless suns seemed to rise again. Even more silver lines than before appeared, forming a new formation. Under the [Release] character, the formation melted like ice, but simultaneously, more ice was being frozen. Thus, the formation that trapped them not only did not disintegrate but became even larger and more complex.

"Quick, who else knows the [Release] character, keep up!"

"Calm down! The Immortal Boat hasn't moved. If too many True Immortal script powers erupt simultaneously, the consequences are unimaginable!"

"This brat has gone mad! What exactly does he want!"

Amidst the constant flashing of countless silver threads, Li Fan's voice continued to echo.

"Zhong Daogong! Answer me!"

"What is your Immortal Boat's answer!"

Zhong Daogong's expression was grim. In all his years, he had never been so cornered by a junior, and it was happening now. Yet... Zhong Daogong looked at the different True Immortal script characters constantly emanating from Li Fan's body, his head aching. If these True Immortal script characters were all activated simultaneously within the formation, even they, who had spent most of their lives researching True Immortal script characters, would likely suffer severe injuries. Zhong Daogong finally understood how troublesome a cultivator possessing the power of True Immortal script and fearing nothing could be.

"Answer me!" Li Fan's near-maniacal voice echoed within the great formation. Seeing that Li Fan was on the verge of collapse, with True Immortal script characters densely packing the air, causing a chilling sensation. Zhong Daogong, with no other choice, replied, "Fellow Daoist, rest assured, our Immortal Boat will absolutely not abandon the plan to explore beyond the High Wall."

"Words are not proof!"

"Then what does Daoist friend desire?" Faced with the superior situation, Zhong Daogong patiently asked.

"First, take me to that weak point of the High Wall, and let me see it for myself! If you give up, I will charge towards it alone, even if it means my death!" Li Fan's tone was resolute.

The Immortal Boat elders exchanged glances.

"What do you think? Can we break this formation?"

"Our formation skills are not unknown. Even if we studied it for a hundred years, we might not figure it out. Let alone breaking it in a short time." Elder Meng Xiaomeng of the Immortal Hub Courtyard wore a schadenfreude expression. "I told you long ago not to rely too much on True Immortal script characters. We should also focus on developing other techniques and divine abilities. You just wouldn't listen. Now you're caught in a bind!"

"What should we do now? Will we really have to take him to that weak point of the High Wall?"

"Not necessarily."

"This person is nearing the end of his life and seems to have gone mad. He cannot be judged by normal standards. Perhaps he will really charge towards the High Wall and die."

"Moreover, don't forget, this person's mastery of True Immortal script characters is profound. Perhaps we can use him for preliminary experiments for the plan."

"Exactly. Let's appease him first. As long as we ensure he doesn't leak the secrets to outsiders..."

...

Half coerced by Li Fan's threat to his life, and half out of consideration for their own scheme, the Immortal Boat elders eventually agreed to Li Fan's request. First, they would take him to witness the so-called weak point of the High Wall. The Immortal Boat and its elders, along with the Returning Void Array, moved through the void. They passed through the Sea of Relics, getting closer and closer to the foot of the High Wall.

"We're approaching the continuous world fragments ahead." "Beyond that lies the formless High Wall," Zhong Daogong said.

Li Fan let out a cold snort, "I've been there. How should we proceed from here?"

"The Remnant Realm Great Wall is connected as one. If the Immortal Boat were to follow, it might be captured by that supreme power and find it difficult to escape. Moreover, as you've noticed, the closer we get to the High Wall, the stronger the resonating Star Power becomes. We cultivators can barely maintain our stability, but a large Immortal Boat cannot." Zhong Daogong explained patiently.

"Don't worry, now that we're here, we won't go back on our promise."

Li Fan's gaze swept over everyone. After pondering for a moment, he finally nodded in agreement. Thus, they left six elders to guard the Immortal Boat. The remaining elders then accompanied Li Fan, venturing deeper into the area.

Chapter 1327: Ascending to the Jade Immortal's Shadow

The surrounding area is endless darkness, and in the distance are desolate, world fragments that stretch beyond sight.

The tide-like echoing star power continuously intensified, and the speed of Li Fan's group's advance slowed down.

"The residual True Immortal power gathered beneath the High Wall is even stronger than it was back then," Zhong Daogong murmured, gazing ahead with a heavy tone.

Affected by the pervasive echoing star power, not only the bodies exposed to the void but even their divine senses began to scatter like duckweed in the wind, dispersing shortly after leaving the body.

Communication among the group still relied on the Immortal Boat's unique [Boundless] transmission method.

"Although the High Wall is majestic, at this rate, it may indeed collapse one day."

"The speed at which the residual power is increasing is faster than we predicted. It seems that even without that brat, we will eventually have to proceed with the wall-jumping plan. Otherwise, if the High Wall collapses, we will have no hope of survival."

"Even so, being forced like this feels truly unwilling."

"Hehehe, let's just go with the flow and use him as a guinea pig..."

* * *

The Immortal Boat members were discussing heatedly.

[Boundless] was a communication method only known to the core members of the Immortal Boat, so they spoke somewhat recklessly even in front of Li Fan.

But they never imagined that Li Fan was also proficient in this [Boundless] communication technique. Thus, he heard every word the Immortal Boat elders spoke.

Lost in thought, he feigned ignorance of their discussion on the surface.

"How... much... longer...?"

He only asked intermittently, looking back with a faint divine sense, urging them on.

Zhong Daogong's answer remained unchanged: "Soon, it's just ahead."

It wasn't that Zhong Daogong was making excuses.

It was like the saying "running to death while looking at a mountain." The vastness of the Star Sea, here at this frontier, at the foot of the High Wall, was displayed to its fullest. Although they seemed not far from the Remnant Realm Great Wall, after flying for a long time, the path ahead showed no signs of shortening, as if it were endless.

Only the slight changes in the scenery of the Remnant Realm Great Wall indicated that they were not standing still.

The increasingly powerful echoing star power also became an obstacle to their progress. It was like walking in an endless muddy swamp, with towering mountains in the distance as the goal.

"Too slow," Li Fan seemed impatient. "At this speed, I'll probably run out of lifespan before we even get there."

Zhong Daogong was about to explain, "It's not that we..."

But he suddenly heard Li Fan say coldly, "Be careful!"

A phantom of a long sword, radiating golden light, descended upon them with Li Fan's words.

The sword body depicted mountains and rivers, the sun, moon, and stars, its aura majestic and sacred.

"In which direction?" Li Fan asked sternly.

The Immortal Boat members were still immersed in this golden sword phantom, which was clearly extraordinary just by looking at it. Not only because the phantom represented the supreme path of the sword.

More importantly, they were horrified to discover that while enveloped by the golden sword phantom, the echoing star power they were subjected to had instantly halved!

It was as if they were standing on a suddenly elevated piece of land, in another world, no longer being buffeted by the surging waves.

"How is this possible?!" The Immortal Boat members were all greatly shocked.

The echoing star power was, in essence, residual True Immortal power. Even though it had the word "residual" attached, it was still True Immortal level power.

This golden sword phantom could actually reduce its influence, implying it was on par with Immortals!

Of course, the Immortal Boat members dared not think too highly. Even so, Li Fan, who could wield a divine ability capable of confronting True Immortal power, could not help but draw their attention.

"This brat is truly like a treasure trove, full of surprises that are constantly being unearthed."

"If we could comprehend this divine ability, perhaps it could open up a second path for our Immortal Boat, besides True Immortal script characters!"

"No, rather than him as an individual, it's the Great Qi civilization that is unfathomable."

The appearance of the golden sword phantom stirred up a thousand waves with a single stone. The Immortal Boat elders had various expressions, while Li Fan seemed unconcerned, staring at Zhong Daogong, "Quickly point the way. Wielding this [Immortal Slaying Sword] consumes a great deal, and I cannot hold on for long."

Within the domain of the golden sword phantom, even divine sense transmission became clearer.

Zhong Daogong's eyes flickered upon hearing the words [Immortal Slaying Sword].

However, he ultimately pointed the way for Li Fan.

The golden sword shone, traversing the Star Sea. Its speed was immeasurably faster than the others flying. The desolate worlds within the Remnant Realm Great Wall rapidly grew larger in their vision. The group drew closer to the foot of the High Wall.

Following Zhong Daogong's guidance, Li Fan controlled the sword phantom and arrived at an abnormal "protrusion" of the Remnant Realm Great Wall.

It was like a towering beacon tower on the continuous Great Wall; the number of world fragments accumulated here was significantly more than in other places.

"The weak point beneath the High Wall is here?" Li Fan asked, squinting.

Zhong Daogong shook his head, "Not necessarily. Structures like this actually exist in multiple places along the Remnant Realm Great Wall. They should be important nodes for maintaining its structural stability. To reach our destination, we need to utilize the 'momentum' of this location."

The golden sword phantom stopped, and Zhong Daogong, along with the other Immortal Boat elders, became solemn.

"Please Daoist friend, ascend."

The Immortal Boat elders jointly cast spells, and a blurry image appeared before Li Fan.

The flat, slightly curved space was greatly distorted here due to the protrusion of the Remnant Realm Great Wall. Like a tower being pushed up, its potential and energy were significantly higher than in other locations.

"Ascend along the momentum of the Remnant Realm Great Wall."

Zhong Daogong gently pointed, and the image of the spatial protrusion magnified infinitely. In an instant, they were enveloped within it.

They were already within the time-space anomaly indicated in the image, yet they remained unaware.

Li Fan stood still, carefully savoring the subtle differences in the surrounding time and space.

"Back then, our Immortal Boat spent several hundred years just to understand this method of [Climbing]. It's normal for Daoist friend to not understand it immediately."

"If it doesn't work, then abandon this golden sword phantom, and we'll fly with our bodies."

The Immortal Boat elders 'kindly' suggested.

Li Fan ignored them, closed his eyes, and the scene in his mind flashed.

In actuality, he had indeed experienced this feeling of spatial highs and lows before.

It was in the end of his previous life when the High Wall collapsed, and an unknown entity descended, causing a maelstrom within the Star Sea.

However, at that time, he was too shaken by the earth-shattering spectacle and deceived by superficial phenomena.

He hadn't paid attention to the spatial turbulence it caused.

"High and low."

The memories in his mind, from illusory, gradually became real. It was as if he had returned to the end of his previous life, witnessing the magnificent, turbulent spectacle of the Star Sea.

A sudden enlightenment slowly welled up in his heart.

The illusion disappeared, and he looked at reality again.

The protruding part of the Remnant Realm Great Wall was extremely conspicuous.

"Everyone, hold on tight!" Li Fan said solemnly.

The sword phantom once again emitted a brilliant golden light. Although it seemed like a great sun in the sky, for some reason, the golden light only shone in this area and did not illuminate a large area.

Despite not having physically moved, the golden sword phantom seemed to have traversed hundreds of millions of miles of space in an instant, becoming decrepit and flickering erratically.

Li Fan's forehead began to bead with cold sweat. His body trembled uncontrollably.

The Immortal Boat members watched as the scenery of the Remnant Realm Great Wall, distorted and deformed, appeared to shrink in their vision. They looked at each other with astonishment.

"How is it possible? They actually completed the climb on the first attempt?"

"This brat's talent and comprehension are truly rare in the world. He must be a top prodigy in the Great Qi civilization."

"To achieve such a feat at such a young age. Give him a few more centuries, and he might truly be able to cross the High Wall! It's no wonder he's become somewhat frantic after his lifespan is nearing its end. If it were me, I wouldn't be able to accept it either!"

The Immortal Boat elders looked at Li Fan, and many felt a hint of pity.

The climb and transformation were ongoing.

The range enveloped by the golden sword phantom was rapidly shrinking, barely covering the Immortal Boat members and Li Fan.

The once brilliant golden light was also gradually dimming.

Clearly, the consumption was even more severe, as if it might extinguish at any moment.

But the changes it brought were also obvious.

The surrounding scenery of the Remnant Realm Great Wall, which stretched to the horizon, slowly curled up and contracted into a circle, closing in.

The perspective rose, and the circle became smaller and smaller.

Finally, it converged to a single point.

*Boom! Boom!*

It was as if they had reached the end of the road, or perhaps hit a wall.

The last remaining golden sword phantom shattered in an instant.

Li Fan violently spat out a mouthful of blood, his face deathly pale.

But he casually wiped it away, a glint of surprise and madness flashing in his eyes.

"This is the High Wall?" Li Fan coughed lightly and spat out another large mouthful of blood. He didn't seem to care and turned to ask.

"No."

"This is the true foot of the High Wall," Zhong Daogong took a careful look at Li Fan, first shaking his head in denial, then sighing with emotion.

He also surveyed their surroundings.

"We have to climb again?" Li Fan heard this and couldn't help but look up.

"The High Wall is difficult to overcome, or perhaps impossible to cross. One can only rely on sacrificing oneself to break through it." Jian Daosheng said in a deep voice.

"The number of people coming this time is smaller. With just our combined strength, we probably won't be able to reach the impact point from back then. However, the distance should be enough to observe the traces."

With that, the Immortal Boat elders formed a circle.

Then, a peculiar energy emerged from them.

It didn't surge upward but rose like a tidal wave at the seashore, one wave after another, higher and higher.

Carried by this surging force, the scene that had initially shrunk to a small point transformed. The lines below the point thickened and extended downwards.

The elders' energy grew more and more vigorous, and the lines became thicker and thicker.

Like pillars of a heavenly mountain, they gradually became indistinguishable in height, yet they solidly supported those above.

Due to the continuous ascent, their field of vision also became higher and broader.

Li Fan gazed into the distance, and in the darkness, he seemed to sense several peaks like theirs.

And in the unseen distance, a majestic mountain stood tall.

Its summit was not visible.

It was only slightly shorter than the endless High Wall.

"That is..."

"True Immortal of Immortal Ruins?"

Looking back into the distance, a realization welled up in Li Fan's mind.

Li Fan had learned from the memories of a Xuan Tian Sect Dharma King that Xuan Tian King had once told his disciples that he had found a way to lead the people, and even the entire Xuanhuang Realm, to escape the Utmost Darkness Star Sea.

However, it was something that only a True Immortal could accomplish.

"This is the difference between Immortals and mortals."

"Mortals are always at the bottom, and only by ascending to Immortality can one stand at the peak."

"The process of cultivation is also a process of climbing step by step. But when a great tribulation descends, even the mountains that could accommodate habitation collapse."

"When the mountain is gone, the path is hidden. Even if one can fly through the air for a time, one cannot remain in that realm indefinitely."

Borrowing the momentum of the Remnant Realm Great Wall, they had reached a height that was normally impossible to attain. It was like pre-emptively reaching the summit of a collapsed mountain that no longer existed in this era. All sorts of insights that did not belong to this time flooded Li Fan's mind.

"The difference between Immortals and mortals is already this great."

"And the High Wall..."

Li Fan turned his gaze, looking further into the distance.

Majestic and continuous, like a firmament pressing down.

He could not see its beginning or end, nor its peaks or valleys.

It simply stood there, blocking their path.

Inspiring despair.

If he hadn't personally witnessed the High Wall collapse before, Li Fan, upon seeing this magnificent scene, would have been overcome by inner demons. Whenever he thought of the High Wall's existence, he would inevitably feel fear.

And looking at the expressions of the Immortal Boat elders, it seemed to be the same.

Their initial ambition had vanished. Their faces showed only endless fear and reverence.

However, they seemed to have a secret method among them.

As they formed a circle, their minds also united.

Not long after, they all awoke from their shock.

Li Fan also feigned to have just "woken up."

"We cannot ascend any further."

Zhong Daogong sighed, then looked into the distance, seemingly searching for traces left by the Merchant Immortal Boat.

Li Fan waited patiently.

After a full half-day, Zhong Daogong pointed in one direction, his expression solemn, "Daoist friend, do you sense the anomaly over there?"

Li Fan followed Zhong Daogong's gaze.

At first glance, it seemed no different from the surrounding scenery.

But after careful consideration, Li Fan did indeed find some subtle clues.

Li Fan extended his hand, as if trying to touch the distant spot.

"Here... it's distorted."

"Is this the trace left by the Merchant Immortal Boat's collision?" Li Fan asked with an unreadable tone.

He lightly stroked the spatial imprint in the air.

Before his eyes, the image of half a magnificent Immortal Boat reappeared, resolutely charging forward.

Then, a world-shattering explosion of light erupted.

Zhong Daogong's eyes flashed with a hint of emotion, and he nodded, "The energy released by crossing the High Wall was so immense that even the High Wall itself could not withstand it."

"Therefore, the traces left here have not vanished for ten thousand years."

"The imprint is still there. This shows that even after so many years, there has been no sign of 'repair.' Thus, theoretically, we have a great possibility of following the path left by the Merchant Immortal Boat to cross the High Wall again," Zhong Daogong said slowly.

Li Fan squinted his eyes, seemingly pondering something.

Shortly after, he shook his head slightly, "No. We have exerted all our strength to reach this height. And that place..."

Li Fan pointed to the location of the Merchant Immortal Boat's trace and asked, "Perhaps even if we exerted ten times the effort, we still wouldn't be able to reach it."

"Let alone cross the High Wall!"

Chapter 1328: Dark Peaks Gather

"There is a distinction between mortals and immortals. Relying solely on ourselves, it is naturally impossible to reach that height. That's why we need to borrow 'external forces.' It was the same for the Immortal Boat of Shang, and it is the same for our Profound Immortal Boat now!" Zhong Daogong said with a slight smile, not explaining in detail, but rather ambiguously.

"External forces? True Immortal script? Is this why you want to join forces with our Great Qi?" Li Fan asked directly.

"Yes... and no." Zhong Daogong's expression was inscrutable.

"Alright, since Daoist friend has seen the weak point of the high wall and proven the sincerity of our Immortal Boat. Why don't we return to a safe place and discuss further? This is not a place to linger..."

Before Zhong Daogong could finish, the high point of the Remnant Realm Great Wall where they were located suddenly trembled slightly.

Everyone couldn't help but look "down." In the Utmost Darkness Star Sea below, for some unknown reason, ripples stirred up waves. Like sea clouds and surging tides, they spread endlessly in the Star Sea.

"It's the reverberating Star Power!" All the elders of the Immortal Boat's faces paled slightly.

"The scale of this outbreak is not small, and it probably won't subside for a while. We should leave as soon as possible," Zhong Daogong said solemnly.

Li Fan looked into the distance. Although the distortion of the perspective prevented him from seeing specific things in the Star Sea, Li Fan could vaguely sense the source of the reverberating Star Power outbreak.

It was as if the Remnant Realm Great Wall, which served as a breakwater, had formed a gap due to the disappearance of one of the remnant realms. A portion of the residual True Immortal power accumulated beneath the high wall found a vent, pouring down mightily through this loophole.

This kind of event had occurred in his previous life. It was caused by his Saint Embryo avatar destroying the fragments of various remnant realms that the Heavenly Physician had implanted in the Utmost Darkness Abyss within the Xuanhuang Realm, forcing him to replenish the realms.

But in this life, the fuse had not even been lit. Why then did the Remnant Realm Great Wall become turbulent?

"Could it be that Yin Shangren and the others caused this commotion?"

"They wouldn't be so reckless..." A hint of doubt flashed through Li Fan's mind.

While he was pondering, the elders of the Immortal Boat had already brought Li Fan down from the "high place" of the Star Sea. The scenery rapidly changed, and the vast and boundless Utmost Darkness Sea disappeared. The Remnant Realm Great Wall still stood tall, and the previous "ascended view" felt like an illusion. Clearly, ascending was not an easy feat even for the elders of the Immortal Boat.

In a moment, all the elders' breathing became disordered, and beads of sweat dripped from their foreheads. Zhong Daogong's expression was solemn as he looked towards the distant source of the disturbance in the Remnant Realm Great Wall.

However, he ultimately chose not to investigate and instead organized and urged everyone to leave. On the way back to the Immortal Boat, Li Fan still led the way with his Golden Sword phantom.

This time, the elders of the Immortal Boat truly experienced how fast this sword shadow was. When everyone reached the location of the Profound Immortal Boat, the reverberating Star Power had not yet affected them.

The expressions of the elders as they looked at Li Fan changed even more.

"Daoist friend, let's first enter the Immortal Boat and then discuss follow-up cooperation plans," Jian Dao Sheng said, pointing to the open gateway of the Immortal Boat, smiling.

Unexpectedly, Li Fan resolutely shook his head and refused: "Still no. I'm afraid I have to go back to Great Qi."

The elders' expressions immediately became somewhat subtle.

Li Fan was fearless, with an arrogant expression: "What? Do you all seem to have objections?"

"This is not what we agreed on before. Daoist friend learned our Immortal Boat's highest secret plan, and now you want to leave..." Zhong Daogong's expression was displeased, and the other elders stared intently at Li Fan, locking onto him with their aura.

"Hmph, I think you don't need to waste your efforts. Everyone has seen the 'Sword Immortal's Strike.' If I unleash it, which one of you can stop me?" Li Fan said unhurriedly.

Upon hearing this, the elders could only remain silent. Indeed, it was faster than the spread of residual True Immortal power in the Star Sea. It could even take multiple people along... Such an escape technique truly surpassed their cognition. However, letting Li Fan leave so easily was absolutely impossible.

The atmosphere in the hall grew tense. It was Li Fan who broke the stalemate: "Why must you all be like this? I'm just going back for a short while. I know your concerns, you're afraid I'll leak the weak point of that high wall. There's no need!"

"I'm going back to try and persuade Great Qi again, to see if they can change their minds. Having witnessed that there really is such a weak point in the high wall, the persuasive power will eventually be much greater. If my master and the others are still unwilling to take the risk, I naturally won't expose this secret. If I'm lucky enough to persuade them..."

"Anyway, we have to cooperate in the end, so it doesn't matter if it's leaked or not."

"My lifespan is nearing its end. Now, before I die, I have personally witnessed the only opportunity to cross the high wall, so how can I give it up?" Li Fan said earnestly.

Afterward, he cupped his hands. In the midst of the heavy encirclement by the Immortal Boat elders, he directly rode the sword shadow and soared away.

Such was the speed that even Zhong Daogong could not react in time; his figure had already vanished.

"This kid is really troublesome," Jian Dao Sheng said, stroking his beard with a frown.

"There's no other way. Possessing True Immortal script, with immortal formations, and his escape techniques are divine and unpredictable. Moreover, his lifespan is nearing its end, and he's not afraid of death... It's best not to make an enemy of such a person."

"Fortunately, he doesn't have many years left to live. Otherwise, our Immortal Boat might not have peace in the future."

"I actually think his words make sense. If Great Qi is unwilling to participate in the plan due to the prophecy of disaster from the World-Protecting Immortal Artifact, then our Immortal Boat is the only one they can rely on. After all, it's obviously unrealistic for him to cross the high wall alone..."

While the elders of the Immortal Boat were in discussion, Li Fan had already returned to the border of the Remnant Realm Great Wall.

The reverberating Star Power was like a rising storm, becoming more intense. The wooden sword phantom Li Fan had left behind earlier was like a candle in the wind, precarious.

He shot out a ray of golden light, stabilizing it further. Li Fan searched for traces of Qiao Gong and the others nearby, but found none. The secret marks they had agreed to leave along the way while searching for suitable remnant world fragments were all scattered by the reverberating Star Power.

"They all lost contact?" Li Fan was somewhat surprised.

"Fortunately, the 'Horizon Distance Array' was not severely damaged." Li Fan floated to the side of the great array, reinforced it again, and then gave up the idea of looking for them.

"I can only pray for their own good fortune."

"With the luck of these few people, just the reverberating Star Power that erupted shouldn't be enough to kill them."

"When the storm gradually subsides, if they are unharmed, they should naturally return."

Passing through the great array and returning to the Xuanhuang Realm, Li Fan found that, as expected, some residual True Immortal power had leaked through the great array. After setting up a net of Origin Force essence at the great array to double-seal it, the tremors caused by the reverberating Star Power finally ceased.

"Among the few, if anyone is most likely to have caused this Star Sea anomaly, it should be Yin Shangren," Li Fan recalled Yin Shangren's strange expression when he first arrived at the Remnant Realm Great Wall.

"He must have seen the scenes from the memories of the world spirits he absorbed. But Yin Shangren is by no means a reckless person. If it were just that, he wouldn't have recklessly moved remnant realm fragments without regard for the consequences..."

"The secrets within this should be revealed when Yin Shangren returns," Li Fan had a vague premonition that Yin Shangren was still alive in some corner of the Remnant Realm Great Wall. He might even have encountered a great fortune.

"Perhaps it's related to the formation of the Remnant Realm Great Wall?" Li Fan suddenly thought so. In the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, not only is the origin of the high wall unknown, but even the formation of the Remnant Realm Great Wall beneath it has always been a mystery. The countless destroyed cultivation worlds in the Star Sea back then did not gather at the Immortal Ruins. Instead, they piled up beneath the high wall, forming a continuous expanse. In Li Fan's opinion, the force maintaining the Remnant Realm Great Wall was a great power not inferior to residual True Immortal power, yet it was beyond Li Fan's knowledge. At his current level of experience, which far surpassed ordinary cultivators, and with the unrestrained exploration of each reincarnation, there was little in the Xuanhuang Realm or the Utmost Darkness Star Sea that remained a blind spot for him. This force maintaining the Remnant Realm Great Wall was one such thing. The deepest part of the Utmost Darkness Sea was another.

Returning to Great Xuan, Li Fan's wisp of divine sense possessed the body of a strong Ghost Tribe member. Then, after gathering the Ghost Tribe members and initiating the ritual to enter the Utmost Darkness Sea, he slowly walked into it.

The Utmost Darkness Sea was endlessly dark. For ordinary cultivators, it was naturally a dangerous land of death. But Li Fan had walked through it countless times, familiar with the way, and traveled without incident.

Ignoring the corpse of the ancient immortal from the Xuanhuang Realm lying on the ground, he walked forward with a single-minded focus, arriving at the central core of the Spirit Gathering Ascension Array. It was like a transparent observation deck, overlooking the silhouette of the True Immortal's remains in the entire Utmost Darkness Sea. He finally stopped, not daring to go deeper, facing the lurking True Immortal's desire for survival.

Before him, the ancient storm clouds that had accumulated for who knows how many years stood quietly, like terrifying and bizarre primordial beasts. Looking down at these accumulated forces from above, Li Fan felt a sense of familiarity.

"As expected, my feeling was not wrong!" A sharp glint flashed in Li Fan's eyes. The scene he perceived earlier while overlooking the Utmost Darkness Sea from the high point of the Remnant Realm Great Wall now appeared before him, overlapping with the image of the storm condensing in the Utmost Darkness Sea. It wasn't about specific scenery, but about the convergence of energy, making this part of the Utmost Darkness Sea significantly elevated.

"This place should be one of the many peaks seen from that high point."

"The energy gathered here, compared to the entire Xuanhuang Realm, is even 'higher.' It's even superior to the position reached by borrowing the power of the Remnant Realm Great Wall!"

Li Fan's eyes flickered, his thoughts racing: "Not only is the 'Spirit Gathering Ascension Array' in the Utmost Darkness Sea established on True Immortal remains, but also because nearly ten thousand years have passed since the array was established!"

"The establishment of the great array back then was for King Xuan Tian to lead the Xuanhuang Realm across the high wall. However, due to various accidents, King Xuan Tian mysteriously disappeared, and the plan was aborted midway."

"But the energy accumulated in the Utmost Darkness Sea did not stop. Instead, it has been continuously accumulating for nearly ten thousand years."

"In the past ten thousand years, various drastic changes have occurred in the Star Sea. However, in reality, the 'height' of the high wall surrounding the Star Sea has not actually changed. This means..."

Li Fan scanned the storm clouds below again. The storm clouds before his eyes suddenly turned into peaks, each floating above the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, facing the high wall from afar.

"The high points that the Immortal Boat people consider treasures, and can only reach with external help, are abundant in the Xuanhuang Realm."

"Standing here, crossing the high wall would be much easier than elsewhere."

"The only concern is that it might provoke the True Immortal's survival intent here..."

"However, as long as I'm careful, there should be no problem."

Maintaining the overhead view was somewhat strenuous for Li Fan. He let out a long sigh, restoring himself to a normal state. He began to ponder the correct way to use this wealth left by King Xuan Tian.

"Simply using the high points as a springboard is definitely not enough. I need more data. Preferably, actual verification..."

"The Immortal Boat can be used as cannon fodder, which is not bad."

"The Spirit Gathering Ascension Array is a part of the Star Crossing Array, involving crossing the high wall. The Eye of the Celestial Beast is also like this. It seems that the Eye of the Celestial Beast is not just for navigation and locking..."

"What it sees might also be the 'height of the high wall,' a dimensional perspective similar to what I saw before!" Li Fan suddenly had a flash of inspiration.

Controlling the body of the Ghost Tribe member, Li Fan stayed in the main control center of the Spirit Gathering Ascension Array for a full seven days. Until the Ghost Tribe member's body could no longer withstand the dense darkness, and was completely consumed by it. His senses disappeared, and he stopped.

In the Great Profound Minor World, Li Fan slowly opened his eyes. His divine sense swept across the heavens and earth. After getting used to the elevated perspective from before and returning to the normal perspective, Li Fan actually felt slightly unwell.

"In ancient times, breaking through the limit of height could lead to ascension to immortality."

"Later, the immortal path was severed, but the high wall still existed..."

"But perhaps, the principles behind these two are somewhat similar."

Looking at the countless beings in the Great Profound, Li Fan felt an inexplicable emotion surge in his heart.

"However, the height of the high wall might be even greater than the height of achieving immortality. After all, King Xuan Tian could ascend to the immortal path back then, but he couldn't cross the high wall."

"To put it another way, if I could cross the high wall now, perhaps I could have ascended to immortality in the past."

Thinking of this, Li Fan couldn't help but be lost in thought.

"Immortal..." Ten thousand years have passed, times have changed. Although the realm is the same, one is achieving the Dao and ascending, while the other is locked behind the high wall. Even if one can cross, they still have to face the unknown risks beyond the high wall.

"The Great Dao is easier to comprehend, but immortality is not immortality." Li Fan could only sigh with such emotion.

"If my guess is correct, the method of building the high wall is the same as the shackles of achieving ascension, then things are interesting."

Chapter 1329: Finger Falls, Destroying the Firmament

Regarding the formation of the high wall, Li Fan has had two hypotheses.

One possibility is that the high wall was created by a True Immortal who achieved enlightenment within the Immortal Ruins, similar to a prohibition set up by cultivators when meditating to prevent others from disturbing them.

The other possibility is that the high wall was built by unknown entities from beyond the wall, sealing the Star Sea to isolate the disaster of True Immortal script that was spreading at that time.

Both hypotheses have a certain degree of validity.

The high wall is formless and intangible, yet it can seal the entire Star Sea. It is a technique that mortal cultivators cannot comprehend at all, and only those at the level of "Immortal" can achieve it. Although the Utmost Darkness Star Sea is vast in the eyes of cultivators in the lower realms, containing countless cultivation worlds, True Immortals can see its entirety with a single glance. This casually drawn, sealed area might be of a suitable scale for Immortals to practice.

On the other hand, the Star Sea is vast and boundless. The Utmost Darkness Star Sea is certainly not the entirety of the lower realms. Perhaps it's not even a corner of the lower realms. After the great calamity of the Immortal Realm, the region where the Xuanhuang Realm is located had King Xuan Tian return after ascending to immortality, and the Faceless Immortal escaped from it. Outside the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, are there no other survivors of the Immortal Realm? It is highly possible that they took preventive measures after discovering the anomaly in the Xuanhuang Realm star field.

"The Immortal Realm collapsed, and the vast lower realms instead became a battlefield for various forces to gather. What does the scene outside the high wall look like now?"

"Are those surviving Immortals still in control? Or have past cultivators fought back and found a way to counter True Immortals? Or even developed civilizations capable of hunting True Immortals?" Li Fan mused leisurely, a sense of longing appearing in his heart.

His emotions surged, and he couldn't calm down for a long time.

"Soon. In this life, with the Profound Immortal Boat taking the lead in crossing the high wall, even if they ultimately fail, I will learn from them and continue in the next life. It will take at most three to five tries before there's a good chance of crossing the high wall."

"And after I achieve Dao Integration by merging with the Heavenly Immortal Souls of the Super Xuanhuang Realm and become the strongest in the Utmost Darkness Star Sea, I can also unify the powers of the Xuanhuang Realm and the Immortal Boat to the greatest extent, and begin exploring beyond the high wall."

"Just like how I explored the Sea of Clouds and the Xuanhuang Realm step by step from the Great Profound Minor World!"

In a slight trance, the scene of him struggling desperately to break through the Immortal Severing Great Array and arriving in the cultivation world in his previous life suddenly appeared in Li Fan's mind.

"Although it is dangerous outside the high wall, I am not what I used to be."

Li Fan's eyes flickered. "Inferiority and superiority... Looking down at the Star Sea below the high wall from an elevated perspective, the enlightenment that arose in his heart was dozens of times more active than comprehending the Dao in the Star Sea. Moreover, what was naturally understood while standing at the peak was a level higher than in normal circumstances. It was as if he was comprehending the Dao from the 'True Immortal's perspective'!"

"Why are all beings below Immortals ants?"

"A True Immortal can destroy the Xuanhuang Realm with a single glance. However, even a mortal cultivator, no matter how strong, would take considerable effort to destroy such a vast world."

"It's because Immortals stand tall enough. In the eyes of True Immortals, a mere realm is just a small point!"

Recalling the scene he saw at the peak of the Remnant Realm Great Wall earlier. The continuous remnant realm fragments, as the height increased, gradually shrunk and then twisted into rings, finally converging into a single point. Compared to the behemoth of the Remnant Realm Great Wall, the current Xuanhuang Realm was just an insignificant fragment. The Great Wall turning into a point. And regarding the Xuanhuang Realm as a point, without even needing to ascend to that height. Recalling the feeling of constantly climbing, in Li Fan's eyes, the Great Profound Minor World and the Xuanhuang Realm, in the distortion, slowly shrank. Although it had not yet reached the point of converging into one, it was as if it were being viewed from outside the realm, turning into a ball of yellow smoke. Li Fan instinctively wanted to reach out and touch it, but found himself as if frozen in ice. There was immense resistance around him, and he couldn't move at all!

"I am still too weak now! Although by chance, I have gained the True Immortal's perspective, the vision and actual actions are two completely different concepts..." Li Fan tried several times, but the result was the same. His body seemed to be outside the world, and he couldn't make any effective manipulations. Furthermore, because of these few attempts, the energy within him was rapidly depleted. Even with Li Fan's current foundation, it was stretched thin and quickly left him nearly exhausted. Li Fan knew he couldn't force it and quickly fell from the high place. When his vision lowered, his movements became flexible again. Li Fan let out a long sigh, recovering from his recent exhaustion. After a moment, his gaze condensed slightly. He found something peculiar. According to the normal recovery speed, he should have been fully recovered within a few breaths. After all, he had the Five Elements Great Grotto-heaven as a foundation, coupled with the absorption of the Xuanhuang World Destruction phenomenon. The energy that the Xuanhuang Realm could erupt in the face of world-ending crises after the merging of all realms was immense, almost inexhaustible for cultivators. But now, Li Fan, simply by attempting to act at a "high place," had depleted this energy reserve in a short period. "Not only has the altitude changed, but the energy consumption required for normal actions has also increased exponentially." "This is also one of the fundamental reasons for the gap between Immortals and mortals. Spiritual power, even the spiritual power of an entire world, cannot support the energy consumption of acting at a 'high place'." "The energy level is too low; a higher-level substitute is needed." "Immortal Spiritual Power..." Various insights flashed through Li Fan's mind. Taking a step, Li Fan left the Great Profound Minor World and arrived at another barren minor world with no inhabitants, only continuous primeval forests. He quietly waited for his rest to complete, and then Li Fan attempted to ascend again. However, this time, Li Fan controlled the speed of altitude increase. When the primeval forest before his eyes shrank to the size of a glass bead, he stopped. For Li Fan, who was at the lowest point, merely maintaining the "altitude" required consuming a large amount of energy. But this time, he did not choose to use his own spiritual power to fill it. Instead, he chose to use Origin Force essence, which was very close to Immortal Spiritual Power. Golden light enveloped him, and the sense of restraint slightly loosened. Compared to the completely frozen state before, it was much easier. Li Fan looked at the minor world before him, which was like a glass bead, and slowly extended his right index finger. Buzz... As if sensing fatal danger, a mournful dirge-like song suddenly sounded in the sky of the barren minor world. However, it was destined to be unable to prevent everything from happening. Li Fan's finger gently descended. A finger shadow appeared synchronously in the sky above the barren minor world, like rolling dark clouds, obscuring the entire minor world. There was no earth-shattering explosion. With just the light sound of glass shattering, the barren minor world instantly turned to ashes! Violent gusts of wind spread in the void due to the world's destruction. But no matter how they blew, Li Fan stood there unharmed. Protected by golden light, the storm could not harm him in the slightest. He narrowed his eyes, looking at his finger, still immersed in the power of that world-destroying strike. The massive consumption of Origin Force essence had caused him to fall from a "high place" and return to a normal perspective, but so easily destroying a minor world like this truly gave Li Fan an illusion of being an supreme deity! Li Fan closed his eyes, and it took him a long time to eliminate this sense of displacement. "Fundamentally, the True Immortal's single glance that destroyed Xuanhuang back then is no different from what I did now. It's just that he stood higher and could wield more power..." "Given enough time, I can also achieve it." Li Fan gently touched the tip of his right index finger, as if wiping away nonexistent dust. "This move, from top to bottom, is like a True Immortal's descending finger..." "Let's call it the [Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger]!" "It represents both a True Immortal descending to the mortal world, and the power of a True Immortal subjugating the mortal world." "Not bad!" Li Fan was quite pleased with his naming. Sensing the divine senses investigating the area due to the inexplicable destruction of this minor world, Li Fan turned into a sword shadow and left directly. The barren minor world was too small; even if it disappeared, it would not affect the overall stability of the Xuanhuang Realm. Returning to Great Xuan, Li Fan, while savoring the feeling of using the [Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger], pondered how to unleash this divine ability more easily in the future. Although the Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger possessed world-destroying power, its drawbacks were also obvious. The time required to cast it was too long. Just climbing to a certain height required Li Fan to accumulate power for a long time. Then, he had to gather Origin Force essence to act freely at that specific altitude... If the target was a world, it would be fine. After all, a world wouldn't run away, and its position wouldn't change. But if the target was a cultivator, he might not give Li Fan such a long preparation time. "First, use formations to ambush them in advance and trap them, buying me enough time." "Secondly..." Li Fan's current cultivation level, among which the [Formation Dao] was the highest. Now that he had comprehended a near-immortal divine ability but could not unleash it freely, he habitually wanted to find a breakthrough from formations. "All the Great Daos in the world originate from the same source. Divine abilities can be transformed into formations, and formations can be transformed into divine abilities..." Ever since he ascended to the peak, Li Fan felt that his thoughts were unprecedentedly active. The bird's-eye view allowed him to ponder the encountered problems from a perspective beyond the mortal realm. "End Separation Disc, deduce!" Temporarily suspending all other tasks, Li Fan poured all his encounters at the foot of the high wall and the insights from casting the Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger into it. Because the requirement to directly transform this divine ability into a formation clearly exceeded the End Separation Disc's processing capabilities, the End Separation Disc manifested a state of lag by simulating personalities. Seeing this, Li Fan pondered briefly. Then, he changed his strategy. He did not aspire to directly transform the Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger into a corresponding formation. Instead, he transformed the casting steps of the divine ability into successive tiered formations. Just like how several ancient immortal formations ultimately constituted the Xuanhuang Realm's Star Crossing Great Array, Li Fan planned to use several sequential formations to achieve the rapid casting of the Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger. "The first step, naturally, is [Ascending Height]." Li Fan had personally climbed several times and had a preliminary understanding of this process. The so-called ascending height was, in reality, to stimulate energy and elevate its "potential" in this region of the Star Sea. "To find a method to accomplish this, perhaps we need to collect enough residual True Immortal power, just as the Profound Immortal Boat planned, and then use the high wall to concentrate and release it." "However, on one hand, I'm not expecting to overturn the high wall with a single finger now, so the required stimulation energy is not as terrifying as imagined." "On the other hand..." In Li Fan's mind flashed the scene of the peaks gathered in the depths of the Utmost Darkness Sea. "Perhaps we can draw inspiration from the [Spirit Gathering Ascension Array]." Li Fan mused inwardly. "The Spirit Gathering Ascension Array can easily form energy peaks rarely seen in the Utmost Darkness Sea because it is itself built upon True Immortal remains." "If we also use True Immortal remains as the formation material..." Li Fan's thoughts instantly opened. A red light flashed in his hand. It was the remaining True Immortal flesh and blood that had been activated by ancient characters on Ou Shangtian's Kun Qian bone hand. "There is no Immortal Spiritual Power, but it is still True Immortal related, so it should be somewhat helpful, right?" Li Fan muttered, using this mass of True Immortal flesh and blood as raw material to begin the first trial. With the Spirit Gathering Ascension Array as a template, the derivation process of the End Separation Disc was smooth. Soon, a nascent formation took shape. Li Fan used Origin Force essence to set up the formation, mixing in the continuously writhing True Immortal flesh and blood. After a long while, when everything was ready, Li Fan narrowed his eyes, studied it, and activated the formation. A moment of silence followed. Then, an incredibly dazzling pillar of light was born within the formation. Fueled by the True Immortal flesh and blood, the light was dazzling to the extreme. What made Li Fan even more delighted was that in his perspective, this light pillar was not just bright. It was slowly rising, ascending, and surpassing all beings! "It went so smoothly?" The thought had just appeared in his mind when the light pillar, which seemed capable of illuminating the entire sky, suddenly extinguished. Li Fan was stunned at first. After some inspection, he finally realized that there was no problem with the formation. It was simply that the True Immortal flesh and blood used as fuel had been completely consumed. Li Fan frowned slightly: "The utilization rate is still too low." "We can still find ways to improve it." "Also, it's not just Kun Qian's bone hand." "The Xuanhuang Realm should have other True Immortal remains, and perhaps we can collect them all..." The purpose of the Ascension Array was not just to quickly cast the [Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger]. Being able to elevate the current "potential" might play an indispensable role in crossing the high wall in the future, and even in achieving True Immortality. Li Fan attached great importance to this. Temporarily putting aside all other external matters, Li Fan focused all his attention on studying it. With the End Separation Disc's derivation and Li Fan's personal guidance and modification, the Ascension Formation underwent thousands of iterations in just seven days, finally achieving a utilization efficiency of True Immortal flesh and blood that was barely satisfactory to Li Fan.

Chapter 1330: Immortals Fall, All Things Vanish

Li Fan began a new round of experiments. This time, after the fist-sized True Immortal flesh and blood was burned out, the resulting altitude was sufficient to activate the [Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger], easily crushing a minor world of the same scale as Great Xuan.

"It is estimated that to achieve the effect of destroying Xuanhuang with a single finger, at least True Immortal flesh and blood the size of a whole person would need to be burned..." Li Fan pondered in silence.

"Compared to the utilization efficiency of True Immortals, there is still a huge gap. But this is already the limit of what I can do now. Perhaps as my strength increases in the future, I will find more suitable improvement methods."

With the first and most crucial step resolved, the subsequent derivation work proceeded smoothly. The End Separation Disc successfully replicated the Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger divine ability using eight sequential formations. With the assistance of the End Separation Disc, and with all materials complete, Li Fan could complete the formation in an instant, making it a instantaneous divine ability.

"Unfortunately, it is composed of formations after all, not as natural as one's own divine ability. If I were to face an opponent skilled in formations, they might exploit the loopholes between the sequential formations and break this divine ability with ease."

"In this Utmost Darkness Star Sea, there should be no one whose formation skills surpass mine. But beyond the high wall, it's hard to say..."

"Regardless, the priority is to collect enough True Immortal flesh and blood for research, and also to prevent them from developing self-awareness due to their large numbers when they gather."

Li Fan stood in the void above the Great Profound Minor World, gazing at the world outside, pondering his recent encounters. He had a more profound understanding of promoting the birth of the Super Xuanhuang Realm in this life.

"If achieving immortality is a process of a person climbing upwards."

"Then what I've planned is to push the entire Xuanhuang Realm to ascend to the other side."

Li Fan's eyes flickered, his thoughts churning: "Currently, achieving immortality as an individual is already impossible, let alone promoting the sublimation of a world."

"In fact, if it weren't for the strand of Immortal Spiritual Power left by Mr. Bai, I wouldn't even consider this. It was only after witnessing the changes in the Xuanhuang Realm after it was contaminated with Immortal Spiritual Power in my previous life that I gained some confidence."

"Promoting the sublimation of the world might have been what the Heavenly Physician had been planning all along. However, the world he wanted to promote was not Xuanhuang, but the Heavenly Law. But this life is destined to be intercepted by me!"

Li Fan felt no guilt: "With the Ascension Array, perhaps I can utilize that strand of Immortal Spiritual Power more efficiently. But whether to inject burning True Immortal flesh and blood during the world's sublimation process..."

Li Fan pondered for a moment, and finally decided to find a small world for an experiment first. Although theoretically, after the True Immortal flesh and blood was burned by the formation, nothing would remain, Li Fan still vaguely felt that there might be some changes within that he could not yet discern.

The target minor world chosen this time was even smaller than the barren minor world crushed by a finger before. It had little vegetation, a complete life desert. After using the Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger to sever its connection with the Xuanhuang Realm, Li Fan dragged it through the void opened by the Rift Cracking Whales.

Only when he was completely far from the main Xuanhuang Realm, ensuring that no disaster would affect it even if something happened, did Li Fan finally stop.

"Legend has it that Immortals can pluck stars and capture the moon. My method is not bad."

Using formations instead of divine abilities, casting it felt completely effortless, even appearing somewhat elegant. However, the rapid consumption of True Immortal flesh and blood inevitably made Li Fan feel a pang of heartache.

"After this experiment, the inventory will be completely depleted. I'll have to accumulate for a while longer."

In the void, Li Fan looked at the minor world below and began to arrange the Ascension Formation throughout the world.

"Besides this, let's also examine the effect of the character [Creation]."

Due to his vigilance against potential Dao-claiming True Immortals, Li Fan had been using the [Creation] character purely as a tool, without attempting to comprehend the profound truths it contained, even after learning about it. In this experiment, Li Fan deliberately distorted its usage. He did not use the fully comprehended form of the [Creation] character.

With all preparations complete, the Ascension Formation was instantly activated. In countless corners of the world, peaks rose like heavenly pillars, lifting the entire world. As the "altitude" climbed, all sorts of wondrous changes occurred in this life desert. Vegetation and trees, as if experiencing millions of years of evolution in the blink of an eye, transformed from a shallow layer covering the surface to towering, continuous primeval forests. The monotonous landscape of the world's surface also began to differentiate and evolve, with majestic natural scenery like high mountains and deep valleys appearing.

"This change did not occur in cultivators like us."

"Until reaching the highest point, the cultivator's body does not change with the increase in altitude. But for the 'world,' it's different."

"It's not a linear increase, but there is indeed feedback at all times."

Watching the magnificent scenes happening in the world below, Li Fan felt waves of enlightenment surging within him. The world's ascension continued as the True Immortal flesh and blood burned. Clearly, more energy was needed the higher it went. The evolutionary spectacle of the world gradually stalled.

"It has reached its limit." Li Fan knew this, not expecting the True Immortal flesh and blood provided this time to push the minor world to any significant height. He stared intently below, observing the changes after the "ascension" was completed.

The True Immortal flesh and blood was completely consumed. The minor world, which had been constantly rumbling, suddenly fell into an eerie silence. It was as if it had been paused. The wind, clouds, air, and even all life within the world were frozen by some unknown force, motionless.

"Hmm?" Li Fan seemed to sense something, and his expression changed slightly. The wooden sword phantom unsheathed, carrying him rapidly away, escaping the void range where the minor world was located.

Not long after Li Fan left, a terrifying disaster befell that minor world. Cracks erupted from within the world. Initially only three or five, xuyên through heaven and earth. Then the cracks continued to spread, quickly covering every corner of the world. Like falling heavily from a great height.

The minor world, which had been temporarily sublimated by Li Fan's formation power, finally returned to its original position. It instantly shattered into pieces! Unlike the silent destruction by the Nine Heavens Descending Dust Finger, the minor world falling from a great height caused a violent collision with the void where the Xuanhuang Realm was located.

Like a massive boulder falling into a pool, invisible ripples spread outwards from the point of the minor world's destruction. Like a howling gale, Li Fan's figure remained motionless, but the clothes on his body fluttered wildly.

Li Fan looked back at the Xuanhuang Realm. Although the Xuanhuang Realm itself would not be harmed by this accidental fall, this hurricane did cause the Xuanhuang Realm to shake slightly.

"It seems the 'flies' will be attracted again." Li Fan sensed the approach of Daosmic energy from the Myriad Immortals Alliance, but did not immediately evade. He had not forgotten the main purpose of this experiment.

Li Fan's divine sense probed the area where the world had fallen. It seemed no wreckage remained. Everything within the minor world had turned to dust in this fall. However, the black energy, which had formed after the True Immortal flesh and blood was decomposed by the white circle to dust, had not vanished with the disappearance of the world. It still floated quietly in the void.

"What exactly is this black energy?"

"Using True Immortal flesh and blood as fuel does indeed cause it to be hidden within the world."

Having obtained the desired result, Li Fan waved his large hand, and the golden net of Origin Force essence enveloped the black energy, making them flee away from this place.

Shortly after Li Fan left, a figure arrived late. If Li Fan were still there, he would have recognized this person as the leader of the Dharma Transmitters, Jiang the Dharma Transmitter. Jiang the Dharma Transmitter was stationed in the realm of Gui Xu and rarely went out. He only appeared when the Xuanhuang Realm encountered a world-ending calamity that ordinary Dharma Transmitters could not resolve. This time, it was merely a minor disturbance caused by the fall of a world, yet it inexplicably drew him out.

The Dharma Transmitter Jiang arrived at the origin of the disturbance, looking at the void where there were no longer any traces, lost in thought. He looked around but found no clues, and couldn't help but frown slightly.

After searching for a long time, finding nothing, the Dharma Transmitter Jiang was about to leave, when his eyes suddenly sharpened, and he looked back at the place where the world had fallen. The black energy, which Li Fan had thought he had completely collected, had actually reappeared.

Upon seeing this black energy, the Dharma Transmitter Jiang's expression dramatically changed. As if he had seen it before and was very familiar with it, the Dharma Transmitter Jiang did not hesitate. He opened his mouth wide and swallowed the black energy, and even the space within the range of the fall, in one gulp.

After consuming the black energy, the Dharma Transmitter Jiang's face visibly aged. Dark patterns surged from his body like a tide of ink, threatening to engulf him. Facing such a terrifying scene, the Dharma Transmitter Jiang's eyes remained incredibly calm. A ripple appeared from the center of his chest. The Dharma Transmitter Jiang's body, under the ripple, also began to tremble like the surface of a disturbed calm water.

In rhythmic vibrations, the Dharma Transmitter Jiang, along with the black energy and space he had swallowed, slowly faded. Finally, they disappeared. No more black energy emerged from that falling point, as if nothing had happened from the beginning...

Li Fan would never know that the "flies" he had perceived, the Myriad Immortals Alliance, had unknowingly solved a major problem for him. If the Dharma Transmitter had not timely cleared the black energy, it was possible that by the time Li Fan reacted, the black energy would have already silently encroached upon the Xuanhuang Realm. Li Fan's Dao Integration plan for this life might have been ruined.

At this moment, Li Fan was contemplating the reasons for the failure of his experiment.

"The world's ascension and the cultivator's ascension are fundamentally different."

"It's not just reflected in the process, but also in the outcome."

"When cultivators return to normal from a 'high place,' they only feel slight discomfort at most. Unlike the world's fall, which is so tragic."

"Perhaps it's because the world absorbed a large amount of energy during the ascension process."

Recalling the scenes he saw in the minor world during its sublimation, Li Fan couldn't help but ponder inwardly. Having obtained the result of the experiment first, a new problem now lay before Li Fan. After pushing the Xuanhuang Realm to ascend, and before it could evolve into Heavenly Immortal Souls for Li Fan to devour, it was necessary to find a way to anchor the Super Xuanhuang Realm's altitude. Otherwise, Li Fan might shatter into pieces along with the Xuanhuang Realm and be forced to return in disgrace before he could achieve Dao Integration.

"Ascending upwards only stabilizes when a certain node is reached. This node should be the boundary between Immortals and mortals."

"I wonder if my arrangements in this life are enough? If not, what method should I use to temporarily anchor the Xuanhuang Realm?"
